tika-s0105t:6_4: padaṃ padaṃ pati anukkamena vaṇṇanāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:6_6: uttānaṃ vā padamaññatra vaṇṇanāpi “anupubbapadavaṇṇanā” tveva vuccati.
tika-s0105t:6_11: Nanu mahāvagge mahāgovindasutte āgato esa purohito eva, na rājā,
tika-s0105t:6_13: Mahāgovindena purohitena pariggahitampi cetaṃ reṇunā nāma magadharājena pariggahitamevāti atthasambhavato evaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:6_14: na pana so rājasaddavacanīyabhāvena gahito tassa rājābhāvato.
tika-s0105t:6_17: idampi ca loke samudāciṇṇaṃ “rājakammapasutena katampi raññā kata”nti.
tika-s0105t:6_19: mandhāturaññā ceva mahāgovindaṃ bodhisattaṃ purohitamāṇāpetvā reṇuraññā ca aññehi ca rājūhi pariggahitattā rājagahanti.
tika-s0105t:6_20: Keci pana “mahāgovindo”ti mahānubhāvo eko purātano rājāti vadanti.
tika-s0105t:7_0: Aññepettha pakāreti nagaramāpanena raññā kāritasabbagehattā rājagahaṃ,
tika-s0105t:7_1: gijjhakūṭādīhi pañcahi pabbatehi parikkhittattā pabbatarājehi parikkhittagehasadisantipi rājagahaṃ,
tika-s0105t:7_3: susaṃvihitārakkhatāya anatthāvahitukāmena upagatānaṃ paṭirājūnaṃ gahaṃ gahaṇabhūtantipi rājagahaṃ,
tika-s0105t:7_4: rājūhi disvā sammā patiṭṭhāpitattā tesaṃ gahaṃ gehabhūtantipi rājagahaṃ,
tika-s0105t:7_6: nivāsasukhatādinā ca sattehi mamattavasena gayhati pariggayhatītipi rājagahanti edise pakāre.
tika-s0105t:7_8: So pana padeso visesaṭṭhānabhāvena uḷārasattaparibhogoti āha “taṃ paneta”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t:7_10: cakkavattikāle cā”ti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ aññadāpi kadāci sambhavato,
tika-s0105t:7_11: “nagaraṃ hotī”ti ca idaṃ upalakkhaṇameva manussāvāsasseva asambhavato.
tika-s0105t:8_5: mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati,
tika-s0105t:8_6: sabbanimittānaṃ amanasikārā animittaṃ cetosamādhiṃ upasampajja viharatī”tiādīsu saddantarasannidhānasiddhena
tika-s0105t:9_2: Kasmā pana saddantarasannidhānasiddhassa visesaparāmasanassābhāvepi idha visesavihārasamaṅgīparidīpanaṃ sambhavatīti?
tika-s0105t:9_4: Visesavacane hi asati visesamicchatā viseso payojitabboti.
tika-s0105t:9_5: Apica iriyāpathasamāyogaparidīpanassa atthato siddhattā tathādīpanameva sambhavatīti.
tika-s0105t:9_8: Kadācipi hi iriyāpathavihārena vinā na bhavati tamantarena attabhāvapariharaṇābhāvatoti.
tika-s0105t:10_4: Na hi ṭhānanisajjādiavatthāhi vinā kañci kāyikaṃ kiriyaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkā,
tika-s0105t:10_11: tattha bahulaṃ pavattiyā brahmapārisajjādidevaloke bhavoti attho,
tika-s0105t:10_19: 86 (atthato samānaṃ)] pana catasso āruppasamāpattiyo āneñjavihārāti visuṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:10_20: taṃ pana mettājjhānādīnaṃ brahmavihāratā viya tāsaṃ bhāvanāvisesabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:10_21: Aṭṭhakathāsu pana dibbabhāvāvahasāmaññato tāpi “dibbavihārā” tveva vuttā.
tika-s0105t:10_23: brahmabhūtā vā hitūpasaṃhārādivasena pavattiyā seṭṭhabhūtā vihārāti brahmavihārā,
tika-s0105t:11_0: Aññataravihārasamaṅgīparidīpananti tāsamekato appavattattā ekena vā dvīhi vā samaṅgībhāvaparidīpanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:11_2: Bhagavā hi lobhadosamohussanne loke sakapaṭipattiyā veneyyānaṃ vinayanatthaṃ taṃ taṃ vihāre upasampajja viharati.
tika-s0105t:11_3: Tathā hi yadā sattā kāmesu vippaṭipajjanti,
tika-s0105t:11_4: tadā kira bhagavā dibbena vihārena viharati tesaṃ alobhakusalamūluppādanatthaṃ “appeva nāma imaṃ paṭipattiṃ
tika-s0105t:11_7: tadā brahmavihārena viharati tesaṃ adosakusalamūluppādanatthaṃ “appeva nāma imaṃ paṭipattiṃ disvā ettha rucimuppādetvā adosena dosaṃ vūpasameyyu”nti.
tika-s0105t:11_9: tadā ariyavihārena viharati tesaṃ amohakusalamūluppādanatthaṃ “appeva nāma imaṃ paṭipattiṃ disvā ettha rucimuppādetvā amohena mohaṃ vūpasameyyu”nti.
tika-s0105t:11_10: Evañca katvā imehi dibbabrahmaariyavihārehi sattānaṃ vividhaṃ hitasukhaṃ harati,
tika-s0105t:11_11: iriyāpathavihārena ca ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ
tika-s0105t:12_4: Tathā vadamāno pana viharatīti ettha vi-
tika-s0105t:12_6: “haratī”ti etassa ca neti pavattetīti atthoti ñāpeti “ṭhitopī”tiādinā vicchedanayanākārena vuttattā.
tika-s0105t:12_7: Evañhi sati tattha kassa kena vicchindanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:12_10: Yadipi bhagavā ekeneva iriyāpathena cirataraṃ kālaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0105t:12_11: tathāpi upādinnakassa nāma sarīrassa ayaṃ sabhāvoti dassetuṃ “ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhana”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:12_14: Yasmā pana bhagavā yattha katthaci vasanto veneyyānaṃ dhammaṃ desento,
tika-s0105t:12_15: nānāsamāpattīhi ca kālaṃ vītināmento vasati, sattānaṃ,
tika-s0105t:12_17: tasmā vividhaṃ haratīti viharatīti evampettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:13_0: Gocaragāmanidassanatthaṃ “rājagahe”ti vatvā buddhānamanurūpanivāsaṭṭhānadassanatthaṃ puna “ambavane”ti vuttanti dassento “idamassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:13_4: sopi tassa samīpavasena vattabboti dasseti “rājagahasamīpe ambavane”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:13_10: bhumme pavattaṃ vā vacanaṃ vibhatti bhummavacanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:13_15: Tassamīpattā pana gocaragāmadassanatthaṃ bhummavacanavasena “rājagahe”tipi vuttaṃ yathā taṃ “gaṅgāyaṃ gāvo caranti,
tika-s0105t:13_21: Na hi “pāṭaliputte pāsāde vasatī”tiādīsu viya idha adhikaraṇādhikaraṇassa abhāvato adhikaraṇassa dvayaniddeso
tika-s0105t:13_22: yutto siyāti codanā anavakāsā katāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:13_26: Kasmā ca ambavanaṃ jīvakasambandhaṃ katvā vuttanti anuyogena mūlato paṭṭhāya tamatthaṃ dassento “ayaṃ panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:14_2: Siveyyakaṃ dussayuganti siviraṭṭhe jātaṃ mahagghaṃ dussayugaṃ.
tika-s0105t:14_3: Divasassa dvattikkhattunti ekasseva divasassa dvivāre vā tivāre vā bhāge,
tika-s0105t:14_5: ekasmiṃyeva divase dvivāraṃ vā tivāraṃ vāti attho.
tika-s0105t:14_9: “Taṃ sandhāyā”ti iminā na bhagavā ambavanamatteyeva viharati,
tika-s0105t:14_11: So pana tadadhikaraṇatāya visuṃ adhikaraṇabhāvena na vuttoti sandhāyabhāsitamatthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:15_5: tasmā paññāsāya ūnāni teḷasa bhikkhusatānīti atthaṃ viññāpetuṃ “aḍḍhasatenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:15_6: Aḍḍhameva sataṃ satassa vā aḍḍhaṃ tathā.
tika-s0105t:16_0: Rājatīti attano issariyasampattiyā dibbati sobhati ca.
tika-s0105t:16_3: attani vā rāgaṃ karotīti attho. Ca-
tika-s0105t:16_10: “Nemittakehi niddiṭṭho”ti vacanena ca ajātassa tassa sattubhāvo na tāva hoti,
tika-s0105t:16_11: sattubhāvassa pana tathā niddiṭṭhattā evaṃ voharīyatīti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:16_12: Ajātasseva pana tassa “rañño lohitaṃ piveyya”nti deviyā dohaḷassa pavattattā ajātoyevesa rañño sattūtipi vadanti.
tika-s0105t:17_10: Ayomayañhi rañño sarīraṃ upanetuṃ ayuttanti vadanti.
tika-s0105t:17_13: Kevalassa lohitassa gabbhiniyā dujjīrabhāvato udakena sambhinditvā pāyesi.
tika-s0105t:17_17: vitathaṃ vāti adhippāyena “puttoti vā dhītāti vā na paññāyatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:18_1: Samāse viya hi vākyepi mahantasaddassa mahādeso.
tika-s0105t:19_3: Sāmyatthe hetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ “divā divasassā”ti aññattha dassanato.
tika-s0105t:19_4: Divassa divasetipi vaṭṭati akārantassapi divasaddassa vijjamānattā.
tika-s0105t:19_14: Vuttappakāranti devadattena vuttākāraṃ vippakāranti apakāraṃ anupakāraṃ,
tika-s0105t:21_3: cittassa vā nānārammaṇesu vibbhamakaraṇato manaso ratho iva manoratho,
tika-s0105t:21_4: mano eva ratho viyāti vā manorathotipi neruttikā vadanti.
tika-s0105t:21_16: yassa kassaci gahaṇatthaṃ paṭicchanno unnataṅgoti idha adhippeto.
tika-s0105t:21_17: Tena vuttaṃ “uccaṅgaṃ katvā pavisituṃ mā dethā”ti.
tika-s0105t:21_23: Catumadhurenāti sappisakkaramadhunāḷikerasnehasaṅkhātehi catūhi madhurehi abhisaṅkhatapānavisesenāti vadanti,
tika-s0105t:21_25: Vuttañhi tattha “dadhi ca madhu ca sappi ca phāṇitañca ekajjhaṃ saṃsaṭṭha”nti,
tika-s0105t:21_26: tadaṭṭhakathāyañca vuttaṃ “dadhi ca madhu cāti suparisuddhaṃ dadhi ca sumadhuraṃ madhu ca.
tika-s0105t:21_27: Ekajjhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhanti ekato katvā missitaṃ āluḷitaṃ.
tika-s0105t:21_28: Tassa tanti tassa taṃ catumadhurabhesajjaṃ pivato”ti “attupakkamena maraṇaṃ na yutta”nti manasi katvā rājā tassā sarīraṃ lehitvā yāpeti.
tika-s0105t:22_7: Manaṃ karothāti yathā rañño manaṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:22_15: Taṃ pana manopadosavaseneva tena katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathāha –
tika-s0105t:24_0: Manasā ce paduṭṭhena, bhāsati vā karoti vā;
tika-s0105t:25_0: Tato naṃ dukkhamanveti, cakkaṃva vahato pada”nti. ;
tika-s0105t:26_1: Abhedepi bhedamiva vohāro loke pākaṭoti vuttaṃ “yakkho hutvā nibbattī”ti.
tika-s0105t:26_5: paṭisandhivasena vā pavattanasaṅkhātaṃ sātisayanibbattanaṃ ñāpetuṃ ekāyeva kiriyā padadvayena vuttā.
tika-s0105t:26_6: Tathāvacanañhi paṭisandhivasena nibbattaneyeva dissati “makkaṭako nāma devaputto hutvā nibbatti kaṇṭako nāma…pe… nibbatti,
tika-s0105t:26_9: Dvinnaṃ vā padānaṃ bhāvatthamapekkhitvā “yakkho”tiādīsu sāmiatthe paccattavacanaṃ kataṃ purimāya pacchimavisesanato,
tika-s0105t:26_14: Assa pana rañño mahāpuññassapi samānassa tattha bahulaṃ nibbattapubbatāya ciraparicitanikanti vasena tattheva nibbatti veditabbā.
tika-s0105t:27_2: taṃsahajātapīti vegassa ca savipphāratāya taṃ samuṭṭhānarūpadhammehi pharaṇavasena sakalasarīraṃ āloḷetvā.
tika-s0105t:29_4: Pañca vatthūnīti “sādhu bhante bhikkhū yāvajīvaṃ āraññikā assū”tiādinā vinaye vuttāni pañca vatthūni.
tika-s0105t:29_5: Yācitvāti ettha yācanaṃ viya katvāti attho.
tika-s0105t:29_6: Na hi so paṭipajjitukāmo yācatīti ayamattho vinaye vuttoyeva.
tika-s0105t:29_9: so pana akatepi saṅghabhede tehi saññāpetiyeva.
tika-s0105t:29_12: Vitthārakathānayoti ajātasattupasādanādivasena vitthārato vattabbāya kathāya nayamattaṃ.
tika-s0105t:29_14: nanu saṅgītikathā viya khandhake āgatāpi sā vattabbāti codanāya āha “āgatattā pana sabbaṃ na vutta”nti,
tika-s0105t:29_16: kiñcimattassa ca vacanakkamassa vuttattā na ettha koci virodhoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:30_1: Nanu videhassa rañño dhītā vedehīti attho sambhavatīti codanamapaneti “na videharañño”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:30_5: Ayaṃ pana padattho kena nibbacanenāti vuttaṃ “tatrāya”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t:31_6: Ettha ca sīlenāti sāsane ariyuposathaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:31_11: Tathā hi gopālakuposatho abhijjhāsahagatassa cittassa vasena vutto,
tika-s0105t:31_13: Yathāha visākhuposathe “so tena abhijjhāsahagatena cetasā divasaṃ atināmetī”ti,
tika-s0105t:31_15: musāvāde tasmiṃ samaye samādapetī”ti ca ādi.
tika-s0105t:32_0: Evaṃ adhippetatthānurūpaṃ nibbacanaṃ dassetvā idāni atthuddhāravasena nibbacanānurūpaṃ adhippetatthaṃ dassetuṃ “ayaṃ panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:32_2: Samānasaddavacanīyānaṃ anekappabhedānaṃ atthānamuddharaṇaṃ atthuddhāro samānasaddavacanīyesu vā atthesu
tika-s0105t:32_5: Nanu ca “atthamattaṃ pati saddā abhinivisantī”tiādinā atthuddhāre codanā,
tika-s0105t:32_7: Apica visesasaddassa avācakabhāvato pātimokkhuddesādivisayopi uposathasaddo sāmaññarūpo eva,
tika-s0105t:32_10: ayaṃ panattho tādisaṃ saddasāmaññamanādiyitvā tattha tattha sambhavatthadassanavaseneva vuttoti,
tika-s0105t:32_13: 1.150) upetehi samaggehi vasīyati na uṭṭhīyatīti uposatho,
tika-s0105t:32_16: adhiṭṭhānavasena vā upecca ariyavāsādiatthāya vasitabbo āvasitabboti uposatho, sīlaṃ.
tika-s0105t:32_19: Navamahatthikulapariyāpanne hatthināge kiñci kiriyamanapekkhitvā taṃkulasambhūtatāmattaṃ pati ruḷhivaseneva uposathoti samaññā,
tika-s0105t:32_23: Divase pana uposatha saddapavatti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttāyeva.
tika-s0105t:32_24: “Suddhassa ve sadāphaggū”tiādīsu suddhassāti sabbaso kilesamalābhāvena parisuddhassa.
tika-s0105t:32_30: Yassa hi sundarikabhāradvājassa nāma brāhmaṇassa phagguṇamāse uttaraphagguṇīyuttadivase titthanhānaṃ
tika-s0105t:32_32: Tato taṃ vivecetuṃ idaṃ majjhimāgamāvare mūlapaṇṇāsake vatthasutte bhagavatā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:32_34: vatasamādānāni ca asamādiyatopi niccakālaṃ uposathavāso eva bhavatīti attho.
tika-s0105t:32_35: “Na bhikkhave”tiādīsu “abhikkhuko āvāso na gantabbo”ti nīharitvā sambandho.
tika-s0105t:32_41: “Pannarase”ti padamārabbha divasavasena yathāvuttanibbacanaṃ katanti dassento “teneva vutta”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:32_42: Pañcadasannaṃ tithīnaṃ pūraṇavasena “pannaraso”ti hi divaso vutto.
tika-s0105t:33_0: “Tāni ettha santī”ti ettakeyeva vutte nanvetāni aññatthāpi santīti codanā siyāti taṃ nivāretuṃ “tadā kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:33_2: atisayato vā ettha taddhitavisayo payuttoti dasseti. Cātumāsī,
tika-s0105t:33_4: Pariyosānabhūtāti ca pūraṇabhāvameva sandhāya vadati tāya saheva catumāsaparipuṇṇabhāvato.
tika-s0105t:33_6: Tīhi ākārehi pūretīti puṇṇāti atthaṃ dasseti “māsapuṇṇatāyā”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:33_8: Purimapuṇṇamito hi paṭṭhāya yāva aparā puṇṇamī,
tika-s0105t:33_13: tāva eko kattikasaṃvaccharoti evaṃ saṃvaccharapuṇṇatāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:33_14: Lokikānaṃ matena pana māsavasena saṃvaccharasamaññā lakkhitā.
tika-s0105t:35_0: Tassa saṅkaṃ tatra vattabbaṃ, vassaṃ māsakamenevā”ti.
tika-s0105t:36_1: Tassa hi gatiyā divaso minitabbo “pāṭipado dutiyā,
tika-s0105t:36_3: Ettha puṇṇoti etissā rattiyā sabbakalāpāripūriyā puṇṇo.
tika-s0105t:36_5: tadā ca cando sabbāsampi soḷasannaṃ kalānaṃ vasena paripuṇṇo hutvā dissati.
tika-s0105t:36_6: Ettha ca “tadahuposathe pannarase”ti padāni divasavasena vuttāni,
tika-s0105t:37_1: na ekakovāti codanāya sodhanālesaṃ dassetuṃ pāḷipadatthameva avatvā “evarūpāyā”tiādīnipi vadati.
tika-s0105t:37_2: Etehi cāyaṃ sodhanāleso dassito “evaṃ ruciyamānāya rattiyā tadā pavattattā tathā parivuto nisinno”ti.
tika-s0105t:37_7: Abbhaṃ dhūmo rajo rāhūti ime cattāro upakkilesā pāḷinayena.
tika-s0105t:37_9: Atha vā anuyuttakarājūhi ceva amaccehi cāti attho.
tika-s0105t:37_12: sīhāsanamatho vāḷabījanitthī ca cāmara”nti hi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:37_20: puṇṇaghaṭehi ca paṭimaṇḍitaṃ gharesu dvāraṃ yassa tadetaṃ nagaraṃ pañca…pe… dvāraṃ.
tika-s0105t:37_24: Tathā hi ummādantijātakādīsupi kattikamāse evameva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:37_28: Tattha tattha nisinnavasena samānabhāgena pāṭiyekkaṃ nakkhattakīḷaṃ anubhavamānena samabhikiṇṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:37_29: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ evaṃ vatvāpi tattheva iti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katanti attho.
tika-s0105t:38_10: yaṃ vacanaṃ paṭiggāhaka nirapekkhaṃ kevalaṃ uḷārāya pītiyā vasena sarasato sahasāva mukhato niccharati,
tika-s0105t:39_0: Dosehi itā gatā apagatāti dosinā ta-
tika-s0105t:39_2: kāraṃ katvā yathā “kilese jito vijitāvīti jino”ti āha “dosāpagatā”ti.
tika-s0105t:39_3: Yadipi sutte vuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave candimasūriyānaṃ upakkilesā,
tika-s0105t:39_4: yehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhā candimasūriyā na tapanti na bhāsanti na virocanti.
tika-s0105t:39_9: tathāpi tatiyupakkilesassa pabhedadassana vasena aṭṭhakathānayena dassetuṃ “pañcahi upakkilesehī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:39_10: Ayamattho ca ramaṇīyādisaddayogato ñāyatīti āha “tasmā”tiādi. Anīya-
tika-s0105t:39_11: saddopi bahulā katvatthābhidhāyako yathā “niyyānikā dhammā”ti dasseti “ramayatī”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:39_17: Īdisāya rattiyā yutto divaso māso utu saṃvaccharoti evaṃ divasamāsādīnaṃ lakkhaṇā sallakkhaṇupāyā bhavituṃ yuttā,
tika-s0105t:39_19: sā eva lakkhaññā ya- vato ṇa-
tika-s0105t:40_0: “Yaṃ no payirupāsato cittaṃ pasīdeyyā”ti vacanato samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vāti ettha paramatthasamaṇo,
tika-s0105t:40_4: Bahati pāpe bahi karotīti brāhmaṇo niruttinayena.
tika-s0105t:40_6: ekavacane vā vattabbe bahuvacanaṃ vacanabyattayo vacanavipallāsoti attho.
tika-s0105t:40_7: Idha pana “payirupāsata”nti vattabbe “payirupāsato”ti vuttattā bahuvacane vattabbe ekavacanavasena vacanabyattayo dassito. Attani,
tika-s0105t:40_8: garuṭṭhāniye ca hi ekasmimpi bahuvacanappayogo niruḷho.
tika-s0105t:40_13: Tathā hi akkharacintakā vadanti “pariyādīnaṃ rayādivaṇṇassa yarādīhi vipariyāyo”ti.
tika-s0105t:41_3: tena yathā rājā ajātasattu attano pitu ariyasāvakassa satthu upaṭṭhākassa ghātanena mahāparādho,
tika-s0105t:41_4: evaṃ bhagavato mahānatthakarassa devadattassa apassayabhāvenāpīti imamatthaṃ upaneti.
tika-s0105t:41_7: taṃ pamukhaṃ katvā apassāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:41_8: Vikkhepapacchedanatthanti vakkhamānāya attano kathāya uppajjanakavikkhepassa pacchindanatthaṃ,
tika-s0105t:43_2: imamatthameva vā antogadhaṃ katvā pāḷiyamevaṃ vuttanti dasseti “tenāhā”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:43_3: Asatthāpi samāno satthā paṭiññāto yenāti satthupaṭiññāto,
tika-s0105t:43_4: tassa abuddhassāpi samānassa buddhapaṭiññātassa “ahameko loke atthadhammānusāsako”ti ācariyapaṭiññātabhāvaṃ vā sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:43_5: “So kirā”tiādinā anussutimattaṃ pati porāṇaṭṭhakathānayova kirasaddena vutto.
tika-s0105t:43_7: Ekūnadāsasataṃ pūrayamānoti ekenūnadāsasataṃ attanā saddhiṃ anūnadāsasataṃ katvā pūrayamāno.
tika-s0105t:43_10: yathā vā sattā anivatthā apārutā jāyanti,
tika-s0105t:43_13: Tadeva pabbajjaṃ aggahesīti tadeva naggarūpaṃ “ayameva pabbajjā nāma siyā”ti pabbajjaṃ katvā aggahesi.
tika-s0105t:44_2: Assa atthīti assa satthupaṭiññātassa parivārabhāvena atthi.
tika-s0105t:44_8: taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ gaṇe eva loke saṅgha-
tika-s0105t:44_13: Tattha labbhamānāppicchataṃ dassetuṃ “appicchatāya vatthampi na nivāsetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:44_14: Na hi tasmiṃ sāsanike viya santaguṇaniggūhaṇalakkhaṇā appicchatā labbhati.
tika-s0105t:44_16: Taranti etena saṃsāroghanti evaṃ sammatatāya laddhi titthaṃ nāma “sādhū”ti sammato,
tika-s0105t:44_18: Na hi tassa sādhūhi sammatatā labbhati.
tika-s0105t:44_22: “Imāni me vatasamādānāni ettakaṃ kālaṃ suciṇṇānī”ti bahū rattiyo jānāti.
tika-s0105t:44_23: Tā panassa rattiyo cirakālabhūtāti katvā “ciraṃ pabbajitassā”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:44_25: Atha tassa padadvayassa ko visesoti ce?
tika-s0105t:44_29: Kiṃ pana atthaṃ sandhāya so amacco āhāti vuttaṃ “acirapabbajitassā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:44_32: Kittako pana soti āha “dve tayo rājaparivaṭṭe”ti, dvinnaṃ,
tika-s0105t:44_34: “Addhagato”ti vatvāpi puna kataṃ vayaggahaṇaṃ osānavayāpekkhaṃ padadvayassa atthavisesasambhavatoti dasseti “pacchimavaya”nti iminā.
tika-s0105t:45_3: Pubbe pitarā saddhiṃ satthu santikaṃ gantvā desanāya sutapubbataṃ sandhāyāha “jhānā…pe… kāmo”ti.
tika-s0105t:45_6: So hi disvā tena saddhiṃ allāpasallāpaṃ katvā,
tika-s0105t:45_7: tato akiriyavādaṃ sutvā ca anattamano ahosi.
tika-s0105t:45_11: kasmā tuṇhī ahosīti codanaṃ visodheti “anattamano samānopī”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:46_2: Vassānakāle gunnaṃ patiṭṭhitasālāyāti pana atthe tabbasena tassa nāmaṃ sātisayamupapannaṃ hoti bahulamanaññasādhāraṇattā,
tika-s0105t:46_3: tathāpi so porāṇehi ananussutoti ekaccavādo nāma kato.
tika-s0105t:46_4: “Mā khalīti sāmiko āhā”ti iminā tathāvacanamupādāya tassa ākhyātapadena samaññāti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:46_5: Saññāya hi vattumicchāya ākhyātapadampi nāmikaṃ bhavati yathā “aññāsikoṇḍañño”ti.
tika-s0105t:48_3: saddena bhojanaṃ bhuñjitvāpi kenaci asucinā makkhitvāpīti imamatthaṃ sampiṇḍeti.
tika-s0105t:48_5: tathārūpe anupagamanīyaṭṭhāne puna vataṃ samādāya gacchatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:51_6: Yathādhippāyaṃ na vattatīti katvā “anattho vata me”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:51_9: tasmā tadeva tuṇhībhāvaṃ pucchitvā kathāpanena mama adhippāyo sampādetabboti ayamettha rañño adhippāyoti dassento “hatthimhi kho panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:51_10: Kinti kāraṇapucchāyaṃ nipātoti dasseti “kena kāraṇenā”ti iminā,
tika-s0105t:51_12: kiṃ taṃ kāraṇanti vā atthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:51_13: Tattha yathāsambhavaṃ kāraṇaṃ uddharitvā adhippāyaṃ dassetuṃ “imesa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:51_14: Yathā etesanti etesaṃ kulūpako atthi yathā,
tika-s0105t:51_15: imesaṃ nu kho tiṇṇaṃ kāraṇānaṃ aññatarena kāraṇena tuṇhī bhavasīti pucchatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:52_1: Pañcapatiṭṭhitenāti ettha pañcahi aṅgehi abhimukhaṃ ṭhitenāti attho,
tika-s0105t:52_2: pādajāṇu kappara hattha sīsasaṅkhātāni pañca aṅgāni samaṃ katvā onāmetvā abhimukhaṃ ṭhitena paṭhamaṃ vanditvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:52_3: Yampi vadanti “navakatarenupāli bhikkhunā vuḍḍhatarassa bhikkhuno pāde vandantena ime pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ
tika-s0105t:52_11: Kāmaṃ sabbāpi tathāgatassa paṭipatti anaññasādhāraṇā acchariyabbhutarūpāva,
tika-s0105t:52_12: tathāpi gabbhokkanti abhijāti abhinikkhamana abhisambodhi dhammacakkappavattana yamakapāṭihāriyadevorohanāni sadevake loke ativiya supākaṭāni,
tika-s0105t:52_13: na sakkā kenaci paṭibāhitunti tāniyevettha uddhaṭāni.
tika-s0105t:53_0: Itthaṃ imaṃ pakāraṃ bhūto pattoti itthambhūto,
tika-s0105t:53_3: Atha vā itthaṃ evaṃpakāro bhūto jātoti itthambhūto,
tika-s0105t:53_7: Abbhuggatoti ettha hi abhisaddo padhānavasena itthambhūtākhyānatthajotako kammappavacanīyo abhibhavitvā uggamanakiriyāpakārassa dīpanato,
tika-s0105t:53_8: tena payogato “taṃ kho pana bhagavanta”nti idaṃ upayogavacanaṃ sāmiatthe samānampi appadhānavasena itthambhūtākhyānatthadīpanato
tika-s0105t:53_11: Nanu ca “sādhu devadatto mātaramabhī”ti ettha viya “taṃ kho pana bhagavanta”nti ettha abhisaddo appayutto,
tika-s0105t:53_16: yathā “sādhu devadatto mātaramabhī”ti ettha abhisaddapayogato itthambhūtākhyāne upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0105t:53_17: evamidhāpi “taṃ kho pana bhagavantaṃ abhi evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo uggato”ti abhisaddapayogato itthambhūtākhyāne upayogavacanaṃ katanti.
tika-s0105t:53_18: Yathā hi “sādhu devadatto mātaramabhī”ti ettha “devadatto mātaramabhi mātuvisaye,
tika-s0105t:53_21: sāmivacanassa vā pasaṅge itthambhūtākhyānajotakena kammappavacanīyena abhisaddena payogato upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0105t:53_22: evamidhāpi sāmiatthe sāmivacanappasaṅge yathā ca tattha “devadatto mātuvisaye,
tika-s0105t:53_23: mātu sambandhī vā sādhuttappakārappatto”ti ayamattho viññāyati,
tika-s0105t:53_24: evamidhāpi “bhagavato sambandhī kittisaddo abbhuggato abhibhavitvā uggamanappakārappatto”ti ayamattho viññāyati.
tika-s0105t:53_25: Tattha hi devadattaggahaṇaṃ viya idha kittisaddaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0105t:54_2: kalyāṇehi guṇehi samannāgato tabbisayatāya yuttoti attho.
tika-s0105t:54_6: Seṭṭhaguṇavisayatā eva hi kittisaddassa seṭṭhatā “bhagavāti vacanaṃ seṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0105t:54_9: saddanīyato ca vaṇṇoyeva kittisaddo nāmāti āha “kittiyevā”ti.
tika-s0105t:54_14: Kittivasena pavatto saddo kittisaddoti bhinnādhikaraṇataṃ dasseti “thutighoso”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:54_20: anaññasādhāraṇe guṇe ārabbha pavattattā abhibyāpetvāti attho. Kinti-
tika-s0105t:54_21: saddo abbhuggatoti codanāya “itipi so bhagavā”tiādimāhāti anusandhiṃ dassetuṃ “kintī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:55_1: So bhagavāti yo so samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho
tika-s0105t:55_2: devānamatidevo sakkānamatisakko brahmānamatibrahmā lokanātho bhāgyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi sadevake loke
tika-s0105t:55_7: Tenāha āyasmā dhammasenāpati “bhagavāti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kataṃ,
tika-s0105t:55_10: Yathā kammaṭṭhānikena“araha”ntiādīsu navasu ṭhānesu paccekaṃ itipisaddaṃ yojetvā buddhaguṇā anussarīyanti,
tika-s0105t:55_13: Evañhi sati“araha”ntiādīhi navahi padehi ye sadevake loke ativiya pākaṭā paññātā buddhaguṇā,
tika-s0105t:55_14: te nānappakārato vibhāvitā honti “itipī”ti padadvayena tesaṃ nānappakāratādīpanato.
tika-s0105t:55_20: tāni ca guṇasallakkhaṇakāraṇāni saddhāsampannānaṃ viññujātikānaṃ paccakkhāni honti,
tika-s0105t:55_21: tasmā tāni saṃkittentena viññunā cittassa sammukhībhūtāneva katvā saṃkittetabbānīti dassento “iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti āha.
tika-s0105t:56_10: evaṃ taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāya paramatthamañjūsāyaṃ nesaṃ vitthāro gahetabbo.
tika-s0105t:57_0: Yasmā jīvako bahuso satthu santike buddhaguṇe sutvā ṭhito,
tika-s0105t:57_3: tasmā so evaṃ vitthārato eva āhāti vuttaṃ “jīvako panā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:58_2: Kammantarāyavasena hissa rañño guṇasarīraṃ khatūpahataṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:58_3: Kasmā panesa jīvakameva gamanasajjāya āṇāpetīti āha “imāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:59_3: Hatthiyānesu ca nibbisevanameva gaṇhanto hatthiniyopi kappāpesi.
tika-s0105t:59_4: Padānupadanti padamanugataṃ padaṃ purato gacchantassa hatthiyānassa pade tesaṃ padaṃ katvā,
tika-s0105t:60_12: “Rañño āsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ āsannacārībhāvena hatthinīsu itthiyo nisajjāpitā”ti ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:60_13: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “itthiyo nissāya purisānaṃ bhayaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-s0105t:60_14: sukhaṃ itthiparivuto gamissāmī”ti tattha kāraṇaṃ vuttameva.
tika-s0105t:60_15: Imināpi kāraṇena bhavitabbanti pana ācariyena evaṃ vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-s0105t:60_16: Rañño paresaṃ dūrupasaṅkamanabhāvadassanatthaṃ tā purisavesaṃ gāhāpetvā āvudhahatthā kāritā.
tika-s0105t:60_19: so ayuttova “pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehī”tiādīsu viya īdisesu pacchimapadassa samāsasseva dassanato.
tika-s0105t:60_20: Kassacidevāti sannipatite mahājane yassa kassaci eva,
tika-s0105t:60_21: tadaññesampi āyatiṃ maggaphalānamupanissayoti āha “sā mahājanassa upakārāya bhavissatī”ti.
tika-s0105t:63_6: Vijjādharataruṇā viyāti mantānubhāvena vijjāmayiddhisampannā vijjādharakumārakā viya.
tika-s0105t:63_12: “Anuyuttā bhavantu te”tiādīsu viya hi ṭīkāyaṃ vutto bhojasaddo bhojakavācakoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:63_20: Seṇiyoti gandhikaseṇīdussikaseṇīādayo “anapaloketvā rājānaṃ vā saṅghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā pūgaṃ vā seṇiṃ vā aññatra kappā vuṭṭhāpeyyā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0105t:63_23: Anekasaṅkhyā ca senā heṭṭhā gaṇitāti ayuttoyeva.
tika-s0105t:63_24: Tadā sabbāvudhato sarova dūragāmīti katvā sarapatanātikkamappamāṇena rañño parisaṃ saṃvidahati.
tika-s0105t:64_0: Sayaṃ bhāyanaṭṭhena cittutrāso bhayaṃ yathā tathā bhāyatīti katvā.
tika-s0105t:64_1: Bhāyitabbe eva vatthusmiṃ bhayato upaṭṭhite “bhāyitabbamida”nti bhāyitabbākārena tīraṇato ñāṇaṃ bhayaṃ bhayato tīretīti katvā.
tika-s0105t:64_8: Bhāyanaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ārammaṇaṃ bhayaṃ bhāyati etasmāti katvā.
tika-s0105t:64_9: Bhāyanahetuṭṭhena ottappaṃ bhayaṃ pāpato bhāyati etenāti katvā.
tika-s0105t:64_13: Yebhuyyenāti ṭhapetvā khīṇāsavadeve tadaññesaṃ vasena bāhullato.
tika-s0105t:64_14: Khīṇāsavattā hi tesaṃ cittutrāsabhayampi na uppajjati.
tika-s0105t:64_22: etaṃ naraṃ taṃ bhayabheravaṃ āgacchati nūnāti attho.
tika-s0105t:65_0: Bhīruṃ pasaṃsantīti pāpato bhāyanato utrāsanato bhīruṃ pasaṃsanti paṇḍitā.
tika-s0105t:65_1: Na hi tattha sūranti tasmiṃ pāpakaraṇe sūraṃ pagabbhadhaṃsinaṃ na hi pasaṃsanti.
tika-s0105t:65_2: Tenāha “bhayā hi santo na karonti pāpa”nti.
tika-s0105t:67_2: Ekekasmiṃ mahādvāre dve dve katvā catusaṭṭhi khuddakadvārāni.
tika-s0105t:68_14: Yathā hi mārisāti niddukkhatābhilāpo sadukkhepi nerayike vuccati “yadā kho te mārisa saṅkunā saṅku hadaye samāgaccheyyā”tiādīsu,
tika-s0105t:68_15: evaṃ yo koci sahāyo asamānavayopi “sammā”ti vuccatīti,
tika-s0105t:68_18: “Na palambhesī”ti vuttepi idha parikappatthova sambhavatīti vuttaṃ “na vippalambheyyāsī”ti,
tika-s0105t:69_3: “Abhikkama mahārājā”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “ete”tiādi vuttanti sasambandhamatthaṃ dassento “mahārāja corabalaṃ nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:71_4: Rañño sarīraṃ phari yathā taṃ soṇadaṇḍassa brāhmaṇassa bhagavato santikaṃ āgacchantassa antovanasaṇḍagatassa.
tika-s0105t:71_5: “Attano aparādhaṃ saritvā mahābhayaṃ uppajjī”ti idaṃ sedamuñcanassa kāraṇadassanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:71_6: Na hi buddhānubhāvato sedamuñcanaṃ sambhavati kāyacittapassaddhihetubhāvato.
tika-s0105t:72_4: So hi tadā nāgarehi pūjitadhanarāsino labbhanato “dhanapālo”ti voharīyati.
tika-s0105t:72_6: atha kho pakatiyāpi bhagavā saññātoti dassetuṃ “bhagavā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:72_11: Nanu ca bhagavato santike issariyalīlāya pucchā agāravoyeva siyāti codanāya “pakati hesā”tiādimāha,
tika-s0105t:72_13: Parivāretvā nisinnena bhikkhusaṅghena pure katepi atthato tassa purato nisinno nāma.
tika-s0105t:73_4: tenūpasaṅkamīti sampattabhāvassa vuttattā idha upagamanameva yuttanti āha “upagato”ti.
tika-s0105t:73_5: Anucchavike ekasmiṃ padeseti yattha viññujātikā aṭṭhaṃsu, tasmiṃ.
tika-s0105t:75_0: Na kacche no paṭivāte, na cāpi onatunnate;
tika-s0105t:76_0: Ime dose vissajjetvā, ekamantaṃ ṭhitā ahū”ti. ;
tika-s0105t:77_0: Tadā bhikkhusaṅghe tuṇhībhāvassa anavasesato byāpitabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūta”nti vicchāvacanaṃ vuttanti āha “yato…pe… mevā”ti,
tika-s0105t:77_7: Tattha pana cakkhuasaṃyamo sabbapaṭhamo dunnivārito cāti tadabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍita”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:78_7: vācasikena upasamena laddhena mānasikopi upasamo anumānato laddho evāti katvā “mānasikena cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:80_1: nanu bhagavantamuddissa rājā na kiñci vadatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:81_0: Katāparādhassa ālapanaṃ nāma dukkaranti sandhāya “mukhaṃ nappahotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:81_1: “Āgamā kho tvaṃ mahārāja yathāpema”nti vacananiddiṭṭhaṃ vā tadā tadatthadīpanākārena pavattaṃ nānānayavicittaṃ
tika-s0105t:81_2: bhagavato madhuravacanampi sandhāya evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:81_3: Ekampi hi atthaṃ bhagavā yathā sotūnaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0105t:81_5: Yaṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ “bhagavatā abyākataṃ tantipadaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-s0105t:83_1: Arahā lābhepi tādī, alābhepi, yasepi, ayasepi,
tika-s0105t:84_1: Arahato…pe… thambho, sārambho, māno, atimāno, mado, pamādo,
tika-s0105t:84_7: sabbā kusalābhisaṅkhārā cattā vantā muttā pahīnā paṭinissaṭṭhā,
tika-s0105t:85_5: sabbaṃ saṃsārapathaṃ tiṇṇo uttiṇṇo nittiṇṇo atikkanto samatikkanto vītivatto,
tika-s0105t:86_1: Arahato rāgā cittaṃ muttaṃ vimuttaṃ suvimuttaṃ, dosā, mohā, kodhā, upanāhā, makkhā, paḷāsā, issāya,
tika-s0105t:86_2: macchariyā, māyāya, sāṭheyyā, thambhā, sārambhā, mānā, atimānā, madā, pamādā,
tika-s0105t:88_2: Vuttampi cetaṃ bhagavatā kāḷakārāmasuttante “iti kho bhikkhave tathāgato diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu tādīyeva tādī,
tika-s0105t:88_3: tamhā ca pana tādimhā añño tādī uttaritaro vā paṇītataro vā natthīti vadāmī”ti.
tika-s0105t:88_4: Atha vā pañcavidhāriyiddhisiddhehi pañcahākārehi tādilakkhaṇe suppatiṭṭhitoti attho.
tika-s0105t:89_1: Idha bhikkhu sace ākaṅkhati ‘paṭikūle appaṭikūlasaññī vihareyya’nti,
tika-s0105t:89_5: sace ākaṅkhati ‘paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī vihareyya’nti,
tika-s0105t:89_7: sace ākaṅkhati ‘appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle ca paṭikūlasaññī vihareyya’nti,
tika-s0105t:89_9: sace ākaṅkhati ‘paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako vihareyyaṃ sato sampajāno’ti,
tika-s0105t:92_0: Na me pañhavissajjane bhāro atthīti satthu sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacāratāya atthato āpannāya dassanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:92_1: “Yadi ākaṅkhasī”ti vutteyeva hi esa attho āpanno hoti.
tika-s0105t:92_2: Sabbaṃ te vissajjessāmīti etthāpi ayaṃ nayo.
tika-s0105t:92_4: taṃ pucchā”ti vacaneneva hi ayamattho sijjhati.
tika-s0105t:93_0: “Pucchāvuso yadākaṅkhasī”tiādīni suttapadāni yesaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena āgatāni,
tika-s0105t:93_2: Tattha hi “pucchāvuso yadākaṅkhasī”ti āḷavakassa yakkhassa okāsakaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0105t:94_1: tasmā bāvarissa ca tuyhaṃ ajitassa ca sabbesañca sesānaṃ yaṃ kiñci sabbaṃ saṃsayaṃ yathā manasā icchatha,
tika-s0105t:94_3: Ettha ca bāvarissa saṃsayaṃ manasā pucchavho,
tika-s0105t:94_4: tumhākaṃ pana sabbesaṃ saṃsayaṃ manasā ca aññathā ca yathā icchatha,
tika-s0105t:94_6: Bāvarī hi “attano saṃsayaṃ manasāva pucchathā”ti antevāsike āṇāpesi.
tika-s0105t:98_7: Ekattanayena hi pavattesu khandhesu avatthāyeva taṃ tadākāranissitā.
tika-s0105t:99_0: Yo bhagavā bodhisattabhūmiyaṃ padesañāṇe ṭhito sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāresi,
tika-s0105t:99_13: āgato bhāro tayā avassaṃ vahitabboti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:100_2: Ahañhi taṃ taṃ vo byākarissaṃ ñatvā sayaṃ lokamimaṃ,
tika-s0105t:101_6: Paṃsuṃ kīḷanto sambhavakumāro nisinnova hutvā pavāresīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:102_1: Yathāpi kusalo tathāti yathā sabbadhammakusalo sabbadhammavidū buddho jānāti katheti,
tika-s0105t:102_8: Rājā ca kho taṃ yadi kāhati vā,
tika-s0105t:102_9: na vāti yo taṃ idha pucchituṃ pesesi,
tika-s0105t:102_11: tayā vā puṭṭhena mayā akkhātamatthaṃ yadi karotu vā,
tika-s0105t:102_13: ahaṃ pana yathādhammaṃ te akkhissaṃ ācikkhissāmīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:103_0: “Rājā ca kho tanti ahaṃ taṃ pañhaṃ yathā tumhākaṃ rājā jānāti jānituṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0105t:103_5: karontassa vā akarontassa vā tassevetaṃ bhavissati,
tika-s0105t:105_2: Apica sikkhitabbatāya sippañca taṃ sattānaṃ jīvitavuttiyā kāraṇabhāvato,
tika-s0105t:105_6: Tassa te katameti idha atthoti āha “katame pana te”ti.
tika-s0105t:105_11: “Puthusippāyatanānī”ti hi sādhāraṇato sippāni uddisitvā upari taṃtaṃsippūpajīvinova niddiṭṭhā puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya.
tika-s0105t:105_14: Aññathā hi yathādhippetāni tāva sippāyatanāni dassetvā puna taṃtaṃsippūpajīvinopi dassetabbā siyuṃ tesamevettha padhānato adhippetattā.
tika-s0105t:105_16: tasmā taṃ papañcaṃ pariharituṃ sippūpajīvīhi taṃtaṃsippāyatanāni saṅgahetvā evamāhāti tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0105t:105_17: “hatthārohātiādīhi ye taṃ taṃ sippaṃ nissāya jīvanti,
tika-s0105t:106_4: Yena hi payogena puriso hatthino ārohanayoggo hoti,
tika-s0105t:106_5: taṃ hatthissa payogaṃ vidhāyantānaṃ sabbesampetesaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t:106_13: hatthiṃ minenti sammā vidahanena hiṃsantīti vā hatthimeṇḍā. Ādi-
tika-s0105t:107_0: Celena celapaṭākāya yuddhe akanti gacchantīti celakā,
tika-s0105t:107_5: Yathā tathā ṭhite senike byūhavicāraṇavasena tato tato calayanti uccālentīti calakāti vuttaṃ “idha rañño”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:107_6: Sakuṇagghiādayo viya maṃsapiṇḍaṃ parasenāsamūhasaṅkhātaṃ piṇḍaṃ sāhasikatāya chetvā chetvā dayanti uppatitvā uppatitvā niggacchantīti piṇḍadāyakā.
tika-s0105t:107_13: Dutiyavikappe piṇḍe janasamūhasaṅkhāte sammadde dayanti uppatantā viya gacchantīti piṇḍadāyakā, daya-
tika-s0105t:108_0: Uggatuggatāti saṅgāmaṃ patvā javaparakkamādivasena ativiya uggatā.
tika-s0105t:108_1: Tadevāti parehi vuttaṃ tameva sīsaṃ vā āvudhaṃ vā.
tika-s0105t:108_8: Sannāho kaṅkaṭo vammaṃ kavaco uracchado jālikāti hi atthato ekaṃ.
tika-s0105t:108_9: Sacammikāti jālikā viya sarīraparittāṇena cammena sacammikā.
tika-s0105t:109_3: ye pūvameva nānappakārato sampādetvā vikkiṇantā jīvanti.
tika-s0105t:109_4: Kesanakhasaṇṭhapanādivasena manussānaṃ alaṅkāravidhiṃ kappenti saṃvidahantīti kappakā.
tika-s0105t:109_5: Cuṇṇavilepanādīhi malaharaṇavaṇṇasampādanavidhinā nhāpenti nahānaṃ karontīti nhāpikā.
tika-s0105t:109_6: Navantādividhinā pavatto gaṇanagantho antarā chiddābhāvena acchiddakoti vuccati,
tika-s0105t:109_13: Hatthasaddo cettha tadekadesesu aṅgulīsu daṭṭhabbo “na bhuñjamāno sabbaṃ hatthaṃ mukhe pakkhipissāmī”tiādīsu viya,
tika-s0105t:110_15: “Kammassa katattā phalassa nibbattanato taṃ kammassa aggisikhā viya hotī”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:110_18: rūpasaddādidasavidhaṃ attano phalaṃ nipphādetuṃ arahatīti attho.
tika-s0105t:111_0: Maggo sāmaññaṃ samitapāpasaṅkhātassa samaṇassa bhāvoti katvā,
tika-s0105t:111_3: Taṃ esa rājā na jānāti ariyadhammassa akovidatāya.
tika-s0105t:111_4: Yasmā panesa “dāsakassakādibhūtānaṃ pabbajitānaṃ lokato abhivādanādilābho sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ
tika-s0105t:111_5: nāmā”ti cintetvā “atthi nu kho koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā īdisamatthaṃ jānanto”ti vīmaṃsanto pūraṇādike
tika-s0105t:111_6: pucchitvā tesaṃ kathāya anadhigatavitto bhagavantampi etamatthaṃ pucchi.
tika-s0105t:112_4: Samaṇakolāhalanti samaṇakotūhalaṃ taṃ taṃ samaṇavādānaṃ aññamaññavirodhaṃ.
tika-s0105t:112_5: Samaṇabhaṇḍananti teneva virodhena “evaṃvādīnaṃ tesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ ayaṃ doso,
tika-s0105t:112_6: evaṃvādīnaṃ tesaṃ ayaṃ doso”ti evaṃ taṃ taṃ vādassa paribhāsanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:113_7: Pucchitā nūti pubbe pucchaṃ kattā nu.
tika-s0105t:113_8: Naṃ puṭṭhabhāvanti tādisaṃ pucchitabhāvaṃ abhijānāsi nu.
tika-s0105t:113_9: Na te sammuṭṭhanti tava na pamuṭṭhaṃ vatāti attho.
tika-s0105t:113_11: Paṇḍitapatirūpakānanti (sāmaṃ viya attano sakkārānaṃ paṇḍitabhāsānaṃ) āmaṃ viya pakkānaṃ paṇḍitā bhāsānaṃ.
tika-s0105t:113_14: vākyapariyāyo vā byañjanasaddo “akkharaṃ padaṃ byañjana”ntiādīsu viya.
tika-s0105t:113_15: Bhagavato rūpaṃ sabhāvo viya rūpamassāti bhagavantarūpo,
tika-s0105t:116_7: Papañcasūdaniyaṃ nāma majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “pacato”ti etassa “tajjentassa vā”ti dutiyopi attho vutto,
tika-s0105t:116_9: paribhāsanañca daṇḍena saṅgahetvā “daṇḍena uppīḷentassa icceva vutta”nti ācariyena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:116_10: adhunā pana potthakesu “tajjentassa vā”ti pāṭhopi bahuso dissati.
tika-s0105t:116_14: Phandatoti ettha parassa phandanavasena suddhakattuttho na labbhati,
tika-s0105t:116_15: atha kho attano phandanavasenevāti āha “paraṃ phandantaṃ phandanakāle sayampi phandato”ti,
tika-s0105t:116_16: attanā katena parassa vibādhanapayogena sayampi phandatoti attho.
tika-s0105t:116_18: hetukattari ca pavattatīti dasseti “hanantassāpi hanāpentassāpī”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:117_0: Gharabhittiyā anto ca bahi ca sandhi gharasandhi.
tika-s0105t:117_1: Kiñcipi asesetvā niravaseso lopo vilumpanaṃ nillopoti āha “mahāvilopa”nti.
tika-s0105t:117_4: “Paripanthe tiṭṭhato”ti ettha acchindanatthameva tiṭṭhatīti ayamattho pakaraṇato siddhoti dasseti “āgatāgatāna”ntiādinā.
tika-s0105t:117_5: “Parito sabbaso panthe hananaṃ paripantho”ti ayamatthopi ācariyena vutto.
tika-s0105t:117_7: tenetaṃ dasseti “sañcicca karotopi na karīyati nāma,
tika-s0105t:117_9: Pāpaṃ na karīyatīti pubbe asato uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā pāpaṃ akatameva nāma.
tika-s0105t:118_0: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ sattā pāpe pavattantīti attano vāde parehi āropitaṃ dosamapanetukāmo pūraṇo imamatthampi dassetīti āha “sattā panā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:118_4: imesaṃ sattānaṃ hiṃsādikiriyā attānaṃ na pāpuṇāti tassa niccatāya nibbikārattā,
tika-s0105t:118_13: Taṃ maṃsakhalakaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ nidānaṃ kāraṇaṃ yassāti tatonidānaṃ,
tika-s0105t:119_7: Keci pana uposathakammenā’ti idaṃ indriyadamassa visesanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:119_11: Adhunā hi katthaci potthake vā- saddo, ca-
tika-s0105t:122_4: Sati hi kammaphale kammānamakiriyabhāvo kathaṃ bhavissati.
tika-s0105t:123_2: na raññā puṭṭhaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ byākarotīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:123_5: tena atthato vipākopi paṭikkhittoyeva nāma hoti.
tika-s0105t:124_2: “Mā mayhaṃ vijite vasathā”ti apasādanā pabbajitassa pabbājanasaṅkhātā viheṭhanāyevāti vuttaṃ “viheṭhetabba”nti.
tika-s0105t:124_3: Tena vuttassa atthassa “evameta”nti upadhāraṇaṃ sallakkhaṇaṃ uggaṇhanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:124_5: Tassa pana atthassa addhaniyabhāvāpādanavasena cittena sandhāraṇaṃ nikkujjanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:124_9: avitathattā vā parehi anuccālito thirabhūto attho apheggubhāvena sāroti vuccati,
tika-s0105t:124_14: Byañjanaṃ pana tena uggahitañceva nikkujjitañca tathāyeva bhagavato santike bhāsitattā.
tika-s0105t:126_2: “Vijjamānamevā”ti iminā sabhāvato vijjamānasseva paṭikkhipane tassa aññāṇameva kāraṇanti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:126_7: paccattatthe vā bhummavacanaṃ yathā “idampissa hoti sīlasmi”nti,
tika-s0105t:126_9: So ca tena tena sattena attanā kātabbakammaṃ,
tika-s0105t:126_15: Parakāro ca nāma parassa vāhasā ijjhanakapayogo.
tika-s0105t:126_22: Atthevesa lokiyadhamme yathā taṃ amhākaṃ bodhisattassa āḷārudake nissāya pañcābhiññālokiyasamāpattilābho,
tika-s0105t:126_28: Jinacakketi “atthi bhikkhave kammaṃ kaṇhaṃ kaṇhavipāka”ntiādi nayappavatte kammānaṃ,
tika-s0105t:127_0: Yathāvuttaattakāraparakārābhāvato eva sattānaṃ paccattapurisakāro nāma koci natthīti sandhāya “natthipurisakāre”ti
tika-s0105t:127_4: “Bale patiṭṭhitā”ti vatvā vīriyamevidha balanti dassetuṃ “vīriyaṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:127_5: Sattānañhi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyika nibbānasampattiāvahaṃ vīriyabalaṃ natthīti so paṭikkhipati,
tika-s0105t:127_6: nidassanamattañcetaṃ vodāniyabalassa paṭikkhipanaṃ saṃkilesikassāpi balassa tena paṭikkhipanato.
tika-s0105t:127_8: atha kasmā tesaṃ visuṃ gahaṇanti āha “idaṃ no vīriyenā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:127_9: Idaṃ no vīriyenāti idaṃ phalaṃ amhākaṃ vīriyena pavattaṃ.
tika-s0105t:127_11: Vīriyathāmaparakkamasambandhanena pavattabalavādīnaṃ vādassa paṭikkhepakaraṇavasena “natthi bala”nti padamiva sabbānipetāni tena ādīyantīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:127_13: vacanatthato pana tassā tassā kiriyāya ussannaṭṭhena balaṃ.
tika-s0105t:127_17: Paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanavasena pavattiyā purisaparakkamoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:128_1: Assasanapassasanavasena pavattiyā pāṇanato pāṇāti iminā atthena samānepi padadvaye ekindriyādivasena
tika-s0105t:128_2: pāṇe vibhajitvā sattato visesaṃ katvā esa vadatīti āha “ekindriyo”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:128_3: Bhavantīti bhūtāti sattapāṇapariyāyepi sati aṇḍakosādīsu sambhavanaṭṭhena tato visesāva,
tika-s0105t:128_7: Jīvanato pāṇaṃ dhārento viya vaḍḍhanato jīvā.
tika-s0105t:128_10: Natthi etesaṃ saṃkilesavisuddhīsu vaso sāmatthiyanti avasā.
tika-s0105t:128_14: achejjasuttāvutassa abhejjamaṇino viya niyatappavattitāya gatijātibandhāpavaggavasena niyāmoti attho.
tika-s0105t:128_16: Channaṃ abhijātīnaṃ sambandhībhūtānaṃ gamanaṃ samavāyena samāgamo.
tika-s0105t:128_17: Sambandhīnirapekkhopi bhāvasaddo sambandhīsahito viya pakatiyatthavācakoti āha “sabhāvoyevā”ti,
tika-s0105t:128_21: evaṃ sabbassāpi lokassa hetupaccayamantarena tathā tathā pariṇāmo akuttimo sabhāvoyevāti attho.
tika-s0105t:129_1: “Sukhañca dukkhañca paṭisaṃvedentī”ti vadanto makkhali adukkhamasukhabhūmiṃ sabbena sabbaṃ na jānātīti
tika-s0105t:129_3: Ayaṃ “sukhañca dukkhañca paṭisaṃvedentī”ti vacanaṃ karaṇabhāvena gahetvā vuttā ācariyassa mati.
tika-s0105t:129_4: Potthakesu pana “aññā sukhadukkhabhūmi natthīti dassetī”ti ayameva pāṭho diṭṭho,
tika-s0105t:129_6: Evaṃ sati “chasvevābhijātīsū”ti vacanaṃ adhikaraṇabhāvena gahetvā chasu eva abhijātīsu sukhadukkhapaṭisaṃvedanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:129_10: Ayameva ca yuttataro paṭikkhepitabbassa atthassa bhūmivasena vuttattā.
tika-s0105t:129_11: Yadi hi “sukhañca dukkhañca paṭisaṃvedentī”ti vacanena paṭikkhepitabbassa dassanaṃ siyā,
tika-s0105t:130_5: “Pañca ca kammuno satānī”ti padassa atthadassanaṃ “pañca kammasatāni cā”ti.
tika-s0105t:130_6: “Eseva nayo”ti iminā “kevalaṃ takkamattakena niratthakaṃ diṭṭhiṃ dīpetī”ti imamevatthamatidisati.
tika-s0105t:130_7: Ettha ca “takkamattakenā”ti vadanto yasmā takkikā avassayabhūtatathatthaggahaṇaaṅkusanayamantarena niraṅkusatāya
tika-s0105t:130_8: parikappanassa yaṃ kiñci attanā parikappitaṃ sārato maññamānā tatheva abhinivissa tattha ca diṭṭhigāhaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-s0105t:130_9: tasmā na tesaṃ diṭṭhivatthusmiṃ viññūhi vicāraṇā kātabbāti imamadhippāyaṃ vibhāveti.
tika-s0105t:130_12: Te hi “cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyasaṅkhātāni imāni pañcindriyāni ‘pañca kammānī’ti titthiyā paññapentī”ti
tika-s0105t:130_14: Kammanti laddhīti tadubhayaṃ oḷārikattā paripuṇṇakammanti laddhi.
tika-s0105t:130_16: “Dvāsaṭṭhi paṭipadā”ti vattabbe sabhāvaniruttiṃ ajānanto “dvaṭṭhipaṭipadā”ti vadatīti āha “dvāsaṭṭhi paṭipadā”ti.
tika-s0105t:130_20: Yadi hi sā yogena siddhā assa,
tika-s0105t:130_22: tathā ca sati ācariyānaṃ matena virujjhatīti vadanti.
tika-s0105t:132_0: Na tveva tepi tiṭṭhanti, dvīhi cittehi samohitā”ti. ;
tika-s0105t:133_0: Ekasmiṃ kappeti catunnamasaṅkhyeyyakappānaṃ aññatarabhūte ekasmiṃ asaṅkhyeyyakappe.
tika-s0105t:133_1: Tatthāpi ca vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīsaññitaṃ ekameva sandhāya “dvaṭṭhantarakappā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:133_2: Na hi so assutasāsanadhammo itare jānāti bāhirakānamavisayattā,
tika-s0105t:134_3: Luddāti vuttāvasesakā ye keci cātuppadajīvikā nesādā.
tika-s0105t:134_7: Ayaṃ sabbopi kaṇhakammapasutatāya kaṇhābhijātīti vadati kaṇhassa dhammassa abhijāti abbhuppatti yassāti katvā.
tika-s0105t:134_11: Kaṇṭakasadisachandarāgena saññuttā bhuñjantīti hi adhippāyena “kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:134_13: Yasmā “te paṇītapaṇīte paccaye paṭisevantī”ti tassa micchāgāho,
tika-s0105t:134_14: tasmā ñāyaladdhepi paccaye bhuñjamānā ājīvakasamayassa vilomagāhitāya paccayesu kaṇṭake pakkhipitvā khādanti
tika-s0105t:134_15: nāmāti vadati kaṇṭakavuttikāti kaṇṭakena yathāvuttena saha jīvikā.
tika-s0105t:134_16: Ayañhissa pāḷiyevāti ayaṃ makkhalissa vādadīpanā attanā racitā pāḷiyevāti yathāvuttamatthaṃ samattheti.
tika-s0105t:134_17: Kaṇṭakavuttikā eva nāma eke apare pabbajitā bāhirakā santi,
tika-s0105t:134_20: Tathā hi te kaṇṭake vattantā viya bhavantīti kaṇṭakavuttikāti vuttā.
tika-s0105t:135_0: Amhākaṃ saññojanagaṇṭho natthīti vādino bāhirakapabbajitā nigaṇṭhā.
tika-s0105t:135_3: tato pana lohitotiādinā yathākkamaṃ tassa parisuddhaṃ vādaṃ dassetuṃ “ime kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:135_4: Paṇḍaratarāti bhuñjananahānapaṭikkhepādivatasamāyogena parisuddhatarā kaṇhanīlamupādāya lohitassāpi parisuddhabhāvena vattabbato.
tika-s0105t:135_7: Te kira ājīvakaladdhiyā visuddhacittatāya nigaṇṭhehipi paṇḍaratarā haliddābhānampi purime upādāya parisuddhabhāvappattito.
tika-s0105t:135_11: Nandādayo kira tathārūpaṃ ājīvakapaṭipattiṃ ukkaṃsaṃ pāpetvā ṭhitā,
tika-s0105t:135_12: tasmā nigaṇṭhehi ājīvakasāvakehi pabbajitehi paṇḍaratarā vuttā paramasukkābhijātīti ayaṃ tassa laddhi.
tika-s0105t:136_5: Rodanti ceva viravanti ca tamanussaritvā. Khedanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:136_11: Bhikkhu ca pannakotiādipi tesaṃ bāhirakānaṃ pāḷiyeva.
tika-s0105t:136_15: attano vā paṭipattiyā paṭipakkhaṃ jinitvā ṭhito.
tika-s0105t:136_16: So kira tathābhūto dhammampi kassaci na kathesi.
tika-s0105t:136_18: Oṭṭhavadanādivippakāre katepi khamanavasena na kiñci kathetītipi vadanti.
tika-s0105t:136_19: Alābhinti “so na kumbhimukhā paṭiggaṇhātī”tiādinā nayena mahāsīhanādasutte vuttaalābhahetusamāyogena alābhiṃ.
tika-s0105t:136_20: Tatoyeva jighacchādubbalaparetatāya sayanaparāyanaṭṭhena samaṇaṃ pannabhūmīti vadati.
tika-s0105t:137_13: “So panā”tiādinā ajānanto panesa bahū devepi satta eva vadatīti tassa appamāṇataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:137_18: Bāhirakasamaye pana “chaddantadahamandākiniyo kuvāḷiyamucalindanāmena voharitā”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:138_6: Saddato panesa ajānanto evaṃ vadatīti na vicāraṇakkhamaṃ.
tika-s0105t:138_8: So hi “caturāsīti satasahassānī”ti vattumasakkonto evaṃ vadati.
tika-s0105t:138_9: Saddaracakā pana “caturāsītiyā tulopo, cassa cu, rassa lo,
tika-s0105t:139_0: “Acelakavatena vā aññena vā yena kenacī”ti vuttamatidisati “tādisenevā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:139_4: so aparipakkaṃ kammaṃ paripāceti nāmāti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:139_9: aparipakkaṃ saṃsaraṇanimittaṃ kammaṃ sīlādinā sīghaṃyeva visuddhappattiyā paripāceti nāma.
tika-s0105t:139_10: Paripakkaṃ kammaṃ phussa phussa kālena paripakkabhāvānāpādanena byantiṃ vigamanaṃ karoti nāmāti.
tika-s0105t:140_5: Imāya upamāya cesa sattānaṃ saṃsāro anukkamena khīyateva,
tika-s0105t:140_6: na vaḍḍhati paricchinnarūpattāti imamatthaṃ vibhāvetīti āha “sutte khīṇe”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:142_2: Taṃmukhena ca phalanti dasseti “dinnassa phalābhāva”nti iminā.
tika-s0105t:142_11: Caturaṅgasamannāgate dāne ṭhānantarādipatti viya hi ānisaṃso,
tika-s0105t:142_15: paralokoti ca kammunā laddhabbo vutto phalābhāvameva sandhāya paṭikkhipanato.
tika-s0105t:142_16: Paccakkhadiṭṭho hi loko kathaṃ tena paṭikkhitto siyā.
tika-s0105t:142_18: yattha yattha bhavayoniādīsu ṭhitā ime sattā,
tika-s0105t:142_24: nāpi tesu idāni kariyamānasakkārāsakkārānamabhāvavasena tesaṃ loke paccakkhattā.
tika-s0105t:142_25: Pubbuḷassa viya imesaṃ sattānaṃ uppādo nāma kevalo,
tika-s0105t:142_26: na cavitvā āgamanapubbako atthīti dassanatthaṃ “natthi sattā opapātikā”ti vuttanti āha “cavitvā upapajjanakā sattā nāma natthī”ti.
tika-s0105t:142_27: Samaṇena nāma yāthāvato jānantena kassaci akathetvā saññatena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-s0105t:142_30: tathā ca attano sampādanassa kassaci avassayo eva na siyā tattha tattheva ucchijjanatoti imamatthaṃ sandhāya “ye imañca…pe…
tika-s0105t:143_2: Yathā hi mattikāya nibbattaṃ bhājanaṃ mattikāmayaṃ,
tika-s0105t:143_3: evamayampi catūhi mahābhūtehi nibbatto catumahābhūtamayoti vuccati.
tika-s0105t:143_9: Upeti upagacchatīti bāhirapathavikāyato tadekadesabhūtā pathavī āgantvā ajjhattikabhāvappatti hutvā sattabhāvena saṇṭhitā,
tika-s0105t:143_10: sā ca mahāpathavī ghaṭādigatapathavī viya idāni tameva bāhiraṃ pathavikāyaṃ samudāyabhūtaṃ puna upeti upagacchati,
tika-s0105t:143_11: sabbaso tena bāhirapathavikāyena nibbisesataṃ ekībhāvameva gacchatīti attho.
tika-s0105t:143_12: Āpādīsupi eseva nayoti ettha pajjunnena mahāsamuddato gahitaāpo viya vassodakabhāvena punapi mahāsamuddaṃ,
tika-s0105t:143_14: mahāvāyukkhandhato niggatamahāvāto viya punapi mahāvāyukkhandhaṃ upeti upagacchatīti parikappanāmattena diṭṭhigatikassa adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:144_0: Manacchaṭṭhāni indriyānīti manameva chaṭṭhaṃ yesaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyānaṃ,
tika-s0105t:144_3: Visayīgahaṇena hi visayāpi gahitā eva honti.
tika-s0105t:144_4: Kathaṃ gaṇitā mañcapañcamāti āha “mañco ceva…pe… attho”ti.
tika-s0105t:144_13: Āhutisaddenettha “dinnaṃ yiṭṭhaṃ huta”nti vuttappakāraṃ dānaṃ sabbampi gahitanti dasseti “pāhunakasakkārādibhedaṃ dinnadāna”nti iminā,
tika-s0105t:144_15: Atthoti adhippāyato attho saddato tassa anadhigamitattā.
tika-s0105t:144_21: Pāḷiyaṃ “loko atthī”ti mati yesaṃ te atthikā,
tika-s0105t:145_2: Vipākaṃ paṭibāhati sabbena sabbaṃ āyatiṃ upapattiyā paṭikkhipanato.
tika-s0105t:145_4: Ubhayaṃ paṭibāhati sabbaso hetupaṭisedhaneneva phalassāpi paṭisedhitattā.
tika-s0105t:145_7: visujjhanti cā”ti vadanto kammassa viya vipākassāpi saṃkilesavisuddhīnaṃ paccayattābhāvajotanato tadubhayaṃ paṭibāhati nāma.
tika-s0105t:145_8: Vipāko paṭibāhito hoti asati kammasmiṃ vipākābhāvato.
tika-s0105t:145_9: Kammaṃ paṭibāhitaṃ hoti asati vipāke kammassa niratthakatāpattito.
tika-s0105t:145_12: visuṃ visuṃ taṃtaṃdiṭṭhidīpakabhāvena pāḷiyaṃ āgatāpi tadubhayapaṭibāhakāvāti attho.
tika-s0105t:146_2: Sajjhāyantīti taṃ diṭṭhidīpakaṃ ganthaṃ yathā tathā tehi kataṃ uggahetvā paṭhanti.
tika-s0105t:146_7: Tasmiṃ ārammaṇeti yathāparikappite kammaphalābhāvādike “karoto na karīyati pāpa”ntiādi nayappavattāya micchādassanasaṅkhātāya laddhiyā ārammaṇe.
tika-s0105t:146_8: Micchāsati santiṭṭhatīti micchāsatisaṅkhātā laddhisahagatā taṇhā santiṭṭhati.
tika-s0105t:146_9: “Karoto na karīyati pāpa”ntiādivasena hi anussavūpaladdhe atthe tadākāraparivitakkanehi saviggahe viya
tika-s0105t:146_11: nijjhānakkhantiyā ca tathā tathā gahite punappunaṃ tatheva āsevantassa bahulīkarontassa micchāvitakkena
tika-s0105t:146_12: samānīyamānā micchāvāyāmupatthambhitā ataṃsabhāvampi “taṃsabhāva”nti gaṇhantī micchāladdhisahagatā taṇhā
tika-s0105t:146_13: musā vitathaṃ saraṇato pavattanato micchāsatīti vuccati.
tika-s0105t:146_15: Micchāsaṅkappādayo viya hi micchāsati nāma pāṭiyekko koci dhammo natthi,
tika-s0105t:146_16: taṇhāsīsena gahitānaṃ catunnampi akusalakkhandhānametaṃ adhivacananti majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāyampi sallekhasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:147_0: Cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hotīti yathāsakaṃ vitakkādipaccayalābhena tasmiṃ ārammaṇe avaṭṭhitatāya anekaggataṃ pahāya ekaggaṃ appitaṃ viya hoti,
tika-s0105t:147_2: So hi paccayavisesehi laddhabhāvanābalo īdise ṭhāne samādhānapatirūpakakiccakaroyeva hoti vālavijjhanādīsu viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:147_3: Javanāni javantīti anekakkhattuṃ tenākārena pubbabhāgiyesu javanavāresu pavattesu sanniṭṭhānabhūte sabbapacchime javanavāre satta javanāni javanti.
tika-s0105t:147_6: na pana tasmiṃ khaṇe tesaṃ tikicchā kenaci sakkā kātunti dassanaṃ tesveva ṭhatvā sattamajavanassa avassamuppajjamānassa nivattituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā,
tika-s0105t:147_7: evaṃ lahuparivatte ca cittavāre ovādānusāsana vasena tikicchāya asambhavato.
tika-s0105t:147_10: te viya atekicchā anivattino micchādiṭṭhigatikāyeva jātāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:148_1: Koci ekaṃ dassanaṃ okkamatīti yassa ekasmiṃyeva abhiniveso,
tika-s0105t:148_3: so ekameva dassanaṃ okkamati. Koci dve,
tika-s0105t:148_8: etena pana vacanena yā pubbe “iti sabbepete atthato ubhayappaṭibāhakā”tiādinā ubhayappaṭibāhakatāmukhena dīpitā atthato siddhā sabbadiṭṭhikatā,
tika-s0105t:148_11: sā yathāsakaṃ paccayasamudāgamasiddhito bhinnārammaṇānaṃ viya visesādhigamānaṃ ekajjhaṃ anuppattiyā aññamaññaṃ abbokiṇṇā evāti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:148_14: Saggāvaraṇādinā hetā samānasāmatthiyā ceva samānaphalā ca,
tika-s0105t:148_15: tasmā tissopi cetā ekassa uppannāpi abbokiṇṇā eva,
tika-s0105t:148_16: ekāya vipāke dinne itarā tassā anubalappadāyikāyoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:148_20: mokkhasaṅkhātaṃ pana nibbānaṃ gantuṃ kā nāma kathāti attho.
tika-s0105t:149_2: Tathā hi vuttaṃ papañcasūdaniyaṃ nāma majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kiṃ panesa ekasmiṃyeva attabhāve niyato hoti,
tika-s0105t:149_5: āsevanavasena pana bhavantarepi taṃ taṃ diṭṭhiṃ rocetiyevā”ti.
tika-s0105t:149_9: Aññathā sammattaniyāmo viya micchattaniyāmopi accantiko siyā,
tika-s0105t:149_12: tasmā yathā sattaṅguttarapāḷiyaṃ “sakiṃ nimuggopi nimuggo eva bālo”ti [a. ni.
tika-s0105t:149_15: Yādise hi paccaye paṭicca ayaṃ taṃ taṃ dassanaṃ okkanto,
tika-s0105t:149_16: puna kadāci tappaṭipakkhe paccaye paṭicca tato sīsukkhipanamassa na hotīti na vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:149_18: idha ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “evarūpassa hi yebhuyyena bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthī”ti yebhuyyaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0105t:149_19: iti āsevanavasena bhavantarepi taṃtaṃdiṭṭhiyā rocanato yebhuyyenassa bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ natthīti katvā vaṭṭakhāṇuko nāmesa jāto,
tika-s0105t:149_20: na pana micchattaniyāmassa accantikatāyāti nīharitvā ñātabbatthatāya neyyatthamidaṃ,
tika-s0105t:149_23: ye ca puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti,
tika-s0105t:150_1: Tattha tasmāti yasmā evaṃ saṃsārakhāṇubhāvassāpi paccayo apaṇṇakajāto,
tika-s0105t:150_5: Bhūtikāmoti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthānaṃ vasena attano guṇehi vuḍḍhikāmo.
tika-s0105t:152_8: Padadvayenāpi loke kenaci hetupaccayena nesaṃ anibbattabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:152_10: Iddhiyāpi na nimmitāti kassaci iddhimato cetovasippattassa puggalassa, devassa,
tika-s0105t:152_15: tathāpi pāḷiyamaṭṭhakathāyañca anāgatameva agahetabbabhāve kāraṇanti dasseti “taṃ neva pāḷiya”ntiādinā.
tika-s0105t:153_2: vañjhāti hi vañjhapasuvañjhatālādayo viya aphalā kassaci ajanakā,
tika-s0105t:153_4: Rūpasaddādayo hi pathavikāyādīhi appaṭibaddhavuttikāti tassa laddhi.
tika-s0105t:153_6: yathā pabbatakūṭaṃ kenaci anibbattitaṃ kassaci ca anibbattakaṃ,
tika-s0105t:153_16: Vikārābhāvato hi tesaṃ sattannaṃ kāyānaṃ esikaṭṭhāyiṭṭhitatā,
tika-s0105t:153_22: tathā anuggahetabbabhāve sati anuggāhakatāpīti tadabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “nāla”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:153_25: Jīvasattamānaṃ kāyānaṃ niccatāya nibbikārabhāvato na hantabbatā,
tika-s0105t:153_28: ghātetā vā atthīti dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “sattannaṃ tveva kāyāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:153_37: kevalaṃ “ahaṃ imaṃ jīvitā voropemī”ti tesaṃ tathā saññāmattameva,
tika-s0105t:153_38: hananaghātanādi pana paramatthato nattheva kāyānaṃ avikopanīyabhāvatoti.
tika-s0105t:155_5: So panettha bhāgo saṃvaralakkhitoti āha “catukoṭṭhāsena saṃvarena saṃvuto”ti,
tika-s0105t:155_6: saṃyamattho vā yāmasaddo yamanaṃ saññamanaṃ yāmoti katvā.
tika-s0105t:155_7: “Yatatto”tiādīsu viya hi anupasaggopi saupasaggo viya saññamatthavācako,
tika-s0105t:155_8: so pana catūhi ākārehīti āha “catukoṭṭhāsena saṃvarenā”ti.
tika-s0105t:155_18: sabbena pāpavāraṇena yuttoti hi sabbappakārena saṃvaralakkhaṇena pāpavāraṇena samannāgato.
tika-s0105t:155_20: Phuṭṭhoti aṭṭhannampi kammānaṃ khepanena mokkhappattiyā kammakkhayalakkhaṇena sabbena pāpavāraṇena phuṭṭho,
tika-s0105t:157_1: Amarāvikkhepe vuttanayo evāti brahmajāle amarāvikkhepavādavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayo eva. Kasmā?
tika-s0105t:159_6: tasmā sabbattha yathā tathā vacanokāsaladdhabhāvamattena attho na vutto,
tika-s0105t:159_8: evañca katvā tattha tattha atthuddhārādivasena atthavivecanā katāti.
tika-s0105t:160_1: Yathā te rucceyyāti idāni mayā pucchiyamāno attho yathā tava citte rucceyya,
tika-s0105t:160_4: Mayā vā dāni pucchiyamānamatthaṃ tava sampadānabhūtassa roceyyātipi vaṭṭati.
tika-s0105t:160_8: Sāmameva yena kenaci hetunā dāsabhāvamupagato sāmaṃdāsabyopagato.
tika-s0105t:160_11: Koci dāsopi samāno alaso kammaṃ akaronto “kammakāro”ti na vuccati,
tika-s0105t:160_12: so pana na tathābhūtoti visesanametanti āha “analaso”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:160_18: Sayanato avuṭṭhiteti rattiyā vibhāyanavelāya seyyato avuṭṭhite.
tika-s0105t:160_20: Yāva sāmino rattiṃ niddokkamananti aparāya bhāviniyā rattiyā padosavelāyaṃ yāva niddokkamanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:160_23: etthantare sabbakiccaṃ katvā pacchā nipatatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:160_24: Kiṃ kāramevāti kiṃ karaṇīyameva kinti pucchāya kātabbato,
tika-s0105t:160_27: Paṭikuddhaṃ mukhaṃ oloketuṃ na visahatītipi dasseti “tuṭṭhapahaṭṭha”nti iminā.
tika-s0105t:161_2: saddo idha upamatthoti ñāpeti yathā “akkhāhataṃ maññe aṭṭhāsi rañño mahāsudassanassa antepuraṃ upasobhayamāna”nti.
tika-s0105t:161_3: So vatassāhanti ettha so vata assaṃ ahanti padacchedo,
tika-s0105t:161_10: Puññānīti uḷārataraṃ puññaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ aññadā katapuññato uḷārāya pabbajjāya adhippetattā.
tika-s0105t:161_11: “So vatassāya”ntipi pāṭhe so rājā viya ayaṃ ahampi assaṃ. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0105t:161_17: yadi puññāni kareyyanti paṭhamapāṭhassa atthamicchanti keci.
tika-s0105t:161_18: Evaṃ sati dutiyapāṭhe “ayamevattho”ti avattabbo siyā tattha ayaṃ-
tika-s0105t:161_24: raññā dinnadānaṃ satadhā katvā tattha ekabhāgampīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:161_25: Yāvajīvaṃ na sakkhissāmi dātunti yāvajīvaṃ dānatthāya ussāhaṃ karontopi satabhāgamattampi dātuṃ na sakkhissāmi,
tika-s0105t:161_26: tasmā pabbajissāmīti pabbajjāyaṃ ussāhaṃ katvāti attho.
tika-s0105t:162_0: Kāyena pihitoti kāyena saṃvaritabbassa kāyadvārena pavattanakassa pāpadhammassa saṃvaraṇavasena pidahito.
tika-s0105t:162_4: Akusalapavesanadvāranti ca kāyakammabhūtānamakusalānaṃ pavesanabhūtaṃ kāyaviññattisaṅkhātaṃ dvāraṃ.
tika-s0105t:162_8: ukkaṭṭhabhāve vā saṇṭhito ghāsacchādanamattameva paramaṃ pamāṇaṃ koṭi etassa,
tika-s0105t:162_9: na tato paraṃ kiñci āmisajātaṃ pariyesati,
tika-s0105t:163_3: Paramavodānappattānanti tāya eva jhānābhiratiyā paramaṃ uttamaṃ vodānaṃ cittavisuddhiṃ pattānaṃ.
tika-s0105t:163_8: Ettha ca paṭhamo viveko itarehi dvīhi vivekehi sahāpi vattabbo itaresu siddhesu tassāpi sijjhanato,
tika-s0105t:163_9: vinā ca tasmiṃ siddhepi itare samasijjhanato.
tika-s0105t:163_12: Na vinā itaresu siddhesuyeva tassa sijjhanatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:163_16: Kāyena eko viharati vicarati puggalavasena asahāyattā.
tika-s0105t:163_21: gotrabhuādīnañca ārammaṇakaraṇamattattā na tesaṃ vasena sātisayā nibbutisukhasamphusanā,
tika-s0105t:163_22: phalasamāpattinirodhasamāpattivasena pana sātisayāti āha “phalasamāpattiṃ vā nirodhasamāpattiṃ vā”ti.
tika-s0105t:164_11: Paccuppannassa pana anatthassa nisedhavasena paripālanaṃ āvaraṇagutti.
tika-s0105t:165_2: saddo pubbe vuttatthāpekkhakoti vuttaṃ “yadi tava dāso”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:165_6: Tadeva ca kāraṇaṃ katvā rājāpi evamāhāti dassetuṃ “paṭhamanti bhaṇanto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:167_6: khuddako gahapati gahapatiko ekasmiññeva gehamatte jeṭṭhakattāti,
tika-s0105t:167_12: Vaḍḍhetīti uparūpari uppādanena mahantaṃ sannicayaṃ karoti.
tika-s0105t:168_1: Appampi pahāya pabbajituṃ dukkaranti dassanañca pageva mahantanti viññāpanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:168_4: Appampi pahāya pabbajituṃ dukkarabhāvo pana majjhimanikāye majjhimapaṇṇāsake laṭukikopamasuttena dīpetabbo.
tika-s0105t:168_5: Vuttañhi tattha “seyyathāpi udāyi puriso daliddo assako anāḷhiyo,
tika-s0105t:168_6: tassa’ssa ekaṃ agārakaṃ oluggaviluggaṃ kākātidāyiṃ naparamarūpaṃ,
tika-s0105t:168_8: Yadi appampi bhogaṃ pahāya pabbajituṃ dukkaraṃ,
tika-s0105t:168_9: kasmā dāsavārepi bhogaggahaṇaṃ na katanti āha “dāsavāre panā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:168_11: Yathā ca dāsassa bhogāpi abhogāyeva parāyattabhāvato,
tika-s0105t:168_12: evaṃ ñātayopīti dāsavāre ñātiparivaṭṭaggahaṇampi na katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:168_13: Parivaṭṭati paramparabhāvena samantato āvaṭṭatīti parivaṭṭo, ñātiyeva.
tika-s0105t:170_4: Evamevāti vuccamāneti yathā paṭhamadutiyāni sāmaññaphalāni paññattāni,
tika-s0105t:170_5: tathāyeva paññapetuṃ sakkā nu khoti vutte.
tika-s0105t:170_10: savane vā asantosanena bhiyyo bhiyyo sotukāmatājananato sotukāmatāya pariyantaṃ nāma natthīti attho.
tika-s0105t:170_14: Upari visesanti taṃ ṭhapetvā tadupari visesameva sāmaññaphalaṃ pucchanto.
tika-s0105t:171_2: Teneva hi sādhukasaddassatthaṃ vadantena sādhusaddo atthuddhāravasena udāhaṭo.
tika-s0105t:171_3: Tena ca nanu sādhukasaddasseva atthuddhāro vattabbo,
tika-s0105t:172_4: Tādiso hi jīvitaṃ jahantopi akattabbaṃ na karoti.
tika-s0105t:173_4: “Suṇohi sādhukaṃ manasi karohī”ti hi sādhukasaddena savanamanasikārānaṃ sātaccakiriyāpi tadāṇāpanampi jotitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:173_5: Āyācaneneva ca uyyojanasāmaññato āṇatti saṅgahitāti na sā visuṃ atthuddhāre vuttā.
tika-s0105t:173_9: Idāni yathāvuttena sādhukasaddassa atthattayena pakāsitaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0105t:173_10: tassa vā atthattayassa idha yogyataṃ vibhāvetuṃ “daḷhīkammatthena hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:174_0: Manasi karohīti ettha na ārammaṇapaṭipādanalakkhaṇo manasikāro,
tika-s0105t:174_3: Avikkhittacittoti yathāvuttamanasikāradvayapubbakāya cittapaṭipāṭiyā ekārammaṇe ṭhapanavasena anuddhatacitto hutvā.
tika-s0105t:174_5: anaggharatanamiva vā suvaṇṇamañjusāya dullabhadhammaratanaṃ citte paṭisāmehītipi attho.
tika-s0105t:174_7: Evaṃ padadvayassa paccekaṃ yojanāvasena atthaṃ dassetvā idāni paṭiyogīvasena dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:175_10: tasmā “saha byañjanenā”ti nibbacanaṃ katvāpi “byañjanasampanno”ti attho ācariyena vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0105t:175_16: Sādhukapadaṃ ekameva samānaṃ āvuttinayādivasena ubhayattha yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:175_19: Desanā nāma tassā manasā vavatthāpitāya tantiyā desanā.
tika-s0105t:175_23: Yasmā cete dhammadesanātthapaṭivedhā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā,
tika-s0105t:175_28: Ettha ca paṭivedhassa dukkarabhāvato dhammatthānaṃ dukkhogāhatā,
tika-s0105t:175_31: tabbisayañāṇuppattiyā ca dukkarabhāvato paṭivedhassa dukkhogāhatā veditabbā.
tika-s0105t:176_0: “Suṇāhi sādhuka”nti “sādhukaṃ manasi karohī”ti vadanto na kevalaṃ atthakkamato eva ayaṃ yojanā,
tika-s0105t:176_1: atha kho saddakkamatopi ubhayattha sambandhattāti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:176_2: “Sakkā mahārājā”ti idhāpi “aññampi diṭṭheva dhamme sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ…pe…
tika-s0105t:176_4: Vitthārato bhāsananti atthameva daḷhaṃ karoti “desessāmīti saṃkhittadīpana”ntiādinā. Hi-
tika-s0105t:176_9: Tenāyamattho sambhavatīti yathāvuttamatthaṃ sagāthāvaggasaṃyutte vaṅgīsasutte gāthāpadena sādhetuṃ “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:177_1: yathā sāḷikāya ālāpo madhuro kaṇṇasukho pemanīyo,
tika-s0105t:177_3: Paṭibhānanti cetassa visesanaṃ liṅgabhedassapi visesanassa dissanato yathā “guṇo pamāṇa”nti.
tika-s0105t:177_4: Paṭibhānanti ca saddo vuccati paṭibhāti taṃtadākārena dissatīti katvā.
tika-s0105t:177_9: āyasmantaṃ dhammasenāpatiṃ thometukāmena desanābhāsanānaṃ visesaṃ dassentena pabhinnapaṭisambhidena āyasmatā vaṅgīsattherena “saṅkhittena,
tika-s0105t:178_2: atha kho vitthārenapi bhāsissatī”ti hi taṃ padaṃ sutvāva ussāhajāto sañjātussāho,
tika-s0105t:178_5: Apica “tena hi mahārāja suṇohi sādhukaṃ manasi karohi,
tika-s0105t:178_6: bhāsissāmī”ti vuttaṃ sabbampi uyyojanapaṭiññākaraṇappakāraṃ ussāhajananakāraṇaṃ sabbeneva ussāhasambhavato,
tika-s0105t:178_9: bhāsissāmī”ti vutte sabbeheva tīhipi padehi ussāhajātoti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0105t:178_10: Paccassosīti pati assosi bhagavato vacanasamanantarameva pacchā assosi,
tika-s0105t:178_11: “sakkā pana bhante”tiādinā vā pucchitvā puna “evaṃ bhante”ti assosīti attho.
tika-s0105t:178_12: Taṃ pana patissavanaṃ atthato sampaṭicchanamevāti āha “sampaṭicchi,
tika-s0105t:178_14: Teneva hi “iti attho”ti avatvā “iti vuttaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:179_1: “Athassa bhagavā etadavocā”ti vacanasambandhamattaṃ dassetvā “etaṃ avocā”ti padaṃ vibhajitvā atthaṃ dassento “idānī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:179_2: “Idhā”ti iminā vuccamānaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ tathāgatassa uppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ lokamevādhippetanti dasseti “desopadese nipāto”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:179_5: athāyamattho na vattabbo avuttepi labbhamānattāti codanāyāha “svāya”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t:180_1: Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hotī”ti,
tika-s0105t:180_3: Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hotī”ti ca ādi.
tika-s0105t:183_1: Pubbe vuttaṃ tathāgatassa uppattiṭṭhānabhūtameva sandhāya “loka”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:183_4: Atthato hi vitthāraṇaṃ saddamukheneva hotīti ubhayattha saddaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0105t:183_5: Yasmā pana “aparehipi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā tathāgato”tiādinā tathāgata-
tika-s0105t:183_7: “araha”nti ādayo ca visuddhimaggaṭīkāyaṃ aparehipi pakārehi vitthāritā ācariyena,
tika-s0105t:183_9: Tathāgatassa sattanikāyantogadhatāya “idha pana sattaloko adhippeto”ti vatvā tatthāyaṃ yasmiṃ sattanikāye,
tika-s0105t:184_4: Evaṃ paricchinneti pañcanimittabaddhā sīmā viya pañcahi yathāvuttanimittehi paricchinne.
tika-s0105t:184_11: tathāpi cesa kuṭilaparicchedena miniyamāno pariyanta parikkhepato navayojanasatiko hoti.
tika-s0105t:184_13: Asītimahātherāti yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ sunāparantakassa puṇṇattherassāpi mahāsāvakesu pariyāpannattā.
tika-s0105t:184_15: Tathā hi “candanamaṇḍalamāḷapaṭiggahaṇe bhagavā na tattha aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapetī”ti majjhimāgama-
tika-s0105t:185_3: Catūsu panetesu vikappesu paṭhamo buddhabhāvāya āsannatarapaṭipattidassanavasena vutto.
tika-s0105t:185_4: Āsannatarāya hi paṭipattiyā ṭhitopi “uppajjatī”ti vuccati uppādassa ekantikattā,
tika-s0105t:185_8: Na hi mahāsattānaṃ antimabhavūpapattito paṭṭhāya bodhisambhārasambharaṇaṃ nāma atthi buddhatthāya kālamāgamayamāneneva tattha patiṭṭhanato.
tika-s0105t:185_10: Bodhiyā hi niyatabhāvappattito pabhuti “buddho uppajjatī”ti viññūhi vattuṃ sakkā uppādassa ekantikattā.
tika-s0105t:185_11: Yathā pana “sandanti nadiyo”ti sandanakiriyāya avicchedamupādāya vattamānappayogo,
tika-s0105t:185_12: evaṃ uppādatthāya paṭipajjanakiriyāya avicchedamupādāya catūsupi vikappesu “uppajjati nāmā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:188_0: Yasmā pana buddhānaṃ sāvakānaṃ viya na paṭipāṭiyā iddhividhañāṇādīni uppajjanti,
tika-s0105t:188_1: saheva pana arahattamaggena sakalopi sabbaññutaññāṇādiguṇarāsi āgato nāma hoti,
tika-s0105t:188_2: tasmā tesaṃ nipphattasabbakiccattā arahattaphalakkhaṇe uppanno nāmāti ekaṅguttaravaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:188_3: Asati hi nipphattasabbakiccatte na tāvatā “uppanno”ti vattumarahati.
tika-s0105t:188_4: Sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppannabhāvanti catūsu vikappesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ “tathāgato sujātāya…pe…
tika-s0105t:188_5: uppajjati nāmā”ti vuttaṃ tathāgatassa uppannatāsaṅkhātaṃ atthibhāvaṃ.
tika-s0105t:188_6: Tadeva sandhāya uppajjatīti vuttaṃ buddhabhāvāya āsannatarapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitasseva adhippetattā.
tika-s0105t:188_7: Ayameva hi attho mukhyato uppajjatīti vattabbo.
tika-s0105t:189_0: Ettha ca “uppanno”ti vutte atītakālavasena koci atthaṃ gaṇheyyāti tannivattanatthaṃ “uppanno hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:189_1: “Uppannā dhammā”tiādīsu viya hi idha uppannasaddo paccuppannakāliko.
tika-s0105t:189_2: Nanu ca arahattaphalasamaṅgīsaṅkhāto uppannoyeva tathāgato pavedanadesanādīni sādheti,
tika-s0105t:189_3: atha kasmā yathāvutto arahattamaggapariyosāno uppajjamānoyeva tathāgato adhippeto.
tika-s0105t:189_4: Na hi so pavedanadesanādīni sādheti madhupāyāsabhojanato yāva arahattamaggo,
tika-s0105t:189_7: buddhabhāvāya āsannatarapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa uppajjamānassa gahaṇeneva arahattaphalasamaṅgīsaṅkhātassa uppannassāpi gahitattā.
tika-s0105t:189_9: Iti pavedanadesanādisādhakassa arahattaphalasamaṅginopi tathāgatassa gahetabbattā neyyatthamidaṃ “uppajjatī”ti vacanaṃ daṭṭhabbanti.
tika-s0105t:189_12: uppannoti tīhi kālehi atthavibhajane “dīpaṅkarapādamūle laddhabyākaraṇato yāva anāgāmiphalā uppajjamāno nāma,
tika-s0105t:189_16: Yasmā pana ekaṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ekapuggalo bhikkhave loke uppajjamāno uppajjatī”ti suttapadavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-s0105t:189_19: tasmā idhāpi arahattaphalakkhaṇameva sandhāya uppajjatīti vuttanti dasseti “sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ sandhāyā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:189_21: Sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppannabhāvanti ca sabbaveneyyānaṃ paṭhamataraṃ arahattaphalavasena uppannabhāvanti attho.
tika-s0105t:189_22: “Uppanno hotī”ti ca iminā arahattaphalakkhaṇavasena atītakālaṃ dassetīti.
tika-s0105t:189_23: Ayameva ca nayo aṅguttaraṭīkākārena ācariyasāriputtattherena adhippetoti.
tika-s0105t:190_0: So bhagavāti yo so tathāgato “araha”ntiādinā pakittitaguṇo,
tika-s0105t:190_2: Idāni vattabbaṃ imasaddena nidasseti vuccamānatthassa parāmasanato.
tika-s0105t:190_4: nayidaṃ mahājanassa sammukhamattaṃ sandhāya “imaṃ loka”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:190_10: samudāyo samāsattho hoti lokāvayavena kataviggahena lokasamudāyassa yathārahaṃ labbhamānattā.
tika-s0105t:191_0: Evaṃ vacanatthato atthaṃ dassetvā vacanīyatthato dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:191_1: Pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ pārisesañāyena itaresaṃ padantarehi visuṃ gahitattā.
tika-s0105t:191_5: Yasmā cesa dāmarikarājaputto viya tattha vasitattā pākaṭo,
tika-s0105t:191_6: tasmā santesupi aññesu vasavattimahārājādīsu pākaṭatarena teneva visesetvā vuttoti,
tika-s0105t:191_8: Māraggahaṇena cettha taṃsambandhino devāpi gahitā okāsalokena saddhiṃ sattalokassa gahaṇato.
tika-s0105t:191_17: Kāmaṃ “sadevaka”ntiādivisesanānaṃ vaseneva sattavisayopi lokasaddo viññāyati samavāyatthavasena tulyayogavisayattā tesaṃ,
tika-s0105t:191_18: “salomako sapakkhako”tiādīsu pana vijjamānatthavasena atulyayogavisayepi ayaṃ samāso labbhatīti byabhicāradassanato
tika-s0105t:191_20: na pana lokasaddena sattalokassa aggahitattā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:191_31: Samāsapadatthesu sattalokassapi vuttanayena gahitattā “okāsalokena saddhiṃ sattaloko”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:192_1: Arūpinopi sattā attano āneñjavihārena viharanto “dibbantīti devā”ti idaṃ nibbacanaṃ laddhumarahantīti
tika-s0105t:192_8: Chakāmāvacaradevalokassa savisesaṃ māravase pavattanato vuttaṃ “samārakaggahaṇena chakāmāvacaradevaloko”ti.
tika-s0105t:192_9: So hi tassa dāmarikassa viya vasapavattanokāso.
tika-s0105t:192_10: Rūpī brahmaloko gahito pārisesañāyena arūpībrahmalokassa visuṃ gahitattā.
tika-s0105t:192_18: “Paja”nti iminā pana imāyeva catasso parisā vuttā.
tika-s0105t:193_5: Ito pana aññesaṃ manussasattānamabhāvato “paja”nti iminā eteyeva catūhi pakārehi ṭhitā manussasattā vuttā.
tika-s0105t:193_7: Evaṃ vikappadvayepi pajāgahaṇena catuparisādivasena manussānaññeva gahitattā idāni avasesasattepi saṅgahetvā
tika-s0105t:193_9: Etthāpi catuparisavasena gahitena manussalokena saha avasesasabbasattaloko gahito,
tika-s0105t:194_0: Ettāvatā bhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetvā idāni tena tena visesena abhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetuṃ “apicetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:194_3: Paṭhamanayena hi pañcasu gatīsu devagatipariyāpannāva pañcakāmaguṇasamaṅgitāya,
tika-s0105t:194_7: ativiya dīghāyukatāyāti evamādīhi visesehi ativiya ukkaṭṭhā.
tika-s0105t:194_9: Evaṃ paṭhamapadeneva padhānanayena sabbalokassa sacchikatabhāve siddhepi iminā kāraṇavisesena sesapadāni vuttānīti dasseti “tato yesa”ntiādinā.
tika-s0105t:194_11: “Chakāmāvacarissaro” tiyeva vutte sakkādīnampi tassa ādhipaccaṃ siyāti āsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ “vasavattī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:194_13: So hi chaṭṭhadevalokepi anissaro tattha vasavattidevarājasseva issarattā.
tika-s0105t:194_14: Tenāha bhagavā aṅguttarāgamavare aṭṭhanipāte dānānisaṃsasutte “tatra bhikkhave vasavattī devaputto dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthuṃ atirekaṃ karitvā…pe…
tika-s0105t:194_15: paranimmitavasavattī deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhātī”ti vitthāro.
tika-s0105t:194_16: Majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāyampi vuttaṃ “tatra hi vasavattirājā rajjaṃ kāreti,
tika-s0105t:194_17: māro pana ekasmiṃ padese attano parisāya issariyaṃ pavattento rajjapaccante dāmarikarājaputto viya vasatī”ti
tika-s0105t:194_28: ayameva vā pāṭho tathāyeva samantapāsādikāyaṃ diṭṭhattā,
tika-s0105t:194_31: so pana tesu adiṭṭhattā na sundaro.
tika-s0105t:195_0: Idāni porāṇakānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanānayaṃ dassetuṃ “porāṇā panāhū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:195_1: Tattha aññapadena niravasesasattalokassa gahitattā sabbattha avasesalokanti anavasesapariyādānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:195_11: “Tibhavūpage satte”ti vatvā “tedhātukamevā”ti vadantā okāsalokena saddhiṃ sattaloko gahitoti dassenti.
tika-s0105t:196_7: atha kho visesanamukhena karaṇampīti dasseti “adhikena ñāṇenā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:196_10: Sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacāratāya hi sabbadhammapaccakkhā buddhā bhagavanto.
tika-s0105t:197_2: saddaggahaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiyā antarā ṭhitikāpi kadāci bhagavato desanā hotīti katvā kataṃ.
tika-s0105t:197_3: Bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento yasmiṃ khaṇe parisā sādhukāraṃ vā deti,
tika-s0105t:197_5: taṃ khaṇampi pubbābhogena paricchinditvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
tika-s0105t:197_6: yathāparicchedañca samāpattito vuṭṭhāya pubbe ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya dhammaṃ desetīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttovāyamattho.
tika-s0105t:197_7: Appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desentoti ugghaṭitaññussa vasena appaṃ vā vipañcitaññussa,
tika-s0105t:197_8: neyyassa ca vasena bahuṃ vā desento.
tika-s0105t:197_11: niyyānikatā ca sabbaso anavajjabhāvenevāti vuttaṃ “anavajjameva katvā”ti.
tika-s0105t:197_12: Desanāyāti pariyattidhammassa desakāyattena hi āṇādividhinā atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanāti pariyattidhammo vuccati.
tika-s0105t:197_13: Kiñcāpi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma paramatthato koci natthi,
tika-s0105t:197_14: yesu pana avayavesu samudāyarūpena avekkhitesu gāthādisamaññā,
tika-s0105t:197_15: taṃ tato bhinnaṃ viya katvā saṃsāmivohāramāropetvā dassento “atthi desanāya ādimajjhapariyosāna”nti āha.
tika-s0105t:197_27: Evaṃ suttāvayave kalyāṇattayaṃ dassetvā sakalepi sutte dassetuṃ “ekānusandhikassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:197_28: Tattha nātibahuvibhāgaṃ yathānusandhinā ekānusandhikaṃ sandhāya “ekānusandhikassā”ti āha.
tika-s0105t:197_29: Itarasmiṃ pana teneva dhammavibhāgena ādimajjhapariyosānā labbhantīti “anekānusandhikassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:197_31: Idamavocāti nigamanaṃ upalakkhaṇameva “iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:197_33: Saṅgītikārakehi ṭhapitānipi hi nidānanigamanāni satthu desanāya anuvidhānato tadantogadhānevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:201_0: Evaṃ vuttassa satthusāsanassa pakāsako pariyattidhammo eva sīlādiatthavasena kalyāṇattayavibhāvane vutto.
tika-s0105t:201_3: Sīlasamādhivipassanā ādi nāma sāsanasampattibhūtānaṃ uttarimanussadhammānaṃ mūlabhāvato.
tika-s0105t:201_8: Kāmaṃ sutte ariyamaggassa antadvayavigamena tesaṃ majjhimapaṭipadābhāvo vutto,
tika-s0105t:201_9: majjhimabhāvasāmaññato pana sammāpaṭipattiyā ārambhanipphattīnaṃ majjhimabhāvassāpi sādhakabhāve yuttanti āha “atthi bhikkhave,
tika-s0105t:201_10: majjhimā paṭipadā tathāgatena abhisambuddhāti evaṃ vutto ariyamaggo majjhaṃ nāmā”ti,
tika-s0105t:201_12: phalanibbānasaṅkhātānañca nipphattīnaṃ vemajjhabhāvato ariyamaggo majjhaṃ nāmāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:201_17: nibbānasacchikiriyāya ca hoti tato paraṃ kattabbābhāvatoti vā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:201_18: Idāni tesaṃ dvinnampi sāsanassa pariyosānataṃ āgamena sādhetuṃ “etadatthaṃ ida”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:201_22: Etadeva phalaṃ sāraṃ yassāti etaṃsāraṃ niggahitāgamena.
tika-s0105t:201_26: Idañhi cūḷavedallasutte “sātthaṃ sabyañjana”ntiādisaddantarasannidhānato “idha desanāya ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ adhippeta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:202_0: Evaṃ saddapabandhavasena desanāya kalyāṇattayavibhāgaṃ dassetvā tadatthavasenapi dassento “bhagavā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:202_3: Tathā samatthanamukhena ca atthavasena kalyāṇattayavibhāgaṃ dassetīti.
tika-s0105t:202_4: Atthato panetaṃ dassento yo tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe katavidhi saddapabandho gāthāsuttavasena vavatthito pariyattidhammoyeva idha desanāti vutto,
tika-s0105t:202_5: tassa cattho visesato sīlādi evāti āha “ādimhi sīla”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t:202_8: tathā maggaggahaṇena sasambhāramaggoti atthattayavasena anavasesato pariyattiatthaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0105t:202_10: Ettha ca sīlamūlakattā sāsanassa sīlena ādikalyāṇatā vuttā,
tika-s0105t:202_14: Atthavasena hi idha desanāya ādikalyāṇādibhāvo vutto.
tika-s0105t:204_2: Na so sātthaṃ deseti niyyānatthavirahato tassā desanāya.
tika-s0105t:204_5: dvippakāreneva vā byañjanena yuttā damiḷabhāsā viya.
tika-s0105t:204_6: Sabbaniroṭṭhabyañjanāti vivaṭakaraṇatāya oṭṭhe aphusāpetvā uccāretabbato sabbathā oṭṭhaphusanarahitavimuttabyañjanā kirātabhāsā viya.
tika-s0105t:204_7: Sabbavissaṭṭhabyañjanāti sabbasseva vissajjanīyayuttatāya sabbathā vissaggabyañjanā savarabhāsā viya.
tika-s0105t:204_8: Sabbaniggahitabyañjanāti sabbasseva sānusāratāya sabbathā bindusahitabyañjanā pārasikādimilakkhubhāsā viya.
tika-s0105t:204_9: Evaṃ “damiḷakirātasavaramilakkhūnaṃ bhāsā viyā”ti idaṃ paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:204_11: Sabbāpesā byañjanekadesavaseneva pavattiyā aparipuṇṇabyañjanāti vuttaṃ “byañjanapāripūriyā abhāvato abyañjanā nāmā”ti.
tika-s0105t:205_0: Ṭhānakaraṇāni sithilāni katvā uccāretabbamakkharaṃ pañcasu vaggesu paṭhamatatiyaṃ sithilaṃ.
tika-s0105t:205_1: Tāni asithilāni katvā uccāretabbamakkharaṃ tesveva dutiyacatutthaṃ dhanitaṃ.
tika-s0105t:208_3: Ṭhānakaraṇāni niggahetvā avivaṭena mukhena uccāretabbaṃ niggahitaṃ.
tika-s0105t:208_6: Ṭhānakaraṇāni vissaṭṭhāni katvā vivaṭena mukhena uccāretabbaṃ vimuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:208_7: Dasadhātiādīsu evaṃ sithilādivasena byañjanabuddhisaṅkhātassa akkharuppādakacittassa dasahi pakārehi byañjanānaṃ pabhedoti attho.
tika-s0105t:208_10: byañjanabuddhiyā vā karaṇabhūtāya byañjanānaṃ dasadhā pabhedotipi yujjati.
tika-s0105t:209_5: tamatthaṃ parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanāya eva desanāya desetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:209_14: Upanetabbassa vā vodānatthassa avuttassa abhāvato anūnatā,
tika-s0105t:210_3: brahmānaṃ vā seṭṭhānaṃ cariyanti dānameva brahmacariyaṃ.
tika-s0105t:215_0: Aññatra tāhīti paradārabhūtāhi vajjetvā. Amhanti amhākaṃ.
tika-s0105t:217_5: Yāva devamanussehīti ettha devalokato yāva manussalokā supakāsitanti adhippāyavasena pāsādikasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:217_6: yāva devā ca manussā cāti attho.
tika-s0105t:217_7: Tasmāti yasmā sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ sakalasāsanaṃ idha “brahmacariya”nti adhippetaṃ, tasmā.
tika-s0105t:217_8: “Brahmacariya”nti iminā samānādhikaraṇāni sabbapadāni yojetvā atthaṃ dassento “so dhammaṃ desetī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:217_9: “Evaṃ desento cā”ti hi iminā brahmacariyasaddena dhammasaddādīnaṃ samānatthataṃ dasseti,
tika-s0105t:217_10: “dhammaṃ desetī”ti vatvāpi “brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetī”ti vacanaṃ sarūpato atthappakāsanatthanti ca vibhāveti.
tika-s0105t:218_5: Bhogarūpādivatthukā madā suppaheyyā honti nimittassa anavaṭṭhānato,
tika-s0105t:218_7: Tasmā khattiyabrāhmaṇakulīnānaṃ pabbajitānampi jātivijjaṃ nissāya mānajappanaṃ duppajahanti āha “yebhuyyena…pe…
tika-s0105t:218_13: Patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkontīti sīle patiṭṭhahituṃ na ussahanti,
tika-s0105t:218_14: suvisuddhaṃ katvā sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkontīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:218_16: patiṭṭhātunti vā saccapaṭivedhena lokuttarāya patiṭṭhāya patiṭṭhātuṃ.
tika-s0105t:218_17: Sā hi nippariyāyato sāsane patiṭṭhā nāma.
tika-s0105t:219_0: Evaṃ byatirekato atthaṃ vatvā anvayatopi vadati “gahapatidārakā panā”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:220_1: Parisuddhanti rāgādīnaṃ accantameva pahānadīpanato nirupakkilesatāya sabbathā suddhaṃ.
tika-s0105t:220_3: dhammena vā sadevakassa lokassa sāmīti dhammassāmī.
tika-s0105t:220_7: sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti saddhaṃ paṭilabhati.
tika-s0105t:220_10: Kāmaṃ “jāyampatikā”ti vutteyeva gharasāmikagharasāminīvasena dvinnameva gahaṇaṃ viññāyati,
tika-s0105t:220_13: Ekāyapi tāva saṃvāso sambādhoyevāti dassanatthaṃ “dve”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:220_20: Vuttañhi “rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccatī”tiādi āgamanapathatāpi uṭṭhānaṭṭhānatā evāti dvepi saṃvaṇṇanā ekatthā,
tika-s0105t:220_26: Evaṃ akusalakusalappavattīnaṃ ṭhānāṭhānabhāvena gharāvāsapabbajjānaṃ sambādhabbhokāsataṃ dassetvā idāni
tika-s0105t:220_27: kusalappavattiyā eva aṭṭhānaṭṭhānabhāvena tesaṃ tabbhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:221_0: Visuṃ visuṃ paduddhāramakatvā samāsato atthavaṇṇanā saṅkhepakathā.
tika-s0105t:221_2: Akhaṇḍaṃ katvāti dukkaṭamattassāpi anāpajjanena achiddaṃ katvā.
tika-s0105t:221_6: Pariyodātaṭṭhena nimmalabhāvena saṅkhaṃ viya likhitaṃ dhotanti saṅkhalikhitaṃ.
tika-s0105t:221_13: saddena kammappavacanīyena yogato “agāra”nti etaṃ bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha “agāramajjhe”ti.
tika-s0105t:221_17: Kasmā cetāni gahitānīti āha “brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikānī”ti.
tika-s0105t:222_3: Ābandhanaṭṭhenāti “putto nattā panattā”tiādinā pemavasena paricchedaṃ katvā bandhanaṭṭhena,
tika-s0105t:222_6: Atha vā pitāmahapituputtādivasena parivattanaṭṭhena parivaṭṭotipi yujjati.
tika-s0105t:223_1: Pātimokkhasaṃvarena pihitakāyavacīdvāro samāno tena saṃvarena upeto nāmāti katvā “pātimokkhasaṃvarena samannāgato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:223_11: “Sikkhāpadesū”ti vutteyeva tadavayavabhūtaṃ “sikkhāpadaṃ samādāya sikkhatī”ti atthassa gamyamānattā kammapadaṃ
tika-s0105t:224_6: Uppattidvāradassanatthanti uppattiyā kāyavacīviññattisaṅkhātassa dvārassa kammāpadesena dassanatthaṃ,
tika-s0105t:224_9: siddhepi sati punārambho niyamāya vā hoti,
tika-s0105t:224_15: Kāyavacīdvāresu uppannena anavajjena kāyakammavacīkammena samannāgatattā parisuddhājīvoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:225_0: Idāni suttantarena saṃsandituṃ “muṇḍikaputtasuttantavasena vā evaṃ vutta”nti āha. Vā-
tika-s0105t:225_4: Tattha thapatīti pañcakaṅgaṃ nāma vaḍḍhakiṃ bhagavā ālapati. Thapati-
tika-s0105t:225_8: Kusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ kusalaṃ vacīkamma”nti sīlassa kusalakāyakammavacīkammabhāvaṃ dassetvā “ājīvapārisuddhampi
tika-s0105t:225_9: kho ahaṃ thapati sīlasmiṃ vadāmī”ti evaṃ pavattāya muṇḍikaputtasuttadesanāya “kāyakammavacīkammena samannāgato
tika-s0105t:225_10: kusalenā”ti sīlassa kusalakāyakammavacīkammabhāvaṃ dassetvā “parisuddhājīvo”ti evaṃ pavattā ayaṃ sāmaññaphalasuttadesanā
tika-s0105t:225_11: ekasaṅgahā aññadatthu saṃsandati sameti yathā taṃ gaṅgodakena yamunodakaṃ,
tika-s0105t:228_1: Evanti “so evaṃ pabbajito samāno pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto viharatī”tiādinā nayena.
tika-s0105t:228_2: “Sīlasmi”nti idaṃ niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ tato ekassa niddhāraṇīyattāti āha “ekaṃ sīla”nti.
tika-s0105t:228_3: Apica iminā ādhāre bhummaṃ dasseti samudāyassa avayavādhiṭṭhānattā yathā “rukkhe sākhā”ti.
