tika-s0105t:228_4: “Ida”nti padena katvatthavasena samānādhikaraṇaṃ bhummavacanassa katvatthe pavattanato yathā “vanappagumbe
tika-s0105t:228_5: yatha phusitagge”ti dasseti “paccattavacanatthe vā etaṃ bhumma”nti iminā.
tika-s0105t:228_10: “Idamassa hoti sīlasmi”nti ettha mahāsīlapariyosānena niddhāriyamānassa abhāvato paccattavacanatthoyeva
tika-s0105t:228_11: sambhavatīti āha “idaṃ assa sīlaṃ hotīti attho”ti,
tika-s0105t:229_4: “yadidaṃ sīlasaṃvarato”ti pana padassa “yaṃ idaṃ bhayaṃ sīlasaṃvarato bhaveyyā”ti atthavacanato,
tika-s0105t:229_5: “sīlasaṃvarahetu bhayaṃ na samanupassatī”ti ca atthassa upapattito sīlasaṃvarato sīlasaṃvarahetūti atthoyeva sambhavati.
tika-s0105t:229_6: “Yaṃ idaṃ bhayaṃ sīlasaṃvarato bhaveyyā”ti hi pāṭhopi dissati.
tika-s0105t:229_7: “Saṃvarato”ti hetuṃ vatvā tadadhigamitaatthavasena “asaṃvaramūlakassa bhayassa abhāvā”tipi hetuṃ vadati.
tika-s0105t:229_11: Ettha ca “yathāvidhānavihitenā”ti iminā porāṇakāciṇṇavidhānasamaṅgitāsaṅkhātaṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0105t:229_18: Vuttañhi aggaññasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ mahāsammatābhisekavibhāvanāya “te panassa khettasāmino tīhi saṅkhehi
tika-s0105t:229_20: tīhi saṅkhehi khattiyābhisekena muddhani abhisittenā”ti sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāyampi cūḷasīhanādasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ
tika-s0105t:229_21: “paṭhamaṃ tāva abhisekaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ rājūnaṃ suvaṇṇamayādīni tīṇi saṅkhāni ca gaṅgodakañca khattiyakaññañca
tika-s0105t:230_1: abhisekamaṅgalatthañhi alaṅkatapaṭiyattassa maṇḍapassa antokatassa udumbarasākhamaṇḍapassa majjhe suppatiṭṭhite
tika-s0105t:230_2: udumbarabhaddapīṭhamhi abhisekārahaṃ abhijaccaṃ khattiyaṃ nisīdāpetvā paṭhamaṃ tāva maṅgalābharaṇabhūsitā
tika-s0105t:230_3: jātisampannā khattiyakaññā gaṅgodakapuṇṇaṃ suvaṇṇamayasāmuddikadakkhiṇāvaṭṭasaṅkhaṃ ubhohi hatthehi sakkaccaṃ
tika-s0105t:230_4: gahetvā sīsopari ussāpetvā tena tassa muddhani abhisekodakaṃ abhisiñcati,
tika-s0105t:230_5: evañca vadeti “deva taṃ sabbepi khattiyagaṇā attānamārakkhatthaṃ iminā abhisekena abhisekikaṃ mahārājaṃ karonti,
tika-s0105t:230_6: tvaṃ rājadhammesu ṭhito dhammena samena rajjaṃ kārehi,
tika-s0105t:230_10: Tato puna purohitopi porohiccaṭhānānurūpālaṅkārehi alaṅkatapaṭiyatto gaṅgodakapuṇṇaṃ rajatamayaṃ saṅkhaṃ
tika-s0105t:230_11: ubhohi hatthehi sakkaccaṃ gahetvā tassa sīsopari ussāpetvā tena tassa muddhani abhisekodakaṃ abhisiñcati,
tika-s0105t:230_12: evañca vadeti “deva taṃ sabbepi brāhmaṇagaṇā attānamārakkhatthaṃ iminā abhisekena abhisekikaṃ mahārājaṃ karonti,
tika-s0105t:230_13: tvaṃ rājadhammesu ṭhito dhammena samena rajjaṃ kārehi,
tika-s0105t:230_17: Tato puna seṭṭhipi seṭṭhiṭṭhānabhūsanabhūsito gaṅgodakapuṇṇaṃ ratanamayaṃ saṅkhaṃ ubhohi hatthehi sakkaccaṃ
tika-s0105t:230_18: gahetvā tassa sīsopari ussāpetvā tena tassa muddhani abhisekodakaṃ abhisiñcati,
tika-s0105t:230_19: evañca vadeti “deva taṃ sabbepi gahapatigaṇā attānamārakkhatthaṃ iminā abhisekena abhisekikaṃ mahārājaṃ karonti,
tika-s0105t:230_20: tvaṃ rājadhammesu ṭhito dhammena samena rajjaṃ kārehi,
tika-s0105t:230_24: Te pana tassa evaṃ vadantā “sace tvaṃ amhākaṃ vacanānurūpaṃ rajjaṃ karissasi,
tika-s0105t:230_27: tava muddhā sattadhā phalatū”ti evaṃ rañño abhisapanti viyāti daṭṭhabbanti.
tika-s0105t:231_6: cetasikasukhasamuṭṭhānehi ca paṇītarūpehi phuṭṭhasarīrassa uppannaṃ kāyikasukhanti.
tika-s0105t:233_1: Sāmaññassa visesāpekkhatāya idhādhippetopi viseso tena apariccatto eva hotīti āha “cakkhusaddo katthaci buddhacakkhumhi vattatī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:233_2: Vijjamānameva hi abhidheyyabhāvena visesatthaṃ visesantaranivattanena visesasaddo vibhāveti,
tika-s0105t:233_5: Aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ buddhānameva cakkhu dassananti buddhacakkhu,
tika-s0105t:233_16: idha pana maggeheva phalāni saṅgahetvā dasseti.
tika-s0105t:233_23: “Pasādacakkhuvohārenā”ti iminā idha cakkhusaddo cakkhupasādeyeva nippariyāyato vattati,
tika-s0105t:233_24: pariyāyato pana nissayavohārena nissitassa vattabbato cakkhuviññāṇepi yathā “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”ti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:233_25: Idhāpi sasambhārakathā avasiṭṭhāti katvā sesapadesupīti pi-
tika-s0105t:233_32: asammissabhāvo ca sampayogābhāvato parisuddhatāti āha “asammissaṃ parisuddha”nti,
tika-s0105t:233_35: Sati ca suvisuddhe indriyasaṃvare nīvaraṇesu padhānabhūtapāpadhammavigamena adhicittānuyogo hatthagato eva hoti,
tika-s0105t:235_22: “Eseva nayo”ti iminā nipannasseva abhimukhaṃ saṃsappanapaṭiāsappanāni dasseti.
tika-s0105t:235_23: Ṭhānanisajjāsayanesu hi yo gamanavidhuro kāyassa purato abhihāro,
tika-s0105t:236_1: tena attanā kattabbakiccassa karaṇasīlo sampajānakārīti āha “sampajaññena sabbakiccakārī”ti.
tika-s0105t:236_2: “Sampajaññameva vā kārī”ti iminā sampajānassa karaṇasīlo sampajānakārīti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:236_8: tadeva sampajañña”nti ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāto aparo nayo –
tika-s0105t:237_0: Dhammato vaḍḍhisaṅkhātena atthena saha vattatīti sātthakaṃ,
tika-s0105t:237_5: aññattha ca pavattesu avijahitakammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte gocare sampajānanaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ.
tika-s0105t:237_7: hi ekasesanayena vā gocarasaddo tadatthadvayepi pavattati.
tika-s0105t:237_15: Saṅkhepato vuttaṃ tadatthameva vivarituṃ “cetiyaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:238_1: Yasmā pana dhammato vaḍḍhiyeva attho nāma,
tika-s0105t:238_3: taṃ sabbampi sappāyamevāti siyā avisesena kassaci āsaṅkāti tannivattanatthaṃ “cetiyadassanaṃ tāvā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0105t:238_10: Asamapekkhanaṃ nāma gehassitaaññāṇupekkhāvasena ārammaṇassa ayoniso gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t:238_11: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassā”tiādi mātugāmasamphassavasena kāyasaṃsaggāpatti.
tika-s0105t:238_15: Mahāparisaparivārānanti kadāci dhammassavanādiatthāya itthipurisasammissaparivāre sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:239_1: Pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya paṭivacanadānavasena bhikkhūnaṃ anuvattanakathā āciṇṇā,
tika-s0105t:239_2: tasmā paṭivacanassa adānavasena ananuvattanakathā tassa dutiyā nāma hotīti āha “dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā”ti.
tika-s0105t:240_1: “Sace pana cetiyassa mahāpūjāyā”tiādikaṃ sabbampi vuttappakāraṃ paccāmasati,
tika-s0105t:240_7: tadeva bhāvanāya visayabhāvato gocaranti āha “kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ gocara”nti.
tika-s0105t:241_3: Na paccāharatīti āhārūpayogato yāva divāṭhānupasaṅkamanā kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paṭineti.
tika-s0105t:241_8: Dve tayo pallaṅketi dve tayo nisajjāvāre.
tika-s0105t:241_10: Usumanti dve tīṇi uṇhāpanāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:241_11: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitvāti tadahe mūlabhūtaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitvā.
tika-s0105t:242_8: Paribhogacetiyato sārīrikacetiyaṃ garutaranti katvā “cetiyaṃ vanditvā”ti pubbakālakiriyāvasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:242_11: “bodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ pattenāpī”ti pana vacanato yadi cetiyaṅgaṇato gate bhikkhācāramagge bodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-s0105t:242_14: Evañhi sati bodhiyaṅgaṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ pattenāpi bodhiṃ vanditvā cetiyaṃ vanditabbaṃ,
tika-s0105t:242_16: tadubhayampi appattena na vanditabbanti ayamattho suviññāto hoti.
tika-s0105t:242_21: Buddhaguṇānussaraṇavaseneva bodhiādiparibhogacetiyepi nipaccakaraṇaṃ upapannanti dasseti “buddhassa bhagavato
tika-s0105t:243_3: Janasaṅgahatthanti “mayi akathente etesaṃ ko kathessatī”ti dhammānuggahena mahājanassa saṅgahaṇatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:243_4: Aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ vacanaṃ samatthetuṃ “dhammakathā hi kammaṭṭhānavinimuttā nāma natthī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:243_5: Tasmāti yasmā “dhammakathā nāma kātabbāyevā”ti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti,
tika-s0105t:243_6: yasmā vā dhammakathā kammaṭṭhānavinimuttā nāma natthi,
tika-s0105t:243_8: Ācariyānandattherena pana “tasmā”ti etassa “kathetabbāyevāti vadantī”ti etena sambandho vutto.
tika-s0105t:245_7: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ vīthiṃ nārohati khudāparissamena kilantakāyassa samādhānābhāvato.
tika-s0105t:245_10: Antokucchiyañhi odanādivatthusmiṃ asati kammajatejo uṭṭhahitvā udarapaṭalaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-s0105t:248_1: Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu kāme avītarāgo hoti,
tika-s0105t:248_4: yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati,
tika-s0105t:248_5: aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ caratī”ti. Ca –
tika-s0105t:249_3: cittaṃ bandhitvā muṭṭhiyaṃ viya katvā gaṇhanabhāvo cetaso vinibandho.
tika-s0105t:250_11: Adhunā pana atthakāmāti hitavācakena atthasaddena pāṭho dissati,
tika-s0105t:251_11: Soyeva nayoti “ayaṃ bhikkhū”tiādikā yo patiṭṭhāne vutto,
tika-s0105t:251_13: Pacchato āgacchantānaṃ chinnabhattabhāvabhayenāpi yonisomanasikāraṃ paribrūhetīti idampi parassa jānaneneva saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:253_2: amhākaṃ atthāya lokanāthena chabbassāni kataṃ dukkaracariyaṃ “evāhaṃ yathābalaṃ pūjessāmī”ti attho.
tika-s0105t:253_9: Vippayuttena uddhaṭe paṭinivattentoti sampayuttena uddharitapādeyeva puna ṭhapanaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0105t:253_18: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “anujānāmi bhikkhave sabbeheva pakkhagaṇanaṃ uggahetu”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t:255_0: Vīthiṃ otaritvā ito cito ca anoloketvā paṭhamameva vīthiyo sallakkhetabbāti āha “vīthiyo sallakkhetvā”ti.
tika-s0105t:255_3: “Na hi javena piṇḍapātiyadhutaṅgaṃ nāma kiñci atthī”ti iminā javena gamane loluppacāritā viya asāruppataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:255_11: puttamaṃsassa khādanañca tidhā upamā yassa āharaṇassāti tathā.
tika-s0105t:255_13: yāpanāyā”tiādinā vuttehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ katvā.
tika-s0105t:256_0: Gatapaccāgatesu kammaṭṭhānassa haraṇaṃ vattanti atthaṃ dassento “haraṇapaccāharaṇasaṅkhāta”nti āha.
tika-s0105t:256_1: “Yadi upanissayasampanno hotī”ti idaṃ “devaputto hutvā”tiādīsupi sabbattha sambajjhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:256_2: Tattha paccekabodhiyā upanissayasampadā kappānaṃ dve asaṅkhyeyyāni,
tika-s0105t:256_7: itaresaṃ pana atītāsu jātīsu vivaṭṭupanissayavasena kālaniyamamantarena nibbattitaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyakusalaṃ.
tika-s0105t:256_8: “Seyyathāpī”tiādinā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhānantare etadaggaṭṭhapitānaṃ therānaṃ sakkhidassanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:256_9: Tattha thero bāhiyo dārucīriyoti bāhiyavisaye sañjātasaṃvaḍḍhatāya bāhiyo,
tika-s0105t:257_0: “Tasmā tiha te bāhiya evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute, mute,
tika-s0105t:257_3: Yato kho te bāhiya diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute, mute,
tika-s0105t:257_9: tato tvaṃ bāhiya nevidha na huraṃ na ubhayamantarena,
tika-s0105t:258_1: Evaṃ sāriputtattherādīnampi mahāpaññatādidīpanāni suttapadāni vitthārato vattabbāni.
tika-s0105t:258_2: Visesato pana aṅguttarāgame etadaggasuttapadāni sikhāpattanti koṭippattaṃ niṭṭhānappattaṃ sabbathā paripuṇṇato.
tika-s0105t:259_4: tadubhayassa pana vinā taṇhāya appavattanato taṇhāgāhavasenāti tīhipi maññanāhi andhabālaputhujjanassa abhikkame sammuyhanaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:259_5: “Tathā asammuyhanto”ti vatvā tadeva asammuyhanaṃ yena ghanavinibbhogena hoti,
tika-s0105t:260_1: yasmā cettha vāyodhātuyā anugatā tejodhātu uddharaṇassa paccayo.
tika-s0105t:260_3: tena tassā uddharaṇe vāyodhātuyā anugatabhāvo hoti,
tika-s0105t:260_6: Yasmā pana tejodhātuyā anugatā vāyodhātu atiharaṇavītiharaṇānaṃ paccayo.
tika-s0105t:260_7: Kiriyagatikāya hi vāyodhātuyā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu sātisayo byāpāro,
tika-s0105t:260_8: tena tassā tattha tejodhātuyā anugatabhāvo hoti,
tika-s0105t:260_10: itarāsañca tadabhāvato omattatāti dasseti “tathā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesū”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:260_11: Satipi cettha anugamakānugantabbatāvisese tejodhātuvāyodhātubhāvamattaṃ sandhāya tathāsaddaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0105t:260_22: tato paraṃ haraṇaṃ vītiharaṇanti vā ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-s0105t:261_0: Yasmā pathavīdhātuyā anugatā āpodhātu vossajjane paccayo.
tika-s0105t:261_2: tena tassā vossajjane pathavīdhātuyā anugatabhāvo hoti,
tika-s0105t:261_6: Yasmā pana āpodhātuyā anugatā pathavīdhātu sannikkhepanassa paccayo.
tika-s0105t:261_7: Patiṭṭhābhāve viya patiṭṭhāpanepi tassā sātisayakiccattā āpodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo hoti,
tika-s0105t:261_8: tathā ghaṭṭanakiriyāya pathavīdhātuyā vasena sannirujjhanassa sijjhanato tassā sannirujjhanepi āpodhātuyā anugatabhāvo hoti,
tika-s0105t:262_0: Anugamakānugantabbatāvisesepi sati pathavīdhātuāpodhātubhāvamattaṃ sandhāya tathāsaddaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0105t:263_7: Tattha tatthevāti yattha yattha uddharaṇādike uppannā,
tika-s0105t:263_9: Na hi dhammānaṃ desantarasaṅkamanaṃ atthi lahuparivattanato.
tika-s0105t:263_13: Sabbañcetaṃ uddharaṇādikoṭṭhāse sandhāya sabhāgasantativasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:263_14: Itaro eva hi rūpadhammānampi pavattikkhaṇo gamanayogagamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyena paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi,
tika-s0105t:263_16: yathā tilānaṃ bhijjayamānānaṃ paṭapaṭāyanena bhedo lakkhīyati,
tika-s0105t:263_20: Tilabhedalakkhaṇaṃ paṭapaṭāyanaṃ viya hi saṅkhatabhedalakkhaṇaṃ uppādo uppannānamekantato bhinnattā.
tika-s0105t:264_0: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ koṭṭhāseti yathāvutte chabbidhepi koṭṭhāse gamanādikassa apaccāmaṭṭhattā.
tika-s0105t:264_3: Tattha paṭhamapadasambandhe rūpenāti yena kenaci sahuppajjanakena rūpena.
tika-s0105t:264_4: Dutiyapadasambandhe pana “rūpenā”ti idaṃ yaṃ tato nirujjhamānacittato upari sattarasamacittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ,
tika-s0105t:264_5: tadeva tassa nirujjhamānacittassa nirodhena saddhiṃ nirujjhanakaṃ sattarasacittakkhaṇāyukaṃ rūpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:264_11: yathayidaṃ citta”nti evamādipāḷivacanehi ca virodho siyā.
tika-s0105t:264_12: Cittacetasikā hi sārammaṇasabhāvā yathābalaṃ attano ārammaṇapaccayabhūtamatthaṃ vibhāvento eva uppajjanti,
tika-s0105t:264_15: evaṃ tesaṃ pakāsetabbabhāvanipphatti soḷasahi cittehi hoti,
tika-s0105t:264_22: pacchājātapaccayo ca tathevāti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ samānakkhaṇatā na yujjateva,
tika-s0105t:264_23: tasmā vuttanayenevettha attho veditabboti ācariyena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:264_24: tadetaṃ cittānuparivattiyā viññattiyā ekanirodhabhāvassa suviññeyyattā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:264_25: Tato saviññattikena puretaraṃ sattarasamacittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannena rūpena saddhiṃ aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatīti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:264_31: taṃ nirujjhantaṃ aññassa pacchā uppajjamānassa anantarādipaccayabhāveneva nirujjhati,
tika-s0105t:264_34: Yadi evaṃ tesamubhinnaṃ antaro labbheyyāti codanaṃ “no”ti apanetumāha “avīci manusambandho”ti,
tika-s0105t:264_38: rūpasantāno ca nadīsotova nadiyaṃ udakappavāho viya vattatīti attho.
tika-s0105t:265_6: abhimukhadisānurūpagatesu vāmadakkhiṇapassesu vividhā pekkhananti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:265_12: pacchato āgacchantaparissayaparivajjanādīsu apalokitassa ca siyā sambhavoti āha “iminā vā”tiādi,
tika-s0105t:266_2: So hi āyasmā vipassanākāle “yamevāhaṃ indriyesu aguttadvārataṃ nissāya sāsane anabhiratiādivippakāraṃ patto,
tika-s0105t:266_5: teneva naṃ satthā “etadaggaṃ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ,
tika-s0105t:267_0: Sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā ālokitavilokitassāti ajjhāharitvā sambandho.
tika-s0105t:267_6: Yasmā pana ālokitādi nāma dhammamattasseva pavattiviseso,
tika-s0105t:267_7: tasmā tassa yāthāvato jānanaṃ asammohasampajaññanti dassetuṃ “abbhantare”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:267_14: Adho sīdatīti osīdantaṃ viya heṭṭhā gacchati.
tika-s0105t:267_15: Uddhaṃ laṅghetīti laṅghentaṃ viya upari gacchati.
tika-s0105t:268_0: Tatthāti tesu gāthāya dassitesu sattasu cittesu.
tika-s0105t:268_14: Tattha hi āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ puretaraṃ pavattāyonisomanasikāravasena ayoniso āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanākārena
tika-s0105t:268_15: pavattanato iṭṭhe itthirūpādimhi lobhasahagatamattaṃ javanaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0105t:268_19: tassa pana manodvārikassa rajjanadussanādino pañcadvārikajavanaṃ mūlaṃ,
tika-s0105t:268_25: Heṭṭhupariyavasenāti heṭṭhā ca upari ca parivattamānavasena,
tika-s0105t:268_27: Tathā bhavaṅguppādavasena hi tesaṃ bhijjitvā patanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:268_29: uparimassa ca bhavaṅgassa aparāparuppattivasena pañcadvārikajavanato visadisassa manodvārikajavanassa
tika-s0105t:269_3: Cakkhudvāre rūpassa āpāthagamanena āvajjanādīnaṃ pavattanato pavattikāraṇavaseneva “gehabhūte”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:270_4: Tatthāti tasmiṃ vacane ayaṃ upamāti attho.
tika-s0105t:270_5: Udayabbayaparicchinno tāva tattako kālo etesanti tāvakālikāni,
tika-s0105t:272_3: tabbinimuttako ko eko āloketi na tveva āloketi.
tika-s0105t:272_4: Ko ca eko viloketi natveva viloketīti attho.
tika-s0105t:273_4: āloko upanissayapaccayoti dassanassa suttantanayena pariyāyato paccayatā vuttā.
tika-s0105t:274_0: Idāni yathāpāṭhaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇesu sampajānaṃ vibhāvento “samiñjite pasārite”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:274_2: Taṃsamiñjanapasāraṇeneva hi sabbesaṃ hatthapādānaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:274_7: Yaṃ yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati sātthepi anatthepi samiñjituṃ,
tika-s0105t:275_1: Tadapariggahaṇe ādīnavadassaneneva pariggahaṇepi ānisaṃso vibhāvitoti tesamidha udāharaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:275_2: Mahācetiyaṅgaṇeti duṭṭhagāmaṇiraññā katassa hemamālīnāmakassa mahācetiyassa aṅgaṇe.
tika-s0105t:277_0: Evaṃ kirāha nattā te, duṭṭhagāmaṇi bhūpati.
tika-s0105t:280_0: Bhūmippadeso cettha aṅgaṇaṃ “udaṅgaṇe tattha papaṃ avindu”ntiādisu viya,
tika-s0105t:280_2: Teneva kāraṇena gihī jātoti kāyasaṃsaggasamāpajjanahetunā ukkaṇṭhito hutvā hīnāyāvatto.
tika-s0105t:280_4: Mahācetiyaṅgaṇepi cīvarakuṭiṃ katvā tattha sajjhāyaṃ gaṇhantīti vuttaṃ “cīvarakuṭidaṇḍake”ti,
tika-s0105t:280_6: “Maṇisappo nāma sīhaḷadīpe vijjamānā ekā sappajātīti vadantī”ti ācariyānandattherena,
tika-s0105t:280_8: aññe”ti vā avatvā “vadanti”cceva vacanañca sārato gahetabbatāviññāpanatthaṃ aññathā gahetabbassa avacanato,
tika-s0105t:281_1: Antevāsikehīti tattha nisinnesu bahūsu antevāsikesu ekena antevāsikena.
tika-s0105t:281_5: Tattha ṭhitānaṃ pucchantānaṃ saṅgahaṇavasena “tumhehī”ti puna puthuvacanakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t:281_6: Evaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo yassāti evarūpo niggahitalopavasena tena,
tika-s0105t:282_3: hatthapādādīhi vā taṃ taṃ ākāraṃ kurumānaṃ yāti gacchatīti yantaṃ,
tika-s0105t:282_7: Tathā hi naṃ potthena vatthena alaṅkariyattā potthalikā,
tika-s0105t:282_8: pañca aṅgāni yassā sajīvassevāti pañcālikāti ca voharanti.
tika-s0105t:283_0: Saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇeti ettha saṅghāṭicīvarānaṃ samānadhāraṇatāya ekatodassanaṃ ganthagarutāpanayanatthaṃ,
tika-s0105t:284_22: Aneneva yathāvuttamasappāyaṃ anekantaṃ tathārūpapaccayena kassaci kadāci sappāyasambhavato.
tika-s0105t:284_23: Idaṃ pana dvayaṃ ekantameva asappāyaṃ kassaci kadācipi sappāyābhāvatoti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:285_0: “Yo imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā attānaṃ na sammā payojeti,
tika-s0105t:287_9: veḷudānaṃ deti, patta, puppha, phala, sināna,
tika-s0105t:288_7: tabbasena uppannaṃ asappāyaṃ sīlavināsanena anatthāvahattāti attho.
tika-s0105t:288_8: Samāhāradvandepi hi katthaci pulliṅgapayogo dissati yathā “cittuppādo”ti.
tika-s0105t:288_10: atiaruciye ca dosādayoti āha “akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhantī”ti.
tika-s0105t:289_0: “Abbhantare attā nāmā”tiādinā saṅkhepato asammohasampajaññaṃ dassetvā “tattha cīvarampi acetana”ntiādinā
tika-s0105t:289_1: cīvarassa viya “kāyopi acetano”ti kāyassa attasuññatāvibhāvanena tamatthaṃ paridīpento “tasmā neva sundaraṃ
tika-s0105t:289_2: cīvaraṃ labhitvā”tiādinā vuttassa itarītarasantosassa kāraṇaṃ vibhāvetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:289_5: Attasuññatāvibhāvanena pana tadatthaṃ paridīpituṃ vuttaṃ “tattha cīvara”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t:289_6: Idāni attasuññatāvibhāvanassa payojanabhūtaṃ itarītarasantosasaṅkhātaṃ laddhaguṇaṃ pakāsento āha “tasmā neva sundara”ntiādīti.
tika-s0105t:290_9: Potthakarūpapaṭicchādane dhātuyo dhātusamūhaṃ paṭicchādenti viyāti sambandho.
tika-s0105t:291_2: Kehici sakkatassāpi kehici asakkatassa kāyassa upamānabhāvena yogyattā tesamidha kathanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:291_4: Attasuññatāya nāgavammikacetiyarukkhādīhi viya kāyasaṅkhātena attanā somanassaṃ vā domanassaṃ vā na kātabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:293_1: Cattāro vā pañca vā gaṇṭhikā catupañcagaṇṭhikā yathā “dvattipattā,
tika-s0105t:293_3: saddasseva attho idha padhāno catugaṇṭhikāhato vā pañcagaṇṭhikāhato vā patto dubbisodhanīyoti vikappanavasena atthassa gayhamānattā.
tika-s0105t:293_8: dubbisodhanīyatāmattena pana palibodhakaraṇato idha asappāyoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:293_11: “Maṇivaṇṇapatto pana lobhanīyo”ti iminā kiñcāpi so vinayapariyāyena kappiyo,
tika-s0105t:293_14: na vaṭṭatī”ti hi vinayaṭṭhakathāsu pacanakiriyāmattameva paṭikkhittaṃ.
tika-s0105t:293_15: Tathā hi vadanti “maṇivaṇṇaṃ pana pattaṃ aññena kataṃ labhitvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti “tādisañhi araññe
tika-s0105t:293_16: ekakassa nivāsantarāyakara”ntiādinā cīvare vuttanayena “nimittakammādivasena laddho pana ekantaakappiyo
tika-s0105t:293_17: sīlavināsanena anatthāvahattā”tiādinā amhehi vuttanayopi yathārahaṃ netabbo.
tika-s0105t:294_4: Rāgādipariḷāhajanakapattassa īdisameva upamānaṃ yuttanti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:295_3: Gavādīnañhi vaṇesu nīlamakkhikāhi katā anayabyasanahetubhūtā aṇḍakā āsāṭikā nāma vuccati.
tika-s0105t:295_17: Saṅkhāradukkhatādīhi niccāturassa kāyassa paribhogabhūtānaṃ pattacīvarānaṃ edisameva upamānamupapannanti tathā vacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:296_0: Asanādikiriyāya kammavisesayogato asitādipadeheva kammavisesasahito kiriyāviseso viññāyatīti vuttaṃ “asiteti piṇḍapātabhojane”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:297_0: Tattha piṇḍapātabhojanādīsu attho nāma iminā mahāsivattheravādavasena “imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā”tiādinā sutte vuttaṃ aṭṭhavidhampi payojanaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:297_1: Mahāsivatthero hi “heṭṭhā cattāri aṅgāni paṭikkhepo nāma,
tika-s0105t:297_2: upari pana aṭṭhaṅgāni payojanavasena samodhānetabbānī”ti vadati.
tika-s0105t:297_11: phāsuvihāro pana bhojanānisaṃsamattanti evaṃ aṭṭha aṅgāni payojanavasena samodhānetabbāni.
tika-s0105t:297_21: “anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cā”ti pana bhojanānisaṃsamattanti vuttāni aṭṭhaṅgāni idhānadhippetāni.
tika-s0105t:297_25: Nanu ca “nevadavāyātiādinā nayena vutto”ti mariyādavacanena dutiyanayasseva idhādhippetabhāvo viññāyatīti? Na,
tika-s0105t:297_30: tena pana “imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyātiādinā nayenā”ti vattabbanti.
tika-s0105t:298_0: Tidhā dente dvidhā gāhaṃ sandhāya “paṭiggahaṇaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:298_1: bhojanādigahaṇatthāya hatthaotāraṇaṃ bhuñjanādiatthāya ālopakaraṇantiādinā anukkamena bhuñjanādipayogo vāyodhātuvaseneva vibhāvito.
tika-s0105t:298_17: Jivhāsaṅkhātena hatthena āloḷitaviloḷitavasena ito cito ca parivattakaṃ jivhāhatthaparivattakaṃ. Kaṭacchu,
tika-s0105t:298_20: Idha pana yena bhojanādīni antokatvā gaṇhāti,
tika-s0105t:298_27: Pathavīsandhārakajalassa taṃsandhārakavāyunā viya paribhuttāhārassa vāyodhātunāva āmāsaye avaṭṭhānanti dasseti “vāyodhātuvaseneva tiṭṭhatī”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:298_28: Tathā paribhuttañhi āhāraṃ vāyodhātu heṭṭhā ca tiriyañca ghanaṃ parivaṭumaṃ katvā yāva pakkā sannirujjhanavasena āmāsaye patiṭṭhitaṃ karotīti.
tika-s0105t:298_29: Uddhanaṃ nāma yattha ukkhaliyādīni patiṭṭhāpetvā pacanti,
tika-s0105t:298_36: Vītiharatīti tato kucchiyaṃ vimissaṃ karonto haratī”ti ācariyadhammapālatthero,
tika-s0105t:298_39: Tadubhayampi atthato ekameva ubhayatthāpi kucchisambandhamattaṃ haraṇasseva adhippetattā.
tika-s0105t:299_8: Tāni pana āhārassa dhāraṇaparivattanasañcuṇṇanavisosanāni pathavīsahitā eva vāyodhātu kātuṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0105t:299_12: Allattañca anupāletīti yathā vāyodhātuādīhi ativiya sosanaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0105t:299_17: Taṃtaṃvijānanassa paccayabhūto taṃnipphādakoyeva payogo sammāpayogo nāma.
tika-s0105t:299_26: “Abbhantare attā nāma koci bhuñjanako natthī”tiādinā ābhujati samannāharati,
tika-s0105t:300_4: Paribhogatoti dantamusalehi sañcuṇṇetvā jivhāya samparivattanakkhaṇeyeva antarahitavaṇṇagandhasaṅkhāravisesaṃ
tika-s0105t:300_5: suvānadoṇiyaṃ suvānavamathu viya paramajegucchaṃ āhāraṃ paribhuñjanato.
tika-s0105t:300_6: Āsayatoti evaṃ paribhuttassa āhārassa pittasemhapubbalohitāsayabhāvūpagamanena paramajigucchanahetubhūtato
tika-s0105t:300_8: Āsayati ekajjhaṃ pavattamānopi kammabalavavatthito hutvā mariyādavasena aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato tiṭṭhati pavattati etthāti hi āsayo,
tika-s0105t:300_12: Nidheti yathābhutto āhāro nicito hutvā tiṭṭhati etthāti hi āmāsayo “nidhāna”nti vuccati.
tika-s0105t:300_17: asammāparipaccamānassa ca bhuttāhārassa yathākkamaṃ kesādikuṇapadadduādirogābhinipphattisaṅkhātapayojanatoti vā attho.
tika-s0105t:300_19: Nissandanatoti akkhikaṇṇādīsu anekadvāresu ito cito ca vissandanato.
tika-s0105t:303_2: Sabbattha āhāre paṭikkūlatā paccavekkhitabbāti saha pāṭhasesena yojanā.
tika-s0105t:303_4: Sammakkhanaṃ pana paribhogādīsu labbhamānampi nissandavasena visesato paṭikkūlanti sabbapacchā ṭhapitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:304_1: yathāvuttena vā tejena paripaccanato uccārapassāvabhāvaṃ pattakāle.
tika-s0105t:306_1: tassa kāmatāya nikkhamananti bālamaññanaṃ nivattetuṃ “akāmatāyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:306_2: attano anicchāya apayogena vāyodhātuvipphāreneva nikkhamatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:306_6: “Sannicitā uccārapassāvā”ti vatvā “so panāyaṃ uccārapassāvo”ti puna vacanaṃ samāhāradvandepi pulliṅgapayogassa sambhavatādassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:306_8: Attanā nirapekkhaṃ nissaṭṭhattā neva attano atthāya santakaṃ vā hoti,
tika-s0105t:307_1: pacchato ca kāyassa atiharaṇaṃ vuttanti idha gamanameva gahita”nti ācariyānandattherena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:307_5: pacchato ca kāyātiharaṇassa tadavinābhāvato padavītihāraniyamitāya gamanakiriyāya eva saṅgahitattā,
tika-s0105t:308_0: “Ettha ca eko iriyāpatho dvīsu ṭhānesu āgato.
tika-s0105t:308_1: So heṭṭhā ‘abhikkante paṭikkante’ti ettha bhikkhācāragāmaṃ gacchato ca āgacchato ca addhānagamanavasena kathito.
tika-s0105t:308_2: ‘Gate ṭhite nisinne’ti ettha vihāre cuṇṇikapāduddhārairiyāpathavasena kathitoti veditabbo”ti.
tika-s0105t:309_1: na pana atthabhedoti dassetuṃ “gacchanto vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:309_4: majjhimanikāye ca saṅgīte satipaṭṭhānasutte addhānairiyāpathāti cirapavattakā dīghakālikā iriyāpathā
tika-s0105t:309_11: aññattha vā ito cito ca parivattanādivasena pavattā appamattakabhāvena cuṇṇavicuṇṇiyabhūtā iriyāpathā.
tika-s0105t:309_14: khuddakā hutvā vuttanayena cuṇṇikā iriyāpathāti attho.
tika-s0105t:311_0: Gamanaṭhānanisajjānaṃ viya nisīdanasayanassa kamavacanamayuttaṃ yebhuyyena tathā kamābhāvatoti “uṭṭhāya” micceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:312_2: Divāseyyasikkhāpade viya piṭṭhipasāraṇassāpi sayanairiyāpathabhāvena ekalakkhaṇattā etthāvarodhanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:312_9: Āvajjanavasena hi bhavaṅgupacchede sati vīthicittāni uppajjantīti.
tika-s0105t:312_13: taṭṭīkāhi ca viruddhattā na porāṇapāṭhoti veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:312_19: Appavattanti niddokkamanakāle anuppajjanaṃ suttaṃ nāmāti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0105t:312_21: itarathā chadvārikacittānaṃ purecarānucaravasena uppajjantānaṃ sabbesampi dvāravimuttacittānaṃ pavattaṃ suttaṃ nāma siyā,
tika-s0105t:312_22: evañca katvā niddokkamanakālato aññasmiṃ kāle uppajjantānaṃ dvāravimuttacittānampi pavattaṃ jāgarite saṅgayhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:313_0: Cittassa payogakāraṇabhūte oṭṭhādike paṭicca yathāsakaṃ ṭhāne saddo jāyatīti āha “oṭṭhe ca paṭiccā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:313_6: Na hi “oṭṭhe ca paṭiccā”tiādinā sasamuccayena kammavacanena ṭhānavacanaṃ sambhavatīti.
tika-s0105t:313_8: Bhāsanassa paṭisañcikkhanavirodhato tuṇhībhāvapakkhe “aparabhāge bhāsito iti paṭisañcikkhatī”ti na vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:314_0: Bhāsanatuṇhībhāvānaṃ sabhāvato bhede sati ayaṃ vibhāgo yutto siyā,
tika-s0105t:315_0: Yasmā pana mahāsivattheravāde anantare anantare iriyāpathe pavattarūpārūpadhammānaṃ tattha tattheva nirodhadassanavasena sampajānakāritā gahitā,
tika-s0105t:315_5: Asammohasaṅkhātaṃ dhuraṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ yassa vacanassāti asammohadhuraṃ,
tika-s0105t:315_6: mahāsatipaṭṭhānasutteyeva tassa vacanassa adhippetabhāvassa hetugabbhamidaṃ vacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:315_7: Yasmā panettha sabbampi catubbidhaṃ sampajaññaṃ labbhati yāvadeva sāmaññaphalavisesadassanapadhānattā imissā desanāya,
tika-s0105t:315_8: tasmā taṃ idha adhippetanti dassetuṃ “imasmiṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:315_11: atha kasmā sampajaññavaseneva vitthāro katoti codanaṃ sodhento “sampajānakārīti cā”tiādimāha,
tika-s0105t:315_12: satisampayuttasseva sampajānassa vasena atthassa viditabbattā evaṃ vitthāro katoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:315_13: “Satisampayuttassevā”ti ca iminā yathā sampajaññassa kiccato padhānatā gahitā,
tika-s0105t:315_15: na panetaṃ satiyā sampajaññena saha bhāvamattadassanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:315_16: Na hi kadāci satirahitā ñāṇappavatti atthīti.
tika-s0105t:316_1: atha kasmā satisampayuttassa sampajaññassa vasena attho veditabboti codanampi sodheti “satisampajaññena
tika-s0105t:316_2: samannāgatoti etassa hi padassa ayaṃ vitthāro”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:316_4: “satisampajaññena samannāgato”ti evaṃ ekato uddiṭṭhassa atthassa vitthārattā uddese viya niddesepi tadubhayaṃ samadhurabhāveneva gahitanti.
tika-s0105t:316_5: Imināpi hi satiyā sampajaññena samadhurataṃyeva vibhāveti ekato uddiṭṭhassa atthassa vitthārabhāvadassanena tadatthassa siddhattā.
tika-s0105t:316_6: Idāni vibhaṅganayenāpi tadatthaṃ samatthetuṃ “vibhaṅgappakaraṇe panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:316_7: Imināpi hi sampajaññassa viya satiyāpettha padhānataṃyeva vibhāveti.
tika-s0105t:316_8: Tattha etāni padānīti “abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hotī”tiādīni uddesapadāni.
tika-s0105t:316_9: Vibhattānevāti satiyā sampajaññena sampayogamakatvā sabbaṭṭhānesu visuṃ visuṃ vibhattāniyeva.
tika-s0105t:317_2: eko bhikkhu gacchanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento gacchati,
tika-s0105t:317_4: Tathā eko tiṭṭhanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0105t:317_6: Eko nisīdanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento nisīdati,
tika-s0105t:317_8: Eko sayanto aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ vitakkento sayati,
tika-s0105t:317_10: Ettakena pana gocarasampajaññaṃ na pākaṭaṃ hotīti caṅkamanena dīpenti.
tika-s0105t:317_11: Yo hi bhikkhu caṅkamaṃ otaritvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ṭhito pariggaṇhāti “pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattā rūpārūpadhammā
tika-s0105t:317_13: pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattāpi pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
tika-s0105t:317_14: caṅkamanavemajjhe pavattā ubho koṭiyo appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
tika-s0105t:317_15: caṅkamane pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ṭhānaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā,
tika-s0105t:317_17: nisajjāya pavattā sayanaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā”ti evaṃ pariggaṇhanto pariggaṇhantoyeva bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti,
tika-s0105t:317_19: Ayaṃ bhikkhu gatādīsu sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
tika-s0105t:318_0: Evaṃ pana sutte kammaṭṭhānaṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:318_3: tāva caṅkamitvā ṭhatvā nisīditvā sayamāno evaṃ pariggahetvā sayati “kāyo acetano,
tika-s0105t:318_8: Evaṃ pariggaṇhanto pariggaṇhantoyeva cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti,
tika-s0105t:319_3: tasmiṃ sati jāgaritaṃ nāma hotī”ti pariggaṇhanto bhikkhu jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma.
tika-s0105t:319_4: Apica rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pañca koṭṭhāse jaggantopi jāgarite sampajānakārī nāma hoti.
tika-s0105t:320_1: bāttiṃsa tiracchānakathā pahāya dasakathāvatthunissitaṃ sappāyakathaṃ kathentopi bhāsite sampajānakārī nāma.
tika-s0105t:321_0: Aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ manasikāraṃ pavattentopi dutiyajjhānaṃ samāpannopi tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī nāma.
tika-s0105t:321_1: Dutiyañhi jhānaṃ vacīsaṅkhāravirahato visesato tuṇhībhāvo nāmāti.
tika-s0105t:321_2: Ayampi nayo purimanayato visesanayattā idhāpi āharitvā vattabbo.
tika-s0105t:321_3: Tathā hesa abhidhammaṭṭhakathādīsu “ayaṃ panettha aparopi nayo”ti ārabhitvā yathāvuttanayo vibhāvitoti.
tika-s0105t:321_8: Evanti iminā vuttappakārena abhikkantapaṭikkantādīsu sattasu ṭhānesu paccekaṃ catubbidhena pakārenāti attho.
tika-s0105t:323_1: Atthadassanena padassapi viññāyamānattā padamanapekkhitvā santosassa attani atthitāya bhikkhu santuṭṭhoti
tika-s0105t:323_3: Santussati na luddho bhavatīti hi padanibbacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:323_4: Apica padanibbacanavasena atthe vutte yassa santosassa attani atthibhāvato santuṭṭho nāma,
tika-s0105t:323_5: so apākaṭoti taṃ pākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ “itarītarapaccayasantosena samannāgato”ti atthamattamāha,
tika-s0105t:323_6: cīvarādike yattha katthaci kappiyapaccaye santosena samaṅgībhūtoti attho. Itara-
tika-s0105t:323_7: saddo hi aniyamavacano dvikkhattuṃ vuccamāno yaṃ kiñci-
tika-s0105t:323_10: Atha vā itaraṃ vuccati hīnaṃ paṇītato aññattā,
tika-s0105t:323_13: tasmā hīnena vā paṇītena vā cīvarādikappiyapaccayena santosena samaṅgībhūtoti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0105t:325_3: Paṭhamena appattapatthanābhāveyeva vutte yathāladdhato aññassa apatthanā nāma appicchatāyapi siyā pavattiākāroti
tika-s0105t:325_4: appicchatāpasaṅgabhāvato tatopi nivattameva santosassa sarūpaṃ dassetuṃ dutiyena pattapatthanābhāvo vuttoti
tika-s0105t:325_9: saha vā sīlādīhi guṇabhāgehi vattatīti sabhāgo,
tika-s0105t:325_11: Taṃ parivattetvāti pakatidubbalādīnaṃ garucīvaraṃ na phāsubhāvāvahaṃ,
tika-s0105t:325_14: Atricchatādippakārena hi parivattetvā lahukacīvaraparibhogo santosavirodhī hoti,
tika-s0105t:325_15: tassa pana tadabhāvato yathāvuttappayojanavasena parivattetvā lahukacīvaraparibhogopi na santosavirodhīti āha “lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hotī”ti.
tika-s0105t:325_16: Payojanavasena parivattetvā lahukacīvaraparibhogopi na tāva santosavirodhī,
tika-s0105t:325_17: pageva tathā aparivattetvā paribhogeti sambhāvitassa atthassa dassanatthañhettha api-
tika-s0105t:325_19: Cīvaraniddesepi “pattacīvarādīnaṃ aññatara”nti vacanaṃ yathārutaṃ gahitāvasesapaccayasantosassa cīvarasantose samavarodhitādassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:325_20: “Therako ayamāyasmā mallako”tiādīsu theravohārassa paññattimattepi pavattito dasavassato pabhuti ciravassapabbajitesveva
tika-s0105t:325_27: Tathā cāhu “nantakaṃ kappaṭo jiṇṇavasanaṃ tu paṭaccara”nti natthi dasāsaṅkhāto anto koṭi yesanti hi nantakāni, na-
tika-s0105t:325_29: Saṅketakovidānaṃ pana ācariyānaṃ tathā avuttattā vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:325_31: nantakena saha saṃsibbitāni paṃsukūlāni cīvarānīti attho.
tika-s0105t:325_35: bahūni vā cīvarāni labhitvā tāni vissajjetvā tadaññassa gahaṇampi mahicchatādinaye aṭṭhatvā yathāsāruppanaye
tika-s0105t:325_38: Yathāsāruppanayena yathāladdhaṃ vissajjetvā tadaññagahaṇampi na tāva santosavirodhī,
tika-s0105t:325_39: pageva anaññagahaṇena yathāladdhasseva yathāsāruppaṃ paribhogeti sambhāvitassa atthassa dassanatthañhettha api-
tika-s0105t:326_2: paribhuñjanañca visesato yuttataranti atthantaraṃ viññāpetuṃ “yāpentopī”ti avatvā “samaṇadhammaṃ karontopī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:326_3: Missakāhāranti taṇḍulamuggādīhi nānāvidhapubbaṇṇāparaṇṇehi missetvā kataṃ āhāraṃ.
tika-s0105t:327_0: Aññampi senāsane yathāsāruppasantosaṃ dassento āha “yo hī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:327_2: dutiye pana yathāpattassa asampaṭicchanena yathāsāruppasantoso vuttoti ayametesaṃ viseso. Hi-
tika-s0105t:327_6: “Uttamasenāsanaṃ nāma pamādaṭṭhāna”nti vatvā tabbhāvameva dassetuṃ “tattha nisinnassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:327_7: Niddābhibhūtassāti thinamiddokkamanena cittacetasikagelaññabhāvato bhavaṅgasantatisaṅkhātāya niddāya abhibhūtassa,
tika-s0105t:327_9: Paṭibujjhatoti tathārūpena ārammaṇantarena paṭibujjhantassa paṭibujjhanahetu kāmavitakkā pātubhavantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:328_1: tesaṃ vā yena kenaci santakenāti ajjhāharitvā sambandho.
tika-s0105t:328_6: Catumadhuranti majjhimāgamavare mahādhammasamādānasutte vuttaṃ dadhimadhusappiphāṇitasaṅkhātaṃ catumadhuraṃ,
tika-s0105t:328_7: ekasmiñca bhājane catumadhuraṃ ṭhapetvā tesu yadicchasi,
tika-s0105t:328_10: Buddhādīhi vaṇṇitanti “pūtimuttabhesajjaṃ nissāya pabbajjā”tiādinā sammāsambuddhādīhi pasatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:328_11: Appicchatāvisiṭṭhāya santuṭṭhiyā niyojanato paramena ukkaṃsagatena santosena santussatīti paramasantuṭṭho.
tika-s0105t:329_0: Kāmañca santosappabhedā yathāvuttatopi adhikatarā cīvare vīsati santosā,
tika-s0105t:329_4: idha pana saṅkhepena dvādasavidhoyeva santoso vutto.
tika-s0105t:329_7: Evaṃ “idha mahārāja bhikkhu santuṭṭho hotī”ti ettha puggalādhiṭṭhānaniddiṭṭhena santuṭṭhapadeneva santosappabhedaṃ
tika-s0105t:329_8: dassetvā idāni “kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātenā”tiādi desanānurūpaṃ tena santosena
tika-s0105t:329_10: tassa ca kāyakucchiparihāriyabhāvaṃ vibhāvento evamāhāti ayamettha sambandho.
tika-s0105t:329_11: Kāmañcassa cīvarapiṇḍapāteheva yathākkamaṃ kāyakucchiparihāriyehi santuṭṭhatā pāḷiyaṃ vuttā,
tika-s0105t:329_13: sabbattha ca kāyakucchiparihāriyatā laddhabbāti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ayaṃ vinicchayo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:329_16: Vuttampi cetaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu “na hetaṃ katthacipi pāḷiyamāgata”nti.
tika-s0105t:330_4: tasmiṃ vā yogo yuttoti yuttayogo, tassa.
tika-s0105t:331_1: kāyassa vā parihāro posanamattaṃ payojanametehīti kāyaparihāriyā ka-
tika-s0105t:331_8: ajjhoharaṇavasena sarīraṭṭhitiyā upakārakabhāvena kucchiparihāriyatāti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-s0105t:331_12: evaṃ vuttanayena kāyaparihāriyaṃ hotīti kāraṇajotane vā,
tika-s0105t:333_0: Aṅgaṃ nāma mañcapīṭhānaṃ pādūpari ṭhapito padhānasambhāraviseso.
tika-s0105t:334_3: Seyyaṃ pavisantassāti paccattharaṇakuñcikānaṃ tādise kāle paribhuttabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:334_5: Attano santakabhāvena paccattharaṇādhiṭṭhānena adhiṭṭhahitvā tattheva senāsane tiṭṭhanakañhi “tatraṭṭhaka”nti vuccati.
tika-s0105t:334_13: Nanu santuṭṭhapuggaladassane santuṭṭhova aṭṭhaparikkhāriko dassetabboti anuyoge yathārahaṃ tesampi santuṭṭhabhāvaṃ dassento “etesu cā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:334_16: ācariyadhammapālattherena pana “mahāgajā”ti pāṭhassa diṭṭhattā “dupposabhāvena mahāgajā viyāti mahāgajā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:334_21: kimetesampi vasena ayaṃ desanā icchitāti codanaṃ sodhetuṃ “bhagavā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:334_22: Aṭṭhaparikkhārikassa vasena imissā desanāya icchitabhāvo kathaṃ viññāyatīti anuyogampi apaneti “so hī”tiādinā,
tika-s0105t:334_23: tasseva tathā pakkantabhāvena “kāyaparihārikena cīvarenā”tiādi pāḷiyā yogyato tassa vasena icchitabhāvo viññāyatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:334_24: Vacanīyassa hetubhāvadassanena hi vācakassāpi hetubhāvo dassitoti.
tika-s0105t:334_25: Evañca katvā “iti imassā”tiādi laddhaguṇavacanampi upapannaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:334_33: ṭīkāyaṃ pana paṭhamassa vacanatthassa heṭṭhā vuttattā dutiyova idha vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:335_1: “ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā”tiādinā vā nayena brahmavihārabhāvanāpharaṇaṭṭhānabhūtā catasso disā etassāti catuddiso,
tika-s0105t:335_5: Tāsveva disāsu katthacipi satte vā saṅkhāre vā bhayena na paṭihanati,
tika-s0105t:335_6: sayaṃ vā tehi na paṭihaññateti appaṭigho.
tika-s0105t:335_21: Eko careti asahāyo ekākī hutvā carituṃ viharituṃ sakkuṇeyya.
tika-s0105t:335_23: saddo yathā “ko imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti khaggavisāṇakappatāya ekavihārīti dasseti “khaggavisāṇakappo”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:335_24: Saṇṭhānena khaggasadisaṃ ekameva matthake uṭṭhitaṃ visāṇaṃ yassāti khaggo;
tika-s0105t:335_30: Apica ekavihāritāya khaggavisāṇakappoti dassetumpi evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:336_0: Evaṃ vaṇṇitanti khaggavisāṇasutte bhagavatā tathā desanāya vivaritaṃ,
tika-s0105t:336_2: Khaggassa nāma migassa visāṇena kappo sadiso tathā. Kappa-
tika-s0105t:336_3: saddo hettha “satthukappena vata bho kira sāvakena saddhiṃ mantayamānā”tiādīsu viya paṭibhāge vattati,
tika-s0105t:337_2: idha pana ḍetuṃ samattho sapakkhikova adhippetoti visesadassanatthaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “pakkhī sakuṇo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:337_3: na tu “ākāse antalikkhe caṅkamatī”tiādīsu viya pariyāyamattadassanatthanti āha “pakkhayutto sakuṇo”ti.
tika-s0105t:337_10: Attano pattaṃ eva bhāro yassāti sapattabhāro.
tika-s0105t:337_13: Yena kāmanti yattha attano ruci, tattha.
tika-s0105t:337_15: Yena yathā pavatto kāmoti hi yenakāmo, taṃ,
tika-s0105t:339_1: Pubbe vuttasseva atthacatukkassa puna sampiṇḍetvā kathanaṃ kimatthanti adhippāyena anuyogaṃ uddharitvā sodheti “so…pe…
tika-s0105t:339_4: Ime cattāroti sīlasaṃvaro indriyasaṃvaro sampajaññaṃ santosoti pubbe vuttā cattāro āraññikassa sambhārā.
tika-s0105t:339_5: Na ijjhatīti na sampajjati na saphalo bhavati.
tika-s0105t:339_7: atha kho ayampi dosoti dasseti “tiracchānagatehi vā”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:339_8: Vattabbataṃ āpajjatīti “asukassa bhikkhuno araññe tiracchānagatānaṃ viya,
tika-s0105t:339_10: na pana araññavāsānucchavikā kāci sammāpaṭipatti atthī”ti apavādavasena vacanīyabhāvamāpajjati,
tika-s0105t:339_14: vanacaravisabhāgajanehi vā saddhiṃ vippaṭipattivasena vasanīyabhāvaṃ āpajjati.
tika-s0105t:339_19: Tathā hi vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyampi vuttaṃ “evarūpassa hi araññavāso kāḷamakkaṭaacchataracchadīpimigānaṃ aṭavivāsasadiso hotī”ti adhivatthāti adhivasantā.
tika-s0105t:339_21: Tāvatā apalāyantassa hatthehipi sīsaṃ paharitvā palāpanākāraṃ karontīti ācariyasāriputtattherena kathitaṃ.
tika-s0105t:339_22: Evaṃ byatirekato paccayasampattiyā dassitabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā idāni anvayatopi pakāsetuṃ “yassa panete”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:342_2: Idha pana paṇṇattivītikkamasaṅkhātaṃ thullavajjaṃ kāḷakasadisattā kāḷakaṃ,
tika-s0105t:342_3: micchāvītikkamasaṅkhātaṃ aṇumattavajjaṃ tilakasadisattā tilakanti ayaṃ viseso.
tika-s0105t:342_7: viparīto vā hutvā ayanaṭṭhena vayotipi vuccati.
tika-s0105t:342_11: tattha tattha devatānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā tassa yaso patthaṭoti vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:342_12: evañca katvā heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ayasapattharaṇampi devatānamārocanavasenāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:343_2: Taṃ pana janasaddanigghosābhāvena veditabbaṃ saddakaṇṭakattā jhānassāti dassetuṃ “appasaddaṃ appanigghosanti attho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:343_4: Tathā hi vuttaṃ vibhaṅge “yadeva taṃ appanigghosaṃ,
tika-s0105t:343_10: Majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāvaṇṇanāyaṃ pana ācariyadhammapālatthero evamāha “appasaddassa parittapariyāyaṃ manasi katvā vuttaṃ ‘byañjanaṃ sāvasesaṃ siyā’ti.
tika-s0105t:343_12: Appasaddo panettha abhāvatthotipi sakkā viññātuṃ ‘appābādhatañca sañjānāmī’tiādīsu viyā”ti.
tika-s0105t:343_14: Etadevāti ca mayā saṃvaṇṇiyamānaṃ nissaddataṃ evāti attho.
tika-s0105t:343_15: Santikepīti gāmādīnaṃ samīpepi edisaṃ vivittaṃ nāma,
tika-s0105t:343_18: Yassa senāsanassa samantā gāvutampi aḍḍhayojanampi pabbatagahanaṃ vanagahanaṃ nadīgahanaṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:344_1: Vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ nidassananayena sarūpato dassitasenāsanasseva hi ayaṃ vibhāgo.
tika-s0105t:344_12: Tassa kira ekapasse bhitti uccatarā hoti,
tika-s0105t:345_3: Pāsādoti dve kaṇṇikāni gahetvā kato dīghapāsādo.
tika-s0105t:345_4: Aṭṭoti paṭirājādipaṭibāhanatthaṃ iṭṭhakāhi kato bahalabhittiko catupañcabhūmako patissayaviseso.
tika-s0105t:345_7: Leṇanti pabbataṃ khaṇitvā vā pabbhārassa appahonakaṭṭhāne kuṭṭaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā vā katasenāsanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:345_8: Guhāti bhūmidari vā yattha rattindivaṃ dīpaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-s0105t:346_15: Cimilikā nāma sudhāparikammakatāya bhūmiyā vaṇṇānurakkhaṇatthaṃ paṭakhaṇḍādīhi sibbetvā katā.
tika-s0105t:346_16: Cammakhaṇḍo nāma sīhabyagghadīpitaracchacammādīsupi yaṃ kiñci cammaṃ.
tika-s0105t:346_17: Aṭṭhakathāsu hi senāsanaparibhoge paṭikkhittacammaṃ na dissati.
tika-s0105t:346_21: Yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantīti ṭhapetvā vā etāni mañcādīni yattha bhikkhū sannipatanti,
tika-s0105t:346_22: sabbametaṃ senāsanaṃ nāmāti evaṃ vuttaṃ avasesaṃ rukkhamūlādipaṭikkamitabbaṭṭhānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇābhāvato kevalaṃ sayanassa,
tika-s0105t:346_24: Senāsanaggahaṇenāti “vivittaṃ senāsana”nti iminā senāsanasaddena vivittasenāsanassa vā ādānena,
tika-s0105t:346_25: vacanena vā gahitameva sāmaññajotanāya visese avaṭṭhānato,
tika-s0105t:347_0: Yadevaṃ kasmā “arañña”ntiādi puna vuttanti anuyogena “idha panassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:347_1: Evaṃ gahitesupi senāsanesu yathāvuttassa bhikkhuno anucchavikameva senāsanaṃ dassetukāmattā puna evaṃ vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:347_2: “Bhikkhunīnaṃ vasena āgata”nti idaṃ vinaye āgatameva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:347_4: Vinaye hi gaṇamhāohīyanasikkhāpade bhikkhunīnaṃ āraññakadhutaṅgassa paṭikkhittattā idampi ca tāsaṃ araññaṃ nāma,
tika-s0105t:347_5: na pana pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchimaṃ araññameva senāsanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:348_0: “Ekā vā gaṇamhā ohīyeyyāti agāmake araññe dutiyikāya bhikkhuniyā dassanūpacāraṃ vā savanūpacāraṃ vā vijahantiyā āpatti thullaccayassa,
tika-s0105t:349_1: Abhidhamme pana “araññanti nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā sabbametaṃ arañña”nti āgataṃ.
tika-s0105t:349_5: taṃ araññanti nippariyāyena dassetuṃ tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:349_6: Indakhīlā bahi nikkhamitvā yaṃ ṭhānaṃ pavattaṃ,
tika-s0105t:349_9: pacchimanti idaṃ pana suttantanayena āraññakasikkhāpade āraññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ imassa bhikkhuno anurūpaṃ,
tika-s0105t:349_10: tasmā visuddhimagge dhutaṅganiddese yaṃ tassa lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:350_3: Vuttañhetaṃ “yāvatā majjhanhike kāle samantā chāyā pharati,
tika-s0105t:350_8: saddo pana avisesato pabbatapariyāyoti katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:350_10: Disāsu khāyamānāsūti dasasu disāsu abhimukhībhāvena dissamānāsu.
tika-s0105t:350_11: Tathārūpenapi kāraṇena siyā cittassa ekaggatāti etaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:350_15: taṃ kandaranti apabbatapadesepi vidugganadīnivattanapadesaṃ kandaranti dassetī”ti ācariyānandatthero,
tika-s0105t:350_17: Nadīnivattanapadeso ca nāma nadiyā nikkhamanaudakena puna nivattitvā gato viduggapadeso.
tika-s0105t:350_18: “Apabbatapadesepī”ti vadanto pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ nidassanamattena paṭhamaṃ pabbatapadesanti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:350_19: yathāvutto pana nadīpadesopi kandaro evāti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:351_2: “Dvinnaṃ pabbatānampi āsannatare ṭhitānaṃ ovarakādisadisaṃ vivaraṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:351_3: ekasmiṃyeva pana pabbate umaṅgasadisa”nti vadanti ācariyā.
tika-s0105t:351_4: Ekasmiṃyeva hi umaṅgasadisaṃ antoleṇaṃ hoti upari paṭicchannattā,
tika-s0105t:351_10: “taṃ gahetvā suduṅgāya ravantaṃ yakkhinī khipī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0105t:351_11: Manussānaṃ anupacāraṭṭhānanti pakatisañcāravasena manussehi na sañcaritabbaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0105t:351_18: vanapatthanti na manussūpacārānametaṃ senāsanānaṃ adhivacana”nti imaṃ vibhaṅgapāḷisesaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0105t:351_22: tasmā patthasadisaṃ vanaṃ vanapatthoti visesanaparanipāto daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0105t:351_23: Sabbesaṃ sabbāsu disāsu abhimukho okāso abbhokāsoti āha “acchanna”nti,
tika-s0105t:351_24: kenaci chadanena antamaso rukkhasākhāyapi na chāditanti attho.
tika-s0105t:351_25: Daṇḍakānaṃ upari cīvaraṃ chādetvā katā cīvarakuṭi.
tika-s0105t:352_4: tasmā parisamantato aṅkanaṃ āsanaṃ pallaṅko ra-
tika-s0105t:352_8: dakkhiṇoruñca samaṃ ṭhapetvā ubhinnaṃ pādānaṃ aññamaññasambandhanakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t:352_11: na āharimehi vāḷehi katoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:352_12: Ābhujitvāti ca yathā pallaṅkavasena nisajjā hoti,
tika-s0105t:352_13: tathā ubho pāde ābhugge samiñjite katvā,
tika-s0105t:352_14: taṃ pana ubhinnaṃ pādānaṃ tathābandhatākaraṇamevāti āha “bandhitvā”ti.
tika-s0105t:352_16: saddo uparimakāyavisayo heṭṭhimakāyassa anujukaṃ ṭhapanassa nisajjāvacaneneva viññāpitattāti vuttaṃ “uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujuṃ ṭhapetvā”ti.
tika-s0105t:352_17: Taṃ pana uparimakāyassa ujukaṃ ṭhapanaṃ sarūpato dasseti “aṭṭhārasā”tiādinā,
tika-s0105t:352_18: aṭṭhārasannaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhikānaṃ koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādanameva tathā ṭhapananti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:353_7: Na paripatatīti na vigacchati vīthiṃ na vilaṅgheti.
tika-s0105t:353_8: Tato eva pubbenāparaṃ visesappattiyā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuddhiṃ phātiṃ vepullaṃ upagacchati.
tika-s0105t:353_10: bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato nivāretvā kammaṭṭhānaṃyeva purakkhatvāti attho.
tika-s0105t:353_11: Parisaddassa samīpatthataṃ dasseti “mukhasamīpe vā katvā”ti iminā,
tika-s0105t:353_12: mukhassa samīpe viya citte nibaddhaṃ upaṭṭhāpanavasena katvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:354_0: Ettha ca yathā “vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajatī”tiādinā bhāvanānurūpaṃ senāsanaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0105t:354_1: evaṃ “nisīdatī”ti iminā alīnānuddhaccapakkhiko santo iriyāpatho dassito,
tika-s0105t:354_17: tatoyeva ca niyyānabhūtaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ katvāti attho”ti ayaṃ ācariyānandattherassa mati.
tika-s0105t:355_6: Suttesu ca dissati “luccatīti kho bhikkhu lokoti vuccati.
tika-s0105t:355_12: pana idha ca adhunā potthake “luccanapaluccanaṭṭhenā”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-s0105t:355_17: cutibhaṅgavasena ca paluccanasabhāvato loko nāmā”ti (vaṃsatthapakāsiniyaṃ nāma mahāvaṃsaṭīkāyaṃ paṭhamaparicchede
tika-s0105t:355_18: pañcamagāthā vaṇṇanāyaṃ) keci pana “bhijjanauppajjanaṭṭhenā”ti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0105t:355_21: Apica ācariyehipi “luccanapaluccanaṭṭhenā”ti pāṭhameva ulliṅgetvā tathā attho vutto siyā,
tika-s0105t:355_22: pacchā pana paramparābhatavasena pamādalekhattā tattha tattha na diṭṭhoti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0105t:355_23: na luccati na paluccatīti yo gahitopi tathā na hoti,
tika-s0105t:355_25: aniccānupassanāya vā luccati bhijjati vinassatīti gahetabbova lokoti taṃgahaṇarahitānaṃ lokuttarānaṃ natthi lokatā,
tika-s0105t:355_27: Evaṃ tattha tattha vacanatopi yathāvutto kesañci attho na yuttoti.
tika-s0105t:356_1: Vikkhambhanavasenāti ettha vikkhambhanaṃ tadaṅgappahānavaseneva anuppādanaṃ appavattanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:356_6: Evaṃ pana pubbabhāgabhāvanāya tathā pahānatoyevetaṃ cittaṃ vigatābhijjhaṃ nāma,
tika-s0105t:356_7: na tu cakkhuviññāṇamiva sabhāvato abhijjhāvirahitattāti dassetuṃ “na cakkhuviññāṇasadisenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:356_11: anāgate ca puna anādānassa karaṇaṃ parisodhanaṃ nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:356_12: Yathā ca imassa cittassa pubbabhāgabhāvanāya parisodhitattā vigatābhijjhatā,
tika-s0105t:356_16: nibbicikicchatā ca veditabbāti nidassento “byāpādapadosaṃ pahāyātiādīsupi eseva nayo”ti āha.
tika-s0105t:356_23: “yā tasmiṃ samaye kāyassa akallatā”tiādinā ca middhassa abhidhamme niddiṭṭhattā “thinaṃ cittagelaññaṃ,
tika-s0105t:356_25: Satipi hi thinamiddhassa aññamaññaṃ avippayoge cittakāyalahutādīnaṃ viya cittacetasikānaṃ yathākkamaṃ
tika-s0105t:356_30: Rattimpi divāpi tassa sañjānanasamatthā saññā ālokasaññā,
tika-s0105t:356_31: tassā ca vigatanīvaraṇāya parisuddhāya atthitā idha adhippetā.
tika-s0105t:356_32: Atisayatthavisiṭṭhassa hi atthiatthassa avabodhako ayamīkāroti dassento “rattimpī”tiādimāha,
tika-s0105t:357_1: sampajānātīti sampajānoti evaṃ puggalaniddesoti dasseti “satiyā ca ñāṇena ca samannāgato”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:357_2: Santesupi aññesu vīriyasamādhiādīsu kasmā idameva ubhayaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:357_3: vigatābhijjhādīsu vā idaṃ ubhayaṃ avatvā kasmā idheva vuttanti anuyogamapanetuṃ “idaṃ ubhaya”ntiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:357_13: atthamattaṃ pana dassetuṃ “kathaṃ idaṃ kathaṃ ida’nti evaṃ nappavattatīti akathaṃkathī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:357_14: “Kusalesu dhammesū”ti idaṃ “akathaṃkathī”ti iminā sambajjhitabbanti āha “na vicikicchati,
tika-s0105t:357_16: Vacanatthalakkhaṇādibhedatoti ettha ādisaddena paccayapahānapahāyakādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0105t:358_1: Vaḍḍhiyā gahitaṃ dhanaṃ iṇaṃ nāmāti vuttaṃ “vaḍḍhiyā dhanaṃ gahetvā”ti.
tika-s0105t:358_12: Āṇaṇyameva hi nidānaṃ kāraṇamassāti vā āṇaṇyanidānaṃ,
tika-s0105t:359_2: Sā hi kusalavipākasantānassa virodhibhāvato sukhavedanāya visabhāgā,
tika-s0105t:359_11: ābādhasamuṭṭhānena dukkhavedanāsaṅkhātena dukkhena dukkhito dukkhasamannāgatoti attho.
tika-s0105t:359_12: Dukkhavedanāya pana ābādhabhāvena ādimhi bādhatīti ābādhoti katvā ābādhasaṅkhātena mūlabyādhinā ābādhiko,
tika-s0105t:359_13: aparāparaṃ sañjātadukkhasaṅkhātena anubandhabyādhinā dukkhitoti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0105t:359_14: Evañhi sati dukkhavedanāvasena vuttassa dukkhitapadassa ābādhikapadena visesitabbatā pākaṭā hotīti ayamettha ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttanayo.
tika-s0105t:359_25: Adhigaccheyya somanassaṃ “atthi me kāyabala”nti pāḷiyā attho.
tika-s0105t:362_0: Tuṇḍikīre pacitvāna, tato bhuñjanti bhojana”nti. ādīsu viya;
tika-s0105t:363_0: “Kaṇo tu kuṇḍako bhave”ti (abhidhāne bhakaṇḍe catubbaṇṇavagge 454 gāthā) hi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:363_1: Appako pana kaṇo kākaṇoti vuccati yathā “kālavaṇa”nti,
tika-s0105t:363_5: Evañhi sati “rājadāyo nāma kākaṇikamattaṃ na vaṭṭati,
tika-s0105t:363_6: aḍḍhamāsagghanikaṃ maṃsaṃ detī”ti vuttena umaṅgajātakavacanena ca aviruddhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:364_3: Tenāha “attano ruciyā kiñci kātuṃ na labhatī”ti.
tika-s0105t:364_6: tena kāmaṃ gamo na hotīti sapāṭhasesayojanaṃ dassetuṃ “yenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:364_8: kāmena vā icchāya gamo kāmaṃgamo niggahītāgamena.
tika-s0105t:364_11: Aparādhīnatāya attano bhujo viya sakicce esitabbo pesitabboti bhujisso,
tika-s0105t:364_19: Anudakatāya kaṃ pānīyaṃ tārenti etthāti kantāro,
tika-s0105t:365_8: Kiñci paṭibāhitunti pharusavacanādikaṃ kiñcipi paṭisedhetuṃ na sakkoti iṇaṃ dātumasakkuṇattā.
tika-s0105t:365_11: Yo yamhi kāmacchandena rajjatīti yo puggalo yamhi kāmacchandassa vatthubhūte puggale kāmacchandena rajjati.
tika-s0105t:365_12: Taṇhāsahagatena taṃ vatthuṃ gaṇhātīti taṇhābhūtena kāmacchandena taṃ kāmacchandassa vatthubhūtaṃ puggalaṃ “mameta”nti gaṇhāti.
tika-s0105t:365_13: Sahagatasaddo hettha tabbhāvamatto “yāyaṃ taṇhā ponobhavikā nandīrāgasahagatā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0105t:365_18: na tu “khantī paramaṃ tapo titikkhā”tiādīsu viya tapabhūto adosapadhāno cittuppādo.
tika-s0105t:365_20: Itthīnaṃ kāmacchando titikkhākāraṇaṃ hoti viyāti sambandho.
tika-s0105t:366_2: Tassa pittakopanato sabbampi madhusakkarādikaṃ amadhurabhāvena sampajjatīti vuttaṃ “tittakaṃ tittakanti uggiratiyevā”ti.
tika-s0105t:366_8: Madhusakkarādīnaṃ rasaṃ na vindati nānubhavati na jānāti na labhati ca viyāti sambandho.
tika-s0105t:368_5: So hi kappiyākappiyaṃ yāthāvato na jānāti.
tika-s0105t:369_1: Ussaṅkitaparisaṅkitoti avasaṅkito ceva samantato saṅkito ca,
tika-s0105t:369_5: Gacchanto pana tāya ussaṅkitaparisaṅkitatāya tattha tattha tiṭṭhatipi.
tika-s0105t:369_8: tasmā ca gataṭṭhānato agataṭṭhānameva bahutaraṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:369_9: tato eva ca so kicchena kasirena khemantabhūmiṃ pāpuṇāti vā,
tika-s0105t:369_20: Satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati. Dhamme. Saṅghe. Sikkhāya. Pubbante. Aparante.
tika-s0105t:369_22: Idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhati vicikicchatī”ti vibhaṅge vuttesu aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu.
tika-s0105t:369_27: Itīti tasmā vuttanayena asakkuṇanato antarāyaṃ karotīti sambandho.
tika-s0105t:369_29: natthi nu kho”ti araññaṃ paviṭṭhassa ādimhi eva sappanaṃ saṃsayo āsappanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:370_1: Tatrāyaṃ sadisatāti ettha pana appahīnapakkhe vuttanayānusārena sadisatā veditabbā.
tika-s0105t:370_6: Pubbe paṇṇamāropitāya vaḍḍhiyā saha vattatīti savaḍḍhikaṃ.
tika-s0105t:370_12: Atha vā nillepatāyāti vuttanayena avilimpanabhāvena visesanabhūtena alaggatāyāti attho.
tika-s0105t:370_21: Anuppannaanuppādanauppannappahānādivibhāvanavasena mahāsatipaṭṭhānasutte savisesaṃ pāḷiyā āgatattā “mahāsatipaṭṭhāne vaṇṇayissāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:370_24: Nikāyantarāgatopi hi attho ācariyehi aññattha yebhuyyena vuttoti vadanti.
tika-s0105t:370_29: Dibbānipi rūpāni passato kileso na samudācarati,
tika-s0105t:372_1: Bandhanāgāraṃ pavesāpitattā aladdhanakkhattānubhavano puriso hi “nakkhattadivase bandhanāgāraṃ pavesito puriso”ti vutto,
tika-s0105t:372_2: nakkhattadivase eva vā tadananubhavanatthaṃ tathā kato puriso evaṃ vuttotipi vaṭṭati.
tika-s0105t:372_15: Sādhūnaṃ ratijananato hi dhammopi chaṇasadisaṭṭhena “nakkhatta”nti vutto.
tika-s0105t:373_0: Uddhaccakukkucce mahānatthakaranti parāyattatāpādanena vuttanayena mahato anatthassa kārakaṃ.
tika-s0105t:373_7: balena vā attanā icchitassa karaṇaṃ balakkāro, tena.
tika-s0105t:374_9: saparivāratāya ca corā dūratova disvā palāyeyyuṃ.
tika-s0105t:374_18: evaṃ vicikicchāyapīti idhāpi bahussutatādayo tayopi dhammā gahitā,
tika-s0105t:374_20: pana sappāyakathā ca pañcannampi pahānāya saṃvattanti,
tika-s0105t:374_21: tasmā tāsu tassa tassa nīvaraṇassa anucchavikasevanatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0105t:374_22: Tiṇaṃ viyāti tiṇaṃ bhayavasena na gaṇeti viya.
tika-s0105t:374_23: Duccaritakantāraṃ nittharitvāti duccaritacaraṇūpāyabhūtāya vicikicchāya nittharaṇavasena duccaritasaṅkhātaṃ kantāraṃ nittharitvā.
tika-s0105t:374_24: Vicikicchā hi sammāpaṭipattiyā appaṭipajjananimittatāmukhena micchāpaṭipattimeva paribrūhetīti tassā appahānaṃ duccaritacaraṇūpāyo,
tika-s0105t:375_2: Sā hi taruṇatāya kathañcipi tuṭṭhāvatthā tuṭṭhākāramattaṃ.
tika-s0105t:375_4: tassattho “okkantikabhāvappattāya pītiyā vasena tuṭṭhassā”ti ṭīkāyaṃ vutto,
tika-s0105t:375_5: evaṃ sati pāmojjapadena okkantikā pītiyeva gahitā siyā.
tika-s0105t:375_6: “Sakalasarīraṃ khobhayamānā pīti jāyatī”ti etassā cattho “attano savipphārikatāya,
tika-s0105t:375_7: attasamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpuppattiyā ca sakalasarīraṃ khobhayamānā pharaṇalakkhaṇā pīti jāyatī”ti vutto,
tika-s0105t:375_8: evañca sati pītipadena pharaṇā pītiyeva gahitā siyā,
tika-s0105t:375_10: pana aññattha ca taruṇabalavatāmattasāmaññena padadvayassa atthadīpanato yā kāci taruṇā pīti pāmojjaṃ,
tika-s0105t:375_12: pañcavidhāya vā pītiyā yathākkamaṃ taruṇabalavatāsambhavato purimā purimā pāmojjaṃ,
tika-s0105t:375_15: Tuṭṭhassāti pāmojjasaṅkhātāya taruṇapītiyā vasena tuṭṭhassa. Ta-
tika-s0105t:375_19: “Sakalasarīraṃ khobhayamānā”ti iminā pīti nāma ettha balavapītīti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:376_3: Pītiyā sampayuttaṃ mano yassātipi vaṭṭati, tassa.
tika-s0105t:376_7: na ca kāyāyatanādīsu viya rūpakāyampīti dasseti “nāmakāyo”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:376_11: Vuttappakārāya pubbabhāgabhāvanāya vasena cetasikasukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedentoyeva taṃsamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭasarīratāya
tika-s0105t:376_12: kāyikampi sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti vuttaṃ “kāyikampi cetasikampi sukhaṃ vedayatī”ti.
tika-s0105t:376_13: Iminā nekkhammasukhenāti “sukhaṃ vedetī”ti evaṃ vuttena saṃkilesanīvaraṇapakkhato nikkhantattā,
tika-s0105t:376_14: paṭhamajjhānapakkhikattā ca yathārahaṃ nekkhammasaṅkhātena upacārasukhena appanāsukhena ca.
tika-s0105t:377_5: Tathā hi kāmacchandappahāne ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ “vikkhambhanavasenāti ettha vikkhambhanaṃ anuppādanaṃ appavattanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:377_7: pahīnattāti ca pahīnasadisataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ jhānassa anadhigatattā”ti.
tika-s0105t:377_8: Passaddhakāyassa sukhapaṭisaṃvedanāya ca vuttappakārāya pubbabhāgabhāvanāya vasena cetasikasukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedentoyeva
tika-s0105t:377_10: Apica kā nāma kathā aññehi vattabbā aṭṭhakathāyameva “cha dhamme bhāvetvā”ti tattha tattha pubbabhāgabhāvanāya vuttattā.
tika-s0105t:377_11: Sukhino cittasamādhāne pana sukhassa upacārabhāvanāya viya appanāyapi kāraṇattā,
tika-s0105t:377_12: “so vivicceva kāmehī”tiādinā ca vakkhamānāya appanāya hetuphalavasena sambajjhanato pubbabhāgasamādhi,
tika-s0105t:377_14: pubbabhāgasukhamiva vā appanāsukhampi appanāsamādhissa kāraṇamevāti tampi appanāsukhaṃ appanāsamādhino
tika-s0105t:377_15: kāraṇabhāvena ācariyadhammapālattherena gahitanti imamatthamasallakkhentā nekkhammapadatthaṃ yathātathaṃ
tika-s0105t:379_1: Yadevaṃ “sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti eteneva upacāravasenapi appanāvasenapi cittassa samādhānaṃ kathitaṃ siyā,
tika-s0105t:379_2: evaṃ sante “so vivicceva kāmehī”tiādikā desanā kimatthiyāti codanāya “so vivicceva…pe…
tika-s0105t:379_4: Tattha “samāhite”ti padadvayaṃ “dassanatthaṃ vutta”nti imehi sambandhitvā samāhitattā tathā dassanatthaṃ vuttanti adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:379_6: paṭhamajjhānādisamādhito ca upari pattabbassa paṭhamadutiyajjhānādivisesassa dassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:379_12: Tassa samādhinoti yo appanālakkhaṇo samādhi “sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti sabbasādhāraṇavasena vutto,
tika-s0105t:379_14: Pabhedadassanatthanti dutiyajjhānādivibhāgassa ceva paṭhamābhiññādivibhāgassa ca pabhedadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:379_16: So hi gabbhāsaye karīyatīti katvā karasaṅkhātato pupphasambhavato jātattā karajoti vuccati.
tika-s0105t:380_0: Nanu ca nāmakāyopi vivekajena pītisukhena tathā laddhūpakārova siyā,
tika-s0105t:380_1: atha kasmā yathāvutto rūpakāyova idha gahitoti?
tika-s0105t:380_3: “Abhisandetī”tiādisaddantarābhisambandhato hi rūpakāyo eva idha bhagavatā vuttoti adhigamīyati tasseva abhisandanādikiriyāyogyattāti.
tika-s0105t:380_5: so imameva kāyaṃ vivekajena pītisukhenāti hi bhedavasena,
tika-s0105t:380_6: samudāyāvayavavasena ca parikappanāmattasiddhā hetukiriyā ettha labbhati,
tika-s0105t:380_7: abhisandanaṃ panetaṃ jhānamayena pītisukhena karajakāyassa tintabhāvāpādanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:380_11: Atthato pana abhisandanaṃ nāma yathāvuttapītisukhasamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi kāyassa parippharaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:380_18: so imameva kāyaṃ vivekajena pītisukhena samantato phuṭṭho bhavatīti attho.
tika-s0105t:380_23: “avayavāvayavīsambandhe avayavini sāmivacana”nti saddalakkhaṇena panetassa “kiñcī”ti avayavena sambajjhanato
tika-s0105t:380_24: avayavīvisayoyevesa sabbasaddoti mantvā chavimaṃsādikoṭṭhāsasaṅkhātena avayavena avayavībhāvaṃ dassento
tika-s0105t:380_28: Upādinnakasantatipavattiṭṭhāneti kammajarūpasantatiyā pavattiṭṭhāne aphuṭaṃ nāma na hotīti sambandho.
tika-s0105t:380_31: tattha tattha cittajarūpassāpi byāpanato tena tassa kāyassa phuṭabhāvaṃ sandhāya “aphuṭaṃ nāma na hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:381_9: Idha pana yattha katthaci loheti āha “yena kenaci lohena katabhājane”ti.
tika-s0105t:381_11: atha kasmā kaṃsathālakassa savisesassa gahaṇaṃ katanti anuyogaṃ pariharati “mattikābhājana”ntiādinā.
tika-s0105t:381_16: “Paripphosakaṃ paripphosaka”nti idaṃ bhāvanapuṃsakanti dasseti “siñcitvā siñcitvā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:381_17: Phusasaddo cettha parisiñcane yathā taṃ vātavuṭṭhisamaye “devo ca thokaṃ thokaṃ phusāyatī”ti,
tika-s0105t:381_18: tasmā tato tato nhāniyacuṇṇato upari udakena byāpanakaraṇavasena parisiñcitvā parisiñcitvāti attho.
tika-s0105t:381_19: Anupasaggopi hi saddo saupasaggo viya pakaraṇādhigatassa atthassa dīpako,
tika-s0105t:381_20: “siñcitvā siñcitvā”ti pana vacanaṃ “paripphosakaṃ paripphosaka”nti etassa “sandeyyā”ti ettha visesanabhāvaviññāpanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:382_5: Yathāvuttena pariggahitatākāraṇeneva santarabāhiro nhāniyapiṇḍi phuṭā udakasnehenāti āha “sabbatthakameva udakasinehena phuṭā”ti.
tika-s0105t:382_9: “Santarabāhirā phuṭā”ti ca iminā nhāniyapiṇḍiyā sabbaso udakena temitabhāvamāha,
tika-s0105t:382_10: “na ca paggharaṇī”ti pana iminā tintāyapi tāya ghanathaddhabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0105t:382_17: Evaṃ pana apaggharaṇato hatthenapi dvīhipi tīhipi aṅgulehi gahetuṃ,
tika-s0105t:382_20: evaṃ sati snehavigamanena sukkhattā thaddhā hutvā tathā gahetuṃ,
tika-s0105t:382_21: kātuṃ vā na sakkāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:382_23: guḷikāvasena sā piṇḍi kātuṃ sakkāti attho.
tika-s0105t:384_1: Tāhi tāhi udakasirāhi ubbhijjati uddhaṃ nikkhamatīti ubbhidaṃ,
tika-s0105t:384_7: Ubbhijjanakampi udakaṃ katthaci heṭṭhā ubbhijjitvā dhārāvasena uṭṭhahitvā bahi gacchati,
tika-s0105t:384_8: na taṃ koci antoyeva patiṭṭhitaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti dhārāvasena uṭṭhahanato,
tika-s0105t:384_9: idha pana vālikātaṭe viya udakarahadassa antoyeva ubbhijjitvā tattheva tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0105t:384_10: na dhārāvasena uṭṭhahitvā bahi gacchatīti viññāyati akhobhakassa sannisinnasseva udakassa adhippetattāti imamatthaṃ sandhāyāha “na heṭṭhā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:384_12: lohitānugatā lohitasirā viya udakānugato pathavipadeso “udakasirā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0105t:384_17: Kālena kālanti ruḷhīpadaṃ “eko ekāyā”tiādi viyāti vuttaṃ “kāle kāle”ti.
tika-s0105t:384_23: Vassasaddato cassa siddhīti dasseti “na vasseyyā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:385_0: “Sītā vāridhārā”ti itthiliṅgapadassa “sītaṃ dhāra”nti napuṃsakaliṅgena atthavacanaṃ dhārasaddassa dviliṅgikabhāvaviññāpanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:385_6: Uggantvā uggantvā bhijjantanti uṭṭhahitvā uṭṭhahitvā dhārākiraṇavasena ubbhijjantaṃ,
tika-s0105t:385_10: Dhārānipātapubbuḷakehīti udakadhārānipātehi ca tatoyeva uṭṭhitaudakapubbuḷakasaṅkhātehi pheṇapaṭalehi ca.
tika-s0105t:385_11: Evaṃ yathākkamaṃ tiṇṇampi rahadānamagahetabbataṃ vatvā ubbhidodakasseva gahetabbataṃ vadati “sannisinnamevā”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:385_16: Iddhinimmitamivāti iddhimatā iddhiyā tathā nimmitaṃ iva.
tika-s0105t:387_3: yāva ca mūlā”ti vacanayogena “appekaccānī”tiādinā uppalagacchādīnameva gahetabbatāya vanamevādhippetaṃ,
tika-s0105t:387_14: Yaṃ kiñci uppalaṃ uppalameva uppalasaddassa sāmaññanāmavasena tesu sabbesupi pavattanato.
tika-s0105t:387_15: Satapattanti ettha satasaddo bahupariyāyo “satagghī sataraṃsi sūriyo”tiādīsu viya anekasaṅkhyābhāvato.
tika-s0105t:387_16: Evañca katvā anekapattassāpi padumabhāve saṅgaho siddho hoti.
tika-s0105t:387_24: Rattavaṇṇatāya hi kokanāmakānaṃ sunakhānaṃ nādayato saddāpayato,
tika-s0105t:387_39: yāva ca mūlā udakena abhisandanādibhāvadassanatthaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “udakānuggatānī”ti vacanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:389_4: Yasmā ca parisuddhasseva paccayavisesena pavattiviseso pariyodātatā suddhantasuvaṇṇassa nighaṃsanena pabhassaratā viya,
tika-s0105t:389_6: Vijju viya pabhāya ito cito ca niccharaṇaṃ pabhassaraṃ yathā “ābhassarā”ti.
tika-s0105t:389_11: Utupharaṇaṃ na hotīti odātavatthena viya savisesaṃ utupharaṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0105t:389_15: “Taṅkhaṇadhotaparisuddhenā”ti ca etena odātasaddo ettha parisuddhavacano eva “gihī odātavatthavasano”tiādīsu viya,
tika-s0105t:389_16: na setavacano yena kenaci taṅkhaṇadhotaparisuddheneva utupharaṇasambhavatoti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:390_0: Nanu ca pāḷiyaṃ “nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa odātena vatthena aphuṭaṃ assā”ti kāyassa odātavatthapharaṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:390_2: atha kasmā utupharaṇaṃ idha vuttanti anuyogenāha “imissāya hī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:390_6: etena ca odātena vatthena sabbāvato kāyassa pharaṇāsambhavato,
tika-s0105t:390_7: upameyyena ca ayuttattā kāyaggahaṇena tannissitavatthaṃ gahetabbaṃ,
tika-s0105t:390_11: Yogino hi karajakāyo vatthaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo utupharaṇasadisena catutthajjhānasukhena pharitabbattā,
tika-s0105t:390_12: utupharaṇaṃ viya catutthajjhānasukhaṃ vatthassa viya tena karajakāyassa pharaṇato,
tika-s0105t:390_13: purisassa sarīraṃ viya catutthajjhānaṃ utupharaṇaṭṭhāniyassa sukhassa nissayabhāvato.
tika-s0105t:390_16: Ettha ca pāḷiyaṃ “parisuddhena cetasā”ti cetogahaṇena catutthajjhānasukhaṃ bhagavatā vuttanti ñāpetuṃ “catutthajjhānasukhaṃ,
tika-s0105t:390_18: Nanu ca catutthajjhānasukhaṃ nāma sātalakkhaṇaṃ natthīti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0105t:391_11: aṭṭhannampi samāpattīnaṃ upari abhiññādhigame avinābhāvatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:391_24: Satipi jhānesu āvajjanādipañcavidhavasībhāve ayameva cuddasavidho vasībhāvo abhiññā nibbattane ekantena
tika-s0105t:391_26: iminā ca arūpasamāpattīsu ciṇṇavasībhāvaṃ vinā rūpasamāpattīsu eva ciṇṇavasībhāvena samāpatti na ijjhatīti
tika-s0105t:392_0: Nanu yathāpāṭhameva vinicchayo vattabboti codanaṃ sodheti “pāḷiyaṃ panā”tiādinā,
tika-s0105t:392_1: sāvasesapāṭhabhāvato nīharitvā esa vinicchayo vattabboti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:392_3: atha kasmā tāni aggahetvā sāvasesapāṭho bhagavatā katoti?
tika-s0105t:392_5: Satipi hi tāsaṃ tathā avinābhāve visesato panetā rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānapādakā,
tika-s0105t:392_6: tasmā tāsaṃ tappādakabhāvaviññāpanatthaṃ tattheva ṭhatvā desanā katā,
tika-s0105t:394_1: “Puna caparaṃ mahārāja (pāḷiyaṃ natthi) bhikkhū”ti vatvāpi kimatthaṃ dassetuṃ “so”ti padaṃ puna vuttanti codanāyāha “so…pe…
tika-s0105t:394_4: neyyatthavasena ca vuttāsu aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ciṇṇavasitāvisiṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ dassetuṃ evaṃ vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:394_5: Sesanti “so”ti padatthato sesaṃ “evaṃ samāhite”tiādīsu vattabbaṃ sādhippāyamatthajātaṃ.
tika-s0105t:394_10: tayidaṃ pana ñāṇadassanapadaṃ sāsane yesu ñāṇavisesesu niruḷhaṃ,
tika-s0105t:394_11: taṃ sabbaṃ atthuddhāravasena dassento “ñāṇadassananti maggañāṇampi vuccatī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:394_15: atha kho tadā bhagavatopi ñāṇadassanaṃ udapādīti attho.
tika-s0105t:394_19: Yasmā vipassanāñāṇaṃ ñeyyasaṅkhāte tebhūmakasaṅkhāre aniccādito jānāti,
tika-s0105t:394_20: bhaṅgānupassanato ca paṭṭhāya paccakkhato te passati,
tika-s0105t:394_21: tasmā yathāvuttaṭṭhena ñāṇadassanaṃ nāma jātanti dasseti “idha panā”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:395_0: Abhinīharatīti vipassanābhimukhaṃ cittaṃ tadaññakaraṇīyato nīharitvā haratīti ayaṃ saddato attho,
tika-s0105t:395_3: taṃ pana vuttanayena aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgate tasmiṃ citte vipassanākkamena jāte vipassanābhimukhaṃ cittapesanamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:395_6: Tassaṃ poṇaṃ vaṅkaṃ pabbhāraṃ nīcanti attho.
tika-s0105t:395_9: upacayati vā vaḍḍhatīti atthaṃ sandhāya “odanenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:395_14: imassa pūtikāyassa duggandhabhāvato gandhodakādīhi ubbaṭṭanavilimpanajātikoti attho.
tika-s0105t:395_15: Ucchādanena hi pūtikāye sedavātapittasemhādīhi garubhāvaduggandhānamapagamo hoti.
tika-s0105t:396_0: Evaṃ aniyamitakālavasena atthaṃ vatvā idāni niyamitakālavasena atthaṃ vadati “daharakāle”tiādinā. Vā-
tika-s0105t:396_1: saddo cettha atthadassanavaseneva atthantaravikappanassa viññāyamānattā na payutto,
tika-s0105t:396_13: Vikirati cāti evaṃ bhindanto ca kiñci payojanaṃ asādhento vippakiṇṇova hoti.
tika-s0105t:396_14: Evaṃ navahi padehi yathārahaṃ kāye samudayavayadhammānupassitā dassitāti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento “tatthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:396_21: Yuttaṃ tāva hotu majjhe tīhipi padehi kāyassa samudayakathanaṃ tesaṃ tadatthadīpanato, “rūpī,
tika-s0105t:396_23: parimaddanadhammo”ti pana tīhi tpadehi kathaṃ tassa tathākathanaṃ yuttaṃ siyā tesaṃ tadatthassa adīpanatoti?
tika-s0105t:396_25: “Rūpī”ti hi idaṃ attano paccayabhūtena utuāhāralakkhaṇena rūpena rūpavāti atthassa dīpakaṃ.
tika-s0105t:396_28: parimaddanadhammo”ti ca idaṃ padadvayaṃ tathāvidharūpuppādanena saṇṭhānasampādanatthassa dīpakanti.
tika-s0105t:396_32: Tadā pavattañhi vipassanācittameva “idañca me viññāṇa”nti āsannapaccakkhavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:397_3: tāya eva pabhāsampattiyā maṇino bhadratāti atthamattaṃ dassetuṃ “subhoti sundaro”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:397_11: gāmassa ca avidūre samuṭṭhitattā veḷuriyoti paññāyittha,
tika-s0105t:397_12: devaloke pavattassapi ca taṃsadisavaṇṇanibhatāya tadeva nāmaṃ jātaṃ yathā taṃ manussaloke laddhanāmavasena devaloke devatānaṃ,
tika-s0105t:397_13: so pana mayūragīvāvaṇṇo vā hoti vāyasapattavaṇṇo vā siniddhaveṇupattavaṇṇo vāti ācariyadhammapālattherena paramatthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:397_17: tatoyeva so idha padese mañjāramaṇīti pākaṭo hoti.
tika-s0105t:397_19: Yathāha “puna caparaṃ ānanda rañño mahāsudassanassa maṇiratanaṃ pāturahosi,
tika-s0105t:397_20: so ahosi maṇi veḷuriyo subho jātimā aṭṭhaṃso”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:398_2: Tato ceva visesena pasannoti dassetuṃ “suṭṭhu pasanno”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:398_6: kāḷakādiapaharaṇatthāya ceva suttena āvunatthāya ca vijjhitabbatā vedhanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:399_2: Cakkhumā puriso viya vipassanālābhī bhikkhu sammadeva tassa dassanato,
tika-s0105t:399_3: tassa purisassa maṇino āvibhūtakālo viya tassa bhikkhuno kāyassa āvibhūtakālo tannissayassa pākaṭabhāvato.
tika-s0105t:399_4: Suttassāvibhūtakālo viya tesaṃ dhammānamāvibhūtakālo tannissitassa pākaṭabhāvatoti ayamettha upamāsampādane kāraṇavibhāvanā,
tika-s0105t:400_2: “Phassapañcamakāna”ntiādipadattayassetaṃ visesanaṃ atthavasā liṅgavibhattivacanavipariṇāmoti katvā pacchimapadassāpi visesanabhāvato.
tika-s0105t:400_4: sabbacittacetasikaggahaṇena ca gahitadhammā vipassanācittuppādapariyāpannā evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:400_5: Evañhi tesaṃ vipassanāviññāṇagatikattā āvutasuttaṃ viya “vipassanāviññāṇa”nti heṭṭhā vuttavacanaṃ avirodhitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:400_7: “Idañca me viññāṇaṃ ettha sitaṃ ettha paṭibaddha”nti iminā tasseva vacanato.
tika-s0105t:400_8: “Ayaṃ kho me kāyo”tiādinā hi vipassanāñāṇena vipassitvā “tadeva vipassanāñāṇasampayuttaṃ viññāṇaṃ ettha
tika-s0105t:400_9: sitaṃ ettha paṭibaddha”nti nissayavisayādivasena manasi karoti,
tika-s0105t:400_13: Dhammasaṅgahādīsu desitanayena pākaṭabhāvato cettha phassapañcamakānaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0105t:400_19: tassa pana āvibhūtattā puggalassāpi āvibhūtā nāma honti,
tika-s0105t:401_3: atha kasmā sabbābhiññānaṃ puratova vuttanti codanālesaṃ dassetvā pariharanto “idañca vipassanāñāṇa”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:401_4: “Idañca maggañāṇānantara”nti hi iminā yathāvuttaṃ codanālesaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:401_8: padhānato pana tabbacaneneva sabbassapi vipassanāñāṇassa gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ avisesato tassa idha vuttattā.
tika-s0105t:401_11: Lokiyābhiññānaṃ purato vuttaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ tāsaṃ nānantaratāya anupakāraṃ,
tika-s0105t:401_12: āsavakkhayañāṇasaṅkhātāya pana lokuttarābhiññāya purato vuttaṃ tassā anantaratāya upakāraṃ,
tika-s0105t:401_15: Kasmā pana upakāraṭṭhāne tathā avatvā anupakāraṭṭhāneva bhagavatā vuttanti hi codanā sambhavati.
tika-s0105t:401_17: Tattha evaṃ santepīti yadipi ñāṇānupubbiyā maggañāṇassa anantaratāya upakāraṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:402_1: Etassa antarā vāro natthīti pañcasu lokiyābhiññāsu kathitāsu ākaṅkheyyasuttādīsu viya chaṭṭhābhiññāpi
tika-s0105t:402_4: chaṭṭhābhiññāya ca antarā pavesetvā kathetabbaṃ anabhiññālakkhaṇabhāvena tadapariyāpannato.
tika-s0105t:402_5: Iti etassa vipassanāñāṇassa tāsamabhiññānaṃ antarā vāro natthi,
tika-s0105t:402_6: tasmā tattha avasarābhāvato idheva rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānānantaraṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ kathitanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:402_10: tena na kevalaṃ vipassanāñāṇassa idha dassane tadeva kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0105t:402_11: atha kho idampīti imamatthaṃ samuccinātīti ācariyena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:402_12: Saddavidū pana īdise ṭhāne ca- saddo vā-
tika-s0105t:402_16: Attanā payujjitabbassa hi vijjamānatthasseva jotakā upasagganipātā yathā magganidassane sākhābhaṅgā,
tika-s0105t:402_17: yathā ca adissamānā jotane padīpāti evamīdisesu.
tika-s0105t:405_2: “Dibbena cakkhunā bheravampi rūpaṃ passatoti ettha iddhividhañāṇena bheravaṃ rūpaṃ nimminitvā maṃsacakkhunā passatotipi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:405_3: Evampi hi abhiññālābhino apariññātavatthukassa bhayaṃ santāso uppajjati uccavālikavāsimahānāgattherassa viyā”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:405_5: evaṃ dibbāya sotadhātuyā bheravaṃ saddaṃ suṇatoti etthāpi iddhividhañāṇena bheravaṃ saddaṃ nimminitvā maṃsasotena suṇatopīti vattabbameva.
tika-s0105t:405_6: Evampi hi abhiññālābhino apariññātavatthukassa bhayaṃ santāso uppajjati uccavālikavāsimahānāgattherassa viya.
tika-s0105t:405_7: Thero hi koñcanādasahitaṃ sabbasetaṃ hatthināgaṃ māpetvā disvā,
tika-s0105t:405_16: Pāṭiyekkanti jhānābhiññādīhi asammissaṃ visuṃ bhūtaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ.
tika-s0105t:408_0: Idhāpi vuttaṃ “idampi kho mahārāja sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ…pe…
tika-s0105t:408_2: tasmā pāḷiyā saṃsandanato imameva nayaṃ yuttataranti vadanti.
tika-s0105t:410_1: Manomayanti ettha pana mayasaddo aparapaññattivikārapadapūraṇanibbattiādīsu anekesvatthesu āgato.
tika-s0105t:410_2: Idha pana nibbattiattheti dassetuṃ “manena nibbattita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:410_6: adhiṭṭhānamanena cāti ubhayathāpi nibbattattā ubhayampetaṃ yuttameva.
tika-s0105t:410_8: paccaṅgaṃ nāma kapparajaṇṇuādi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samudāye avayavaṃ.
tika-s0105t:410_12: Nimmitarūpe hi pasādo nāma natthīti dassetuṃ “saṇṭhānavasena avikalindriya”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:410_13: imināva tassa jīvitindriyādīnampi abhāvo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:411_0: Ayamevattho pāḷiyampi vibhāvitoti āha “muñjamhā īsikantiādiupamāttayampi hi…pe…
tika-s0105t:411_3: Yampi hi sadisabhāvadassanatthameva vutta”nti pāṭho dissati.
tika-s0105t:411_12: “Pavāheyyā”ti vacanato anto ṭhitā eva īsikā adhippetāti dasseti “anto īsikā hotī”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:412_0: Yajjevaṃ “seyyathāpi pana mahārāja puriso ahiṃ karaṇḍā uddhareyyā”ti purisassa karaṇḍato ahiuddharaṇūpamāya ayamattho virujjheyya.
tika-s0105t:412_1: Na hi so hatthena tato uddharituṃ sakkāti anuyogenāha “tatthā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:412_2: “Uddhareyyā”ti hi aniyamavacanepi hatthena uddharaṇasseva pākaṭattā taṃdassanamiva jātaṃ.
tika-s0105t:412_5: Ahino nāma pañcasu ṭhānesu sajātiṃ nātivattanti upapattiyaṃ, cutiyaṃ,
tika-s0105t:412_12: Sarīraṃ khādayamānaṃ viyāti attanoyeva tacaṃ attano sarīraṃ khādayamānaṃ viya.
tika-s0105t:412_13: Purāṇatacaṃ jigucchantoti jiṇṇatāya katthaci muttaṃ katthaci olambitaṃ jiṇṇatacaṃ jigucchanto.
tika-s0105t:412_20: Seyyathāpi nāma puriso ahiṃ passitvā “aho vatāhaṃ imaṃ ahiṃ kañcukato uddhareyya”nti ahiṃ karaṇḍā cittena uddhareyya,
tika-s0105t:412_26: so imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimmināti…pe…
tika-s0105t:414_1: Bhājanādivikatikiriyānissayabhūtā suparikammakatamattikādayo viya vikubbanakiriyānissayabhāvato iddhividhañāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:415_1: Pubbe nīvaraṇappahānavāre viya kantāraggahaṇaṃ akatvā kevalaṃ addhānamaggaggahaṇaṃ khemamaggadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:415_7: Tathā tathā pana paripuṇṇavacanaṃ upamāsampattiyā upameyyasampādanatthaṃ,
tika-s0105t:416_1: Mando uttānaseyyakadārakopi “daharo”ti vuccatīti tato visesanatthaṃ “yuvā”ti vuttanti mantvā yuvasaddena
tika-s0105t:416_4: anicchanato ca amaṇḍanajātikoti tato visesanatthaṃ “maṇḍanajātiko”tiādi vuttanti mantvā maṇḍanajātikādisaddena
tika-s0105t:416_5: visesitabbameva yuvasaddassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ “yobbannena samannāgato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:416_6: Pāḷiyañhi yathākkamaṃ padattayassa visesitabbavisesakabhāvena vacanato tathā saṃvaṇṇanā katā,
tika-s0105t:416_7: itarathā ekakenāpi padena adhippetatthādhigamikā saparivārā saṃvaṇṇanāva kātabbā siyāti.
tika-s0105t:416_22: evaṃ mukhe adosopi mukhadosoti saralopena vutto sāmaññaniddesatopi anekatthassa viññātabbattā,
tika-s0105t:416_24: Avuttopi hi attho sampiṇḍanavasena vutto viya viññāyati,
tika-s0105t:416_25: mukhadoso ca mukhaadoso ca mukhadosoti ekadesasarūpekasesanayenapettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0105t:416_26: Evañhi atthassa paripuṇṇatāya “paresaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ cittaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotī”ti vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:419_0: Asamāne sadde tidhā, catudhā ca samānake;
tika-s0105t:421_0: “Sarāgaṃ vā citta”ntiādinā pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ cittaṃ.
tika-s0105t:422_3: Kasmā pana pāḷiyaṃ gāmattayameva upamāne gahitanti codanaṃ sodhetuṃ “taṃ divasa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:422_4: Taṃ divasaṃ katakiriyā nāma pākatikasattassāpi yebhuyyena pākaṭā hoti.
tika-s0105t:422_5: Tasmā taṃ divasaṃ gantuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ gāmattayameva bhagavatā gahitaṃ,
tika-s0105t:422_8: gāmattayaggahaṇena pana tadaheva katakiriyā adhippetāti mantvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ taṃdivasaggahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:422_9: Taṃdivasagatagāmattayaggahaṇeneva ca mahābhinīhārehi aññesampi pubbenivāsañāṇalābhīnaṃ tīsupi bhavesu
tika-s0105t:422_10: katakiriyā yebhuyyena pākaṭā hotīti dīpitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:422_12: Tīsu bhavesu katakiriyāyāti abhisamparāyesu pubbe diṭṭhadhamme pana idāni,
tika-s0105t:423_1: Pāḷiyaṃ rathikāya vīthiṃ sañcaranteti aññāya rathikāya aññaṃ rathiṃ sañcaranteti attho,
tika-s0105t:423_2: tena aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇaṃ dassitanti āha “aparāparaṃ sañcarante”ti,
tika-s0105t:423_3: taṃtaṃkiccavasena ito cito ca sañcaranteti vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:423_6: Pāsādo viya bhikkhussa karajakāyo daṭṭhabbo tattha patiṭṭhitassa daṭṭhabbadassanasiddhito.
tika-s0105t:423_10: Cakkhumā puriso viya ayameva dibbacakkhuṃ patvā ṭhito bhikkhu daṭṭhabbassa dassanato.
tika-s0105t:423_12: tato nikkhamanto viya ca mātukucchiṃ paṭisandhivasena pavisanto,
tika-s0105t:423_13: tato ca vijātivasena nikkhamanto mātukucchiyā gehasadisattā.
tika-s0105t:423_17: gehaṃ pavisanto viya attabhāvaṃ upapajjanavasena okkamanto,
tika-s0105t:423_18: gehā nikkhamanto viya ca attabhāvato cavanavasena apakkamanto attabhāvassa gehasadisattā.
tika-s0105t:424_5: Iminā hi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave jātasaṃvaddhe satte vadati,
tika-s0105t:424_6: “aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇakasattā”ti pana etena tathā aniyamitakālike sādhāraṇasatte.
tika-s0105t:424_7: Evañhi tesaṃ yathākkamaṃ sañcaraṇakasannisinnakajanopamatā upapannā hotīti.
tika-s0105t:424_8: Tīsu bhavesu nibbattasattānaṃ āvibhūtakāloti ettha pana vuttappakārānaṃ sabbesampi sattānaṃ aniyamato gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:425_1: atha kasmā “tīsu bhavesū”ti catuvokārabhavassāpi saṅgaho kato.
tika-s0105t:425_2: Na hi so arūpadhammārammaṇoti anuyogaṃ pariharanto “idañcā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:425_3: Tattha “idanti tīsu bhavesu nibbattasattānanti idaṃ vacana”nti ayamettha ācariyassa mati,
tika-s0105t:425_4: evaṃ sati aṭṭhakathācariyehi aṭṭhakathāyameva yathāvutto anuyogo pariharitoti.
tika-s0105t:425_7: atha kasmā “dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne”tiādinā
tika-s0105t:425_9: Na hi so arūpadhammārammaṇoti anuyogaṃ pariharanto “idañcā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:425_11: Evañhi sati aṭṭhakathācariyehi pāḷiyameva yathāvutto anuyogo pariharitoti.
tika-s0105t:425_14: Desanāsukhatthamevāti kevalaṃ desanāsukhatthaṃ eva avisesena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:425_16: “Ṭhapetvā arūpabhava”nti vā “dvīsu bhavesū”ti vā satte passati kāmāvacarabhavato,
tika-s0105t:425_18: rūpāvacarabhave ca upapajjamāneti vā vuccamānā hi desanā yathārahaṃ bhedyabhedakādivibhāvanena sukhāsukhāvabodhā ca na hoti,
tika-s0105t:425_19: avisesena pana evameva vuccamānā sukhāsukhāvabodhā ca. Desetuṃ,
tika-s0105t:427_4: vipassanā ca nāmesā tividhā vipassakapuggalabhedena mahābodhisattānaṃ vipassanā,
tika-s0105t:427_10: Sā “ṭhapetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ avasesarūpārūpajjhānānaṃ aññatarato vuṭṭhāyā”tiādinā anekadhā,
tika-s0105t:427_11: arūpamukhavasena catudhātuvavatthāne vuttānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ dhātupariggahamukhānañca aññataramukhavasena
tika-s0105t:427_13: mahābodhisattānaṃ pana catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena pabhedagamanato nānānayaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇasannissayassa
tika-s0105t:427_14: ariyamaggañāṇassa adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ pubbabhāgañāṇagabbhaṃ gaṇhāpentaṃ paripākaṃ gacchantaṃ paramagambhīraṃ
tika-s0105t:427_17: yassa ca pavattivibhāgena catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassappabhedassa pādakabhāvena samāpajjiyamānā catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhyā
tika-s0105t:427_19: Svāyaṃ buddhānaṃ vipassanācāro paramatthamañjusāyaṃ visuddhimaggavaṇṇanāyaṃ uddesato ācariyena dassito,
tika-s0105t:428_1: tasmā asatipi payojanavācake payojanavaseneva attho veditabboti āha “khayañāṇanibbattanatthāyā”ti.
tika-s0105t:428_3: arahattamaggo ca ukkaṭṭhaniddesena idha khayo nāma,
tika-s0105t:428_8: So pana pāpakkhayo āsavakkhayena vinā natthi,
tika-s0105t:428_9: tasmā “khaye ñāṇa”nti ettha khayaggahaṇena āsavakkhayova vuttoti dasseti “āsavānaṃ khayo”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:428_13: samitapāpatā ca nippariyāyato arahattaphalenevāti āha “āsavānaṃ khayā samaṇo hotīti ettha phala”nti.
