tika-s0105t:428_16: “Āsavakkhayā”ti pana samāsavasena dvibhāvaṃ katvā vuttattā “āsavānaṃ khayo”ti padassa atthuddhāre āsavakkhayapadaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t:429_3: “Arā siṅghāmi vārija”ntiādīsu viya hi dūratthoyaṃ nipāto.
tika-s0105t:429_5: Arāsaddo viya ārāsaddopi dūratthe eko nipātoti veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:429_7: Kāmañca dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “arahattamaggasaṅkhātā ārā dūraṃ gatova hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:429_8: tathāpi āsavavaḍḍhiyā saṅkhāre vaḍḍhento visaṅkhārato suvidūradūro,
tika-s0105t:429_9: tasmā “ārā so āsavakkhayā”ti ettha āsavakkhayapadaṃ visaṅkhārādhivacanampi sambhavatīti āha “nibbāna”nti.
tika-s0105t:429_15: Na hi nibbānamanārabbha maggeneva āsavānaṃ khayo hotīti.
tika-s0105t:430_2: Pāḷiyaṃ idaṃ dukkhanti dukkhassa ariyasaccassa paricchinditvā,
tika-s0105t:430_3: anavasesetvā ca tadā tassa bhikkhuno paccakkhato gahitabhāvadassananti dassetuṃ “ettaka”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:430_4: Tattha hi ettakaṃ dukkhanti tassa paricchijja gahitabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:430_7: Sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasena pajānanameva yathābhūtaṃ pajānanaṃ nāmāti dasseti “sarasalakkhaṇapaṭivedhenā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:430_12: Asammohato paṭivijjhanañca nāma yathā tasmiṃ ñāṇe pavatte pacchā dukkhasaccassa sarūpādiparicchede sammoho na hoti,
tika-s0105t:430_15: “Nibbattika”nti iminā “dukkhaṃ samudeti etasmāti dukkhasamudayo”ti nibbacanaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:430_18: Yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvāti yaṃ nibbānaṃ maggassa ārammaṇapaccayaṭṭhena kāraṇabhūtaṃ āgamma.
tika-s0105t:430_19: Ṭhānanti hi kāraṇaṃ vuccati tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattatāyāti katvā.
tika-s0105t:430_20: Tadubhayaṃ patvāti ca tadubhayavato puggalassa tadubhayassa patti viya vuttā.
tika-s0105t:430_25: Asamānakattuke viya hi samānakattukepi tvāpaccayassa hetvatthe pavatti saddasatthesu pākaṭā.
tika-s0105t:430_30: dukkhasamudayassa pana gahaṇaṃ taṃnibbattakassa nirujjhanato tassāpi nirujjhanadassanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:430_34: Sabbanāmikañhi padaṃ vuttassa vā liṅgassa gāhakaṃ,
tika-s0105t:431_3: Pariyāyadesanābhāvo nāma hi āveṇiko buddhadhammoti heṭṭhā vuttovāyamattho.
tika-s0105t:431_6: atha kasmā sarūpato dassitasaccāniyeva kilesavasena pariyāyato puna dassento evamāhāti vuttanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0105t:431_7: taṃsambandhattā pana sesasaccānaṃ taṃsamudayādipariyāyopi labbhatīti katvā evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:431_12: Tathā hi “kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccatī”tiādinā āsavavimuttasīseneva sabbakilesavimutti vuttā.
tika-s0105t:431_13: “Idaṃ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādinā missakamaggova idha kathito lokiyavipassanāya lokuttaramaggassa
tika-s0105t:431_14: missakattāti vuttaṃ “saha vipassanāya koṭippattaṃ maggaṃ kathesī”ti.
tika-s0105t:431_15: “Jānato passato”ti iminā tayopi pariññāsacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamayā vuttā catusaccapajānanāya eva catukiccasiddhito,
tika-s0105t:431_16: pahānābhisamayo pana pārisesato “vimuccatī”ti iminā vuttoti āha “maggakkhaṇaṃ dassetī”ti.
tika-s0105t:431_17: Cattāri hi kiccāni catusaccapajānanāya eva siddhāni.
tika-s0105t:431_18: Yathāha “taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pariññātanti me bhikkhave pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:431_24: tathāpi dhammānaṃ samānakālikānampi paccayapaccayuppannatā sahajātādikoṭiyā labbhatīti,
tika-s0105t:432_0: Bhavāsavaggahaṇena cettha bhavarāgassa viya bhavadiṭṭhiyāpi samavarodhoti diṭṭhāsavassāpi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-s0105t:432_1: adhunā pana “diṭṭhāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccatī”ti katthaci pāṭho dissati,
tika-s0105t:432_5: Ettha ca kiñcāpi pāḷiyaṃ saccapaṭivedho aniyamitapuggalassa aniyamitakālavasena vutto,
tika-s0105t:432_6: tathāpi abhisamayakāle tassa paccuppannataṃ upādāya “evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato”ti vattamānakālaniddeso kato,
tika-s0105t:432_7: so ca kāmaṃ kassaci maggakkhaṇato paraṃ yāvajjatanā atītakāliko eva,
tika-s0105t:432_8: sabbapaṭhamaṃ panassa atītakālikattaṃ phalakkhaṇena veditabbanti āha “vimuttasminti iminā phalakkhaṇa”nti.
tika-s0105t:432_10: Taggahaṇena pana tadavinābhāvato sesāni niravasesāni gahetabbāni,
tika-s0105t:432_15: Nanu ca “vimuttasmiṃ vimutta”nti vuttaṃ phalameva tassa ārammaṇasaṅkhātā bhūmi,
tika-s0105t:432_16: atha kathaṃ “khīṇā jātī”tiādīhi tassa bhūmidassananti codanaṃ sodhetuṃ “tena hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:432_17: Yasmā pana pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇena vijjamānassāpi kammassa āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikabhāvato “khīṇā jātī”ti pajānāti,
tika-s0105t:432_19: tasmā “khīṇā jātī”tiādīhi tassa bhūmidassananti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:432_21: avinābhāvato ca gahitena pañcavidhena paccavekkhaṇañāṇenāti attho.
tika-s0105t:433_0: “Khīṇā jātī”ti ettha sotujanānaṃ suviññāpanatthaṃ parammukhā viya codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti “katamā panā”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:433_4: vijjamānattā”ti vakkhamānameva hi atthaṃ manasi katvā ayaṃ codanā samuṭṭhāpitā,
tika-s0105t:433_5: tattha na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇāti assa bhikkhuno atītā jāti,
tika-s0105t:433_9: Na anāgatā assa jāti khīṇā maggabhāvanāyāti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:433_11: idañca anāgatabhāvasāmaññameva gahetvā lesena codanādhippāyavibhāvanatthaṃ vadati,
tika-s0105t:433_12: na anāgatavisesaṃ anāgate maggabhāvanāya khepanapayogābhāvatoti attho.
tika-s0105t:433_18: Anāgatavisesoti ca abhāvite magge uppajjanāraho anantarajātibhedo vuccati.
tika-s0105t:433_19: Na paccuppannā assa jāti khīṇā maggabhāvanāyāti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:433_22: Tattha tattha bhave paṭhamābhinibbattilakkhaṇā hi jāti.
tika-s0105t:433_23: “Yā panā”tiādinā pana maggabhāvanāya kilesahetuvināsanamukhena anāgatajātiyā eva khīṇabhāvo pakāsitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:433_24: Ekacatupañcavokārabhavesūti bhavattayaggahaṇaṃ vuttanayena anavasesato jātiyā khīṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ,
tika-s0105t:433_31: Evañca katvā paccavekkhaṇaparamparāya tathā pajānanā siddhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:434_0: Brahmacariyavāso nāma ukkaṭṭhaniddesato maggabrahmacariyassa nibbattanamevāti āha “parivuttha”nti,
tika-s0105t:434_2: Kasmā panidaṃ so atītakālavasena pajānātīti anuyogenāha “puthujjanakalyāṇakena hi saddhi”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t:434_3: Puthujjanakalyāṇakopi hi heṭṭhā vuttalakkhaṇo sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno nāma dakkhiṇavibhaṅgasuttādīsu tathā eva vuttattā.
tika-s0105t:434_4: Vasanti nāmāti vasantā eva nāma honti,
tika-s0105t:434_7: Nanu ca “so ‘idaṃ dukkha”nti yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādinā pāḷiyaṃ sammādiṭṭhiyeva vuttā,
tika-s0105t:434_9: atha kasmā “catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyābhāvanāvasena soḷasavidhaṃ kiccaṃ
tika-s0105t:434_12: Sammādiṭṭhiyā hi catūsu saccesu pariññādikiccasādhanavasena pavattamānāya sammāsaṅkappādīnampi sesānaṃ dukkhasacce pariññābhisamayānuguṇāva pavatti,
tika-s0105t:434_13: itarasaccesu ca nesaṃ pahānābhisamayādivasena pavatti pākaṭā evāti.
tika-s0105t:434_14: Dukkhanirodhamaggesu yathākkamaṃ pariññāsacchikiriyābhāvanāpi yāvadeva samudayapahānatthāti katvā tadattheyeva
tika-s0105t:434_15: tāsaṃ pakkhipanena “kataṃ karaṇīya”nti padassa adhippāyaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “tenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:435_0: Kasmā panettha “kataṃ karaṇīya”nti atītaniddeso katoti āha “puthujjanakalyāṇakādayo”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:435_5: Te pana pakārā ariyamaggabyāpārabhūtā pariññādayo idhādhippetāti vuttaṃ “evaṃ soḷasakiccabhāvāyā”ti.
tika-s0105t:435_6: Te hi maggaṃ paccavekkhato maggānubhāvena pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti magge paccavekkhite taṃkiccapaccavekkhaṇāyapi sukhena siddhito.
tika-s0105t:435_7: Evaṃ sādhāraṇato catūsu maggesu paccekaṃ catukiccavasena soḷasakiccabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā tesupi kiccesu pahānameva
tika-s0105t:435_8: padhānaṃ tadatthattā itaresaṃ pariññādīnanti tadeva visesato pakāsetuṃ “kilesakkhayabhāvāya vā”ti āha.
tika-s0105t:436_0: Apica purimanayena paccavekkhaṇaparamparāya paccavekkhaṇavidhiṃ dassetvā idāni padhānattā pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇavidhimeva
tika-s0105t:436_4: āyasaddo cettha sampadānavacanassa kāriyabhūto nissakkattheti dasseti “itthabhāvato”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:436_5: “Imasmā evaṃ pakārā”ti pana vadanto pakāro nāma pakāravantato atthato bhedo natthi.
tika-s0105t:436_10: atthato pana abhedepi sati avayavāvayavitādinā bhedaparikappanāvasena siyā kiñci bhedamatthaṃ,
tika-s0105t:437_5: imamatthaṃ dassento “itthabhāvato imasmā evaṃ pakārā”ti āhāti.
tika-s0105t:437_9: “Ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhantī”ti idāni pāṭho,
tika-s0105t:437_10: “ime pana carimakattabhāvasaṅkhātā pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhantī”ti pana majjhimāgamavinayaṭīkādīsu,
tika-s0105t:437_15: Etena hi tesaṃ khandhānaṃ apariññāmūlābhāvena apatiṭṭhābhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:437_18: Yathāha “kabaḷīkāre ce bhikkhave āhāre atthi rāgo,
tika-s0105t:437_23: yathā chinnamūlakā rukkhā mūlābhāvato appatiṭṭhā anokāsā tiṭṭhanti,
tika-s0105t:437_28: Apaṇṇattikabhāvanti yesu khandhesu vijjamānesu tathā tathā parikappanāsiddhā paññatti,
tika-s0105t:437_29: tadabhāvato tassāpi dharamānakapaññattiyā abhāvena apaññattikabhāvaṃ gamissanti.
tika-s0105t:437_30: Paṇṇatti paññattīti hi atthato ekaṃ yathā “paññāsa paṇṇāsā”ti.
tika-s0105t:438_3: Tañhi pabbatapādato anukkamena bahulaṃ saṃkhittaṃ saṅkucitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:438_11: sā cassa anāvilatā kaddamābhāvena hotīti āha “nikkaddamo”ti.
tika-s0105t:438_24: Samūhavācakassa ghaṭāsaddassa itthi liṅgassāpi dissanato “gumba”nti padassatthaṃ dasseti “ghaṭā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:439_0: Kāmañca “sippiyasambukampi sakkharakathalampi macchagumbampi tiṭṭhantampi carantampī”ti ettha sakkharakathalaṃ tiṭṭhatiyeva,
tika-s0105t:439_2: tathāpi sahacaraṇanayena sabbāneva caranti viya evaṃ vuttanti atthaṃ dassento “tiṭṭhantampi carantampīti etthā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:439_7: Antarantarāti bahūnaṃ gāvīnamantarantarā ṭhitāsu gāvīsu vijjamānāsupi.
tika-s0105t:439_12: sippiyasambukamacchagumbānaṃ caraṇakiriyāyapi yogato ṭhānakiriyāya anekantattā ekantato tiṭṭhantameva
tika-s0105t:439_13: na kadācipi carantaṃ sakkharakathalaṃ upādāya sippiyasambukampi macchagumbampi tiṭṭhantanti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:439_17: Itarampi dvayanti sippiyasambukamacchagumbaṃ padavasena evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:439_19: Carantanti vuttanti etthāpi tesaṃ ṭhānakiriyamupādāya “tiṭṭhantampī”ti pi-
tika-s0105t:439_23: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “kiṃ vā imāya sahacariyāya,
tika-s0105t:439_26: sippisambukassa macchagumbassa ca vasena tiṭṭhantampi carantampīti evaṃ yojanā kātabbā”ti.
tika-s0105t:439_27: Alabbhamānassāpi atthassa sahayogīvasena desanāmattaṃ pati sahacaraṇanayo,
tika-s0105t:439_28: sādhāraṇato desitassāpi atthassa sambhavavasena vivecanaṃ pati yathālābhanayoti ubhayathāpi yujjati.
tika-s0105t:440_2: itarāni carantipi tiṭṭhantipī”ti iminā yathālābhanayo dassito yathāsambhavaṃ atthassa vivecitattā,
tika-s0105t:440_3: “yathā panā”tiādinā pana sahacaraṇanayo alabbhamānassāpi atthassa sahayogīvasena desanāmattassa vibhāvitattāti,
tika-s0105t:440_8: Udakarahado ca nāma katthaci samuddopi vuccati “rahadopi tattha gambhīro,
tika-s0105t:440_14: So hi udakavasena raho cakkhurahādikaṃ dadātīti udakarahado o-
tika-s0105t:440_17: Saddavidū pana “udakaṃ haratīti udakarahado niruttinayenā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0105t:441_1: Tattha ettāvatāti “puna caparaṃ mahārāja bhikkhu evaṃ samāhite citte…pe…
tika-s0105t:441_5: tassa ca visuṃ gaṇanadassanena heṭṭhā catutthajjhānānantaraṃ vattabbatākāraṇesu tīsu nayesu tatiyanayasseva yuttatarabhāvopi dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:441_6: Manomayañāṇassa iddhividhasamavarodhitabhāve visuddhimagge vuttepi idha pāḷiyaṃ visuṃ desitattā visuṃ eva gahaṇaṃ,
tika-s0105t:441_9: tabbasena nipphannattā taggahaṇeneva gahitaṃ taṃ ñāṇadvayanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:442_0: Sabbesaṃ pana dasannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ārammaṇavibhāgassa visuddhimagge anāgatattā tatthānāgatañāṇānaṃ ārammaṇavibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “tesa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:442_10: attanā vā nimmite manomaye kāye vijjamānaṃ rūpāyatanamevātipi yujjati.
tika-s0105t:442_11: Idañhi tassa ñāṇassa abhinimmiyamāne manomaye kāye rūpāyatanamevārabbha pavattanato vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:442_13: Na hi rūpakalāpo gandhāyatanādivirahito atthīti sabbathā parinipphannameva nimmitarūpaṃ.
tika-s0105t:442_16: Nibbānavasena ekadhammārammaṇampi samānaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ parittārammaṇāditikavasena tividhārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0105t:443_2: Ratanakūṭaṃ viya kūṭāgārassa arahattaṃ kūṭaṃ uttamaṅgabhūtaṃ bhagavato desanāya arahattapariyosānattāti āha “arahattanikūṭenā”ti.
tika-s0105t:443_5: ratanāgāraṃ viya ratanakūṭena arahattakūṭena niṭṭhāpesi “vimuttasmi”nti iminā,
tika-s0105t:445_1: Ettāvatā bhagavatā desitassa sāmaññaphalasuttassa atthavaṇṇanaṃ katvā idāni dhammasaṅgāhakehi saṅgītassa
tika-s0105t:445_2: “evaṃ vutte”tiādipāṭhassapi atthavaṇṇanaṃ karonto paṭhamaṃ sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ “rājā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:445_12: Ime pañhe puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchanto ahaṃ ciraṃ vata amhi,
tika-s0105t:445_13: evaṃ pucchantopi ahaṃ thuse koṭṭento viya kañci sāraṃ nālatthanti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:445_17: Dasabalassa guṇānubhāvaṃ ajānanto ahaṃ vañcito suciraṃ vata amhīti.
tika-s0105t:445_23: Ullaṅghanasamatthāyapi ubbegapītiyā anullaṅghanampi siyāti āha “pañcavidhāya pītiyā phuṭasarīro”ti.
tika-s0105t:446_1: vigatabhāvo ca khayo evāti āha “khaye dissatī”ti.
tika-s0105t:446_4: tādiso ca sundaro bhaddako nāmāti vuttaṃ “sundare”ti.
tika-s0105t:447_12: Sabbā obhāsayaṃ disāti sabbā dasapi disā obhāsayanto.
tika-s0105t:447_14: sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karonto ko vandatīti sambandho.
tika-s0105t:448_4: kasmā panāyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ vuttoti codanāya sodhanāmukhena āmeḍitavisayaṃ niddhāreti “bhaye kodhe”tiādinā,
tika-s0105t:448_6: iminā ca iminā ca visayenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:448_7: “Sādhu sādhu bhante”ti āmeḍitavasena atthaṃ dassetvā tassa visayaṃ niddhārento evamāhātipi sambandhaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0105t:448_27: aññesu ca visayesu āmeḍitavacanaṃ budho kareyya,
tika-s0105t:448_33: āpubbo tu dvattikkhattumuccāraṇe vattati yathā “etadeva yadā vākya-
tika-s0105t:449_0: Evaṃ āmeḍitavasena dvikkhattuṃ vuttabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni nayidaṃ āmeḍitavaseneva dvikkhattuṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:449_2: Āmeḍitavasena atthaṃ dassetvā vicchāvasenāpi dassento evamāhātipi vadanti,
tika-s0105t:449_4: Byāpetabbassa hi byāpakena guṇakiriyādabbena byāpanicchāya dvattikkhattuṃ vacanaṃ vicchā yathā “gāmo gāmo ramaṇīyo”ti.
tika-s0105t:449_10: taṃ pana bhagavato vacanaṃ dhammadesanāyevāti katvā “yadidaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanā”ti āha,
tika-s0105t:449_12: tadidaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanāsaṅkhātaṃ vacanaṃ abhikkantanti attho.
tika-s0105t:449_13: Evaṃ paṭiniddesopi hi atthato abhedattā yutto eva “yattha ca dinnaṃ mahapphalamāhū”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0105t:449_21: Dutiyapadepi “abhikkantanti pasādanaṃ apekkhitvā napuṃsakaliṅgena vutta”ntiādinā yathārahamesa nayo netabbo.
tika-s0105t:450_4: tesu “guṇādhigamanato”ti vuttesuyeva guṇesu padhānabhūtā guṇā dassetabbāti te padhānabhūte guṇe tāva dassetuṃ “saddhājananato paññājananato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:450_7: padhānaniddeso cesa desanāya adhigametabbehi sīlasamādhidukādīhipi yojanāsambhavato.
tika-s0105t:450_24: hitajjhāsayappavattitāya ca vīmaṃsiyamānahitatoti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:451_3: “Cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī”ti idaṃ “telapajjotaṃ dhāreyyā”ti catutthaupamāya ākāramattadassanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:451_10: uttarābhimukho vā gacchā”tiādinā vacanamattaṃ avatvā “esa maggo,
tika-s0105t:451_11: evaṃ gacchā”ti hatthe gahetvā nissandehaṃ dasseyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:451_16: Nikkujjitaṃ ukkujjeyyāti kassacipi ādheyyassa anādhārabhūtaṃ kiñci bhājanaṃ ādhārabhāvāpādanavasena ukkujjeyya upari mukhaṃ ṭhapeyya.
tika-s0105t:451_18: adhomukhaṭṭhapitatāya asaddhamme patitanti evaṃ padadvayaṃ nikkujjitapadassa yathādassitena atthadvayena yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ,
tika-s0105t:451_20: Attano sabhāveneva hi esa rājā saddhammavimukho,
tika-s0105t:451_21: pāpamittena pana devadattena pitughātādīsu uyyojitattā asaddhamme patitoti.
tika-s0105t:452_2: micchādiṭṭhi pana savisesaṃ paṭicchādikā satte micchābhinivesavasenāti āha “micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchanna”nti.
tika-s0105t:452_3: Tenāha bhagavā “micchādiṭṭhiparamāhaṃ bhikkhave vajjaṃ vadāmī”ti, [a. ni.
tika-s0105t:452_5: “Micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṃ sāsanaṃ vivarantenā”ti vadanto sabbabuddhānaṃ ekāva anusandhi,
tika-s0105t:452_6: ekaṃva sāsananti katvā kassapassa bhagavato sāsanampi iminā saddhiṃ ekasāsanaṃ karotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:452_8: evañca katvā micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannassa sāsanassa vivaraṇavacanaṃ upapannaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0105t:453_0: Sabbo akusaladhammasaṅkhāto apāyagāmimaggo kummaggo kucchito maggoti katvā.
tika-s0105t:453_1: Sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ ujupaṭipakkhatāya micchādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha micchattadhammā micchāmaggo mokkhamaggato micchā vitatho maggoti katvā.
tika-s0105t:453_2: Teneva hi tadubhayassa paṭipakkhataṃ sandhāya “saggamokkhamaggaṃ āvikarontenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:453_10: Tesaṃ buddhādiratanarūpānaṃ paṭicchādakassa mohandhakārassa viddhaṃsakaṃ tathā.
tika-s0105t:453_12: Tadubhayaṃ tulyādhikaraṇavasena viyūhitvā tassa dhārako samādahakoti atthena “tappaṭicchādakamohandhakāraviddhaṃsakadesanāpajjotadhārakenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:454_2: Pasannacittatā ca imaṃ desanaṃ sutvā evāti atthaṃ ñāpetuṃ “imāya desanāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:454_21: evañca katvā vinayaṭṭhakathādīsu “saraṇanti gacchāmī”ti saheva itisaddena attho vuttoti.
tika-s0105t:454_22: Ettha hi nāyaṃ gami- saddo nī-
tika-s0105t:454_25: evaṃ “bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti vattuṃ na sakkā,
tika-s0105t:454_29: so buddhaṃ vā gaccheyya saraṇaṃ vā”ti khuddakanikāyaṭṭhakathāya uddhaṭā codanā anavakāsā.
tika-s0105t:454_38: Tassa hi samānādhikaraṇabhāve adhippete paṭihatacittopi bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamanto buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato nāma siyā.
tika-s0105t:454_43: “saraṇa”nti pana gamanākārassāti vuttanayena itilopavaseneva attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0105t:459_0: “Iti iminā adhippāyena bhagavantaṃ gacchāmī”ti pana vadanto aneneva adhippāyena bhajanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:459_2: Tattha “gacchāmī”tiādīsu purimassa purimassa pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ atthavacanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:459_6: payirupāsanaṃ vattapaṭivattakaraṇena upaṭṭhānanti evaṃ sabbathāpi anaññasādhāraṇataṃyeva dasseti.
tika-s0105t:459_7: Evaṃ “gacchāmī”ti padassa gatiatthaṃ dassetvā buddhiatthampi dassetuṃ “evaṃ vā”tiādimāha,
tika-s0105t:459_9: Kasmā pana “gacchāmī”ti padassa “bujjhāmī”ti ayamattho labbhatīti codanaṃ sodheti “yesañhī”tiādinā,
tika-s0105t:459_10: anena ca niruttinayamantarena sabhāvatova gamudhātussa buddhiatthoti dīpeti.
tika-s0105t:460_2: na maggaṭṭhāti te dassento “yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne cā”ti āha.
tika-s0105t:460_5: nippariyāyena pana maggaṭṭhā eva tathā vattabbā,
tika-s0105t:460_7: Tathā hi te eva “apāyesu apatamāne dhāretī”ti vuttā.
tika-s0105t:460_11: tadetaṃ sammattaniyāmokkamanavasena nippariyāyato apāyavinimuttake sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:460_12: tadanupapattivasena pana pariyāyato apāyavinimuttakaṃ kalyāṇaputhujjanampi “yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne”ti padena dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:460_13: Tathā hesa dakkhiṇavibhaṅgasuttādīsu sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannabhāvena vuttoti,
tika-s0105t:460_16: sacchikatanirodhe ca yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne ca puggale apāyesu apatamāne katvā dhāretīti sapāṭhasesayojanā.
tika-s0105t:460_18: vattamānakālikena ca pacchimena padena saha kalyāṇaputhujjanena maggaṭṭhānameva.
tika-s0105t:460_24: vaṭṭadukkhesu pana sabbesupi apatamāne katvā dhāretīti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:460_25: Tathā hi abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “sotāpattimaggo cettha apāyabhavato vuṭṭhāti,
tika-s0105t:460_29: sabbabhavehipi vuṭṭhāti evāti vadantī”ti evañca katvā ariyamaggo niyyānikatāya,
tika-s0105t:460_30: nibbānañca tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāyāti ubhayameva nippariyāyena dhammo nāmāti sarūpato dassetuṃ “so atthato ariyamaggo ceva nibbānañcā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:460_32: svāyamattho ca pāḷiyā eva siddhoti āha “vuttañceta”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t:460_40: tena “yāvatā bhikkhave dhammā saṅkhatā vā asaṅkhatā vā,
tika-s0105t:461_0: Yasmā pana ariyaphalānaṃ “tāya saddhāya avūpasantāyā”tiādi vacanato maggena samucchinnānaṃ kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānakiccatāya niyyānānuguṇatā,
tika-s0105t:461_2: pariyattiyā pana niyyānadhammasamadhigamahetutāya niyyānānuguṇatāti iminā pariyāyena vuttanayena dhammabhāvo labbhati,
tika-s0105t:461_5: Tattha chattamāṇavakavimāneti chatto kira nāma setabyāyaṃ brāhmaṇamāṇavako,
tika-s0105t:461_6: so ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ pokkharasātibrāhmaṇassa santike sippaṃ uggahetvā “garudakkhiṇaṃ dassāmī”ti ukkaṭṭhābhimukho gacchati,
tika-s0105t:461_8: tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattamānañca disvā gāthābandhavasena saraṇagamanavidhiṃ desesi,
tika-s0105t:461_10: Devalokepi hi tassa manussakāle samaññā yathā “maṇḍūko devaputto,
tika-s0105t:461_12: idha pana chattamāṇavakavimānaṃ vatthu kāraṇaṃ etassāti katvā uttarapadalopena “na tathā tapati nabhe sūriyo,
tika-s0105t:461_13: cando ca na bhāsati na phusso,
tika-s0105t:462_0: Kāmarāgo bhavarāgoti evamādibhedo anādikālavibhāvito sabbopi rāgo virajjati pahīyati etenāti rāgavirāgo, maggo.
tika-s0105t:462_2: antonijjhānalakkhaṇassa ca sokassa taduppattiyaṃ sabbaso parikkhīṇattā natthi ejā,
tika-s0105t:462_3: soko ca etasminti anejaṃ, asokañca, phalaṃ.
tika-s0105t:462_4: Tadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “taṇhāvasiṭṭhānaṃ sokanimittānaṃ kilesānaṃ paṭippassambhanato asoka”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:462_5: Dhammamasaṅkhatanti sampajja sambhūya paccayehi appaṭisaṅkhatattā asaṅkhataṃ attano sabhāvadhāraṇato paramatthadhammabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ.
tika-s0105t:462_10: evaṃ sati dhammasaddo tīsupi ṭhānesu yojetabbo.
tika-s0105t:462_11: Appaṭikūlasaddena ca tattha nibbānameva gahitaṃ “natthi ettha kiñcipi paṭikūla”nti katvā,
tika-s0105t:463_1: Evaṃ idha catūhipi padehi pariyattidhammoyeva gahito,
tika-s0105t:463_9: uddesādivasena ca suṭṭhu vibhajanato suvibhattanti tīhipi padehi pariyattidhammameva vadatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:463_11: kathentassa viya suṇantassāpi sammukhībhāvato ubhatopaccakkhatādassanatthaṃ idheva “ima”nti āsannapaccakkhavacanamāha.
tika-s0105t:463_12: Puna “dhamma”nti idaṃ yathāvuttassa catubbidhassāpi dhammassa sādhāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:463_13: Pariyattidhammopi hi saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhānamattāyapi yāthāvapaṭipattiyā apāyapatanato dhāreti,
tika-s0105t:463_14: imassa ca atthassa idameva chattamāṇavakavimānaṃ sādhakanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:463_15: Sādhāraṇabhāvena yathāvuttaṃ dhammaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā dassento puna “ima”nti āha.
tika-s0105t:463_19: kāro adhikopi ariyacariyādipadehi viya anekakkharapadena yuttattā anupavajjoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:464_0: Diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātenāti “yāyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya,
tika-s0105t:464_1: tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttāya diṭṭhiyā ceva “yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni
tika-s0105t:464_2: acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññupasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṃvattanikāni,
tika-s0105t:464_3: tathārūpehi sīlehi sīlasāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ sīlānañca saṃhatabhāvena,
tika-s0105t:464_7: Ariyapuggalā hi yattha katthaci dūre ṭhitāpi attano guṇasāmaggiyā saṃhatā eva.
tika-s0105t:465_12: Te puggalā maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhe yugale akatvā visuṃ visuṃ puggalagaṇanena aṭṭha ca honti.
tika-s0105t:465_13: Imaṃ saṅghaṃ saraṇatthaṃ saraṇāya parāyaṇāya apāyadukkhavaṭṭadukkhaparitāṇāya upehi upagaccha bhaja seva,
tika-s0105t:465_14: evaṃ vā jānāhi bujjhassūti saha yojanāya attho.
tika-s0105t:465_15: Yattha yesu sucīsu catūsu purisayugesu dinnaṃ mahapphalamāhu,
tika-s0105t:465_18: Evampi hi paṭiniddeso yutto eva atthato abhinnattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:468_1: kattu ca vibhāvanā tattha kosallāya hoti yevāti saha kattunā taṃ vidhiṃ dassetuṃ “idāni tesu saraṇagamanesu kosallatthaṃ…pe…
tika-s0105t:468_3: “Yo ca saraṇaṃ gacchatī”ti iminā hi kattāraṃ vibhāveti tena vinā saraṇagamanasseva asambhavato,
tika-s0105t:468_9: taṃ pana saṃkilesaggahaṇeneva atthato vibhāvitaṃ hotīti na gahitaṃ.
tika-s0105t:468_16: Hiṃsatthassa sarasaddassa vasenetaṃ siddhanti dassento dhātvatthavasena “hiṃsatīti saraṇa”nti vatvā taṃ pana hiṃsanaṃ kesaṃ, kathaṃ,
tika-s0105t:468_26: Duggatiparikilesanti duggatipariyāpannaṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ “duggatiyaṃ parikilissanaṃ saṃvibādhanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:468_28: tayidaṃ sabbaṃ parato phalakathāyaṃ āvi bhavissati.
tika-s0105t:468_30: na pana sattahiṃsanamivāti dasseti “hanati vināsetī”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:469_0: Evaṃ hiṃsanatthavasena avisesato saraṇasaddatthaṃ dassetvā idāni tadatthavaseneva visesato dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:469_1: Ratanattayassa paccekaṃ hiṃsanakāraṇadassanameva hi purimanayato imassa visesoti.
tika-s0105t:469_2: Tattha hite pavattanenāti “sampannasīlā bhikkhave viharathā”tiādinā atthe sattānaṃ niyojanena.
tika-s0105t:469_3: Ahitā ca nivattanenāti “pāṇātipātassa kho pāpako vipāko,
tika-s0105t:469_4: pāpakaṃ abhisamparāya”ntiādinā ādīnavadassanādimukhena anatthato ca sattānaṃ nivattanena.
tika-s0105t:469_5: Bhayaṃ hiṃsatīti hitāhitesu appavattipavattihetukaṃ byasanaṃ appavattikaraṇena vināseti.
tika-s0105t:469_7: phalanibbānasaṅkhāto pana assāsadānena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsatīti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:469_10: Anupasaggopi hi saddo saupasaggo viya atthavisesavācako “appakampi kataṃ kāraṃ,
tika-s0105t:469_12: Anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvato vipulaphalapaṭilābhakaraṇena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃ satīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:469_13: Imināpi pariyāyenāti ratanattayassa paccekaṃ hiṃsakabhāvakāraṇadassanavasena vibhajitvā vuttena imināpi kāraṇena.
tika-s0105t:469_14: Yasmā panidaṃ saraṇapadaṃ nāthapadaṃ viya suddhanāmapadattā dhātvatthaṃ antonītaṃ katvā saṅketatthampi vadati,
tika-s0105t:469_15: tasmā heṭṭhā saraṇaṃ parāyaṇanti attho vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:470_0: Evaṃ saraṇatthaṃ dassetvā idāni saraṇagamanatthaṃ dassento “tappasādā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:470_3: suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti evamādinā tasmiṃ ratanattaye pasādo tappasādo,
tika-s0105t:470_6: tappasādo ca taggarutā ca tappasādataggarutā, tāhi.
tika-s0105t:470_8: tadeva ratanattayaṃ parāyaṇaṃ parāgati tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ etassāti tapparāyaṇo,
tika-s0105t:470_16: Ariyā hi ratanattayaṃ guṇābhiññatāya pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garuṃ katvā passanti,
tika-s0105t:470_19: Tapparāyaṇatā panettha taggatikatāti tāya catubbidhampi vakkhamānaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:470_20: Avisesena vā pasādagarutā jotitāti pasādaggahaṇena anaveccappasādassa lokiyassa,
tika-s0105t:470_23: lokuttarassa cāti ubhayenapi padena ubhayampi lokiyalokuttarasaraṇagamanaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:470_28: tadākārappavattaṃ saddhāpaññādisampayuttadhammasahitaṃ cittaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ nāma “saraṇanti gacchati etenāti katvā”ti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:471_4: Maggakkhaṇe ijjhamāneneva hi catusaccādhigamena phalaṭṭhānampi saraṇagamakatā sijjhati lokuttarasaraṇagamanassa bhedābhāvato,
tika-s0105t:471_9: kiccato ca sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:471_12: Nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā ārammaṇato ijjhatīti hi yojetabbaṃ, tvā-
tika-s0105t:471_13: saddo ca hetutthavācako yathā “sakko hutvā nibbattī”ti.
tika-s0105t:471_14: Apica “ārammaṇato”ti vuttamevatthaṃ sarūpato niyameti “nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:471_16: “Ārammaṇato nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā”ti etena vā maggakkhaṇānurūpaṃ ekārammaṇataṃ dassetvā “kiccato”ti iminā
tika-s0105t:471_19: nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā”ti ca vuttattā atthato maggañāṇasaṅkhāto catusaccādhigamo eva lokuttarasaraṇagamananti viññāyati.
tika-s0105t:471_20: Tattha hi catusaccādhigamane saraṇagamanupakkilesassa pahānābhisamayavasena samucchindanaṃ bhavati,
tika-s0105t:471_22: maggadhammo ca bhāvanābhisamayavasena paṭivijjhiyamānoyeva saraṇagamanatthaṃ sādheti,
tika-s0105t:471_23: buddhaguṇā pana sāvakagocarabhūtā pariññābhisamayavasena paṭivijjhiyamānā saraṇagamanatthaṃ sādhenti,
tika-s0105t:472_4: na lokiyaṃ viya paṭipāṭiyā asammohapaṭivedhena paṭividdhattāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:472_5: Padīpassa viya hi ekakkhaṇeyeva maggassa catukiccasādhananti.
tika-s0105t:472_6: Ye pana vadanti “saraṇagamanaṃ nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā na pavattati,
tika-s0105t:472_7: maggassa adhigatattā pana adhigatameva taṃ hoti ekaccānaṃ tevijjādīnaṃ lokiyavijjādayo viyā”ti,
tika-s0105t:472_8: tesaṃ pana vacane lokiyameva saraṇagamanaṃ siyā,
tika-s0105t:472_12: Ārammaṇato buddhādiguṇārammaṇaṃ hutvāti etthāpi vuttanayena attho,
tika-s0105t:472_14: ārammaṇato ca sakalepi ratanattaye ijjhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:473_3: Sahajātavasena pubbaṅgamatāyeva hi tammūlikatā saddhāvirahitassa buddhādīsu sammādassanassa asambhavato.
tika-s0105t:473_5: dhammasudhammataṃ saṅghasuppaṭipannatañca lokiyāvabodhavasena sammā ñāyena dassanato.
tika-s0105t:473_7: “saddhāmūlikā ca sammādiṭṭhī”ti pana etena saddhūpanissayā yathāvuttā paññāti.
tika-s0105t:473_10: Tattha paṭhamena padena mātādīhi ussāhitadārakādīnaṃ viya ñāṇavippayuttaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ gahitaṃ,
tika-s0105t:473_12: Tadubhayameva puññakiriyavatthu visesabhāvena dassetuṃ “dasasu puññakiriyavatthūsu diṭṭhijukammanti vuccatī”ti āha.
tika-s0105t:473_13: Diṭṭhi eva attano paccayehi ujuṃ karīyatīti hi atthena sammādiṭṭhiyā diṭṭhijukammabhāvo,
tika-s0105t:473_14: diṭṭhi ujuṃ karīyati etenāti atthena pana saddhāyapi.
tika-s0105t:473_17: evañca katvā “tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto cittuppādo”ti heṭṭhā vuttavacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:473_18: saddhāsammādiṭṭhīnaṃ pana visuṃ gahaṇaṃ taṃsampayuttacittuppādassa tappadhānatāyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:474_0: Tayidanti lokiyaṃ saraṇagamanameva paccāmasati lokuttarassa tathā bhedābhāvato.
tika-s0105t:474_1: Tassa hi maggakkhaṇeyeva vuttanayena ijjhanato tathāvidhassa samādānassa avijjamānattā esa bhedo na sambhavatīti.
tika-s0105t:474_2: Attā sanniyyātīyati appīyati pariccajīyati etenāti attasanniyyātanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:474_4: Taṃ ratanattayaṃ parāyaṇaṃ paṭisaraṇametassāti tapparāyaṇo, puggalo,
tika-s0105t:474_8: “Saraṇa”nti adhippāyena sissabhāvaṃ antevāsikabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ vattapaṭivattādikaraṇaṃ upagacchati etenāti sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:475_2: Hitopadesakathāpariyāyena dhammassāpi ācariyabhāvo samudācarīyati “phalo ambo aphalo ca,
tika-s0105t:475_3: te satthāro ubho mamā”tiādīsu viyāti āha “dhammassa antevāsiko”ti.
tika-s0105t:475_5: Buddhādīnaṃyevāti avadhāraṇassa attasanniyyātanādīsupi sīhagatikavasena adhikāro veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:476_0: Evaṃ attasanniyyātanādīni ekena pakārena dassetvā idāni aparehipi pakārehi dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ,
tika-s0105t:476_1: etena attasanniyyātanatapparāyaṇatādīnaṃ catunnaṃ pariyāyantarehipi attasanniyyātanatapparāyaṇatādi katameva
tika-s0105t:476_2: hoti atthassa abhinnattā yathā taṃ “sikkhāpaccakkhānaabhūtārocanānī”ti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:476_5: Mahākassapo kira sayameva pabbajitavesaṃ gahetvā mahātitthabrāhmaṇagāmato nikkhamitvā gacchanto tigāvutamaggaṃ
tika-s0105t:476_7: antarā ca nāḷandaṃ bahuputtakanigrodharukkhamūle ekakameva nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ passitvā “ayaṃ bhagavā
tika-s0105t:476_13: bhagavantameva passeyyanti sace ahaṃ satthāraṃ passeyyaṃ,
tika-s0105t:476_15: Na hi me ito aññena satthārā bhavituṃ sakkā.
tika-s0105t:476_17: bhagavantameva passeyyanti sace ahaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā suṭṭhu gatattā sugataṃ nāma passeyyaṃ,
tika-s0105t:476_19: Na hi me ito aññena sugatena bhavituṃ sakkā.
tika-s0105t:476_21: bhagavantameva passeyyanti sace ahaṃ sammā sāmañca saccāni buddhattā sammāsambuddhaṃ nāma passeyyaṃ,
tika-s0105t:476_23: na hi me ito aññena sammāsambuddhena bhavituṃ sakkāti ayamettha aṭṭhakathā.
tika-s0105t:476_26: saddena vā bhavitabbaṃ “sace”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā. Vata-
tika-s0105t:476_27: saddo ca passitukāmatāya ekaṃsatthaṃ dīpetītipi yujjati.
tika-s0105t:477_3: pana pasādānurūpadassanatthañca evaṃ vācaṃ bhindatīti tadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:477_4: Gāmā gāmanti aññasmā devagāmā aññaṃ devagāmaṃ,
tika-s0105t:477_12: sambuddhaṃ namassamāno dhammaghosako hutvā vicarissāmīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:478_2: Nanu ca ete āḷavakādayo adhigatamaggattā maggeneva āgatasaraṇagamanā,
tika-s0105t:478_9: sudhammata”nti ca hi etehi tapparāyaṇatākāro pavedito.
tika-s0105t:478_10: Tasmā saraṇagamanavisesamanapekkhitvā pavedanākāramattaṃ upadisantena evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:478_11: Athāti “kathaṃ kho brāhmaṇo hotī”tiādinā puṭṭhassa aṭṭhavidhapañhassa “pubbenivāsaṃ yo vedī”tiādinā byākaraṇapariyosānakāle.
tika-s0105t:478_14: Evampi paṇipāto daṭṭhabboti evampi paramanipaccakārena paṇipāto daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0105t:479_8: Evaṃ sesesupi paṇipātapadena cetesaṃ sambandho tabbasena paṇipātassa catubbidhattā.
tika-s0105t:479_13: Idāni “na itarehī”tiādinā vuttameva atthattayaṃ yathākkamaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:480_5: tasmā “āpadāsu uppannāsu bhavissatī”ti evaṃ manasi katvā nidhāpeyyāti āha “āpadāsu bhavissatī”ti.
tika-s0105t:480_6: Imesu pana catūsu koṭṭhāsesu “ekena bhoge bhuñjeyyā”ti vuttakoṭṭhāsatoyeva gahetvā bhikkhūnampi kapaṇaddhikādīnampi dānaṃ dātabbaṃ,
tika-s0105t:480_11: pana niyyānikaṃ vā anusāsaniṃ paccāsisantopi dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātameva karoti nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:481_1: Atthavasā liṅgavibhattivipariṇāmoti katvā gahitasaraṇāya upāsikāya vātipi yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:481_11: tassa pana kāraṇaṃ seṭṭhavasena avanditattāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:481_18: tabbibhāgasambandhato cettha sakkā abhedopi sukhena dassetunti abhedadassanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0105t:482_0: Ariyamaggo eva lokuttarasaraṇagamananti cattāri sāmaññaphalāni vipākaphalabhāvena vuttāni.
tika-s0105t:482_4: Yathā hi sālibījādīnaṃ phalāni taṃsadisāni vipakkāni nāma honti,
tika-s0105t:482_8: sārammaṇabhāvena ca sadisāni vipakkāni nāma honti,
tika-s0105t:483_5: pabbatāni vanāni cā”tiādinā vuttaṃ khemaṃ saraṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0105t:483_8: evaṃ sati kiṃ nāma vatthu khemaṃ saraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:483_10: kiṃ nāma vatthuṃ saraṇamāgamma sabbadukkhā pamuccatīti ce?
tika-s0105t:484_0: Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato…pe…
tika-s0105t:485_0: Etaṃ kho saraṇaṃ khemaṃ, etaṃ saraṇamuttamaṃ;
tika-s0105t:487_2: calanato ca akuppaṃ acalaṃ lokuttarameva saraṇagamanaṃ pakāsetuṃ “cattāri ariyasaccāni,
tika-s0105t:487_9: passatī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ lokuttarasaraṇagamanasaṅkhātaṃ ariyasaccadassanaṃ. Kho-
tika-s0105t:488_9: Kañci saṅkhāranti catubhūmakesu saṅkhatasaṅkhāresu ekampi saṅkhāraṃ.
tika-s0105t:488_11: Sukhato upagaccheyyāti “ekantasukhī attā hoti arogo paraṃ maraṇā”ti evaṃ attadiṭṭhivasena “sukho”ti gaṇheyya,
tika-s0105t:488_12: diṭṭhivippayuttacittena pana ariyasāvako pariḷāhavūpasamatthaṃ mattahatthiparittāsito cokkhabrāhmaṇo
tika-s0105t:488_13: viya ukkārabhūmiṃ kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhato upagacchati.
tika-s0105t:491_0: Imesu pana tīsupi vāresu ariyasāvakassa catubhūmakavaseneva paricchedo veditabbo,
tika-s0105t:491_2: Yaṃ yañhi puthujjano “niccaṃ sukhaṃ attā”ti gāhaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-s0105t:491_3: taṃ taṃ ariyasāvako “aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā”ti gaṇhanto gāhaṃ viniveṭheti.
tika-s0105t:492_3: Kiṃ pana ariyasāvako tehi aññampi pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyyāti?
tika-s0105t:492_5: Cakkavattirajjasakajīvitahetupi hi so taṃ jīvitā na voropeyya,
tika-s0105t:492_6: tathāpi puthujjanabhāvassa mahāsāvajjatādassanatthaṃ ariyabhāvassa ca balavatāpakāsanatthaṃ evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:492_9: Lohitaṃ uppādeyyāti jīvamānakasarīre khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi lohitaṃ uppādeyya.
tika-s0105t:492_10: Saṅghaṃ bhindeyyāti samānasaṃvāsakaṃ samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhitaṃ saṅghaṃ pañcahi kāraṇehi bhindeyya,
tika-s0105t:492_11: vuttañhetaṃ “pañcahupāli ākārehi saṅgho bhijjati kammena, uddesena,
tika-s0105t:492_14: salākaggāhenā”ti aññaṃ satthāranti ito aññaṃ titthakaraṃ “ayaṃ me satthā”ti evaṃ gaṇheyya,
tika-s0105t:493_2: Na te gamissanti apāyabhūminti te buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā tannimittaṃ apāyaṃ na gamissanti.
tika-s0105t:493_6: devapuraṃ vā “devānaṃ kāyo samūho etthā”ti katvā.
tika-s0105t:494_6: “Esa nayo”ti iminā “sādhu kho devānaminda dhammasaraṇagamanaṃ hotī”ti suttapadaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0105t:494_7: Velāmasuttaṃ nāma aṅguttaranikāye navanipāte jātigottarūpabhogasaddhāpaññādīhi mariyādavelātikkantehi
tika-s0105t:494_8: uḷārehi guṇehi samannāgatattā velāmanāmakassa bodhisattabhūtassa caturāsītisahassarājūnaṃ ācariyabrāhmaṇassa
tika-s0105t:494_9: dānakathāpaṭisaññuttaṃ suttaṃ tattha hi karīsassa catutthabhāgappamāṇānaṃ caturāsītisahassasaṅkhyānaṃ
tika-s0105t:494_18: aparimāṇassa ca khajjabhojjādibhedassa āhārassa pariccajanavasena sattamāsādhikāni sattasaṃvaccharāni
tika-s0105t:494_19: nirantaraṃ pavattavelāmamahādānato ekassa sotāpannassa dinnadānaṃ mahapphalataraṃ,
tika-s0105t:495_0: “Yaṃ gahapati velāmo brāhmaṇo dānaṃ adāsi mahādānaṃ,
tika-s0105t:496_0: Iminā ca ukkaṭṭhaparicchedato lokuttarasseva saraṇagamanassa phalaṃ dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:496_1: Tathā hi velāmasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “saraṇaṃ gaccheyyāti ettha maggenāgataṃ anivattanasaraṇaṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-s0105t:496_2: apare panāhu ‘attānaṃ niyyātetvā dinnattā saraṇagamanaṃ tato mahapphalatara’nti vutta”nti kūṭadantasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0105t:496_3: pana vakkhati “yasmā ca saraṇagamanaṃ nāma tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ jīvitapariccāgamayaṃ puññakammaṃ saggasampattiṃ deti,
tika-s0105t:496_4: tasmā mahapphalatarañca mahānisaṃsatarañcāti veditabba”nti iminā pana nayena lokiyassāpi saraṇagamanassa phalaṃ idha dassitamevāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:496_5: Ācariyadhammapālattherenapi hi ayamevattho icchitoti viññāyati idha ceva aññāsu ca majjhimāgamaṭīkādīsu avisesatoyeva vuttattā,
tika-s0105t:496_8: Apare pana vadanti “kūṭadantasuttaṭṭhakathāyampi lokuttarasseva saraṇagamanassa phalaṃ vutta”nti,
tika-s0105t:496_11: detī”ti hi tadubhayasādhāraṇakāraṇavasena tadubhayassāpi phalaṃ tattha vuttanti.
tika-s0105t:496_12: Velāmasuttādīnanti ettha ādisaddena aggappasādasuttachattamāṇavakavimānādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0105t:497_0: Aññāṇaṃ nāma vatthuttayassa guṇānamajānanaṃ tattha sammoho.
tika-s0105t:497_3: Micchāñāṇaṃ nāma vatthuttayassa guṇānaṃ aguṇabhāvaparikappanena viparītaggāho.
tika-s0105t:497_14: Lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ sikkhāsamādānaṃ viya agahitakālaparicchedaṃ jīvitapariyantameva hoti,
tika-s0105t:497_16: so ca taṇhādiṭṭhādivirahitattā adosoti āha “anavajjo kālakiriyāya hotī”ti.
tika-s0105t:498_1: tañca kho ākāraṭṭhāneti atthamattaṃ dassetuṃ “upāsako ayanti evaṃ dhāretū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:498_6: kiṃ lakkhaṇo upāsako nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:498_8: kena pavattinimittena upāsakasaddo tasmiṃ puggale niruḷhoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:498_10: Saddassa hi abhidheyye pavattinimittameva tadatthassa tabbhāvakāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t:498_13: kittakena vatasamādānenāyaṃ sīlasampanno nāma hotīti attho.
tika-s0105t:498_16: kena kammasamādānena assa ājīvo sambhavatīti pucchati,
tika-s0105t:498_17: so pana micchājīvassa parivajjanena hotīti micchājīvopi vibhajīyati.
tika-s0105t:498_21: Sāmaññaniddiṭṭhe hi sati anantarasseva vidhi vā paṭisedho vāti anantarassa gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t:499_7: Mahānāmāti attano cūḷapituno sukkodanassa puttaṃ mahānāmaṃ nāma sakyarājānaṃ bhagavā ālapati.
tika-s0105t:499_8: Ettāvatāti ettakena buddhādisaraṇagamanena upāsako nāma hoti,
tika-s0105t:499_11: so pana tadā vatthuttayābhāvato kadāciyeva hotīti sabbadā pavattaṃ tevācikaupāsakabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “saraṇagato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:499_13: na cettha sambhavati aññaṃ paṭikkhipitvā ekaṃ vā dve vā saraṇagato upāsako nāmāti imamatthampi ñāpetuṃ evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:501_1: tassa maṇanato hananato vināsanato veramaṇiyo nāma,
tika-s0105t:501_3: Tathā hi udāhaṭe mahānāmasutte vuttaṃ “pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hotī”tiādi “yathāhā”tiādinā sādhakaṃ,
tika-s0105t:501_4: sarūpañca dasseti yathā taṃ uyyānapālassa ekeneva udakapatiṭṭhānapayogena ambasecanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:504_0: Iti so pītiyā kāyaṃ, sabbaṃ pharati attano”ti.
tika-s0105t:505_0: [“Ambo ca siñcato āsi, samaṇo ca nahāpito;
tika-s0105t:506_0: Bahuñca puññaṃ pasutaṃ, aho saphalaṃ jīvita”nti. (idha ṭīkāyaṃ mūlapāṭho)]
tika-s0105t:508_5: tena micchāvaṇijjakammena ājīvanato aññampi adhammikaṃ ājīvanaṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-s0105t:508_7: tena kāyavisamādiduccaritaṃ vajjetvā kāyasamādinā sucaritena ājīvanaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:508_13: Satthavaṇijjāti āvudhabhaṇḍaṃ katvā vā kāretvā vā yathākataṃ paṭilabhitvā vā tassa vikkayo.
tika-s0105t:508_15: Maṃsavaṇijjāti sūnakārādayo viya migasūkarādike posetvā maṃsaṃ sampādetvā vikkayo.
tika-s0105t:508_16: Majjavaṇijjāti yaṃ kiñci majjaṃ yojetvā tassa vikkayo.
tika-s0105t:509_0: Tassevāti yathāvuttassa pañcaveramaṇilakkhaṇassa sīlassa ceva pañcamicchāvaṇijjādippahānalakkhaṇassa ājīvassa ca paṭiniddeso.
tika-s0105t:509_3: Evaṃ sīlaājīvavipattivasena upāsakassa vipattiṃ dassetvā assaddhiyādivasenapi dassento “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:509_8: Sāpissāti sāpi assaddhiyādivippaṭipatti assa upāsakassa vipattīti veditabbā.
tika-s0105t:509_16: “Iminā diṭṭhādinā idaṃ nāma maṅgalaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ bālajanaparikappitena kotūhalasaṅkhātena diṭṭhasutamutamaṅgalena samannāgato kotūhalamaṅgaliko.
tika-s0105t:509_17: Maṅgalaṃ paccetīti diṭṭhamaṅgalādibhedaṃ maṅgalameva pattiyāyati no kammanti kammassakataṃ no pattiyāyati.
tika-s0105t:509_18: Ito ca bahiddhāti ito sabbaññubuddhasāsanato bahiddhā bāhirakasamaye. Ca-
tika-s0105t:509_23: Pubbakāraṃ karotīti paṭhamataraṃ dānamānanādikaṃ kusalakiriyaṃ karoti,
tika-s0105t:509_24: bāhirakasamaye paṭhamataraṃ kusalakiriyaṃ katvā pacchā sāsane karotīti vuttaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0105t:509_25: Tatthāti vā tesaṃ bāhirakānaṃ titthiyānantipi vadanti.
tika-s0105t:509_26: Ettha ca dakkhiṇeyyapariyesanapubbakāre ekaṃ katvā pañca dhammā veditabbā.
tika-s0105t:510_3: Evaṃ sīlasampadāājīvasampadāvasena upāsakassa sampattiṃ dassetvā saddhādivasenapi dassento “ye cassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:510_7: Catunnaṃ parisānaṃ ratijananaṭṭhena upāsakova ratanaṃ upāsakaratanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:511_8: Vihāraggenāti ovarakakoṭṭhāsena “imasmiṃ gabbhe vasantānaṃ idaṃ nāma phalaṃ pāpuṇātī”tiādinā taṃtaṃvasanaṭṭhānakoṭṭhāsenāti attho.
tika-s0105t:511_15: ajjabhāvo ca nāma tasmiṃ dhammassavanasamaye dharamānakatāpāpuṇakabhāvo.
tika-s0105t:511_16: Tadā hi taṃ nissayavasena dharamānataṃ nimittaṃ katvā taṃdivasanissitaaruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya yāva puna aruṇuggamanā etthantare ajjasaddo pavattati,
tika-s0105t:511_17: tasmā tasmiṃ samaye dharamānakatāsaṅkhātaṃ ajjabhāvaṃ ādiṃ katvāti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0105t:511_21: Evaṃ paṭhamakkharena dissamānapāṭhānurūpaṃ atthaṃ dassetvā idāni tatiyakkharena dissamānapāṭhānurūpaṃ
tika-s0105t:512_1: “pāṇupeta”nti ca karaṇattheneva samāsoti ñāpetuṃ “yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0105t:512_4: pāṇehi karaṇabhūtehi upeto pāṇupetoti attho ācariyehi abhimato.
tika-s0105t:512_5: Iminā ca “pāṇupetanti idaṃ padaṃ tassa saraṇagamanassa āpāṇakoṭikatādassana”nti imamatthaṃ vibhāveti.
tika-s0105t:512_6: “Pāṇupeta”nti hi iminā yāva me pāṇā dharanti,
tika-s0105t:512_10: atha kho pāṇānaṃ pariccajanavasena yāvajīvaṃ upetoti āpāṇakoṭikatā dassitā. “Tīhi…pe…
tika-s0105t:512_14: Ekacco kappiyakārakasaddassa attho upāsakasaddassa vacanīyopi bhavatīti vuttaṃ “upāsakaṃ kappiyakāraka”nti,
tika-s0105t:512_15: attasanniyyātanasaraṇagamanaṃ vā sandhāya evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:512_16: Evaṃ “pāṇupeta”nti iminā nītatthato dassitaṃ tassa saraṇagamanassa āpāṇakoṭikataṃ dassetvā evaṃ vadanto
tika-s0105t:512_17: panesa rājā “jīvitena saha vatthuttayaṃ paṭipūjento saraṇagamanaṃ rakkhāmī”ti adhippāyaṃ vibhāvetīti
tika-s0105t:512_18: neyyatthato vibhāvitaṃ tassa rañño adhippāyaṃ vibhāvento “ahañhī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:512_23: iminā vā kāraṇena upāsakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretūti ayamattho pakāsito.
tika-s0105t:513_0: Accayanaṃ sādhumariyādaṃ atikkamma madditvā pavattanaṃ accayo,
tika-s0105t:513_2: acceti abhibhavitvā pavattati etenāti vā accayo,
tika-s0105t:513_4: so ca aparajjhati etenāti aparādhoti vuccati.
tika-s0105t:513_5: So hi aparajjhantaṃ purisaṃ abhibhavitvā pavattati.
tika-s0105t:514_7: Yathādhammaṃ paṭikaraṇaṃ nāma katāparādhassa khamāpanamevāti āha “khamāpesīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0105t:514_8: “Paṭiggaṇhāmā”ti etassa adhivāsanaṃ sampaṭicchāmāti atthaṃ dasseti “khamāmā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:514_16: Sadevakena lokena “saraṇa”nti araṇīyato upagantabbato tathāgato ariyo nāmāti vuttaṃ “buddhassa bhagavato”ti.
tika-s0105t:514_20: yā “esā”ti niddiṭṭhā vuddhīti codanamapanetuṃ “yo accaya”ntiādi vuttanti sambandhaṃ dasseti “katamā”tiādinā,
tika-s0105t:514_23: “Yathādhammaṃ paṭikarotī”ti idaṃ āyatiṃ saṃvarāpajjanāya pubbakiriyādassananti viññāpanatthaṃ “yathādhammaṃ
tika-s0105t:514_27: etapadena pana tassāpi paṭiniddeso sambhavati “yathādhammaṃ paṭikarotī” tipi paṭiniddisitabbassa dassanato.
tika-s0105t:514_28: Keci pana “yathādhammaṃ paṭikarotī’ti idaṃ pubbakiriyāmattasseva dassanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:514_30: ‘Āyatiñca saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī’ti idaṃ pana paṭiniddisitabbassevāti viññāpanatthaṃ evaṃ vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-s0105t:514_32: Itarathā hi khamāpanābhāvepi āyatiṃ saṃvarāpajjanāya eva ariyūpavādāpagamanaṃ vuttaṃ siyā,
tika-s0105t:515_1: nanu pāḷiyaṃ “yo accaya”ntiādinā puggalaniddeso katoti codanaṃ sodhetuṃ “desanaṃ panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0105t:515_7: tathāpi puna puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ karontena “yo accaya”ntiādinā puggalādhiṭṭhānadesanā āraddhā desanāvilāsavasena,
tika-s0105t:516_4: Vacasāyattheti pana vācāpariyosānattheti attho yutto osānakaraṇatthassa sāsaddassa vasena sāyasaddanipphattito yathā “dāyo”ti.
tika-s0105t:516_6: Gamanāya kataṃ vācāpariyosānaṃ katvā vuttattā tasmiṃyeva atthe vattatīti.
tika-s0105t:516_19: mahantaṃ karaṇīya”ntipi udānaṭṭhakathādīsu vuttaṃ. Yaṃ- taṃ-
tika-s0105t:516_22: aññakiriyāya ca anupayuttattā “tassa kālaṃ tvameva jānāsī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:516_23: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “tayā ñātaṃ gamanakālaṃ tvameva ñatvā gacchāhī”ti.
tika-s0105t:516_27: tathā idhāpi tayā ñātaṃ kālaṃ tvameva jānāsi,
tika-s0105t:516_28: gamanavasena karohīti gamane niyojetīti dassetuṃ “tvameva jānāsī”ti pāṭhaseso vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:516_29: “Tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā”tiādi yathāsamāciṇṇaṃ pakaraṇādhigatamattaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:516_32: Dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalanti dvīsu hatthesu jātānaṃ dasannaṃ nakhānaṃ samodhānena ekībhāvena samujjalantaṃ,
tika-s0105t:516_35: Añjati byattiṃ pakāseti etāyāti añjali. Añju-
tika-s0105t:517_1: Imasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipaccanakānaṃ attano pubbe katakusalamūlānaṃ khaṇanena khato,
tika-s0105t:517_3: padadvayenapi tassa kammāparādhameva dasseti pariyāyavacanattā padadvayassa.
tika-s0105t:517_4: Kusalamūlasaṅkhātapatiṭṭhābhedanena khatūpahatabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “bhinnapatiṭṭho jāto”ti vuttaṃ. Patiṭṭhā,
tika-s0105t:517_8: sā kiriyāparādhena bhinnā vināsitā etenāti bhinnapatiṭṭho.
tika-s0105t:517_11: tathā anena raññā attanāva attā khato khanitoti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:517_12: Khatoti hi idaṃ idha kammavasena siddhaṃ,
tika-s0105t:518_0: “Rāgo rajo na ca pana reṇu vuccatī”tiādi vacanato rāgadosamohāva idha rajo nāmāti vuttaṃ “rāgarajādivirahita”nti.
tika-s0105t:518_2: Dhammesu cakkhunti catusaccadhammesu pavattaṃ tesaṃ dassanaṭṭhena cakkhuṃ.
tika-s0105t:518_17: tasmimpi anadhigate aññesaṃ vattabbatāyeva abhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:519_0: Idāni “khatāyaṃ bhikkhave rājā”tiādipāṭhassa suviññeyyamadhippāyaṃ dassento “idaṃ vuttaṃ hotī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:519_5: Esa nayo sotāpattimaggaṃ patto abhavissāti etthāpi.
tika-s0105t:519_8: idha pana “idhevāsane nisinno”ti niyamitattā atītakālikamevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:519_9: Idañhi bhagavā rañño āsanā vuṭṭhāya acirapakkantasseva avocāti.
tika-s0105t:519_22: tassa ca tividhassapi sāsanassa uttamatāyāti hi saha samuccayena attho adhippetoti.
tika-s0105t:520_6: daṇḍenāti vā nissakkatthe karaṇavacanaṃ “sumuttā mayaṃ tena mahāsamaṇenā”tiādīsu viya,
tika-s0105t:520_10: Tattha hi tadanubhavanakānaṃ sattānaṃ kammabalena lohamayā mahatī kumbhī nibbattā,
tika-s0105t:523_1: uparimatalaṃ pāpuṇitvā muccissatī”ti vadanto imamatthaṃ dīpeti –
tika-s0105t:523_2: yathā aññe seṭṭhiputtādayo aparāparaṃ adho patantā,
tika-s0105t:523_3: uddhaṃ gacchantā ca anekāni vassasatasahassāni tattha paccanti,
tika-s0105t:523_5: ayaṃ pana rājā yathāvuttakāraṇena ekavārameva adho patanto,
tika-s0105t:523_7: Ayaṃ pana attho kuto laddhoti anuyogaṃ pariharanto “idampi kira bhagavatā vuttamevā”ti āha.
tika-s0105t:523_11: Atha pāḷiyaṃ saṅgītaṃ siyāti codanamapaneti “pāḷiyaṃ pana na āruḷha”nti iminā,
tika-s0105t:523_12: pakiṇṇakadesanābhāvena pāḷiyamanāruḷhattā pāṭhabhāvena na saṅgītanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:524_1: evaṃ sati imaṃ desanaṃ sutvā ko rañño ānisaṃso laddhoti kassaci āsaṅkā siyāti tadāsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ
tika-s0105t:524_3: “Ayañhī”tiādinā niddālābhādikaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ anekavidhaṃ mahānisaṃsaṃ sarūpato niyametvā dasseti.
tika-s0105t:524_10: nāhosī”ti iminā sātisayaṃ pothujjanikasaddhāpaṭilābhaṃ dassetīti evamādi diṭṭhadhammiko,
tika-s0105t:524_12: parinibbāyissatī”ti iminā pana ukkaṃsato samparāyiko dassito,
tika-s0105t:524_13: anavasesato pana aparāparesu bhavesu aparimāṇoyeva samparāyiko veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:525_6: anācariyako hutvā sāmaññeva sambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti attho.
tika-s0105t:525_11: Na hi te lokuttaradhammaṃ paññattiṃ āropetvā desetuṃ sakkonti,
tika-s0105t:525_13: vanacarakena nagare sāyitabyañjanaraso viya ca nesaṃ dhammābhisamayo hoti,
tika-s0105t:526_1: yadi rañño kammantarāyābhāve tasmiṃyeva āsane dhammacakkhu uppajjissatha,
tika-s0105t:526_2: atha kathaṃ anāgate paccekabuddho hutvā parinibbāyissati.
tika-s0105t:526_3: Yadi ca anāgate paccekabuddho hutvā parinibbāyissati,
tika-s0105t:526_4: atha kathaṃ tasmiṃyeva āsane dhammacakkhu uppajjissatha,
tika-s0105t:526_5: nanu ime sāvakabodhipaccekabodhiupanissayā bhinnanissayā dvinnaṃ bodhīnaṃ asādhāraṇabhāvato.
tika-s0105t:526_6: Asādhāraṇā hi etā dve yathākkamaṃ pañcaṅgadvayaṅgasampattiyā,
tika-s0105t:526_10: Nāyaṃ virodho ito paratoyevassa paccekabodhisambhārānaṃ sambharaṇīyattā.
tika-s0105t:526_11: Sāvakabodhiyā bujjhanakasattāpi hi asati tassā samavāye kālantare paccekabodhiyā bujjhissanti tathābhinīhārassa sambhavatoti.
tika-s0105t:526_14: Katābhinīhārāpi hi tattha niyatimappattā tassa ñāṇassa paripākaṃ anupagatattā satthu sammukhībhāve sāvakabodhiṃ
tika-s0105t:526_18: Tathā hi paccekabodhiyaṃ niyato samāno devadatto cirakālasambhūtena lokanāthe āghātena garutarāni ānantariyakammāni pasavi,
tika-s0105t:526_19: tasmā kammantarāyena ayaṃ idāni asamavetadassanābhisamayo rājā paccekabodhiniyāmena anāgate vijitāvī
tika-s0105t:527_2: Apica pāḷiyamanāruḷhampi atthaṃ saṅgahetuṃ “idamavocā”tiādinā nigamanaṃ karotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:528_3: mahādhammarājādhirājagarunā katāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthappakāsaniyā sāmaññaphalasuttavaṇṇanāya
tika-s0105t:532_1: Evaṃ sāmaññaphalasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni ambaṭṭhasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ saṃvaṇṇokāsassa pattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ,
tika-s0105t:532_2: sāmaññaphalasuttassānantaraṃ saṅgītassa suttassa ambaṭṭhasuttabhāvaṃ pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe…
tika-s0105t:532_9: Apubbapadavaṇṇanā nāma heṭṭhā aggahitatāya apubbassa padassa atthavibhajanā.
tika-s0105t:533_5: “Kosalā nāma rājakumārā”ti vutteyeva siddhepi “janapadino”ti vacanaṃ santesupi aññesu taṃtaṃnāmapaññātesu
tika-s0105t:533_6: tattha nivasantesu janapadibhāvato tesameva nivasanamupādāya janapadassāyaṃ samaññāti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:533_7: “Tesaṃ nivāso”ti iminā “kosalānaṃ nivāsā kosalā”ti taddhitaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:533_9: atthato panesa eko evāti vibhāveti. Api-
tika-s0105t:533_17: puthubhāvassa vā nissaye abhiniropanā idha ruḷhi,
tika-s0105t:533_18: tena vuttaṃ ācariyena idha ceva aññattha ca majjhimāgamaṭīkādīsu “akkharacintakā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu yutte viya īdisaliṅgavacanāni icchanti,
tika-s0105t:533_23: Nāmābhiniropanāya hi ekavacanampi bhavati yathā “sīho gāyatī”ti.
tika-s0105t:535_0: Te rajjaṃ kārayissanti, mithilāyaṃ pajāpatī”ti. ādīsu –
tika-s0105t:536_1: tathā idhāpi tannivāsasaṅkhātassa ekatthassa ruḷhivasena “kosalesū”ti bahuvacanapayogo hoti.
tika-s0105t:536_4: tathā idhāpi jātivasena avayavappabhedena bahvatthassa “janapade”ti ekavacanapayogo hoti.
tika-s0105t:536_5: Vuttañca ācariyena majjhimāgamaṭīkāyaṃ “tabbisesanepi janapadasadde jātisadde ekavacanameva.
tika-s0105t:537_0: Evaṃ ruḷhivasena bahumhi viya vattabbe bahuvacanaṃ dassetvā idāni bahvatthavasena bahumpi eva vattabbe bahuvacanaṃ dassento “porāṇā panāhū”tiādimāha. Pana-
tika-s0105t:537_5: imasmiṃ pana naye tesu kosalesu janapadesūti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:537_6: Mahāpanādanti mahāpanādajātaka surucijātakesu āgataṃ surucino nāma videharañño puttaṃ mahāpanādanāmakaṃ rājakumāraṃ.
tika-s0105t:537_13: Tassa kira dibbanāṭakānaṃ anantarabhaveyeva diṭṭhattā manussanāṭakānaṃ naccaṃ amanuññaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0105t:537_17: atha kho aññepi ubhayaraṭṭhavāsino manussā attano attano kiccaṃ pahāya tasmiṃ maṅgalaṭṭhāne sannipatiṃsu.
tika-s0105t:538_0: Mahājanakāye sannipatiteti keci “pahaṃsanavidhiṃ dassetvā rājakumāraṃ hāsāpessāmā”ti,
tika-s0105t:538_1: keci “taṃ kīḷanaṃ passissāmā”ti evaṃ mahājanasamūhe sannipatite.
tika-s0105t:538_3: Sakkapesito kira dibbanāṭako rājaṅgaṇe ākāse ṭhatvā upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ nāma dasseti,
tika-s0105t:538_10: imamatthaṃ sandhāya “so dibbanāṭakaṃ dassetvā hasāpesī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:538_14: Taṃ kusalanti vacanaṃ upādāyāti ettha “kacci kusalaṃ?
tika-s0105t:538_15: Āma kusala”nti vacanapaṭivacanavasena pavattakusalavāditāya te manussā ādito “kusalā”ti samaññaṃ labhiṃsu,
tika-s0105t:538_16: tesaṃ kusalānaṃ issarāti rājakumārā kosalā nāma jātā,
tika-s0105t:538_17: tesaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānatāya pana padeso kosalāti pubbe vuttanayameva.
tika-s0105t:538_21: “so padeso kosalāti vuccatī”ti saññīsaññā yathākkamaṃ ekavacanabahuvacanavasena vuttattā purimanaye viya idhāpi ruḷhivaseneva bahuvacanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:538_23: Idha pana ācariyena evaṃ vuttaṃ so padesoti padesasāmaññato vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:538_26: Kosalāti vuccati kusalā eva kosalāti katvā”ti tatrāyamadhippāyo siyā –
tika-s0105t:538_28: vacanavipallāsena vā vuttattā puthuatthavisayatāya eva bahuvacanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:538_30: “Kusala”nti hi vacanamupādāya ruḷhināmavasena vuttanayena kosalā yathā “yevāpanakaṃ,
tika-s0105t:538_34: Kusalanti ca ārogyaṃ “kacci nu bhoto kusalaṃ,
tika-s0105t:538_39: kacci tesaṃ nāṭakānaṃ chekatā hotīti attho.
tika-s0105t:539_7: abhedepi vā bhedavohārena vuttaṃ yathā “divāvihāraṃ nisīdī”ti,
tika-s0105t:539_14: Idāni taṃ vibhāgena dassetvā idhādhippetaṃ niyamento “cārikā ca nāmesā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:539_15: Sāvakānampi ruḷhivasena cārikāya sambhavato tato viseseti “bhagavato”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:539_16: Tathā hi majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “cārikaṃ caramānoti ettha kiñcāpi ayaṃ cārikā nāma mahājanasaṅgahatthaṃ buddhānaṃyeva labbhati,
tika-s0105t:539_17: buddhe upādāya pana ruḷhisaddena sāvakānampi vuccati kilañjādīhi katabījanīpi tālavaṇṭaṃ viyā”ti.
tika-s0105t:539_19: saddena vā nātidūrepīti sampiṇḍanaṃ tatthāpi cārikāsambhavato.
tika-s0105t:540_0: Evaṃ dhammagarutākittanamukhena mahākassapapaccuggamanādīni ekadesena dassetvā idāni vanavāsitissasāmaṇerassa
tika-s0105t:540_4: kambaladāyakatisso”ti ca pubbe laddhanāmo pacchā “vanavāsitisso”ti pākaṭo khīṇāsavasāmaṇero.
tika-s0105t:540_6: Ākāsagāmīhi saddhiṃ ākāseneva gantukāmo bhagavā “chaḷabhiññānaṃ ārocehī”ti avoca.
tika-s0105t:540_8: Tanti bhagavantaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena cīvaraṃ pārupantaṃ.
tika-s0105t:540_9: No thero no oramattako vatāti sambandho,
tika-s0105t:541_2: Kasmā pana sadevakassa lokassa maggadesakopi samāno bhagavā evamāhāti codanaṃ sodhetuṃ “bhagavā kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:542_1: Saṅghakammavasena sijjhamānāpi upasampadā satthu āṇāvasena sijjhanato “buddhadāyajjaṃ te dassāmī”ti vuttanti vadanti.
tika-s0105t:542_2: Apare pana “aparipuṇṇavīsativassasseva tassa upasampadaṃ anujānanto satthā ‘buddhadāyajjaṃ te dassāmī’ti avocā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0105t:542_5: Dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana dhammasenāpatiāditherānaṃ cattālīsabhikkhusahassaparivārānaṃ attano attano parivārehi saddhiṃ paccekaṃ gamanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:542_6: bhagavato ca ekakasseva gamanaṃ khuddakabhāṇakānaṃ matena vuttaṃ, idha,
tika-s0105t:542_7: pana majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāyañca aññathā gamanaṃ dīghabhāṇakamajjhimabhāṇakānaṃ matenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:543_1: Mahāmaṇḍalanti majjhimadesapariyāpanneneva bāhirimena pamāṇena paricchinnattā mahantataraṃ maṇḍalaṃ.
tika-s0105t:543_2: Majjhimamaṇḍalanti itaresaṃ ubhinnaṃ vemajjhe pavattaṃ maṇḍalaṃ.
tika-s0105t:543_7: Tattha navayojanasatikatā majjhimadesapariyāpannavaseneva gahetabbā tato paraṃ aturitacārikāya agamanato.
tika-s0105t:543_8: Taduttari hi turitacārikāya eva tathāgato gacchati,
tika-s0105t:543_13: Mahājanakāyassa sannipatanato purimaṃ purimaṃ āgatā nimantetuṃ labhanti.
tika-s0105t:543_15: Samathavipassanā taruṇā hontīti ettha samathassa taruṇabhāvo upacārasamādhivasena,
tika-s0105t:543_23: “Migasirassa paṭhamapāṭipadadivase”ti idaṃ majjhimadesavohāravasena migasiramāsassa paṭhamaṃ pāṭipadadivasaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:543_24: etarahi pavattavohāravasena pana pacchimakattikamāsassa kāḷapakkhapāṭipadadivaso veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:544_0: Aññenapi kāraṇenāti bhikkhūnaṃ samathavipassanātaruṇabhāvato aññenapi majjhimamaṇḍale veneyyānaṃ ñāṇaparipākādikāraṇena.
tika-s0105t:544_10: Indriyaparipākaṃ āgamayamānoti saddhādiindriyānaṃ vimuttiparipācanabhāvena paripakkaṃ paṭimānento.
tika-s0105t:544_11: Phussamāghaphagguṇacittamāsānaṃ aññataramāsassa paṭhamadivase nikkhamanato māsaniyamo ettha na katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:544_12: Tenāha “ekamāsaṃ vā dviticatumāsaṃ vā tattheva vasitvā”ti.
tika-s0105t:545_1: jaṅghāhi vicaritvā tattha tattha katipāhaṃ nivasanavasena vā.
tika-s0105t:545_3: Sarīraphāsukatthāyāti ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne nibaddhavāsavasena ussannadhātukassa sarīrassa vicaraṇena phāsubhāvatthāya.
tika-s0105t:545_4: Aṭṭhuppattikālābhikaṅkhanatthāyāti aggikkhandhopamasutta maghadevajātakādi desanānaṃ viya dhammadesanāya abhikaṅkhitabbaaṭṭhuppattikālatthāya,
tika-s0105t:545_7: Sikkhāpadapaññāpanatthāyāti surāpānasikkhāpadādi paññāpane viya sikkhāpadānaṃ paññāpanatthāya.
tika-s0105t:545_10: katipaye vā puggale uddissa cārikā nibaddhacārikā.
tika-s0105t:545_11: Tadaññā sambahule uddissa gāmanigamanagarapaṭipāṭiyā cārikā anibaddhacārikā.
tika-s0105t:546_0: “Esā idha adhippetā”ti vuttameva vitthārato dassetuṃ “tadā kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:546_4: Tattha hi satte bhabbe paripakkindriye passituṃ buddhañāṇaṃ abhinīharitvā ṭhito bhagavā ñāṇajālaṃ pattharatīti vuccati,
tika-s0105t:546_7: imasmiṃyeva ca saparivāre jambudīpe bodhaneyyā honti.
tika-s0105t:546_9: Gottādisambandhā viya hi saccapaṭivedhasambandhā veneyyā bhagavato bandhavā nāmāti.
tika-s0105t:546_11: Bhagavā kira mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya “ye sattā bhabbā paripakkañāṇā,
tika-s0105t:546_12: te mayhaṃ ñāṇassa upaṭṭhahantū”ti cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāya samannāharati,
tika-s0105t:546_13: tassa sahasamannāhārā eko vā dve vā sambahulā vā tadā vinayūpagā veneyyā ñāṇassa āpāthamāgacchanti,
tika-s0105t:546_18: Veneyyasattapariggaṇhanatthañhi samannāhāre kate paṭhamaṃ nesaṃ veneyyabhāvena upaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:546_19: atha “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti saraṇagamanādivasena kañci nipphattiṃ vīmaṃsamāno pubbūpanissayādīni oloketi.
tika-s0105t:546_22: Vādapaṭivādaṃ katvāti “evaṃ nu te ambaṭṭhā”tiādinā mayā vuttavacanassa “ye ca kho te bho gotama muṇḍakā samaṇakā”tiādinā paṭivacanaṃ datvā,
tika-s0105t:546_24: tikkhattuṃ ibbhavādanipātanavasena nānappakāraṃ sādhusabhāvāya vācāya vattumayuttaṃ vākyaṃ vakkhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:547_3: “Yena disābhāgenā”ti karaṇaniddesānurūpaṃ karaṇatthe upayogavacananti dasseti “tena avasarī”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:547_4: “Yasmiṃ padese”ti pana bhummaniddesānurūpaṃ “taṃ vā avasarī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:547_13: nippariyāyato adhikaraṇe cetaṃ bhummanti tadubhayampi padaṃ visesatthadassanena vivaranto “icchānaṅgalaṃ upanissāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:547_15: Tattha dhammarājassa bhagavato sabbaso adhammaniggaṇhanaparā eva paṭipatti,
tika-s0105t:547_17: Sīlakhandhāvāranti cakkavattirañño dāruiṭṭhakādikataṃ khandhāvārasadisaṃ sīlasaṅkhātaṃ khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā viharatīti sambandho.
tika-s0105t:547_18: Dārukkhandhādīhi āsamantato varanti parikkhipanti etthāti hi khandhāvāro a-
tika-s0105t:547_21: Tattha pana bhagavato aciranivasanakiriyāsambandhamattena bhayanivāraṇaṭṭhena taṃsadisatāya sīlampi tathā vuccati.
tika-s0105t:547_28: dibbavihārādīsu yena yena attanā abhirucitena vihārena viharatīti attho.
tika-s0105t:549_4: Lokiyā pana vadanti “brahmuno apaccaṃ brāhmaṇo, nāgamo, ṇattaṃ,
tika-s0105t:549_7: Atha kesaṃ itaro vacanatthoti codanamapaneti “ariyā panā”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:549_8: Atha vā yaṃ lokiyā vadanti “brahmunā jāto brāhmaṇo”tiādiniruttiṃ,
tika-s0105t:549_11: “Jātibrāhmaṇāna”nti pana iminā saddantarena dassitesu jātibrāhmaṇavisuddhibrāhmaṇavasena duvidhesu brāhmaṇesu
tika-s0105t:549_13: Bahanti pāpe bahi karontīti hi ariyā brāhmaṇā niruttinayena.
tika-s0105t:549_17: Pokkharena sadiso kāyo yassāti hi pokkharasātī niruttinayena.
tika-s0105t:550_0: Idāni aparampi tassa nāmalābhahetuṃ dassento “ayaṃ panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:550_1: Tattha ca “himavantapadese mahāsare padumagabbhe nibbattī”ti idamevassa nāmalābhahetudassanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:550_3: Tenāha “iti naṃ pokkhare sayitattā pokkharasātīti sañjānantī”ti.
tika-s0105t:550_8: Yaṃ pana ācariyena vuttaṃ “imassa brāhmaṇassa kīdiso pubbayogo,
tika-s0105t:550_9: yena naṃ bhagavā anuggaṇhituṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatoti āhā”ti,
tika-s0105t:550_11: “So tato manussaloka”ntiādivacanato devaloke nibbattīti ettha aparāparaṃ nibbatti eva vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:550_12: Tathārūpena kammena nibbattimeva sandhāya “mātukucchivāsaṃ jigucchitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:550_13: “Padumagabbhe nibbattī”ti iminā saṃsedajoyeva hutvā nibbattīti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:550_17: Suvaṇṇacuṇṇehi piñjaraṃ hemavaṇṇo yassāti suvaṇṇacuṇṇapiñjaro, taṃ,
tika-s0105t:550_24: nipphatti vā vuccati nadīsamuddādīnaṃ pariyosānabhūtaṃ pāraṃ viyāti katvā.
tika-s0105t:550_30: Brahmadeyyaṃ adāsīti vakkhamānanayena brahmadeyyaṃ katvā adāsi.
tika-s0105t:551_2: tato “ukkaṭṭha”nti idaṃ ajjhāpubbavasayoge bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ. Adhi-
tika-s0105t:551_4: saddo mariyādattho tato “ukkaṭṭha”nti idaṃ kammappavacanīyayoge bhummatthe upayogavacananti dasseti “ukkaṭṭhanāmake”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:551_11: mariyādā ca nāma yāya tattha vasitabbaṃ,
tika-s0105t:551_13: Yāya mariyādāyāti hi yāya aparādhīnatāsaṅkhātāya anaññasādhāraṇāya avatthāyāti attho.
tika-s0105t:551_15: tenetaṃ dīpeti “satipi bhummavacanappasaṅge dhātvatthānuvattakavisesakabhūtehi duvidhehipi upasaggehi yuttattā upayogavacanamevettha vihita”nti.
tika-s0105t:552_3: tatthāpi ayaṃ sukhaṇo mā atikkamī”ti rattivibhāyanaṃ anurakkhantā,
tika-s0105t:552_4: rattiyaṃ ālokakaraṇatthāya ukkā ṭhapetvā ukkāsu jalamānāsu nagarassa vatthuṃ aggahesuṃ,
tika-s0105t:552_8: niruttinayena vā ukkāsu vijjotayantīsu ṭhitāti ukkaṭṭhā,
tika-s0105t:552_9: tathā ukkāsu ṭhitāsu ṭhitā āsītipi ukkaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0105t:552_10: Majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana evaṃ vuttaṃ “tañca nagaraṃ ‘maṅgaladivaso sukhaṇo,
tika-s0105t:552_11: sunakkhattaṃ mā atikkamī’ti rattimpi ukkāsu ṭhitāsu māpitattā ukkaṭṭhātipi vuccati,
tika-s0105t:552_12: daṇḍadīpikāsu jāletvā dhāriyamānāsu māpitattāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti,
tika-s0105t:552_13: tadapiminā saṃsandati ceva sameti ca nagaravatthupariggahassapi nagaramāpanapariyāpannattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:552_16: manussasampattiyā ca taṃ nagaraṃ ukkaṭṭhaguṇayogato ukkaṭṭhāti nāmaṃ labhatī”ti.
tika-s0105t:552_17: Lokiyā pana vadanti “ukkā dhārīyati etassa māpitakāleti ukkaṭṭhā,
tika-s0105t:552_20: tenevidha payogo dissati “yathā ca bhavaṃ gotamo ukkaṭṭhāya aññāni upāsakakulāni upasaṅkamatī”ti mūlapariyāyasuttādīsu
tika-s0105t:552_21: ca “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharati subhagavane sālarājamūle”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:552_23: kathaṃ panetaṃ sesapadesu siyāti anuyogenāha “tassa anupayogattā sesapadesū”ti.
tika-s0105t:553_0: Kiṃ nu khvāyaṃ saddapayogo saddalakkhaṇānugatoti codanamapaneti “tattha…pe…
tika-s0105t:553_3: anupayogavasena ca upayogavacananti vutte dubbidhepi vidhāne.
tika-s0105t:553_9: saddavidū ca icchanti “upaanuadhiāiccādipubbavasayoge sattamiyatthe upayogavacanaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-s0105t:554_5: dhīādayo nipātā ca kammappavacanīyasaññā honti kiriyāsaṅkhātaṃ kammaṃ pavacanīyaṃ yesaṃ te kammappavacanīyā”ti.
tika-s0105t:554_6: Sesapadānaṃ pana yathāvidhimanupayoge katarena lakkhaṇena upayogavacananti?
tika-s0105t:554_8: Yajjevaṃ tesampi ādhārabhāvato nānādhāratā siyāti? Na,
tika-s0105t:554_11: Aññe pana saddavidū evamicchanti “samānādhikaraṇapadānaṃ paccekaṃ kiriyāsambandhanena visesitabbapadena samānavacanatā yathā ‘kaṭaṃ karoti, vipulaṃ,
tika-s0105t:554_14: dassanīyaṃ karotī’ti paccekaṃ kiriyāsambandhanena kammattheyeva dutiyā”ti,
tika-s0105t:555_8: Udakassāti ca pūraṇakiriyāyoge karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ “mahante mahante sāṇipasibbake kārāpetvā hiraññasuvaṇṇassa pūrāpetvā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0105t:555_9: Saha dhaññenāti sadhaññanti nagarasaddāpekkhāya napuṃsakaliṅgena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:555_12: Pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇādibhedaṃ bahudhaññasannicayanti ettha ādisaddena tadubhayavinimuttaṃ alābukumbhaṇḍādisūpeyyaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0105t:556_0: “Rājabhogga”nti vutte “kena dinna”nti avassaṃ pucchitabbato evaṃ vuttanti dasseti “kenā”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:556_1: Raññā viya bhuñjitabbanti vā rājabhogganti aṭṭhakathāto aparo nayo.
tika-s0105t:556_2: Yāva puttanattapanattaparamparā kulasantakabhāvena rājato laddhattā “rañño dāyabhūta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:556_3: “Dhammadāyādā me bhikkhave bhavathā”tiādīsu viya ca dāyasaddo dāyajjapariyāyoti āha “dāyajjanti attho”ti.
tika-s0105t:556_4: Kathaṃ dinnattā brahmadeyyaṃ nāmāti codanaṃ pariharati “chattaṃ ussāpetvā”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:556_5: Rājanīhārena paribhuñjitabbato hi uddhaṃ paribhogalābhassa brahmadeyyatā nāma natthi,
tika-s0105t:556_11: “Raññā bhuñjitabba”ntveva vutte idhādhippetattho na pākaṭoti hutvā-
tika-s0105t:556_13: Tañhi so rājakulato asamudāgatopi rājā hutvā bhuñjituṃ labhatīti ayamidhādhippeto attho.
tika-s0105t:556_15: “rājadāya”nti imināva raññā dinnabhāve siddhe “raññā pasenadinā kosalena dinna”nti puna ca vacanaṃ kimatthiyanti āha “dāyakarājadīpanattha”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t:556_16: Asukena raññā dinnanti dāyakarājassa adīpitattā evaṃ vuttanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:556_17: Ettha ca paṭhamanaye “rājabhogga”nti pade pucchāsambhavato idaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:556_18: dutiyanaye pana “rājadāya”nti padeti ayampi viseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0105t:556_19: Tattha atibahulatāya purato ṭhapanokāsābhāvato passenapi odanasūpabyañjanādi dīyati etassāti pasenadi,
tika-s0105t:556_21: So hi rājā taṇḍuladoṇassa odanampi tadupiyena sūpabyañjanena bhuñjati.
tika-s0105t:556_22: Tathā hi naṃ bhuttapātarāsakāle satthu santikamāgantvā ito cito ca samparivattantaṃ niddāya abhibhuyyamānaṃ ujukaṃ nisīditumasakkontaṃ bhagavā –
tika-s0105t:561_0: Imāya gāthāya ovadi. Bhāgineyyañca so sudassanaṃ nāma māṇavaṃ –
tika-s0105t:566_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ bhagavato santike uggahāpetvā attano bhuñjantassa osānapiṇḍakāle devasikaṃ bhaṇāpeti,
tika-s0105t:566_1: so aparena samayena tassā gāthāya atthaṃ sallakkhetvā punappunaṃ osānapiṇḍapariharaṇena nāḷikodanamattāya
tika-s0105t:566_3: Udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana evaṃ vuttaṃ “paccāmittaṃ parasenaṃ jinātīti pasenadī”ti.
tika-s0105t:566_10: tasmā kosalādhipatinā pasenadi nāmakena raññā dinnanti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:566_11: Nissaṭṭhapariccattatāsaṅkhātena puna aggahetabbabhāveneva dinnattā idha brahmadeyyaṃ nāma,
tika-s0105t:566_12: na tu purimanaye viya rājasaṅkhepena paribhuñjitabbabhāvena dinnattāti āha “yathā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:567_1: so cāyamupalabbho savanavaseneva jānananti vuttaṃ “sotadvārasampattavacananigghosānusārena aññāsī”ti.
tika-s0105t:567_2: Sotadvārānusāraviññāṇavīthivasena jānanameva hi idha savanaṃ teneva “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo”tiādinā vuttassatthassa adhigatattā,
tika-s0105t:567_3: na pana sotadvāravīthivasena sutamattaṃ tena tadatthassa anadhigatattā.
tika-s0105t:567_5: Tasmā tadatthajotakasaddena vināpi aññatthāpohanavasena assosi eva,
tika-s0105t:567_6: nāssa koci savanantarāyo ahosīti ayamattho viññāyatīti āha “padapūraṇamatte nipāto”ti,
tika-s0105t:567_7: antogadhāvadhāraṇepi ca sabbasmiṃ vākye nītatthato avadhāraṇatthaṃ kho-
tika-s0105t:567_8: saddaggahaṇaṃ “evā”ti sāmatthiyā sātisayaṃ etadatthassa viññāyamānattāti paṭhamavikappo vutto,
tika-s0105t:567_9: nītatthato avadhāraṇena ko attho ekantiko kato,
tika-s0105t:567_16: sadde gahite tena phullitaṃ maṇḍitaṃ vibhūsitaṃ viya hontaṃ pūritaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0105t:567_17: tena ca purimapacchimapadāni sukhuccāraṇavasena siliṭṭhāni honti,
tika-s0105t:568_1: Samitapāpattāti ettha accantaṃ anavasesato savāsanaṃ samitapāpattāti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0105t:568_2: Evañhi bāhirakavītarāgasekkhāsekkhapāpasamanato bhagavato pāpasamanaṃ yathārahaṃ visesitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:568_3: Tena vuttaṃ “bhagavā ca anuttarena ariyamaggena samitapāpo”ti.
tika-s0105t:568_9: assa vā sampadānabhūtassa santā hontīti attho.
tika-s0105t:568_10: Atthānugatā cāyaṃ bhagavati samaññāti vuttaṃ “bhagavā cā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:568_15: “Khalū”ti idaṃ nepātikaṃ khalupacchābhattikapade viya, na nāmaṃ,
tika-s0105t:568_16: anekatthattā ca nipātānaṃ anussavanatthova idhādhippetoti āha “anussavanatthe nipāto”ti,
tika-s0105t:568_22: Piyasamudāhārā hete “bho”ti vā “āvuso”ti vā “devānaṃ piyā”ti vā.
tika-s0105t:568_24: suttanipāte ca vāseṭṭhasuttapadena brāhmaṇajātisamudāgatālapanabhāvaṃ samatthetuṃ “vuttampi ceta”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:569_2: so āmantanādīsu “bho bho”ti vadanto hutvā vicaraṇato bhovādīyeva nāma hoti,
tika-s0105t:569_6: Tattha rāgādayo satte kiñcanti maddanti palibuddhantīti kiñcanāni.
tika-s0105t:569_7: Manussā kira goṇehi khalaṃ maddāpentā “kiñcehi kapila,
tika-s0105t:569_10: Yathāha niddese “akiñcananti rāgakiñcanaṃ, dosa, moha, māna, diṭṭhi,
tika-s0105t:569_13: yassete kiñcanā pahīnā samucchinnā vūpasantā paṭippassaddhā abhabbuppattikā ñāṇagginā daḍḍhā,
tika-s0105t:569_17: sakyaputtoti pana jātivasena sākiyoti ca tasseva vevacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:571_0: Tamhā kulā pabbajitomhi, na kāme abhipatthaya”nti. ;
tika-s0105t:572_4: Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na vattati,
tika-s0105t:572_6: tasmā so gottasaṅkhāto attho tāni rakkhatīti vuccati, go-
tika-s0105t:573_0: “Go goṇe cendriye bhumyaṃ, vacane ceva buddhiyaṃ;
tika-s0105t:575_0: Tesu atthesu goṇe thī, pumā ca itare pumā”ti.
tika-s0105t:576_4: Tathā hi suttanipātaṭṭhakathāya vāseṭṭhasuttasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ “gorakkhanti khettarakkhaṃ,
tika-s0105t:576_12: ādiccabandhuṃ gotamaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ namāmīti hi attho,
tika-s0105t:576_14: uṇhā gāvo rasmiyo etassāti hi uṇhagu, sūriyo.
tika-s0105t:576_18: Tasmiñhi uddhanato uddharitapakkuthitatelasmiṃ pakkhitte taṅkhaṇaññeva taṃ telaṃ sītalaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0105t:576_19: Etesu pana atthesu goṇe vattamāno go-
tika-s0105t:576_20: saddo yathārahaṃ itthiliṅgo ceva pulliṅgo ca,
tika-s0105t:577_1: Aññakulaparamparāya asādhāraṇaṃ tassa kulassa ādipurisasamudāgataṃ taṃkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṃ sāmaññarūpanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:577_2: Sādhāraṇameva hi idaṃ taṃkulapariyāpannānaṃ sādhāraṇato ca sāmaññarūpaṃ.
tika-s0105t:577_3: Tathā hi taṃkule jātā suddhodanamahārājādayopi “gotamo” tveva vuccanti,
tika-s0105t:577_4: teneva bhagavā attano pitaraṃ suddhodanamahārājānaṃ “atikkantavarā kho gotama tathāgatā”ti avoca,
tika-s0105t:577_7: āyasmāpi vaṅgīso āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ “sādhu nibbāpanaṃ brūhi,
tika-s0105t:577_12: Ettha ca “samaṇo”ti iminā sarikkhakajanehi bhagavato bahumatabhāvo dassito tabbisayasamitapāpatāparikittanato,
tika-s0105t:578_2: Sabbakhattiyānañhi ādibhūtamahāsammatamahārājato paṭṭhāya asambhinnaṃ uḷāratamaṃ sakyarājakulaṃ. Yathāha –
tika-s0105t:581_4: Ñātipārijuññabhogapārijuññādinā kenaci pārijuññena parihāniyā anabhibhūto anajjhotthaṭo hutvā pabbajitoti attho.
tika-s0105t:581_5: Tadeva pariyāyantarena vibhāvetuṃ “aparikkhīṇaṃyeva taṃ kulaṃ pahāyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:581_6: Aparikkhīṇanti hi ñātipārijuññabhogapārijuññādinā kenaci pārijuññena aparikkhayaṃ.
tika-s0105t:581_9: Nanu ca “sakyakulā pabbajito”ti idaṃ uccākulā pabbajitabhāvaparidīpanameva siyā tadatthasseva viññāyamānattā,
tika-s0105t:581_11: Na kho panevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ mahantaṃ ñātiparivaṭṭaṃ,
tika-s0105t:581_12: mahantañca bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya saddhāpabbajitabhāvassa atthato siddhattā.
tika-s0105t:581_13: Tathā hi lokanāthassa abhijātiyaṃ tassa kulassa na kiñci pārijuññaṃ,
tika-s0105t:581_15: tato tassa samiddhatamabhāvo loke pākaṭo paññāto hoti,
tika-s0105t:581_16: tasmā “sakyakulā pabbajito”ti ettakeyeva vutte tathā samiddhatamaṃ kulaṃ pahāya saddhāpabbajitabhāvo siddhoyevāti,
tika-s0105t:584_0: Viya sādhusaddo idha sundaratthoti āha “sundaraṃ kho panā”ti.
tika-s0105t:584_5: bhaddakatā ca passantānaṃ hitasukhāvahabhāvenāti vuttaṃ “atthāvahaṃ sukhāvaha”nti.
tika-s0105t:584_6: Attho cettha diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthavasena tividhaṃ hitaṃ sukhampi tatheva tividhaṃ sukhaṃ.
tika-s0105t:585_3: Yādisehi ca guṇehi bhagavā samannāgato catuppamāṇikassa lokassa sabbakālampi-
tika-s0105t:585_6: tādisehi guṇehi samannāgatabhāvaṃ sandhāya “tathārūpānaṃ arahata”nti vuttanti dassento “yathārūpo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:585_12: apica “yathārūpo so bhavaṃ gotamo”ti iminā “tathārūpāna”nti padassa aniyamavasena atthaṃ dassetvā sarūpaniyamavasenapi
tika-s0105t:585_15: ayameva ca nayo ācariyehi adhippeto idha ṭīkāyaṃ,
tika-s0105t:585_17: “Yathārūpā te bhavanto arahanto”ti avatvā “yathārūpo so bhavaṃ gotamo”ti vacanaṃ bhagavatiyeva garugāravavasena
tika-s0105t:585_19: garūsu ca hi bahuvacanaṃ icchanti saddavidū.
tika-s0105t:585_22: lūkhappamāṇānañca sattānaṃ bhagavato pasādāvahataṃ yathārutato dasseti arahantabhāvassa tesaññeva yathārahaṃ visayattā,
tika-s0105t:585_23: taṃdassanena pana itaresampi rūpappamāṇaghosappamāṇānaṃ pasādāvahatā dassitāyeva tadavinābhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:586_4: “Dassana”nti vuttepi taduttari kattabbatāsambhavato ayaṃ sambhāvanattho labbhatīti āha “dassanamattampi sādhu hotī”ti.
tika-s0105t:586_12: saddo “brāhmaṇo pokkharasātī ambaṭṭhaṃ māṇavaṃ āmantesī”ti iminā sambajjhitabbo,
tika-s0105t:586_17: imamatthaṃ vibhāvento āha “dassanamattampi sādhu hotīti evaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ katvā”ti.
tika-s0105t:586_18: Mūlapaṇṇāsake cūḷasīhanādasuttaṭṭhakathāya āgataṃ kosiyasakuṇavatthu cettha kathetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:588_2: dutiyapakatiyā pasaṃsāvacanaṃ katvā voharanti yathā taṃ “puriso naro”ti dassetuṃ aggaññasuttapada mudāhaṭaṃ.
tika-s0105t:588_4: Na jhāyantīti paṇṇakuṭīsu jhānaṃ na appenti na nipphādenti,
tika-s0105t:588_5: gāmanigamasāmantaṃ osaritvā vedaganthe karontāva acchantīti attho.
tika-s0105t:588_6: Taṃ panetesaṃ brāhmaṇajhāyakasaṅkhātaṃ paṭhamadutiyanāmaṃ upādāya tatiyameva jātanti āha “ajjhāyakātveva tatiyaṃ akkharaṃ upanibbatta”nti,
tika-s0105t:588_8: Sā hi tasmiṃyeva niruḷhabhāvena aññattha asañcaraṇato “akkhara”nti vuccati.
tika-s0105t:588_15: Mante dhāretīti yathāadhīte mante asammūḷhe katvā hadaye ṭhapeti.
tika-s0105t:589_1: Tattha iccante thomīyante devā etāyāti iru ica-
tika-s0105t:589_6: Yajjante pujjante devā anenāti yaju punnapuṃsakaliṅgavasena.
tika-s0105t:589_8: sāyanti vā tanuṃ karonti pāpamanenāti sāmaṃ so-
tika-s0105t:590_3: etena nighaṇṭurukkhapariyāyaṃ ādiṃ katvā tappamukhena sesapariyāyānaṃ tattha dassitattā so gantho nighaṇṭu nāma yathā taṃ “pārājikakaṇḍo,
tika-s0105t:590_4: kusalattiko”ti ayamattho dassito iminā yathārutameva tadatthassa adhigatattā.
tika-s0105t:590_6: saddañca nikhaḍati bhindati vibhajja dassetīti nikhaṇḍu,
tika-s0105t:590_11: Itarathā hi so aṭṭhakathāya virodho siyā,
tika-s0105t:590_13: Akkharacintakā pana evamicchanti “tattha tatthāgatāni nāmāni nissesato ghaṭenti rāsiṃ karonti etthāti nighaṇṭu niggahitāgamenā”ti.
tika-s0105t:590_16: Nidassanamattañcetaṃ anekesampi atthānaṃ ekasaddavacanīyatāvibhāvanavasenapi tassa ganthassa pavattattā.
tika-s0105t:590_21: kiriyākappo ca so vikappo cāti kiriyākappavikappo.
tika-s0105t:590_22: So hi vaṇṇapadasambandhapadatthādivibhāgato bahuvikappoti katvā “kiriyākappavikappo”ti vuccati,
tika-s0105t:590_23: so ca ganthavisesoyevāti vuttaṃ “kavīnaṃ upakārāvahaṃ sattha”nti,
tika-s0105t:590_30: Vacanatthato pana kiṭayati gameti ñāpeti kiriyādivibhāganti keṭubhaṃ kiṭa-
tika-s0105t:590_33: Atha vā kiriyādivibhāgaṃ anavasesapariyādānato kiṭento gamanto obheti pūretīti keṭubhaṃ kiṭa-
tika-s0105t:590_35: Apica kiṭanti gacchanti kavayo bandhesu kosallametenāti keṭubhaṃ,
tika-s0105t:590_38: nibbacanavibhāgato ca akkharā pabhedīyanti etenāti akkharappabhedo,
tika-s0105t:590_39: taṃ pana chasu vedaṅgesu pariyāpannaṃ pakaraṇadvayamevāti vuttaṃ “sikkhā ca nirutti cā”ti.
tika-s0105t:595_0: Idha pana tabbasena anekadhā nibbacanaparidīpakaṃ satthaṃ uttarapadalopena “niruttī”ti adhippetaṃ nibbacanavibhāgatopi
tika-s0105t:595_4: nirutti ca hi paccekameva vedaṅgaṃ yathāhu –
tika-s0105t:598_1: na chasu byañjanapadesu viya tadubhayasādhāraṇanibbacanaṃ vedaṅgavisayattāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:598_4: kārāgamo viya avijjamānassa akkharassa āgamo vaṇṇāgamo nāma.
tika-s0105t:598_5: Hiṃsanattā “hiṃso”ti vattabbe “sīho”ti parivattanaṃ viya vijjamānānamakkharānaṃ heṭṭhupariyavasena parivattanaṃ vaṇṇavipariyāyo nāma.
tika-s0105t:598_8: kārāpajjanaṃ viya aññakkharassa aññakkharāpajjanaṃ vaṇṇavikāro nāma.
tika-s0105t:598_9: “Jīvanassa mūto jīvanamūto”ti vattabbe “jīmūto”ti va- kāra na-
tika-s0105t:598_10: kārānaṃ vināso viya vijjamānakkharānaṃ vināso vaṇṇavināso nāma.
tika-s0105t:598_12: āsajja maṃ tvaṃ vadase kumārā”ti ettha “pakubbamāno”ti padassa abhibhavamānoti atthapaṭipādanaṃ viya
tika-s0105t:598_13: tattha tattha yathāyogaṃ visesatthapaṭipādanaṃ dhātūnamatthātisayena yogo nāmāti.
tika-s0105t:599_0: Yathāvuttappabhedānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ ayaṃ catutthoyeva siyā,
tika-s0105t:599_1: atha kena saddhiṃ pañcamoti āha “āthabbaṇavedaṃ catutthaṃ katvā”ti.
tika-s0105t:599_2: Āthabbaṇavedo nāma āthabbaṇavedikehi vihito parūpaghātakaro manto,
tika-s0105t:599_5: evañca katvā “etesa”nti padassa tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vedānantveva attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0105t:599_7: Itiha asāti evaṃ idha loke ahosi “āsā”tipi katthaci pāṭho,
tika-s0105t:599_13: iminā “itihāsā”ti vacanena paṭisaṃyutto itihāso taddhitavasenāti atthaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:599_15: itiha āsā”ti īdisavacanapaṭisaṃyutto itihāso niruttinayenāti atthadassanantipi vadanti.
tika-s0105t:599_20: tesaṃ mate “itiha asā”ti ettha evaṃ pārampariyopadeso asa vijjamāno ahosīti attho.
tika-s0105t:599_24: narasīharājuppattikathāti evamādipurāṇakathāsaṅkhāto bhāratapurāṇarāmapurāṇanarasīhapurāṇādigantho itihāso nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:599_25: “Tesaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ vedāna”nti iminā yathāvākyaṃ “tiṇṇaṃ vedāna”nti ettha visesanabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:600_6: visesena vā ākarīyante pakatipaccayādayo abhinipphādīyante ettha,
tika-s0105t:600_8: sādhusaddānamanvākhyāyakaṃ muddhabodhabyākaraṇa sārassatabyākaraṇa pāṇinībyākaraṇacandrabyākaraṇādi adhunāpi vijjamānasatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:600_15: veyyākaraṇoti tadavasiṭṭhapakatipaccayādisaddavidhikosallanti imassatthassa viññāpanatthaṃ padadvayassa ekato atthavacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:600_19: te eva vede padaso kāyatīti padakoti.
tika-s0105t:601_0: Āyatiṃ hitaṃ bālajanasaṅkhāto loko na yatati na īhati anenāti lokāyataṃ.
tika-s0105t:601_1: Tañhi ganthaṃ nissāya sattā puññakiriyāya cittampi na uppādenti,
tika-s0105t:601_2: lokā vā bālajanā āyatanti ussahanti vādassādena etthāti lokāyataṃ.
tika-s0105t:601_4: saggamokkhaviruddhaṃ vā tanonti etthāti vitaṇḍo ḍa-
tika-s0105t:601_8: viruddhena vādadaṇḍena tāḷenti vādino etthāti vitaṇḍo taḍi-
tika-s0105t:601_11: Adesampi yaṃ nissāya vādīnaṃ vādo pavatto,
tika-s0105t:601_12: taṃ tesaṃ desatopi upacāravasena vuccati yathā “cakkhuṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ,
tika-s0105t:601_15: visesena vā paṇḍitānaṃ manaṃ taḍenti cālenti etenāti vitaṇḍo,
tika-s0105t:601_24: Dvādasasahassaganthapamāṇanti ettha bhāṇavārappamāṇādīsu viya bāttiṃsakkharaganthova adhippeto.
tika-s0105t:603_0: Gāthā cekā mato gantho, gantho bāttiṃsatakkharo”ti.
tika-s0105t:605_1: saddato pana adhigatamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “avayo na hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:605_9: so “dve paṭisedhā pakatiyatthagamakā”ti ñāyena vayo evāti.
tika-s0105t:605_11: ādimajjhapariyosānesu katthacipi aparikilamanto avitthāyanto te ganthe santāne paṇeti byavaharatīti attho.
tika-s0105t:605_18: natthi etassa yathāvuttaganthesu vayo ūnatāti avayo,
tika-s0105t:606_6: tamahaṃ jānāmī”ti idaṃ pana paṭijānanākāradassananti dasseti “yaṃ aha”ntiādinā.
tika-s0105t:606_7: “Āma ācariyā”ti hi yathāgataṃ paṭijānanavacanameva atthavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:607_1: Idāni yenādhippāyena brāhmaṇo pokkharasātī ambaṭṭhaṃ māṇavaṃ āmantetvā “ayaṃ tātā”tiādivacanamabrvi,
tika-s0105t:607_3: Tattha uggatassāti pubbe pākaṭassa kittimato porāṇajanassa.
tika-s0105t:607_8: attānaṃ tato mocetvā apagamanamattampi dukkaraṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:608_2: tathā santaṃyevā”ti padesupi tassa anupayogattā tadatthavasenevāti dasseti “tassa bhoto”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:608_4: Tathā satoyevāti yenākārena arahatādinā saddo abbhuggato,
tika-s0105t:608_5: tenākārena santassa bhūtassa eva tassa bhavato gotamassa saddo yadi vā abbhuggatoti attho.
tika-s0105t:608_6: Apica taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ tathā santaṃyevāti ekassapi atthassa dvikkhattuṃ sambandhabhāvena vacanaṃ
tika-s0105t:608_8: tasmā “tassa bhoto gotamassā”ti sāmaññasambandhabhāvena vicchinditvā “tathā satoyevā”ti visesasambandhabhāvena yojetabbaṃ. Yadi-
tika-s0105t:608_9: saddo cettha saṃsayattho dvinnampi atthānaṃ saṃsayitabbattā. Vā-
tika-s0105t:608_10: saddo ca vikappanattho tesu ekassa vikappetabbattā.
tika-s0105t:608_12: “imassa vacanaṃ saccaṃ vā yadi vā musā”tiādīsu viya yadi- saddo vā-
