tika-s0105t:608_14: saddopi hi “yaṃ yadeva parisaṃ upasaṅkamati yadi khattiyaparisaṃ yadi brāhmaṇaparisa”ntiādīsu vā-
tika-s0105t:608_17: idānetarahi vijjatī”tiādīsu viya ca idha samānatthasaddapayogoti.
tika-s0105t:608_18: Pāḷiyaṃ “yadi vā no tathā”ti idampi “santaṃyeva saddo abbhuggato”ti iminā sambajjhitvā yathāvuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:608_22: vicchinditvā sambandhavisesabhāvena yojetabbattā vā idhāpi itthambhūtākhyānatthavaseneva upayogavacanaṃ nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:609_2: saddaṃ sātthakaṃ katvā saha pāṭhasesena yojetuṃ “yathā sakkā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:609_7: Bāhirakasamaye ācariyamhi upajjhāyasamudācāroti āha “atha naṃ upajjhāyo”ti,
tika-s0105t:610_2: tathāpi aṭṭhakādi vuttaṃ padhānabhūtaṃ mūlaṃ manto,
tika-s0105t:610_4: tattha vuttanayena yaññakiriyāvidhānaṃ kappoti mantasseva padhānabhāvato,
tika-s0105t:610_5: itaresañca tannissayeneva jātattā mantaggahaṇena brahmakappānampi gahaṇaṃ siddhamevāti dasseti “tīsu vedesū”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:610_6: Mantoti hi aṭṭhakādīhi isīhi vuttamūlavedasseva nāmaṃ,
tika-s0105t:610_8: tasmā “vedesū”ti vutte sabbesampi gahaṇaṃ sijjhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:610_14: Jānissanti iti manasi katvā vācentīti sambandho.
tika-s0105t:610_16: Pubbeti “tathāgato uppajjissatī”ti vattabbakālato pabhuti tathāgatassa dharamānakāle.
tika-s0105t:610_20: atha kho aññepi vedā brāhmaṇānaṃ aññāṇabhāvena anukkamena antaradhāyanti evāti ācariyena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:611_3: “Paṇidhimahato samādānamahatotiādinā paccekaṃ mahantasaddo yojetabbo”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:611_4: Evañca sati karuṇā ādi yesaṃ saddhāsīlādīnaṃ te karuṇādayo,
tika-s0105t:611_6: paṇidhi ca samādānañca ñāṇañca karuṇādiguṇā ca,
tika-s0105t:611_9: Apica paṇidhi ca samādānañca ñāṇañca karuṇā ca,
tika-s0105t:611_12: tehi mahantoti nibbacanenapi attho sūpapanno hoti,
tika-s0105t:611_13: paṇidhimahantatādi cassa buddhavaṃsa cariyāpiṭakādi vasena veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:611_14: Mahāpadānasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “mahāpurisassāti jātigottakulapadesādivasena mahantassa purisassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:611_21: tadetaṃ sabbampi idha ādisaddena saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:611_22: Evañhi sati “dveyeva gatiyo bhavantī”ti ubhinnaṃ sādhāraṇavacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0105t:612_5: So hi sucaritaduccaritakammena sattehi upapajjanavasena gantabbāti gati.
tika-s0105t:612_11: so pana ito ca etto ca byāpetvā ṭhitatāva.
tika-s0105t:612_14: Tathā hesa “imesaṃ kho ahaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sīlavantānaṃ kalyāṇadhammānaṃ neva jānāmi āgatiṃ vā gatiṃ vā”ti ettha ajjhāsaye vattati,
tika-s0105t:612_23: idha pana niṭṭhāyaṃ vattatīti veditabbo tadaññesamavisayattā.
tika-s0105t:613_0: Nanu dvinnaṃ nipphattīnaṃ nimittabhūtāni lakkhaṇāni visadisāneva,
tika-s0105t:613_1: atha kasmā “yehi samannāgatassā”tiādinā tesaṃ sadisabhāvo vuttoti codanālesaṃ dassetvā sodhento “tattha kiñcāpī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:613_2: Samānepi nigrodhabimbatādilakkhaṇabhāve attheva koci nesaṃ visesoti dassetuṃ “na teheva buddho hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:613_6: na evaṃ cakkavattīna”nti ayaṃ pana viseso ācariyadhammapālattherena pakāsito.
tika-s0105t:613_7: Jāyanti bhinnesupi atthesu abhinnadhīsaddā etāyāti jāti,
tika-s0105t:616_0: Tasmā lakkhaṇatāmattena samānabhāvato visadisānipi tāniyeva cakkavattinipphattinimittabhūtāni lakkhaṇāni
tika-s0105t:616_1: sadisāni viya katvā tāni buddhanipphattinimittabhūtāni lakkhaṇāni nāmāti idaṃ vacanaṃ vuccatīti attho.
tika-s0105t:616_2: Adhiāpubbavasayoge bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha “agāre vasatī”ti catūhi acchariyadhammehīti abhirūpatā,
tika-s0105t:616_5: brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ piyamanāpatāti imehi catūhi acchariyasabhāvabhūtāhi iddhīhi. Yathāha –
tika-s0105t:617_4: rājā mahāsudassano abhirūpo ahosi dassanīyo pāsādiko”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:618_0: Cetiyajātake āgatanayaṃ gahetvāpi evaṃ vadanti “sarīrato candanagandho vāyati,
tika-s0105t:618_4: Cattāro devaputtā catūsu disāsu sabbakālaṃ khaggahatthā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-s0105t:618_12: Tattha samavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannāgatabhāvoti samavipācaniyā kammajatejodhātuyā sampannatā.
tika-s0105t:618_14: yassa vā pana puṭabhattaṃ viya tatheva tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0105t:618_16: Yassa pana puna bhattakāle bhattacchando uppajjateva,
tika-s0105t:620_0: Samānattatā ca dhammesu, tattha tattha yathārahaṃ;
tika-s0105t:621_0: Ete kho saṅgahā loke, rathassāṇīva yāyato.
tika-s0105t:622_0: Ete ca saṅgahā nāssu, na mātā puttakāraṇā;
tika-s0105t:623_0: Labhetha mānaṃ pūjaṃ vā, pitā vā puttakāraṇā.
tika-s0105t:624_0: Yasmā ca saṅgahā ete, samapekkhanti paṇḍitā;
tika-s0105t:625_0: Tasmā mahattaṃ papponti, pāsaṃsā ca bhavanti te”ti. ;
tika-s0105t:626_3: Catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi rañjanaṭṭhena rājāti pana sabbesaṃ rājūnaṃ samaññā tathā akarontānampi vilīvabījanādīsu
tika-s0105t:627_0: Saddasāmatthiyato anekadhā cakkavattīsaddassa vacanatthaṃ dassento padhānabhūtaṃ vacanatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ dassetuṃ “cakkaratana”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:627_1: Idameva hi padhānaṃ cakkaratanassa pavattanamantarena cakkavattibhāvānāpattito.
tika-s0105t:627_2: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ “kittāvatā cakkavattī hotīti?
tika-s0105t:627_4: Yasmā pana rājā cakkavattī ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vāmahatthena hatthisoṇḍasadisapanāḷiṃ suvaṇṇabhiṅkāraṃ
tika-s0105t:627_5: ukkhipitvā dakkhiṇahatthena cakkaratanaṃ udakena abbhukkiritvā “pavattatu bhavaṃ cakkaratanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:627_6: abhivijinātu bhavaṃ cakkaratana”nti vacanena cakkaratanaṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā pavattesi,
tika-s0105t:627_7: tasmā tādisaṃ pavattāpanaṃ sandhāya “cakkaratanaṃ vattetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:627_8: Yathāha “atha kho ānanda rājā mahāsudassano uṭṭhāyāsanā…pe…
tika-s0105t:627_10: Na kevalañca cakkasaddo cakkarataneyeva vattati atha kho sampatticakkādīsupi,
tika-s0105t:632_6: Ye kho panānanda puratthimāya disāya paṭirājāno,
tika-s0105t:637_1: imināva iriyāpathacakkaṃ vatteti parahitāya uppādetīti nibbacanampi dasseti atthato samānattā.
tika-s0105t:638_0: “Atha kho taṃ ānanda cakkaratanaṃ puratthimaṃ disaṃ pavatti,
tika-s0105t:638_1: anvadeva rājā mahāsudassano saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāya.
tika-s0105t:638_4: tattha rājā mahāsudassano vāsaṃ upagacchi saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:640_0: “Pañcahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato rājā cakkavattī dhammeneva cakkaṃ vatteti,
tika-s0105t:640_1: taṃ hoti cakkaṃ appaṭivattiyaṃ kenaci manussabhūtena paccatthikena pāṇinā.
tika-s0105t:640_3: Idha bhikkhave rājā cakkavattī atthaññū ca hoti,
tika-s0105t:641_0: Khattiyamaṇḍalādisaññitaṃ cakkaṃ samūhaṃ attano vase vatteti anuvattetītipi cakkavattī.
tika-s0105t:641_1: Vuttañhi “ye kho panānanda puratthimāya disāya paṭirājāno,
tika-s0105t:641_4: Tenāha “imassa deva kumārassa heṭṭhā pādatalesu cakkāni jātāni sahassārāni sanemikāni sanābhikāni sabbākāraparipūrānī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:641_5: Cakkaṃ mahantaṃ kāyabalaṃ vattati etassātipi cakkavattī.
tika-s0105t:641_10: dvādasavidhaṃ vā vattadhammaṃ vattati paṭipajjatīti cakkavattī.
tika-s0105t:641_11: Tena vuttaṃ “na hi te tāta dibbaṃ cakkaratanaṃ pettikaṃ dāyajjaṃ,
tika-s0105t:641_12: iṅgha tvaṃ tāta ariye cakkavattivatte vattāhī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:641_13: Cakkaṃ mahantaṃ dānaṃ vatteti pavattetītipi cakkavattī.
tika-s0105t:642_0: “Paṭṭhapesi kho ānanda rājā mahāsudassano tāsaṃ pokkharaṇīnaṃ tīre evarūpaṃ dānaṃ annaṃ annatthikassa,
tika-s0105t:643_3: samo eva ca ñāyo nāmāti āha “ñāyena samenā”ti.
tika-s0105t:643_6: “Idaṃ nāma caratī”ti avuttepi sāmaññajotanāya visese avaṭṭhānato,
tika-s0105t:643_8: Padesaggahaṇe hi asati gahetabbassa nippadesatā viññāyati yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti.
tika-s0105t:644_3: carako vā rājāti dhammarājāti imaṃ savisesaṃ atthaṃ dasseti “parahitadhammakaraṇena vā”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:644_9: Ācariyena pana evaṃ vuttaṃ “cakkavattivattasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ carati,
tika-s0105t:644_12: dhammato anapetattā dhammo ca so rañjanaṭṭhena rājā cāti dhammarājā”ti.
tika-s0105t:644_13: “Rājā hoti cakkavattī”ti vacanato “cāturanto”ti idaṃ catudīpissarataṃ vibhāvetīti āha “cāturantāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:644_14: Cattāro samuddā antā pariyosānā etissāti cāturantā, pathavī.
tika-s0105t:644_15: Sā hi catūsu disāsu puratthimasamuddādicatusamuddapariyosānattā evaṃ vuccati.
tika-s0105t:644_17: sā pana avayavabhūtehi catubbidhehi dīpehi vibhūsitā ekalokadhātupariyāpannā pathavīyevāti dasseti “catubbidhadīpavibhūsitāya pathaviyā”ti iminā. Yathāha –
tika-s0105t:646_0: Sabbeva dāsā mandhātu, ye ca pāṇā pathavissitā”ti.
tika-s0105t:647_0: Ettha ca “catudīpavibhūsitāyā”ti avatvā catubbidhadīpavibhūsitāyāti vidhasaddaggahaṇaṃ paccekaṃ pañcasataparittadīpānampi
tika-s0105t:647_2: koṭṭhāsavācakena vā vidhasaddena samānabhāgānaṃ gahitattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:647_7: “Sabbarājāno vijetī”ti vadanto kāmaṃ cakkavattino kenaci yuddhaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-s0105t:647_8: yuddhena pana sādhetabbassa vijayassa siddhiyā “vijitasaṅgāmo” tveva vuttoti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:648_3: iminā kenaci akampiyaṭṭhena janapade thāvariyappattoti tappurisasamāsaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0105t:648_4: itarena ca daḷhabhattibhāvato janapado thāvariyappatto etasminti aññapadatthasamāsaṃ.
tika-s0105t:648_17: Tathā hi aticaṇḍassa rañño balikhaṇḍādīhi lokaṃ pīḷayato manussā majjhimajanapadaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbatasamuddatīrādīni nissāya paccante vāsaṃ kappenti,
tika-s0105t:648_18: atimudukassa ca rañño corasāhasikajanavilopapīḷitā manussā paccantaṃ pahāya janapadamajjhe vāsaṃ kappenti,
tika-s0105t:648_19: iti evarūpe rājini janapado thāvarabhāvaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
tika-s0105t:648_20: Etasmiṃ pana tadubhayavirahite suvaṇṇatulā viya samabhāvappatte rājini rajjaṃ kārayamāne janapado pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ
tika-s0105t:648_21: ṭhapetvā ayopaṭṭena parikkhitto viya acalo asampavedhī thāvariyappattoti.
tika-s0105t:649_3: sā katamā”tiādinā yathārahaṃ liṅgavibhattivacanavasena payojiyamānova hoti,
tika-s0105t:649_4: idha tāni katamānīti payuttoti āha “tassa cetānī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:649_5: Cacati cakkavattino yathāruci ākāsādigamanāya paribbhamatīti cakkaṃ.
tika-s0105t:649_6: Cakkaratanañhi antosamuṭṭhitavāyodhātuvasena rañño cakkavattissa vacanasamanantarameva pavattati,
tika-s0105t:649_7: na candasūriyavimānādi viya bahisamuṭṭhitavāyodhātuvasenāti vimānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:649_10: suṇantassa ca anappakaṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppajjati acchariyadhammattā.
tika-s0105t:649_11: Vacanatthato pana rameti ratiṃ karotīti ratanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:650_1: so pana ratijananaṭṭheneva ekasaṅgahatāya visuṃ na gahito.
tika-s0105t:650_4: Atha vā ganthabyāsaṃ pariharitukāmena cittīkatādibhāvo na gahitoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:654_0: “Cakkaratanassa ca nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya aññaṃ devaṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti,
tika-s0105t:654_1: sabbepi gandhapupphādīhi tasseva pūjañca abhivādanādīni ca karontīti cittīkataṭṭhena ratanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:654_2: Cakkaratanassa ca ettakaṃ nāma dhanaṃ agghatīti aggho natthi,
tika-s0105t:654_4: Cakkaratanañca aññehi loke vijjamānaratanehi asadisanti atulaṭṭhena ratanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:654_5: Yasmā pana yasmiṃ kappe buddhā uppajjanti,
tika-s0105t:655_10: svāyaṃ cittīkāro tassa pūjanīyatāyāti katvā pūjanīyanti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-s0105t:655_12: taṃ na gahetabbaṃ idha cittasaddassa hadayavācakattā “cittīkatvā suṇātha me”ti āhaccabhāsitapāḷiyaṃ viya.
tika-s0105t:655_15: maṇinā kuṇḍalena cā”tiādīsu pana pubbe avicitraṃ idāni vicitraṃ katanti cittīkatanti attho gahetabbo tattha cittasaddassa vicitravācakattā.
tika-s0105t:656_0: Idāni nesaṃ cittīkatādiatthānaṃ savisesaṃ cakkaratane labbhamānataṃ dassetvā itaresupi te atidisituṃ “yathā ca cakkaratana”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0105t:656_1: Tattha aññaṃ devaṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti rañño anaññasādhāraṇissariyādisampattipaṭilābhahetuto,
tika-s0105t:656_7: Sattānaṃ pāpajigucchanena vigatakāḷako puññapasutatāya maṇḍabhūto yādiso kālo buddhuppādāraho,
tika-s0105t:656_8: tādise eva cakkavattīnampi sambhavoti āha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:659_2: tasmā yathā buddhā kadāci karahaci uppajjanti,
tika-s0105t:659_4: cakkavattino pana anekadāpi buddhuppādakappe uppajjantīti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0105t:659_5: Evaṃ santepi cakkavattivattapūraṇassa dukkarabhāvato dullabhuppādoyevāti iminā dullabhuppādatāsāmaññena tesaṃ dullabhadassanatā vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:659_7: tathāpi cakkavattī eva naṃ sāmibhāvena visavitāya paribhuñjatīti vattabbataṃ arahati tadatthameva uppajjanatoti dassento “tadeta”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:659_9: channampi vā atthānaṃ sesaratanesupi labbhanato “evaṃ sesānipī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:660_0: Imehi pana ratanehi rājā cakkavattī kimatthaṃ paccanubhoti,
tika-s0105t:660_1: nanu vināpi tesu kenaci raññā cakkavattinā bhavitabbanti codanāya tassa tehi hathārahamatthapaccanubhavanadassanena
tika-s0105t:660_5: assaratanañca abhiruhitvā tesaṃ ānubhāvena antopātarāsaṃyeva samuddapariyantaṃ pathaviṃ anupariyāyitvā rājadhāniyā eva paccāgamanato.
tika-s0105t:660_7: Avasesehi maṇiratanaitthiratanagahapatiratanehi upabhuñjanena pavattaṃ upabhogasukhaṃ anubhavati yathārahaṃ tehi tathānubhavanasiddhito.
tika-s0105t:660_8: So hi maṇiratanena yojanappamāṇe padese andhakāraṃ vidhametvā ālokadassanādinā sukhamanubhavati,
tika-s0105t:661_2: Tividhā hi sattiyo “sakkonti samatthenti rājāno etāyā”ti katvā. Yathāhu –
tika-s0105t:663_0: Pabhāvo daṇḍajo tejo, patāpo tu ca kosajo.
tika-s0105t:664_0: Manto ca mantanaṃ so tu, catukkaṇṇo dvigocaro;
tika-s0105t:666_1: Paṭhamena cassa cakkaratanena tadanuyogo paripuṇṇo hoti.
tika-s0105t:666_7: Tassa sabbarājakiccesu kusalabhāvena mantasattiyā viya avirajjhanapayogattā. Damanena,
tika-s0105t:666_12: gahapatiratanato paṭiladdhakosasampattiyā ca pabhāvasattiyā viya pabhāvasamiddhisiddhito.
tika-s0105t:666_14: yathāvuttāhi tividhāhi sattīhi payujjanato yaṃ phalaṃ laddhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:666_15: Taṃ sabbaṃ tehi paripuṇṇaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-s0105t:667_4: Idāni tesaṃ sampannahetuvasenapi kenaci avinābhāvitameva vibhāvetuṃ “visesato”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:667_10: Pacchimaṃ pariṇāyakaratanaṃ amohakusalamūlajanitakammānubhāvena sampajjati mahāpaññeneva cakkavattirājakiccassa parinetabbattā,
tika-s0105t:667_13: Ratanasuttassāti tattha pañcamavagge saṅgītassa dutiyassa ratanasuttassa.
tika-s0105t:667_14: Upadeso nāma savisesaṃ sattannaṃ ratanānaṃ vicāraṇavasena pavatto nayo.
tika-s0105t:668_3: Asure vijinitvā ṭhitattā sakko devānamindo dhīro nāma,
tika-s0105t:668_6: tassa rūpamiva rūpaṃ yesaṃ te dhīraṅgarūpā,
tika-s0105t:668_19: tadeva dhīraṅgaṃ nāmāti āha “vīriyanti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0105t:668_26: Apica dhīraṅgena nibbattaṃ dhīraṅganti atthaṃ dassetuṃ “vīriyamayasarīrā viyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:668_27: evampi vīriyato rūpaṃ na ekantaṃ nibbattanti viya-
tika-s0105t:668_29: Atha vā rūpaṃ sarīrabhūtaṃ dhīraṅgaṃ vīriyametesanti yojetabbaṃ,
tika-s0105t:668_30: tathāpi vīriyaṃ nāma kiñci saviggahaṃ na hotīti dīpeti “vīriyamayasarīrā viyā”ti iminā,
tika-s0105t:668_35: te cassa puttā taṃsadisāyeva bhaveyyunti ayameva cattho ācariyena anumato.
tika-s0105t:668_36: Mahāpadānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana evaṃ vuttaṃ “dhīraṅgaṃ rūpametesanti dhīraṅgarūpā,
tika-s0105t:668_38: divasampi yujjhantā na kilamantīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti,
tika-s0105t:668_39: tadetaṃ rūpasaddassa sabhāvatthataṃ sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:668_40: Idha ceva aññattha katthaci “dhitaṅgarūpā”ti pāṭho dissati.
tika-s0105t:668_41: Vīriyatthopi hi dhitisaddo hoti “saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo,
tika-s0105t:669_0: Nanu ca rañño cakkavattissa paṭisenā nāma natthi,
tika-s0105t:669_4: “sace pana bhaveyyā”ti parikappanāmattena tesaṃ evamānubhāvataṃ dassetuṃ tathā vuttanti adhippāyo,
tika-s0105t:669_5: “parasenappamaddanā”ti vuttepi parasenaṃ pamaddituṃ samatthāti attho gahetabbo pakaraṇatopi atthantarassa viññāyamānattā,
tika-s0105t:669_6: yathā “sikkhamānena bhikkhave bhikkhunā aññātabbaṃ paripucchitabbaṃ paripañhitabba”nti etassa padabhājanīye
tika-s0105t:669_7: “sikkhitukāmenā”ti atthaggahaṇanti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ parimaddituṃ samatthā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:669_8: Na hi te parasenaṃ pamaddantā tiṭṭhanti,
tika-s0105t:669_11: Parasenaṃ pamaddanāya samatthentīti parasenappamaddanāti atthaṃ dassetītipi vadanti.
tika-s0105t:670_0: Pubbe katūpacitassa etarahi vipaccamānakassa puññadhammassa cirataraṃ vipaccituṃ paccayabhūtaṃ cakkavattivattasamudāgataṃ
tika-s0105t:670_1: payogasampattisaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ dassetuṃ “dhammenā”ti padassa “pāṇo na hantabbotiādinā pañcasīladhammenā”ti
tika-s0105t:670_3: Ayañhi attho “ye kho panānanda puratthimāya disāya paṭirājāno,
tika-s0105t:670_4: te rājānaṃ mahāsudassanaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāhaṃsu ‘ehi kho mahārāja,
tika-s0105t:670_14: Ye kho panānanda puratthimāya disāya paṭirājāno,
tika-s0105t:670_15: te rañño mahāsudassanassa anuyantā ahesu”ntiādinā āgataṃ rañño ovādadhammaṃ sandhāya vutto.
tika-s0105t:670_16: Evañhi “adaṇḍena asatthenā”ti idampi visesanavacanaṃ susamatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:671_0: Mahāpadānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “adaṇḍenāti ye katāparādhe satte satampi sahassampi gaṇhanti,
tika-s0105t:671_4: Ayaṃ pana duvidhampi daṇḍaṃ pahāya adaṇḍena ajjhāvasati.
tika-s0105t:671_5: Asatthenāti ye ekatodhārādinā satthena paraṃ vihesanti,
tika-s0105t:671_7: Ayaṃ pana satthena khuddakamakkhikāyapi pivanamattaṃ lohitaṃ kassaci anuppādetvā dhammeneva,
tika-s0105t:671_8: ‘ehi kho mahārājā’ti evaṃ paṭirājūhi sampaṭicchitāgamano vuttappakāraṃ pathaviṃ abhivijinitvā ajjhāvasati
tika-s0105t:671_9: abhibhavitvā sāmī hutvā vasatīti attho”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:671_10: tadetaṃ “dhammenā”ti padassa “pubbe katūpacitena etarahi vipaccamānakena yena kenaci puññadhammenā”ti atthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:671_11: Teneva hi “dhammena paṭirājūhi sampaṭicchitāgamano vuttappakāraṃ pathaviṃ abhivijinitvā ajjhāvasatī”ti.
tika-s0105t:671_12: Ācariyenapi vuttaṃ dhammenāti katūpacitena attano puññadhammena.
tika-s0105t:671_13: Tena hi sañcoditā pathaviyaṃ sabbarājāno paccuggantvā “svāgataṃ te mahārājā”tiādīni vatvā attano rajjaṃ rañño cakkavattissa niyyātenti.
tika-s0105t:671_14: Tena vuttaṃ “so imaṃ pathaviṃ sāgarapariyantaṃ adaṇḍena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhāvasatī”ti,
tika-s0105t:671_16: tasmā ubhayathāpi ettha attho yutto evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:671_17: Cakkavattivattapūraṇādipayogasampattimantarena hi pubbe katūpacitakammeneva evamajjhāvasanaṃ na sambhavati,
tika-s0105t:672_0: Evaṃ ekaṃ nipphattiṃ kathetvā dutiyaṃ nipphattiṃ kathetuṃ yadetaṃ “sace kho panā”tiādivacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:672_3: Yasmā rāgādayo satta pāpadhammā loke uppajjanti,
tika-s0105t:672_4: uppajjamānā ca te sattasantānaṃ chādetvā pariyonandhitvā kusalappavattiṃ nivārenti,
tika-s0105t:672_5: tasmā te idha chadasaddena vuttāti dasseti “rāgadosā”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:672_6: Duccaritanti micchādiṭṭhito aññena manoduccaritena saha tīṇi duccaritāni,
tika-s0105t:672_9: Vuttañca “sabbe te imeheva dvāsaṭṭhiyā vatthūhi antojālīkatā,
tika-s0105t:672_12: aviditakaraṇaṭṭhena avijjāti pavattiākārabhedena aññāṇameva dvidhā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:672_13: Tathā hissa dvidhāpi chadanattho kathito “andhatamaṃ tadā hoti,
tika-s0105t:672_18: Mahāpadānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhikilesataṇhāvasena satta pāpadhammā gahitā.
tika-s0105t:672_20: taṇhāyanaṭṭhena taṇhāti pavattiākārabhedena lobho eva dvidhā vutto.
tika-s0105t:673_1: sattahi pāpadhammehi paṭicchannattā kilesavasena andhakāre loketi attho.
tika-s0105t:673_10: Ayañhi vivaṭṭacchadasaddo daḷhadhammapaccakkhadhammasaddādayo viya pulliṅgavasena ākāranto,
tika-s0105t:673_12: Tathā hi mahāpadānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhikilesataṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ chadanaṃ āvaraṇaṃ
tika-s0105t:673_16: tassā līnatthappakāsaniyampi vuttaṃ “vivaṭṭacchadāti okārassa ākāraṃ katvā niddeso”ti.
tika-s0105t:673_17: Saddavidū pana “ādhanvāditoti lakkhaṇena samāsantagatehi dhanusaddādīhi kvaci āpaccayo”ti vatvā “kaṇḍivadhanvā,
tika-s0105t:674_0: Kasmā padattayametaṃ vuttanti anuyogaṃ hetālaṅkāranayena pariharanto “tatthā”tiādimāha,
tika-s0105t:674_2: Pūjāvisesaṃ paṭiggaṇhituṃ arahatīti arahanti atthena pūjārahatā vuttā.
tika-s0105t:674_4: tasmā pūjārahatāti tassā pūjārahatāya hetu vutto.
tika-s0105t:674_6: Kammādivasena tividhaṃ vaṭṭañca rāgādivasena sattavidho chado ca vaṭṭacchadā,
tika-s0105t:674_11: saddo ubhayattha yojetabboti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “vivaṭṭo ca vicchado cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:674_12: Evampi vadanti “vivaṭṭo ca so vicchado cāti vivaṭṭacchado,
tika-s0105t:674_16: pāpakaraṇe ca rahābhāvāti atthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:674_23: pūjāvisesassa ca arahattā”ti pana hetunā phalānumānadassanampi siyā yathā taṃ agginā dhūmassa,
tika-s0105t:674_25: “Sammāsambuddho chadanābhāvenā”ti idaṃ pana hetunā phalānumānadassanaṃ savāsanasabbakilesacchadanābhāvapubbakattā sammāsambuddhabhāvassa.
tika-s0105t:674_29: Kāmañca ācariyamatiyā phalena hetuanumānadassane vivaṭṭatā phalameva hoti,
tika-s0105t:674_31: pana tathāñāṇassa ca hetubhāvato hetuyeva nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:675_0: Evaṃ padattayavacane hetālaṅkāranayena payojanaṃ dassetvā idāni catuvesārajjavasenapi dassento “dutiyenā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:675_1: Tattha dutiyena vesārajjenāti “cattārimāni bhikkhave tathāgatassa vesārajjāni,
tika-s0105t:675_2: yehi vesārajjehi samannāgato tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,
tika-s0105t:675_4: brahmacakkaṃ pavattetī”tiādinā bhagavatā vuttakkamena dutiyabhūtena “khīṇāsavassa te paṭijānato ‘ime āsavā aparikkhīṇā’ti,
tika-s0105t:675_5: tatra vata maṃ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ saha dhammena paṭicodessatīti
tika-s0105t:675_7: etamahaṃ bhikkhave nimittaṃ asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto vesārajjappatto viharāmī”ti paridīpitena vesārajjena.
tika-s0105t:675_9: dutiyavesārajjassa tadatthabhāvato tena vesārajjena tadatthasiddhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:675_10: “Khīṇāsavassa te paṭijānato ‘ime āsavā aparikkhīṇā’ ti”ādinā vuttameva hi dutiyavesārajjaṃ “kilesehi
tika-s0105t:675_12: Tato ca viññāyati “yathā dutiyena vesārajjena purimasiddhi,
tika-s0105t:675_14: Evañca katvā iminā nayena catuvesārajjavasena padattayavacane payojanadassanaṃ upapannaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:675_15: Itarathā hi kiñcipayojanābhāvato idaṃyeva vacanaṃ idha avattabbaṃ siyāti.
tika-s0105t:676_0: Paṭhamenāti vuttanayena paṭhamabhūtena “sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ‘ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā’ti, tatra…pe…
tika-s0105t:676_2: Dutiyasiddhīti dutiyassa “sammāsambuddho”ti padassa atthasiddhi buddhattasiddhi tassa tadatthabhāvato.
tika-s0105t:676_3: Tatiyacatutthehīti vuttanayeneva tatiyacatutthabhūtehi “ye kho pana te antarāyikā dhammā vuttā,
tika-s0105t:676_5: viharāmī”ti ca “yassa kho pana te atthāya dhammo desito,
tika-s0105t:676_6: so na niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyāti, tatra…pe…
tika-s0105t:676_8: Tatiyasiddhīti tatiyassa “vivaṭṭacchadā”ti padassa atthasiddhi vivaṭṭacchadatthasiddhi tehi tassa pākaṭabhāvatoti attho.
tika-s0105t:676_9: “Yāthāvato antarāyikaniyyānikadhammāpadesena hi satthu vivaṭṭacchadabhāvo loke pākaṭo ahosī”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:677_0: Evaṃ padattayavacane catuvesārajjavasena payojanaṃ dassetvā idāni cakkhuttayavasenapi dassento “purimañcā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:677_3: Purimaṃ “araha”nti padaṃ bhagavato heṭṭhimamaggaphalattayañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ sādheti kilesārīnaṃ,
tika-s0105t:677_5: Dutiyaṃ “sammāsambuddho”ti padaṃ āsayānusayaindriyaparopariyattañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ buddhacakkhuṃ sādheti sammāsambuddhasseva taṃsambhavato.
tika-s0105t:677_7: Tatiyaṃ “vivaṭṭacchadā”ti padaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhātaṃ samantacakkhuṃ sādheti savāsanasabbakilesappahānadīpanato.
tika-s0105t:677_8: “Sammāsambuddho”ti hi vatvā “vivaṭṭacchadā”ti vacanaṃ sammāsambuddhabhāvāya savāsanasabbakilesappahānaṃ vibhāvetīti.
tika-s0105t:677_9: “Ahaṃ kho pana tāta ambaṭṭha mantānaṃ dātā”ti idaṃ appadhānaṃ,
tika-s0105t:677_10: “tvaṃ mantānaṃ paṭiggahetā”ti idameva padhānaṃ samuttejanāvacananti sandhāya “tvaṃ mantānaṃ paṭiggahetāti
tika-s0105t:678_3: vacanasampaṭicchanañcettha tathā mayaṃ taṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ vedissāma,
tika-s0105t:678_4: tvaṃ mantānaṃ paṭiggahetāti ca evaṃ pavattassa pokkharasātino vacanassa sampaṭiggaho.
tika-s0105t:678_7: taṃ panesa ācariyassa samuttejanāya lakkhaṇesu vigatasammohabhāvena buddhamante sampassamānattā vadatīti dassento “sopī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:678_8: Tattha “tāyāti tāya yathāvuttāya samuttejanāyā”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:678_9: adhunā pana potthakesu “tāya ācariyakathāyā”ti pāṭho dissati.
tika-s0105t:680_0: Avisesena vuttassapi vacanassa attho aṭṭhakathāpamāṇato visesena gahetabboti āha “ṭhitamajjhanhikasamaye”ti.
tika-s0105t:680_1: Sabbesamāciṇṇavasena paṭhamanayaṃ vatvā padhānikānameva āveṇikāciṇṇavasena dutiyanayo vutto.
tika-s0105t:680_3: divasabhāge samaṇadhammakaraṇatthaṃ te evaṃ caṅkamantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:680_6: pucchitvāva pavisissāmī”ti ambaṭṭhassa tadupasaṅkamanādhippāyaṃ vibhāvento “so kirā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:681_7: Avisesato vuttampi visesato viññāyamānatthaṃ sandhāya bhāsitavacananti dasseti “gandhakuṭiṃ sandhāyā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:682_3: Kathaṃ pavisanto ataramāno pavisati nāmāti āha “saṇika”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t:682_4: Tattha padappamāṇaṭṭhāneti dvinnaṃ padānaṃ antare muṭṭhiratanapamāṇaṭṭhāne.
tika-s0105t:683_0: 261. “Dānaṃ dadamānehī”ti iminā pāramitānubhāvena sayameva dvāravivaraṇaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:684_0: Bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodiṃsūti ettha samatthena saṃ-
tika-s0105t:684_1: saddena viññāyamānaṃ bhagavato tehi saddhiṃ paṭhamaṃ pavattamodatāsaṅkhātaṃ neyyatthaṃ dassento “yathā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:684_3: kacci yāpanīya”ntiādīni pucchanto tehi māṇavehi saddhiṃ pubbabhāsitāya paṭhamaññeva pavattamodo ahosi.
tika-s0105t:684_5: Tadatthaṃ saha upamāya dassetuṃ “sītodakaṃ viyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:685_0: Khamanīyanti “catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ dukkhabahulatāya sabhāvato dussahaṃ kacci khamituṃ sakkuṇeyya”nti pucchanti,
tika-s0105t:685_1: yāpanīyanti āhārādipaccayapaṭibaddhavuttikaṃ cirappabandhasaṅkhātāya yāpanāya kacci yāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ,
tika-s0105t:685_14: Sammodetabbato sammodanīyanti imamatthaṃ dasseti “sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:685_17: tadeva sammodaniyaṃ yathāvuttanayenāti imamatthampi dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:685_21: “Saritabba”nti atthe pana “saraṇīya”nti vattabbe dīghaṃ katvā “sāraṇīya”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:685_22: Evaṃ saddato atthaṃ dassetvā idāni atthamattato dassetuṃ “suyyamānasukhato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:686_1: Ubhosu khandhesu sāṭakaṃ āsajjetvā kaṇṭhe olambanaṃ sandhāya “kaṇṭhe olambitvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:686_2: Dussakaṇṇaṃ gahetvāti nivatthasāṭakassa koṭiṃ ekena hatthena gahetvā.
tika-s0105t:687_1: Kātuṃ dukkaramasakkuṇeyyaṃ kiccamayaṃ ārabhīti dassetuṃ “bhavaggaṃ gahetukāmo viyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:687_5: Handa tena saddhiṃ mantemīti evaṃ aṭṭhāne vāyamantopi ayaṃ bālo “mayi kiñci akathente mayā saddhiṃ uttari
tika-s0105t:687_7: kathente pana kathāpasaṅgenassa jātigotte vibhāvite mānaniggaho bhavissati,
tika-s0105t:687_8: “handa tena saddhiṃ mantemī”ti bhagavā ambaṭṭhaṃ māṇavaṃ etadavocāti attho.
tika-s0105t:687_10: tesaṃ pana ācariyānaṃ pakaṭṭhā ācariyāti pācariyā yathā “papitāmaho”ti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “ācariyehi ca tesaṃ ācariyehi cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:689_2: mānavasena pana yugaggāhaṃ karonto vadatīti dassento “kāmaṃ tīsū”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:689_5: na tu sayane garukaraṇīyānaṃ sayānānampi sammukhā garukārehi sayanassa akattabbabhāvato.
tika-s0105t:689_7: Sayānena hi ācariyena saddhiṃ sayānassa kathā nāma ācāro na hoti,
tika-s0105t:689_8: tathāpetaṃ itarehi sadisaṃ katvā kathanaṃ idha kathāsallāpo.
tika-s0105t:690_0: Yaṃ panetaṃ “sayāno vā hi bho gotama brāhmaṇo sayānena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ sallapitumarahatī”ti vuttassa
tika-s0105t:690_1: sallāpassa anācārabhāvavibhāvanaṃ satthārā ambaṭṭhena saddhiṃ kathentena kataṃ,
tika-s0105t:690_2: taṃ pāḷivasena saṅgītimanāruḷhampi agarahitāya ācariyaparamparāya yāvajjatanā samābhatanti “ye ca kho
tika-s0105t:690_3: te bho gotamā”tiādikāya uparipāḷiyā sambandhabhāvena dassento “tato kirā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:690_9: saddena padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā “muṇḍakā samaṇakā”ti vadatīti dassetuṃ “muṇḍe muṇḍā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:690_11: saddato pana ibhassa payogo ibho uttarapadalopena,
tika-s0105t:690_12: taṃ ibhaṃ arahantīti ibbhā dvittaṃ katvā.
tika-s0105t:690_14: yathā sobhanaṃ gamanato ibhasaṅkhāto hatthivāhanabhūto parassa vasena pavattati,
tika-s0105t:690_16: evametepi brāhmaṇānaṃ sussūsakā suddā parassa vasena pavattanti,
tika-s0105t:690_19: Te pana kuṭumbikatāya gharavāsino gharasāmikā hontīti atthamattaṃ dasseti “gahapatikā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:691_7: Mukhato nikkhantāti brāhmaṇānaṃ pubbapurisā brahmuno mukhato nikkhantā,
tika-s0105t:691_11: “ibbhā kaṇhā”ti vatvā “bandhupādāpaccā”ti vadanto kulavasena samaṇā vessakulapariyāpannā,
tika-s0105t:691_14: idaṃ panassa “mukhato nikkhantā”tiādivacanatopi ativiya asamavekkhitapubbavacanaṃ catuvaṇṇapariyāpannasseva samaṇabhāvasambhavato.
tika-s0105t:692_0: Mānameva nissāya kathesīti mānamevāpassayaṃ katvā attānaṃ ukkaṃsento,
tika-s0105t:692_2: Jānāpessāmīti attano gottapamāṇaṃ yāthāvato vibhāvanena viññāpessāmi.
tika-s0105t:692_5: taṃ pana kattabbakiccamevāti vuttaṃ “āgantvā kattabbakiccasaṅkhāto attho”ti,
tika-s0105t:692_7: Dutiyassapi puggalavācakassa tadassatthipaccayassa vijjamānattā paṭhamena tadārammaṇikacittameva viññāyatīti āha “tassa māṇavassa citta”nti.
tika-s0105t:693_0: “Yāyeva kho panatthāyā”ti liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttanti dasseti “yeneva kho panatthenā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:693_7: Aññesaṃ santikaṃ āgatānanti garuṭṭhāniyānaṃ santikamupagatānaṃ sādhurūpānaṃ.
tika-s0105t:693_10: “avusitavā”ti ca asikkhitabhāvoyeva vohāravasena vutto yathā taṃ cīvaradānaṃ ticīvarena acchādesīti.
tika-s0105t:693_13: “vusitamānī”ti ca padāpekkhāya apariyositavacanattā samānoti pāṭhasesoti dasseti “appassutova samāno”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:693_15: tadabhāvato panāyaṃ ambaṭṭho avusitavā asikkhito appassutoti viññāyatīti evampi atthāpattito kāraṇaṃ vibhāvento āha “kimaññatra avusitattā”ti.
tika-s0105t:693_19: “kimaññatra avusitattā”ti idaṃ kāraṇaṃ etassa ambaṭṭhassa pharusavacanasamudācāre kāraṇanti.
tika-s0105t:693_23: avusitattā avusitabhāvaṃ aññatra ṭhapetvā etassa evaṃ pharusavacanasamudācāre kāraṇaṃ kimaññaṃ atthīti.
tika-s0105t:694_5: Dosaṃ uggiletvāti sinehapānena kilinnaṃ vātapittasemhadosaṃ ubbamanaṃ katvā.
tika-s0105t:694_6: Gottena gottanti ambaṭṭheneva bhagavatā puṭṭhena vuttena sāvajjena purātanagottena adhunā anavajjasaññitaṃ gottaṃ.
tika-s0105t:694_11: kulāpadeso pana tadanvaye uppannābhiññātapurisavasena gahetabbo yathā “ādicco māghavo”ti.
tika-s0105t:694_12: Sākiyānañhi ādiccagottaṃ aditiyā nāma devadhītāya puttabhūtaṃ ādipurisaṃ pati hoti,
tika-s0105t:696_0: Tamhā kulā pabbajitomhi, na kāme abhipatthaya”nti. ;
tika-s0105t:697_0: Māghavakulaṃ pana tadanvaye abhiññātaṃ macalagāmikapurisaṃ pati hotīti.
tika-s0105t:697_1: Gottamūlassa gārayhatāya amānavatthubhāvapavedanato “mānaddhajaṃ mūle chetvā nipātessāmī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:697_4: “Caṇḍā bho gotama sakyajātī”tiādinā sākiyesu caṇḍabhāvādidosaṃ pāpitesu samaṇopi gotamo pāpito bhavissatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:698_11: Samānāti hontā bhavamānāti asasaddavasenatthoti āha “santāti purimapadasseva vevacana”nti.
tika-s0105t:698_12: Na sakkarontīti sakkāraṃ na karontīti atthameva viññāpeti “na brāhmaṇāna”ntiādinā.
tika-s0105t:698_15: saddassa kiriyāparāmasanassa aniyamassa “tayidaṃ bho gotamā”ti purimavākye ta-
tika-s0105t:698_16: saddena niyamanaṃ veditabbanti āha “yaṃ ime sakyā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:700_6: Ekacco pana abhisitto samāno “idaṃ rajjaṃ nāma bahukiccaṃ bahubyāpāra”nti tato nibbijja rajjaṃ vayasā anantarassa niyyāteti,
tika-s0105t:700_7: kadāci sopi aññassāti evaṃ paramparāniyyātanavasena tadā bahū abhisittapubbā sakyarājāno hontīti idaṃ ācariyassābhimataṃ.
tika-s0105t:700_8: Apica yathārahaṃ ṭhānantaresu abhisittasakyarājūnampi bahutaṃ sandhāya evamāhātipi yujjati.
tika-s0105t:701_6: ye vā pana chejjabhejjaṃ karontā anusāsanti,
tika-s0105t:702_5: Jagghasaddo ca mahāhasane pavattati “na ujjagghikāya antaraghare gamissāmī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0105t:703_0: Kaṇhāyanato paṭṭhāya paramparāgataṃ kulavaṃsaṃ anussavavasena jānanti.
tika-s0105t:703_1: Kulābhimānino hi yebhuyyena paresaṃ uccāvacaṃ kulaṃ tathā tathā udāharanti,
tika-s0105t:703_4: tathā hesa parato bhagavatā pucchito vajirapāṇi bhayena attano kulavaṃsaṃ yāthāvato kathesīti.
tika-s0105t:706_0: “Amhe haṃsakoñcamorasame karotī”ti vadanto heṭṭhā gahitaṃ “na taṃ koci haṃso vā koñco vā moro vā āgantvā
tika-s0105t:706_1: kiṃ tvaṃ lapasīti nisedhetī”ti idampi vacanaṃ saṅgītimanāruḷhaṃ tadā bhagavatā vuttamevāti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:706_2: Tadā vadantoyeva hi evaṃ karotīti vattumarahati.
tika-s0105t:706_4: “avusitavāyevā”tiādivacanañca mānavasena samaṇena gotamena vuttanti ambaṭṭho maññatīti adhippāyenāha “nimmāno dāni jātoti maññamāno”ti.
tika-s0105t:708_3: kāraṃ katvā niddeso ummāde madasaddena nipphannattāti dasseti “nimmadetī”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:708_5: Yadi panāhaṃ gottaṃ puccheyyaṃ sādhu vatāti attho.
tika-s0105t:708_7: Kasmā avocāti pana asuddhabhāvaṃ jānantassāpi tathāvacane kāraṇapucchā.
tika-s0105t:708_9: na visuṃ gottanti āha “mātāpettikanti mātāpitūnaṃ santaka”nti.
tika-s0105t:708_12: Na hi brāhmaṇānaṃ sagottāya eva āvāhavivāho icchito,
tika-s0105t:708_20: na guṇanāmaṃ vā visesanaparanipātavasena vuttattā yathā “agyāhito”ti.
tika-s0105t:708_21: Nāmañca tadeva paveṇīvasena pavattattā gottañcāti hi nāmagottaṃ.
tika-s0105t:708_24: Taṃ panetaṃ nāmaṃ kaṇhaisito paṭṭhāya tasmiṃ kulaparamparāvasena āgataṃ,
tika-s0105t:709_6: Ettha ca yasmā ambaṭṭho jātiṃ nissāya mānathaddho,
tika-s0105t:709_7: na ca tassa yāthāvato jātiyā avibhāvitāya mānaniggaho karīyati,
tika-s0105t:709_8: akate ca mānaniggahe mānavasena ratanattayaṃ aparajjhissati,
tika-s0105t:709_9: kate pana mānaniggahe aparabhāge ratanattaye pasīdissati,
tika-s0105t:709_10: na cedisī vācā pharusavācā nāma hoti cittassa saṇhabhāvato.
tika-s0105t:709_12: Keci ca janā kakkhaḷāya vācāya vuttā agginā viya lohādayo mudubhāvaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0105t:709_13: tasmā bhagavā ambaṭṭhaṃ nibbisevanaṃ kattukāmo “ayyaputtā sakyā bhavanti,
tika-s0105t:710_0: “Idhekacco pāpabhikkhu tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā attano dahatī”tiādīsu viya dahasaddo dhāraṇattho,
tika-s0105t:710_1: dhāraṇañcettha pubbapurisavasena saññāpananti āha “okkāko no pubbapuriso”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:710_4: Pabhā niccharatīti pabhassaraṃ hutvā nikkhamati tathārūpena puññakammena dantānaṃ pabhassarabhāvato.
tika-s0105t:711_5: Anussavavacaneneva hi ananussuto uttaravihāravāsiādīnaṃ matibhedo nirākarīyatīti.
tika-s0105t:711_6: Mahāsammatassāti aggaññasutte vakkhamānanayena “ayaṃ no rājā”ti mahājanena sammannitvā ṭhapitattā “mahāsammato”ti evaṃ sammatassa.
tika-s0105t:720_0: Tassa ca puttapaputtaparamparaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vadanti –
tika-s0105t:729_0: Varo nāma mahātejo, tassa putto mahāvaro;
tika-s0105t:735_0: Idaṃ aṭṭhakathānuparodhavacanaṃ. Yaṃ pana dīpavaṃse vuttaṃ –
tika-s0105t:738_0: Tassa putto rojo nāma, vararojo ca khattiyo;
tika-s0105t:741_0: Varo upavaro rājā, cetiyo ca mahissaro”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:745_0: Rojo ca vararojo ca, tathā kalyāṇakā duve;
tika-s0105t:746_0: Uposatho ca mandhātā, varako pavarā duve”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:747_3: tassa ca puttaparamparāya caturāsītisahassarājūnaṃ pacchimako okkākarājā,
tika-s0105t:747_6: tassa ca puttaparamparāya anekarājasahassānaṃ pacchimako okkākarājāti evamādinā anekadhā virodhavacanaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ nirākaroti.
tika-s0105t:747_10: Tesaṃ pacchatoti maghadevaparamparābhūtānaṃ kaḷārajanakapariyosānānaṃ caturāsītikhattiyasahassānaṃ aparabhāgeti yathānussutaṃ ācariyena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:747_11: Dīpavaṃsādīsu pana “kaḷārajanakarañño puttaparamparāya anekakhattiyasahassānaṃ pacchimako rājā sujāto nāma,
tika-s0105t:747_13: Maghadevaparamparāya anekasahassarājūnaṃ aparabhāge paṭhamo okkāko nāma rājā ahosi,
tika-s0105t:747_14: tassa paramparābhūtānaṃ pana anekasahassarājūnaṃ aparabhāge dutiyo okkāko nāma rājā ahosi,
tika-s0105t:747_15: tassapi paramparāya anekasahassarājūnaṃ aparabhāge tatiyo okkāko nāma rājā ahosi.
tika-s0105t:748_0: Jātiyā pañcamadivase nāmakammādimaṅgalaṃ lokāciṇṇanti vuttaṃ “pañcamadivase alaṅkaritvā”ti.
tika-s0105t:748_1: Sahasā varaṃ adāsinti puttadassanena balavasomanassappatto turitaṃ avīmaṃsitvā tuṭṭhidāyavasena varaṃ adāsiṃ “yaṃ icchasi,
tika-s0105t:748_4: Rajjaṃ pariṇāmetuṃ icchatīti mama varadānaṃ antaraṃ katvā imaṃ rajjaṃ pariṇāmetuṃ icchati.
tika-s0105t:749_0: Rajjaṃ kāressantīti rājabhāvaṃ mahājanena mahājanaṃ vā kārāpessanti.
tika-s0105t:750_7: taṃ vā jalati jotati pākaṭaṃ bhavati etāyāti bhummajālā.
tika-s0105t:751_1: Tumhākaṃ purisesu pariyāpannaṃ ekekampi purisaṃ paccatthikabhūtaṃ aññaṃ purisasatampi purisasahassampi abhibhavituṃ na sakkhissatīti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:753_1: anantarāyikāya puttadhītuvaḍḍhanāya vaḍḍhamānesu eva udapādīti attho.
tika-s0105t:753_3: Kuṭṭharogo nāma sāsamasūrīrogā viya yebhuyyena saṅkamanasabhāvoti vuttaṃ “ayaṃ rogo saṅkamatī”ti.
tika-s0105t:753_4: Upari padarena paṭicchādetvā paṃsuṃ rāsikaraṇena datvā.
tika-s0105t:756_12: Yadettha bhagavatā vuttaṃ “atha kho ambaṭṭha rājā okkāko udānaṃ udānesi ‘sakyā vata bho kumārā,
tika-s0105t:756_14: tadagge kho pana ambaṭṭha sakyā paññāyantī”ti,
tika-s0105t:756_16: atthato ca sābhāvikanibbacananidassanaṃ “sakāhi bhaginīhipi saddhiṃ saṃvāsavasena jātisambhedamakatvā
tika-s0105t:756_17: kulavaṃsaṃ anurakkhituṃ sakkuṇanti samatthentīti sakyā”ti teyeva saddaracanāvisesena sākiyā.
tika-s0105t:759_0: Tadetaṃ saddamattaṃ pati asābhāvikanibbacananidassanaṃ “kapilamunino vasanaṭṭhāne sākavane vasantīti sakyā,
tika-s0105t:760_2: uttaroṭṭhassa ubhosu passesu dāṭhākārena jātā dāṭhikā.
tika-s0105t:760_4: taddhitavasena pana yathā etarahi yakkhe “pisāco”ti samaññā,
tika-s0105t:760_7: Tathāhi vuttaṃ “yathā kho pana ambaṭṭha etarahi manussā pisāce disvā ‘pisācā’ti sañjānanti,
tika-s0105t:760_8: evameva kho ambaṭṭha tena kho pana samayena manussā pisāce ‘kaṇhā’ti sañjānantī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:760_9: Tattha pisāco jātoti idāni pākaṭanāmena suviññāpanatthaṃ purimapadasseva vevacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:760_10: “Na sakabaḷena mukhena byāharissāmī”tiādīsu viya upasaggavasena saddakaraṇattho harasaddo,
tika-s0105t:760_11: puna dutiyopasaggena yutto uccāsaddakaraṇe vattatīti vuttaṃ “uccāsaddamakāsī”ti.
tika-s0105t:761_2: ambaṭṭhena ca attano attano upari pāpetabbopavādassa apanayanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:761_6: Atthaviññāpane sādhanatāya vācā eva karaṇaṃ vākkaraṇaṃ niruttinayena,
tika-s0105t:761_8: Asmiṃ vacaneti ettha tasaddena kāmaṃ “cattārome bho gotama vaṇṇā”tiādinā ambaṭṭhena heṭṭhā vutto jātivādo parāmasitabbo hoti,
tika-s0105t:761_9: tathāpesa jātivādo vede vuttavidhināyeva tena paṭimantetabbo,
tika-s0105t:761_10: tasmā paṭimantanahetubhāvena pasiddhaṃ vedattayavacanameva parāmasitabbanti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ “attanā uggahite vedattayavacane”ti.
tika-s0105t:761_11: Idāni “porāṇaṃ kho pana te ambaṭṭha mātāpettika”ntiādinā bhagavatā vuttavacanassapi parāmasanaṃ dassento “etasmiṃ vā dāsiputtavacane”ti āha.
tika-s0105t:761_12: Apica paṭimantetunti ettha paṭimantanā nāma pañhāvissajjanā,
tika-s0105t:762_6: aṭṭassa ca dukkaraṇato ambaṭṭho sayameva mocetūti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:762_7: Attanāva sakyesu ibbhavādanipātanena attano upari pāpuṇanaṃ sandhāya “attanā baddhaṃ puṭaka”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:764_0: Tatoti dvikkhattuṃ codanāto paraṃ, tatiyacodanāya anāgatāya eva pakkamissāmīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:766_0: Aṭṭhamasattāhe ajapālanigrodhamūle nisinnassa sabbabuddhassa āciṇṇasamāciṇṇaṃ appossukkataṃ sandhāya “ahañcevā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:766_4: Tāsetvā pañhaṃ vissajjāpessāmīti āgato yathā taṃ mūlapaṇṇāsake āgatassa saccakaparibbājakassa samāgame.
tika-s0105t:767_0: “Bhagavā ceva passati ambaṭṭho cā”ti ettha itaresamadassane duvidhampi kāraṇaṃ dassento “yadi hī”tiādimāha. Hi-
tika-s0105t:768_1: Tāṇaṃ gavesamānoti “ayameva samaṇo gotamo ito bhayato mama tāyako”ti bhagavantaṃyeva “tāṇa”nti pariyesanto,
tika-s0105t:768_7: Nilīyatīti yathūpaṭṭhiteneva bhayena upadduto nilīno hoti,
tika-s0105t:768_10: tañca viddhaṃsanameva adhippetanti vuttaṃ “bhayaṃ hiṃsati viddhaṃsetī”ti,
tika-s0105t:770_1: Gaṅgāya dakkhiṇatoti gaṅgāya nāma nadiyā dakkhiṇadisābhāge.
tika-s0105t:770_3: Saraṃ vā sattiādayo vā parassa upari khipitukāmassa mantānubhāvena hatthaṃ na parivattati,
tika-s0105t:770_4: hatthe pana aparivattante kuto āvudhaṃ parivattissatīti tathā aparivattanaṃ sandhāya “āvudhaṃ na parivattatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:770_7: Dhanunā khittasarena agamanīyaṃ sasambhārakathānayena “dhanu agamanīya”nti vuttaṃ yathā “dhanunā vijjhati,
tika-s0105t:770_9: Ambaṭṭhaṃ nāma vijjanti sattānaṃ sarīre abbhaṅgaṃ ṭhapetīti ambaṭṭhā niruttinayena,
tika-s0105t:770_11: Yato ambaṭṭhā vijjā etasmiṃ atthīti katvā kaṇho isi “ambaṭṭho”ti paññāyittha,
tika-s0105t:770_13: So kira “kathaṃ nāmāhaṃ disāya dāsiyā kucchimhi nibbatto”ti taṃ hīnaṃ jātiṃ jigucchanto “handāhaṃ yathā tathā imaṃ jātiṃ sodhessāmī”ti niggato.
tika-s0105t:770_16: vijjābalena rājānaṃ tāsetvā tassa dhītaraṃ laddhakālato paṭṭhāya myāyaṃ dāsajāti sodhitā bhavissatīti.
tika-s0105t:771_1: Ko nu kiṃ kāraṇā dāsiputto samāno maddarūpiṃ dhītaraṃ yācatīti attho.
tika-s0105t:771_4: khuramassa agge appīyati ṭhapīyatīti vā khurappo, saro.
tika-s0105t:771_7: kiṃ bhavissatī”ti rājā bhīto ussaṅkī utrasto ahosi.
tika-s0105t:772_0: Sarabhaṅgajātake āgatānaṃ daṇḍakīrājādīnaṃ pacchā okkākarājā ahosi,
tika-s0105t:772_1: tesaṃ pavatti ca sabbattha cirakālaṃ pākaṭāti āha “daṇḍakīrañño”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:772_6: “Ayampi īdiso mahānubhāvo”ti maññamānā evaṃ cintayantā bhayena avocunti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:774_0: Bhītatasitā bhayavasena chambhitasarīrā uddhaggalomā honti haṭṭhalomā,
tika-s0105t:774_1: abhītatasitā pana bhayupaddavābhāvato acchambhitasarīrā patitalomā honti ahaṭṭhalomā,
tika-s0105t:774_3: tāya pana patitalomatāya tassa sotthibhāvo pākaṭo hotīti phalena kāraṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “pallomo’ti vuttanti dasseti “pannalomo”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:774_4: Niruttinayena padasiddhi yathā taṃ bhayabheravasutte “bhiyyo pallomamāpādiṃ araññe vihārāyā”ti.
tika-s0105t:774_7: kumāro sotthi pallomo bhavissatī”ti paṭiññākaraṇaṃ pakaraṇatoyeva pākaṭaṃ.
tika-s0105t:774_10: Evarūpānañhi bhayupaddavakarānaṃ mantānaṃ ekaṃseneva paṭippassambhakamantāhonti yathā taṃ kusumārakavijjādīnaṃ.
tika-s0105t:774_12: Attano dhītuyā apavādamocanatthaṃ taṃ adāsaṃ bhujissaṃ karoti.
tika-s0105t:774_13: Tassā anurūpe issariye ṭhapanatthaṃ uḷāre ca naṃ ṭhāne ṭhapesi.
tika-s0105t:776_2: brāhmaṇānaṃ samīpe brāhmaṇehi laddhabbāni āsanādīni labhethāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:776_4: Kevalaṃ vedasatthānurūpaṃ paralokagate saddhāya eva kātabbaṃ,
tika-s0105t:776_5: na tadaññaṃ kiñci abhipatthentenāti saddhanti nibbacanaṃ dassetuṃ “matake uddissa katabhatte”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:777_1: Itthiyā vā itthiṃ karitvāti ettha karaṇaṃ nāma kiriyāsāmaññavisayaṃ karabhūdhātūnaṃ atthavasena sabbadhātvantogadhattāti āha “pariyesitvā”ti.
tika-s0105t:777_2: Khattiyakumārassa bhariyābhūtaṃ brāhmaṇakaññaṃ itthiṃ pariyesitvā gahetvā brāhmaṇānaṃ itthiyā vā khattiyāva seṭṭhā,
tika-s0105t:777_4: “Purisena vā purisaṃ karitvāti etthāpi eseva nayo”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:777_5: Tatthāpi hi khattiyakaññāya patibhūtaṃ brāhmaṇakumāraṃ purisaṃ pariyesitvā gahetvā brāhmaṇānaṃ purisena vā khattiyāva seṭṭhā,
tika-s0105t:777_7: Kismiñcideva pakaraṇeti ettha pakaraṇaṃ nāma kāraṇaṃ “etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe”tiādīsu viya,
tika-s0105t:777_8: tasmā rāgādivasena pakkhalite ṭhāne hetubhūteti attho,
tika-s0105t:777_12: Bhasīyati niratthakabhāvena khipīyatīti hi bhassaṃ, chārikā.
tika-s0105t:778_6: Tadetaṃ pajāvacanaṃ viya jātisaddavasena bahumhi ekavacananti āha “pajāyāti attho”ti.
tika-s0105t:781_1: Imasmiṃ pana siloke āhariyamāne brahmagarukā saddheyyataṃ āpajjissanti,
tika-s0105t:781_2: ambaṭṭho ca “vijjācaraṇasampanno”ti padaṃ sutvā vijjācaraṇaṃ pucchissati,
tika-s0105t:781_3: evamayaṃ vijjācaraṇaparidīpanī desanā mahājanassa sātthikā bhavissatīti passitvā lokanātho imaṃ silokaṃ
tika-s0105t:781_4: sanaṅkumārabhāsitaṃ āharīti imamatthampi vibhāvento “imāya pana gāthāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:781_5: Itarathā hi bhagavāpi asabbaññū parāvassayo bhaveyya,
tika-s0105t:781_6: na ca yujjati bhagavato parāvassayatā sammāsambuddhabhāvato.
tika-s0105t:781_16: Na hi pāḷiyaṃ brāhmaṇasamayasiddhaṃ vijjācaraṇaṃ paṭikkhipati,
tika-s0105t:781_17: tadeva ambaṭṭhena cintitaṃ vijjācaraṇaṃ ghaṭetvā aviruddhaṃ katvā anuttaraṃ vijjācaraṇaṃ desetīti.
tika-s0105t:782_9: Tatthāpi hi gottavādoti gottaṃ ārabbha vādo,
tika-s0105t:782_19: ye hi brāhmaṇasseva ajjhenajjhāpanayajanayājanādayoti evaṃ attukkaṃsanaparavambhanavasena pavattā,
tika-s0105t:782_22: Ye hi vinibaddhattayavasena “arahasi vā maṃ tvaṃ,
tika-s0105t:782_23: na vā maṃ tvaṃ arahasī”ti evaṃ pavattanakā,
tika-s0105t:782_24: te āvāhavivāhavinibaddhā ca hontīti imamatthasesaṃ sandhāya “esa nayo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:782_26: na vā maṃ tvaṃ arahasī”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:782_29: Tathā hi ācariyena vuttaṃ “ye pana āvāhavivāhavinibaddhā,
tika-s0105t:782_30: te eva sambandhattayavasena ‘arahasi vā maṃ tvaṃ,
tika-s0105t:782_31: na vā maṃ tvaṃ arahasī’ti evaṃ pavattanakā”ti.
tika-s0105t:783_1: kasmā taṃ puna pucchatīti codanaṃ sodhento “tato ambaṭṭho”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:783_7: Paramatthato avijjācaraṇāniyeva “vijjācaraṇānī”ti gahetvā ṭhito hi paramatthato vijjācaraṇesu vibhajiyamānesu so tato dūrato apanīto nāma hoti.
tika-s0105t:783_11: Padhānakiriyāpekkhā hi kārakāti vuttaṃ “ayaṃ no vijjācaraṇasampadā ñātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-s0105t:784_2: ambaṭṭhassa pana asamapathagamanaṃ nivārento sīlavaseneva niyyātetīti imamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “caraṇapariyāpannampī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:784_5: Kiñci kiñci sīlanti brāhmaṇānaṃ jātisiddhaṃ ahiṃsanādiyamaniyamalakkhaṇaṃ appamattakaṃ sīlaṃ.
tika-s0105t:784_7: attani vijjamānaṃ sīlamattampi nissāya laggeyyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:784_8: “Tattha tattheva laggeyyāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃyeva brāhmaṇasamayasiddhe sīlamatte ‘caraṇa’nti laggeyyā”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:784_12: tattha tattheva laggeyyāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃyeva attani vijjamānasīlamattapaṭisaṃyuttaṭṭhāne “mayampi caraṇasampannā”ti laggeyya,
tika-s0105t:784_14: Tathāpasaṅgābhāvato pana upari caraṇavaseneva niyyātetīti dassento “yaṃ panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:784_15: Rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaniddeseneva arūpāvacarajjhānānampi niddiṭṭhabhāvāpattito “aṭṭhapi samāpattiyo ‘caraṇa’nti niyyātitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:784_19: Vipassanāñāṇato panāti “so evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte
tika-s0105t:784_20: kammanīye ṭhite āneñjappatte ñāṇadassanāya cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmetī”tiādinā nayena vipassanāñāṇato paṭṭhāya.
tika-s0105t:786_4: so ca anekabhedoti vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “araṇī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:786_8: Sujāsaddo hi homakammani habyannādīnamuddharaṇatthaṃ katadabbiyaṃ vattati yathā taṃ kūṭadantasutte “paṭhamo vā dutiyo vā sujaṃ paggaṇhantāna”nti.
tika-s0105t:786_9: Tathā hi imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne ācariyena vuttaṃ “sujāti dabbī”ti.
tika-s0105t:786_11: Keci pana imamatthamavicāretvā tunnatthameva gahetvā “sūcī”ti paṭhanti,
tika-s0105t:786_18: kacati bhāraṃ bandhati etthāti vā kāco.
tika-s0105t:786_21: kārena padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā “khārivividha”nti paṭhantānaṃ vāde samuccayasamāsena atthaṃ dassento “ye panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:787_0: Nanu upasampannassa bhikkhuno sāsanikopi yo koci anupasampanno atthato paricārakova hoti api khīṇāsavasāmaṇero,
tika-s0105t:787_1: kimaṅgaṃ pana bāhirakapabbajiteti anuyogaṃ pati tattha visesaṃ dassetuṃ “kāmañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:787_4: Anekasatasahassasaṃvaravinayasamādānavasena upasampannabhāvassa visiṭṭhabhāvato khīṇāsavasāmaṇeropi puthujjanabhikkhuno paricārakoti vutto.
tika-s0105t:792_0: Evaṃ vuttappabhedānaṃ anekasatasahassānaṃ saṃvaravinayānaṃ samādāya sikkhanena uparibhūtā aggabhūtā sampadāti hi upasampadā,
tika-s0105t:793_3: yato nesaṃ pabbajitumāgatānaṃ vināva titthiyaparivāsena khandhake pabbajjā anuññātā.
tika-s0105t:793_9: kāmaṃ khīṇāsavopi sāmaṇero puthujjanassa bhikkhuno atthato paricārakova hoti,
tika-s0105t:793_12: Tāpaso tu guṇavasena ceva veyyāvaccakaraṇavasena ca lāmakabhāveneva paricārako,
tika-s0105t:793_14: evamimesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ sandhāya tāpasasseva paricārakatā vuttāti.
tika-s0105t:796_2: Yaṃ bhattapuṭaṃ vā yāni taṇḍulādīni vāti sambandho.
tika-s0105t:796_7: Yathāvuttamatthaṃ pāḷiyaṃ nidassanamattena vuttanti āha “idaṃ panassa paṭipattimukha”nti,
tika-s0105t:796_8: idaṃ pana pāḷivacanaṃ assa catutthassa puggalassa kohaññapaṭipattiyā mukhamattanti attho.
tika-s0105t:796_10: So hi nānāvidhena kohaññena lokaṃ vimhāpayanto tattha acchati.
tika-s0105t:797_0: “Sabbāpi tāpasapabbajjā niddiṭṭhā”ti dhammādhiṭṭhānanayena dassitameva puggalādhiṭṭhānanayena vivarituṃ “aṭṭhavidhā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:797_1: Khalādīsu manussānaṃ santike upatiṭṭhitvā vīhimuggamāsatilādīni bhikkhācariyaniyāmena saṅkaḍḍhitvā uñchanaṃ uñchā,
tika-s0105t:797_2: sā eva cariyā vutti etesanti uñchācariyā.
tika-s0105t:797_6: Uñchācariyā hi khalādīni gantvā upatiṭṭhitvā manussehi diyyamānaṃ khalaggaṃ nāma dhaññaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti,
tika-s0105t:797_7: anaggipakkikā pana tādisamapaṭiggaṇhitvā taṇḍulameva paṭiggaṇhantīti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-s0105t:797_10: Ayo viya kaṭṭhino muṭṭhippamāṇo pāsāṇo ayamuṭṭhi nāma,
tika-s0105t:797_14: Pavattaṃ rukkhādito pātāpitaṃ phalaṃ bhuñjanti sīlenāti pavattaphalabhojino.
tika-s0105t:797_16: jiṇṇatāya paṇḍubhūtaṃ palāsañceva jiṇṇapakkabhāvena taṃsadisaṃ pupphaphalādi cāti.
tika-s0105t:797_17: Tena vakkhati “sayaṃ patitāneva pupphaphalapaṇḍupalāsādīni khādantā yāpentī”ti,
tika-s0105t:797_20: Idāni te aṭṭhavidhepi sarūpato dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:799_2: bhikkhūnaṃ ayanti vā bhikkhāti hi bhikkhāsaddo taṇḍulādīsupi niruḷho.
tika-s0105t:800_0: Bhikkhāpariyeṭṭhi nāma dukkhāti paresaṃ gehato gehaṃ gantvā bhikkhāya pariyesanā nāma dīnavuttibhāvena dukkhā.
tika-s0105t:801_0: Ye pana “pāsāṇassa pariggaho nāma dukkho pabbajitassā”ti danteheva uppāṭetvā khādanti,
tika-s0105t:804_0: Kathamettāvatā sabbāpi tāpasapabbajjā niddiṭṭhāti codanā na tāva visodhitāti āha “imā panā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:804_6: Iminā hi “catudvāraṃ agāraṃ karitvā acchatī”tiādinā idha vuttāya catutthāya tāpasapabbajjāya tesamavarodhataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:804_9: Evaṃ pana tesamavarodhataṃ vadanto tadanurūpaṃ imesampi paccekaṃ duvidhataṃ dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:805_1: Ācariyena pokkharasātinā saha pavattatīti sācariyako, tassa.
tika-s0105t:805_5: Tena vuttaṃ “api nu tvaṃ imāya anuttarāya vijjācaraṇasampadāya sandissasi sācariyako”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:805_7: “no hidaṃ bho gotamā”ti sandissanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā asandissanākārameva vibhāvetuṃ “ko cāha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:805_8: Sācariyako ahaṃ ko ca kīdiso hutvā anuttarāya vijjācaraṇasampadāya sandissāmi,
tika-s0105t:805_9: anuttarā vijjācaraṇasampadā kā ca kīdisā hutvā sācariyake mayi sandissati,
tika-s0105t:806_2: Tabbhāvaṃ na paripūreti paripūretuṃ na sakkotīti aparipūramāno,
tika-s0105t:806_4: Attanā āpāyikena hontenāpi tabbhāvaṃ aparipūramānena pokkharasātinā esā vācā bhāsitāti atthato sambandhattā
tika-s0105t:806_6: Apica attanā aparipūramānena āpāyikenāpi sayaṃ aparipūramānāpāyikena hutvāpi pokkharasātinā esā vācā
tika-s0105t:806_7: bhāsitāti atthayuttito itthambhūtalakkhaṇe cetaṃ paccattavacanantipi evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:806_10: Keci pana “karaṇatthameva dassetuṃ evaṃ vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-s0105t:808_3: Adātukāmampi dātukāmaṃ katvā sammukhā paramāvaṭṭeti sammūḷhaṃ karoti etāyāti sammukhāvaṭṭanī.
tika-s0105t:808_6: Kāraṇānurūpaṃ rājūnaṃ puṇṇapattanti āha “kasmā me dinno”ti.
tika-s0105t:809_0: Yadi duvidhenapi kāraṇena rājā brāhmaṇassa sammukhābhāvaṃ na deti,
tika-s0105t:809_1: atha kasmā tadupasaṅkamanaṃ na paṭikkhittanti āha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:809_6: Antasaddena pana tabbhāvena pade vaḍḍhiyamāne dussantaṃ yathā “vananto”ti.
tika-s0105t:809_10: tasmā matakabhattasaṅkhepena vā niccabhattasaṅkhepena vā abhiharitvā dinnaṃ bhikkhanti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:809_13: Kasmā pana bhagavā brāhmaṇassa evarūpaṃ amanāpaṃ mammavacanaṃ avocāti codanaṃ kāraṇaṃ dassetvā sodhetuṃ “idaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:810_1: Rājāsanaṃ nāma hatthikkhandhapadesaṃ sandhāya “hatthigīvāya vā nisinno”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:810_12: Tena vuttaṃ “atha āgaccheyya suddo vā suddadāso vā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:810_14: Tassatthassa sādhanasamatthaṃ vacanaṃ raññā bhaṇitaṃ yathā,
tika-s0105t:810_15: tathā sopi tassatthassa sādhanasamatthameva bhaṇitaṃ vacanaṃ apinu bhaṇatīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:811_2: Yasmā pana te tathābhūtā mantānaṃ pavattakā nāma,
tika-s0105t:811_7: Idaṃ ācariyassa ca ācariyasāriputtattherassa ca mataṃ.
tika-s0105t:811_10: “Sudde bahi katvā raho bhāsitabbaṭṭhena mantā eva taṃ taṃ atthapaṭipattihetutāya pada”nti hi tulyādhikaraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:811_11: anupanītāsādhāraṇatāya rahassabhāvena vattabbāya mantanakiriyāya padamadhigamupāyantipi mantapadanti aṭṭhakathāmuttako nayo.
tika-s0105t:811_21: Aññesaṃ vācitaṃ anuvācentīti aññesaṃ kammabhūtānaṃ tehi vācāpitaṃ mantapadaṃ etarahi brāhmaṇā aññesaṃ anuvācāpenti.
tika-s0105t:812_2: paccakkhato dassanaṭṭhena dibbacakkhusadisañca pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ sandhāya “dibbena cakkhunā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:812_3: Ato dibbacakkhuparibhaṇḍena yathākammūpagañāṇena sattānaṃ kammassakatādīni ceva dibbacakkhusadisena pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena
tika-s0105t:812_4: atītakappe brāhmaṇānaṃ mantajjhenavidhiñca oloketvāti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0105t:812_5: Rūpameva hi paccuppannaṃ dibbacakkhussa ārammaṇanti tamidha aṭṭhānagataṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:812_6: Pāvacanena saha saṃsanditvāti yaṃ kassapasammāsambuddhena vuttaṃ vaṭṭasannissitaṃ vacanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:812_8: Na hi tesaṃ vivaṭṭasannissito attho paccakkhato hoti.
tika-s0105t:812_10: Aparā pareti aṭṭhakādīhi aparā aññepi pare pacchimā okkākarājakālādīsu uppannā.
tika-s0105t:812_11: Pāṇātipātādīni pakkhipitvāti aṭṭhakādīhi ganthitamantapadesveva pāṇātipātādikilesasannissitapadānaṃ tattha tattha pakkhipanaṃ katvā.
tika-s0105t:812_12: Viruddhe akaṃsūti suttanipāte brāhmaṇadhammikasuttādīsu āgatanayena saṃkilesikatthadīpanato paccanīkabhūte akaṃsu.
tika-s0105t:812_14: “Isi vā isitthāya paṭipanno vā”ti hi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:812_15: Kasmā panettha paṭiññāgahaṇavasena desanāsotapatitaṃ na karotīti āha “idha bhagavā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:812_18: Paṭiññaṃ aggahetvāti yathā heṭṭhā paṭiññā gahitā,
tika-s0105t:812_20: tāvatā tvaṃ bhavissasi isi vā isitthāya vā paṭipanno sācariyakoti,
tika-s0105t:812_21: no hidaṃ bho gotamā”ti evaṃ idha paṭiññaṃ aggahetvā.
tika-s0105t:813_6: Ettha pana “nirāmagandhā”ti etena tesaṃ dasannaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ vikkhambhitakilesataṃ dasseti,
tika-s0105t:813_10: “araññāyatane pabbatapādesu vasiṃsū”ti etena manussūpacāraṃ pahāya vivittavāsaṃ,
tika-s0105t:813_14: Evañca dassento micchāpaṭipadāpakkhikaṃ sācariyakassa ambaṭṭhassa vuttiṃ upādāya sammāpaṭipadāpakkhikāpi
tika-s0105t:813_15: tesaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ vutti ariyavinaye sammāpaṭipattiṃ upādāya micchāpaṭipadāyeva.
tika-s0105t:813_17: “Evaṃ su te”tiādinā bhagavā ambaṭṭhaṃ santajjento niggaṇhātītipi vibhāveti.
tika-s0105t:814_6: “Na bhikkhave massu kappāpetabba”ntiādīsu viya hi kapusaddo chedane vattati.
tika-s0105t:814_11: Keci pana “vāḷayuttattā”ti pāṭhaṃ kappetvā vāḷarūpayuttattāti atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-s0105t:814_15: Pākārassa adhobhāge katasudhākammaṃ ṭhānaṃ nagarassa samīpe kattabbato,
tika-s0105t:814_22: Pāḷiyaṃ so maṃ pañhenāti so jano maṃ pucchāvasena sodheyya.
tika-s0105t:814_23: Ahaṃ veyyākaraṇena sodhessāmīti ahampimaṃ vissajjanāvasena sodhessāmīti yathārahamadhikāravasena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:816_3: Saṅkucite iriyāpathe anavasesato lakkhaṇānaṃ dubbibhāvanato “na sakkotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:817_4: Anupasaggampi hi padaṃ katthaci saupasaggamiva atthavisesavācakaṃ yathā “gotrabhū”ti.
tika-s0105t:817_10: Evaṃ “kaṅkhatī”ti padassa āsisanatthataṃ dassetvā idāni saṃsayatthataṃ dassento “kaṅkhāya vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:818_0: Vatthikosenāti nābhiyā adhobhāgasaṅkhāte vatthimhi jātena liṅgapasibbakena.
tika-s0105t:818_3: Yasmā bhagavato kosohitaṃ vatthaguyhaṃ sabbabuddhāveṇikaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ suvisuddhakañcanamaṇḍalasannibhaṃ,
tika-s0105t:818_9: saṇṭhitasaṇṭhānasampattiyā ca kopīnampi samānaṃ akopīnameva jātaṃ.
tika-s0105t:818_14: Tanumudusukumārādīsu panassa guṇesu vicāraṇā eva nāhosi.
tika-s0105t:819_5: ato cettha saha iddhābhisaṅkhāranayena vatthaguyhadassanakāraṇaṃ milindapañhāpāṭhena vibhāvitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:819_12: Kimettha aññena vattabbaṃ catupaṭisambhidāpattena chaḷabhiññena vādīvarena bhadantanāgasenattherena vuttanayeneva sampaṭicchitabbattā.
tika-s0105t:820_5: tañca buddhasantānato vinimuttattā rūpakamattaṃ bhagavatā sadisavaṇṇasaṇṭhānāvayavaṃ iddhimayaṃ bimbakameva hoti,
tika-s0105t:820_9: “Taṃ pana dassento bhagavā yathā attano buddharūpaṃ na dissati,
tika-s0105t:820_11: Tadetaṃ bhadantanāgasenattherena vuttena iddhābhisaṅkhatachāyārūpakamattadassanavacanena saṃsandati ceva sameti ca yathā taṃ “khīrena khīraṃ,
tika-s0105t:820_13: Tathāvacaneneva hi sesabuddharūpassa taṅkhaṇe adassitabhāvo atthato āpanno hoti.
tika-s0105t:820_14: Nivāsananivatthatādivacanena panettha buddhasantānato vinimuttassapi chāyārūpakassa nivāsanādiabahigatabhāvo dassito,
tika-s0105t:820_15: na ca codetabbaṃ “kathaṃ nivāsanādiantaragataṃ chāyārūpakaṃ bhagavā dasseti,
tika-s0105t:820_20: Bujjhanake sati jīvitanimittampi hadayamaṃsaṃ dasseyyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:820_23: Kallosīti vissajjane tvaṃ kusalo cheko asi,
tika-s0105t:820_24: yathāvutto vā vissajjanāmaggo upapanno yutto asīti attho.
tika-s0105t:820_27: Milindapañhe hi sabbattha vissajjanāvasāne “kallo” icceva diṭṭhoti.
tika-s0105t:821_7: tanubhāvo ca dassito amuduno ghanasukhumabhāvāpādanatthamasakkuṇeyyattāti ācariyena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:821_10: tasmā tathākaraṇena mudubhāvo dassito aggi viya dhūmena.
tika-s0105t:821_13: Yasmā pana mudu eva ghanasukhumabhāvāpajjanena tanu hoti,
tika-s0105t:824_9: nāmagottavasena pana aniyamaṃ katvā garahanto puthuvacanena vadatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:824_10: “Yadeva kho tva”nti etassa aniyamavacanassa “evarūpenā”ti idaṃ niyamavacananti dasseti “yādiso”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:824_13: Ettha pana “atthacarakenā”ti iminā byatirekamukhena anatthacarakataṃyeva vibhāvetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:824_14: “Upaneyya upaneyyā”ti idaṃ tvādyantaṃ vicchāvacananti āha “brāhmaṇo kho panā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:824_15: Evaṃ upanetvā upanetvāti taṃ taṃ dosaṃ upanīya upanīya.
tika-s0105t:824_19: tampi assa tathāgamanasaṅkhātaṃ ṭhānaṃ acchinditvāti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:826_1: Kittako pana soti vuttaṃ “sammodanīyakathāyapi kālo natthī”ti.
tika-s0105t:826_7: taṃ pana sādiyanaṃ idha manasāva sampaṭiggaho,
tika-s0105t:827_12: Onītā pattato pāṇi etassāti onītapattapāṇīti bhinnādhikaraṇavisayo tipado bāhiratthasamāso.
tika-s0105t:827_15: kārena ca oṇittasaddo vinābhūteti dasseti “oṇittapattapāṇintipi pāṭho”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:827_17: Oṇittaṃ āmisāpanayanena sucikataṃ pattaṃ pāṇi ca assāti hi oṇittapattapāṇi.
tika-s0105t:827_20: āmisāpanayanena vā sucikataṃ pattaṃ pāṇito assāti oṇittapattapāṇī”ti sāratthadīpaniyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:827_21: Tattha pacchimavacanaṃ “hatthe ca pattañca dhovitvā”ti iminā asaṃsandanato vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:828_7: sīle patiṭṭhānassa upāyabhāvato ca ādito kathetabbā.
tika-s0105t:828_8: Pariccāgasīlo hi puggalo pariggahavatthūsu vinissaṭabhāvato sukheneva sīlāni samādiyati,
tika-s0105t:828_12: bhogasampattihetuṃ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato ca dānakathānantaraṃ sīlakathā kathetabbā.
tika-s0105t:828_14: ayaṃ bhavasampatti tassa phalanti dassanatthaṃ sīlakathānantaraṃ saggakathā.
tika-s0105t:828_15: Tāya hi evaṃ dassitaṃ hoti “imehi dānasīlamayehi,
tika-s0105t:828_16: paṇītapaṇītatarādibhedabhinnehi ca puññakiriyavatthūhi etā cātumahārājikādīsu paṇītapaṇītatarādibhedabhinnā aparimeyyā dibbasampattiyo laddhabbā”ti.
tika-s0105t:828_18: sabbathā pana tehi anupakkiliṭṭho ariyamaggoti dassanatthaṃ saggakathānantaraṃ maggakathā.
tika-s0105t:828_19: Maggañca kathentena tadadhigamupāyadassanatthaṃ kāmānaṃ ādīnavo, okāro,
tika-s0105t:828_22: Saggapariyāpannāpi hi sabbe kāmā nāma bahvādīnavā aniccā addhuvā vipariṇāmadhammā,
tika-s0105t:828_24: sabbepi kāmā hīnā gammā pothujjanikā anariyā anatthasaṃhitāti lāmakabhāvo okāro,
tika-s0105t:828_26: sabbasaṃkilesavippayuttaṃ nibbānanti nekkhamme ānisaṃso ca kathetabboti.
tika-s0105t:828_29: saddena ādyatthena kāmādīnavādīnampi saṅgahoti ayamatthavaṇṇanā katā.
tika-s0105t:828_31: dānakathaṃ sīlakathaṃ saggakathaṃ kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsetī”ti.
tika-s0105t:829_4: ekeneva loke paṭhamaṃ anuttarāya sammāsambodhiyā abhisambuddhattā ca aññesamasādhāraṇāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:829_6: na brahmāyusutte viya heṭṭhimā tayo maggā,
tika-s0105t:831_1: Pāḷiyaṃ “diṭṭhadhammo”tiādīsu dassanaṃ nāma ñāṇato aññampi cakkhādidassanaṃ atthīti tannivattanatthaṃ “pattadhammo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:831_2: Patti ca ñāṇapattito aññāpi kāyagamanādipatti vijjatīti tato visesadassanatthaṃ “viditadhammo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:831_3: Sā panesā viditadhammatā ekadesatopi hotīti nippadesato viditadhammataṃ dassetuṃ “pariyogāḷhadhammo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:831_5: Maggañāṇañhi ekābhisamayavasena pariññādicatukiccaṃ sādhentaṃ nippadesena catusaccadhammaṃ samantato ogāḷhaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-s0105t:831_7: “Kathaṃ pana ekameva ñāṇaṃ ekasmiṃ khaṇe cattāri kiccāni sādhentaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0105t:831_9: na āgamo vā tādiso atthī”ti na vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:831_10: Yathā hi padīpo ekasmiṃyeva khaṇe vaṭṭiṃ dahati,
tika-s0105t:832_3: na nu kho”ti evaṃ pavattikā kathaṃkathā assa vigatā samucchinnā.
tika-s0105t:832_5: tappaṭipakkhesu ca sīlādiguṇesu suppatiṭṭhitattā visāradabhāvaṃ veyyattiyaṃ patto adhigato.
tika-s0105t:832_6: Sāyaṃ vesārajjappatti suppatiṭṭhitatā katthāti codanāya “satthusāsane”ti vuttanti dassento “kattha?
tika-s0105t:832_9: adhigatattā ca na assa paccayo paccetabbo paro atthīti attho.
tika-s0105t:832_13: na paraṃ pacceti pattiyāyatīti aparappaccayotipi yujjati.
tika-s0105t:833_3: mahādhammarājādhirājagarunā katāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthapakāsaniyā ambaṭṭhasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthapakāsanā.
tika-s0105t:836_1: Evaṃ ambaṭṭhasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni soṇadaṇḍasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ saṃvaṇṇanokāsassa pattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ,
tika-s0105t:836_2: ambaṭṭhasuttassānantaraṃ saṅgītassa suttassa soṇadaṇḍasuttabhāvaṃ vā pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe…
tika-s0105t:836_11: Āgamane ādīnavaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhipanavasena āgantuṃ na dassanti,
tika-s0105t:837_2: tathārūpāya pana dhātuyā campakarukkhāva nīlādipañcavaṇṇampi kusumaṃ pupphanti.
tika-s0105t:837_7: Evaṃ pana vadanto na māpanakāleyeva tasmiṃ nagare campakarukkhā ussannā,
tika-s0105t:837_9: Māpanakāle hi campakarukkhānamussannatāya taṃ nagaraṃ “campā”ti nāmaṃ labhi.
tika-s0105t:837_13: Bahubhāvavisiṭṭhā cettha atthitā taddhitapaccayena jotitāti vuttaṃ “mahatiyā senāya samannāgatattā”ti.
tika-s0105t:837_15: Cūḷadukkhakkhandhasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana evaṃ vuttaṃ “seniyo”ti tassa nāmaṃ,
tika-s0105t:837_17: so tassa sārabhūto dassanīyo pāsādiko attabhāvasamiddhiyā bimbisāroti vuccatī”ti.
tika-s0105t:838_4: Pāḷiyaṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikānamadhippetattā “saṅghino”ti vattabbe “saṅghī”ti puthutte ekavacanaṃ vuttanti dasseti “etesa”nti iminā.
tika-s0105t:838_13: pubbe antonagare agaṇāpi pacchā bahinagare gaṇaṃ bhūtā pattāti gaṇībhūtāti.
tika-s0105t:838_17: Rājarājaññādīnaṃ daṇḍadharo purisova tato tato khattiyānaṃ tāyanato rakkhaṇato khattā niruttinayena.
tika-s0105t:838_19: tattha tesaṃ dosaṃ pariharanto yuttapattavasena pucchitamatthaṃ katheti.
tika-s0105t:841_1: sayaṃ vā aṅgīyati gamīyati ñāyatīti aṅgaṃ, hetu.
tika-s0105t:842_2: “Ubhato sujāto”ti hi etthakeyeva vutte yehi kehici dvīhi bhāgehi sujātattaṃ vijāneyya,
tika-s0105t:842_3: sujātasaddo ca “sujāto cārudassano”tiādīsu ārohasampattipariyāyopi hotīti jātivaseneva sujātattaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “mātito ca pitito cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:842_6: mātupakkhato ca pitupakkhato ca paccekaṃ tividhena ñātiparivaṭṭenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:842_7: “Saṃsuddhagahaṇiko”ti imināpi “mātito ca pitito cā”ti vuttamevatthaṃ samatthetīti āha “saṃsuddhā te mātugahaṇī”ti,
tika-s0105t:842_10: idha panassa orasaputtavaseneva icchitāti dassetuṃ “saṃsuddhagahaṇiko”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:842_14: Yathābhuttamāhāraṃ vipācanavasena gaṇhāti na chaḍḍetīti gahaṇī,
tika-s0105t:843_3: “Catuyuga”ntiādīsu viya taṃ tadatthe yujjitabbato kālaviseso yugaṃ nāma.
tika-s0105t:843_5: adhippetatthato pana pitāmahoyeva pitāmahayugasaddena vutto tasseva padhānabhāvena adhippetattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:844_4: yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā pitāmahadvandāti attho veditabbo,
tika-s0105t:844_6: Yugasaddo cettha ekaseso “yugo ca yugo ca yugo”ti,
tika-s0105t:844_7: ato tattha tattha ñātiparivaṭṭe pitāmahadvandaṃ gahitaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0105t:845_0: “Yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā”ti idaṃ kākāpekkhanamiva ubhayattha sambandhagatanti āha “eva”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t:845_6: “Jātivādenā”ti idaṃ hetumhi karaṇavacananti dassetuṃ “kena kāraṇenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:845_9: yugā”ti etena brāhmaṇassa yonidosābhāvo dassito saṃsuddhagahaṇikabhāvakittanato,
tika-s0105t:846_1: sā panassa issaratā vibhavasampattipaccayā pākaṭā jātā,
tika-s0105t:846_7: Aguṇaṃyeva dassemāti anvayato tassa guṇaṃ vatvā byatirekato bhagavato anupasaṅkamanakāraṇaṃ aguṇameva dassema.
tika-s0105t:847_7: Pakāsaniyena parisuddhanimittena vaṇṇasaddassa vaṇṇadhātuyaṃ pavattanato tannimittameva vaṇṇatā,
tika-s0105t:847_8: sā ca vaṇṇanissitāti abhedavasena vuttaṃ “uttamena parisuddhena vaṇṇenā”ti.
tika-s0105t:847_14: Sabbesu vaṇṇesu suvaṇṇavaṇṇova uttamoti āha “parisuddhavaṇṇesupi seṭṭhena suvaṇṇavaṇṇena samannāgato”ti.
tika-s0105t:847_20: Imameva hi atthaṃ sandhāya “mahābrahmuno sarīrasadiseneva sarīrena samannāgato”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:847_24: avayavapāripūriyā ca dassanassa okāso na khuddakoti attho.
tika-s0105t:848_1: taṃ panassa rattaññutāya vuddhaṃ vaddhitanti visesato “vuddhasīlī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:848_3: Evañca katvā padattayampetaṃ adhippetatthato visiṭṭhaṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:848_4: saddatthamattaṃ pana sandhāya “idaṃ vuddhasīlīpadasseva vevacana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:849_0: Vācāya parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanatā eva sundarabhāvoti vuttaṃ “sundarā parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanā”ti.
tika-s0105t:849_2: sikkhāsampattiyā ca kassacipi anūnatāya parimaṇḍalapadāni byañjanāni akkharāni etissāti parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanā.
tika-s0105t:849_4: Atha vā padameva atthassa byañjakattā byañjanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:849_7: Apica pajjati attho etenāti padaṃ, nāmādi,
tika-s0105t:849_10: Atthaviññāpane sādhanatāya vācāva karaṇaṃ vākkaraṇanti tulyādhikaraṇataṃ dassetuṃ “udāharaṇaghoso”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:849_13: tena vā bhāsitabbassa atthassa guṇaparipuṇṇabhāvena pūre guṇehi paripuṇṇabhāve bhavāti porī.
tika-s0105t:849_28: “Eḷā gaḷantī”ti vuttasseva dvidhā atthaṃ dassetuṃ “lālā vā paggharantī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:849_29: “Passe’ḷamūgaṃ uragaṃ dujivha”ntiādīsu viya hi eḷāsaddo lālāya,
tika-s0105t:850_1: elanti doso vuccati “yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0105t:850_2: Duppaññā ca sadosameva kathaṃ kathentā elaṃ paggharāpenti,
tika-s0105t:850_3: tasmā tesaṃ vācā elagaḷā nāma hoti,
tika-s0105t:850_5: “Ādimajjhapariyosānaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā”ti iminā tassā vācāya atthapāripūriṃ vadati.
tika-s0105t:851_5: Kittako pana soti āha “dve tayo rājaparivaṭṭe”ti,
tika-s0105t:851_7: “Addhagato”ti vatvāpi kataṃ vayogahaṇaṃ osānavayāpekkhanti vuttaṃ “pacchimavayaṃ sampatto”ti.
tika-s0105t:851_8: Pacchimo tatiyabhāgoti vassasatassa tidhā katesu bhāgesu tatiyo osānabhāgo.
tika-s0105t:851_10: tasmā sattasaṭṭhime vasse yathārahaṃ labbhamānamāsapakkhadivasato paṭṭhāya pacchimavayo veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:851_11: Ācariyasāriputtattherenapi hi imamevatthaṃ sandhāya “sattasaṭṭhivassato paṭṭhāya pacchimavayo koṭṭhāso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:851_12: Itarathā hi “pacchimavayo nāma vassasatassa pacchimo tatiyabhāgo”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanena virodho bhaveyyāti.
tika-s0105t:852_0: Evaṃ kevalajātivasena paṭhamavikappaṃ vatvā guṇamissakavasenapi dutiyavikappaṃ vadantena “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0105t:852_2: atha kho kulaparivaṭṭena purāṇatāti āha “jiṇṇoti porāṇo”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:852_6: guṇavuddhiyā ca tato sātisayattā “vuddhoti sīlācārādiguṇavuddhiyā yutto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:852_9: vibhavamahattatāya ca anavasesitattā “mahallakoti vibhavamahantatāya samannāgato”ti āha.
tika-s0105t:852_10: Maggapaṭipannoti brāhmaṇānaṃ yuttapaṭipattivīthiṃ avokkamma caraṇavasena upagatoti atthaṃ dasseti “brāhmaṇāna”ntiādinā.
tika-s0105t:854_1: Tādisehi mahānubhāvehi saddhiṃ yugaggāhavasena ṭhapanampi na mādisānaṃ paṇḍitajātīnamanucchavikaṃ,
tika-s0105t:854_2: kuto pana ukkaṃsavasena ṭhapananti idaṃ brāhmaṇassa na yuttarūpanti dassento “na kho pana meta”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:854_3: Tattha yepi guṇā attano guṇehi sadisā,
tika-s0105t:854_4: tepi guṇe uttaritareyeva maññamāno pakāsetīti sambandho.
tika-s0105t:854_6: Na hi buddhānaṃ guṇehi sabbathā sadisā kecipi guṇā aññesu labbhanti.
tika-s0105t:854_8: Ahañca kīdiso nāma hutvā sadiso bhavissāmi,
tika-s0105t:854_10: guṇā ca kīdisā nāma hutvā sadisā bhavissantīti sādhippāyayojanā.
tika-s0105t:854_12: ayameva mūlapāṭho yathā taṃ ambaṭṭhasutte “ko cāhaṃ bho gotama sācariyako,
tika-s0105t:855_0: Evaṃ niyāmento soṇadaṇḍo idaṃ atthajātaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0105t:856_1: Dhammapadaṭṭhakathādīsu pana katthaci bhagavato asītikulasahassatāvacanaṃ ekekapakkhameva sandhāyāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:857_8: Gahitaṃ gahitaṃ ṭhānaṃ pūratiyeva dhanena pākatikameva hoti, na ūnaṃ.
tika-s0105t:858_2: Mātāpitūnaṃ anicchāya pabbajjāva anādaro tena yutte atthe sāmivacananti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:859_1: Dve veḷū adhokaṭimattakameva hontīti āha “dvinnaṃ veḷūnaṃ upari kaṭimattamevā”ti.
tika-s0105t:859_3: bhagavā pana tadā pakatippamāṇovāti dassetuṃ “paññāyamāno”ti vuttamiva dissati,
tika-s0105t:859_9: Na hi dhammapade ayaṃ gāthā dissati.
tika-s0105t:859_13: tasmā pāḷivasena saṅgītimanāruḷhā pakiṇṇakadesanāyevāyaṃ gāthāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:860_0: Tattha te tādiseti pariyāyavacanametaṃ “appaṃ vassasataṃ āyu,
tika-s0105t:860_4: Kilesaparinibbānena parinibbute kutocipi abhaye te tādise pūjayato ettha idaṃ puññaṃ kenaci mahānubhāvena api saṅkhātuṃ na sakkāti attho.
tika-s0105t:861_6: Mukhaṃ vitthārato dviyojanasataṃ parimaṇḍalato visuṃ vuttattā.
tika-s0105t:861_9: iminā aññehi vuttaṃ bhagavato vaṇṇakathaṃ sutvā oloketukāmatāya āgatoti dasseti,
tika-s0105t:861_11: “Yathākathaṃ pana tumhe bhikkhave samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṃ vassaṃ vasitthā”tiādīsu viya hi pucchāyaṃ esa nipātasamudāyo,
tika-s0105t:862_5: ubbedhato ca bhagavato rūpakāyassa paricchedaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0105t:862_6: tathā rūpaṃ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharonto sīhaseyyaṃ kappesī”ti evaṃ ācariyena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:862_8: uddhaggameva katvā dānaṃ dinna”nti aṭṭhakathāvacanena accantameva viruddhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:862_10: aññathā tadeva vacanaṃ vattabbaṃ bhaveyyā”ti vadanti,
tika-s0105t:862_15: Tadā rāhu upāsakabhāvaṃ paṭivedesīti āha “taṃ divasa”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t:863_5: Evañca katvā padacatukkampetaṃ adhippetatthato visiṭṭhaṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:864_1: katthaci aparimāṇāpi devamanussāti atthaṃ sandhāya “bhagavato ekekāya dhammadesanāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:864_3: desanādīsu hi catuvīsatiyā ṭhānesu asaṅkhyeyyā aparimeyyā devamanussā maggaphalāmataṃ piviṃsu.
tika-s0105t:864_8: Bhagavatā hi dinnanaye ṭhatvā sāvakā veneyyaṃ vinenti,
tika-s0105t:865_2: “Imassa vā pūtikāyassā”ti pāṭhāvasāne peyyālaṃ katvā “kelanā paṭikelanā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:865_3: Ayañhi khuddakavatthuvibhaṅgapāḷi “bāhirānaṃ vā parikkhārānaṃ maṇḍanā”tiādi peyyālavasena gayhati.
tika-s0105t:865_4: Tattha imassa vā pūtikāyassāti imassa vā manussasarīrassa.
tika-s0105t:865_6: ūruppamāṇāpi ca galocilatā “pūtilatā” tveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0105t:865_14: yena samannāgato puggalo vassasatikopi samāno tadahujātadārako viya hoti,
tika-s0105t:866_1: na vā pāpaṃ pure karotīti apāpapurekkhāroti yuttāyuttasamāsena duvidhamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “apāpe navalokuttaradhamme”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:866_4: Brahmani seṭṭhe bhagavati bhavā tassa dhammadesanāvasena ariyāya jātiyā jātattā,
tika-s0105t:866_7: brahmaṃ vā seṭṭhaṃ ariyamaggaṃ jānātīti brahmaññā,
tika-s0105t:866_11: “Apāpapurekkhāro”ti ettha “purekkhāro”ti padamadhikāroti dasseti “etissāya ca pajāya purekkhāro”ti iminā. Ca-
tika-s0105t:866_13: atha kho brahmaññāya ca pajāya sambandhabhūtāya purekkhāro”ti.
tika-s0105t:866_21: Tassa sambandhipekkhattā kassā apāpapurekkhāroti pucchāya evamāhāti dassetuṃ “kassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:867_0: Rañjanti aṭṭaṃ bhajanti rājāno etenāti raṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0105t:867_2: Janā pajjanti sukhajīvikaṃ pāpuṇanti etthāti janapado,
tika-s0105t:867_9: cittācārañca ñatvā bhagavāva pucchāya ussāhaṃ janetvā vissajjetīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:868_7: Puṇṇacandassa siriyā samānā sirī etassāti puṇṇacandasassirikaṃ.
tika-s0105t:868_9: Ettha pana “ehi svāgatavādī”ti iminā sukhasambhāsapubbakaṃ piyavāditaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0105t:868_14: “pubbabhāsī”ti iminā dhammānuggahassa okāsakaraṇena hitajjhāsayataṃ dassetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:871_0: Te dhammārammaṇā nāma, ye’saṃ rūpādayo kirā”ti. –
tika-s0105t:872_2: tena bhagavatā adhivutthapadese na devatānubhāvena manussānaṃ anupaddavatā,
tika-s0105t:872_7: Idāni buddhānubhāvameva pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:873_2: “Tādiso”ti iminā “sayaṃ vā uppādito”ti vuttavikappo eva paccāmaṭṭho anantarassa vidhi paṭisedhovāti katvā,
tika-s0105t:873_6: atthamattaṃ pana dassetuṃ yathāvuttavikappadvaye dutiyavikappameva paccāmasitvā “tādisovassa gaṇo atthī”ti
tika-s0105t:873_7: vuttattā avasiṭṭhassapi paṭhamavikappassa saṅgahaṇatthaṃ “purimapadasseva vā vevacanameta”nti vuttanti.
tika-s0105t:873_11: Tatthāpi hi sabbova bhikkhugaṇo anusāsitabbo nāma,
tika-s0105t:873_13: tasmā “tādiso”ti iminā vikappadvayassāpi paccāmasanaṃ upapannaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:873_14: Evaṃ padadvayassa visesatthataṃ dassetvā sabbathā samānatthataṃ dassetuṃ “purimapadassevā”tiādi vuttanti.
tika-s0105t:874_2: etena duvidhesu āgantukesu puretaramāgatavasena idha atithino,
tika-s0105t:875_3: dīghamantare dīghakālantarepi tathāgatassa vaṇṇo na khīyethāti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:875_7: kiriyārahādiyoge viya ca antarayoge adhikakkharapādo anupavajjo,
tika-s0105t:875_8: ayañca gāthā abhūtaparikappanāvasena aṭṭhakathāsu vuttā tathā bhāsamānassa abhāvato.
tika-s0105t:876_2: saddo idha arahattho “alameva nibbinditu”ntiādīsu viyāti āha “yuttamevā”ti.
tika-s0105t:876_3: Puṭena netvā asitabbato paribhuñjitabbato puṭosaṃ vuccati pātheyyaṃ.
tika-s0105t:876_5: Pāḷiyaṃ puṭaṃsenapi kulaputtenāti sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ “tena puṭaṃsenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:878_2: saddo “tirokuḍḍe vā tiropākāre vā chaḍḍeyya vā chaḍḍāpeyya vā”tiādīsu viya bahiatthoti āha “antovanasaṇḍe gatassā”ti.
tika-s0105t:878_3: Tattha vihāropi vanasaṇḍapariyāpannoti dasseti “vihārabbhantaraṃ paviṭṭhassā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:878_4: Ete añjaliṃ paṇāmetvā nisinnā micchādiṭṭhivasena ubhatopakkhikā,
tika-s0105t:878_5: “itare pana sammādiṭṭhivasena ekatopakkhikā”ti atthato āpanno hoti.
tika-s0105t:878_7: ñātipārijuññādinā jiṇṇattā ca nāmagottavasena apākaṭā hutvā pākaṭā bhavitukāmā evamakaṃsūti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:881_9: Paṭhamo vāti tattha sannipatitesu sujākiriyāyaṃ sabbapadhāno vā.
tika-s0105t:881_12: Aggihuttamukhatāya yaññassa yaññe diyyamānaṃ sujāmukhena diyyati.
tika-s0105t:881_15: Tasmā “diyyamāna”nti ayaṃ pāṭhaseso viññāyatīti ācariyena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:881_16: Apica sujāya diyyamānaṃ sujanti taddhitavasena atthaṃ dassetuṃ evamāha.
tika-s0105t:881_18: Purimavāde cettha dānavasena paṭhamo vā dutiyo vā,
tika-s0105t:881_23: Yathādhippetassa hi vijjācaraṇavisesadīpakassa “katamaṃ pana taṃ brāhmaṇasīlaṃ,
tika-s0105t:881_24: katamā sā paññā”tiādivacanassa okāsakaraṇatthameva “imesaṃ pana brāhmaṇa pañcannaṃ aṅgāna”ntiādivacanaṃ bhagavā avoca,
tika-s0105t:881_25: tasmā padhānavacanānurūpamanusandhiṃ dassetuṃ “bhagavā panā”tiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:883_5: Ekadesamattato pana aṅgakena māṇavena tesaṃ samabhāvato taṃ nivattento “ṭhapetvā ekadesamatta”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:883_9: tasmā na tassa mātāpitumattaṃ sandhāya vadati,
tika-s0105t:883_13: Athāpi siyāti yadipi tumhākaṃ evaṃ parivitakko siyā,
tika-s0105t:883_14: bhinnasīlassāpi puna pakatisīle ṭhitassa brāhmaṇabhāvaṃ vaṇṇādayo sādhentīti evaṃ siyāti attho.
tika-s0105t:883_18: Sīlamevāti puna pakatibhūtaṃ sīlameva brāhmaṇabhāvaṃ sādhessati,
tika-s0105t:883_21: Tattha sammohamattaṃ vaṇṇādayoti vaṇṇamantajātiyo brāhmaṇabhāvassa aṅganti sammohamattametaṃ,
tika-s0105t:885_1: Kathito brāhmaṇena pañhoti “sīlavā ca hotī”tiādinā dvinnameva aṅgānaṃ vasena yathāpucchito pañho yāthāvato vissajjito.
tika-s0105t:885_9: kiṃ panesa tathā sakkhissati nu kho,
tika-s0105t:885_11: na tu ekassa aṅgassa ṭhapanīyattāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:885_16: Kuto vā paññārahite jaḷe eḷamūge sīlaṃ sīlavibhāgassa,
tika-s0105t:885_18: Eḷā mukhe gaḷati yassāti eḷamūgo kha-
tika-s0105t:885_23: Pakaṭṭhaṃ ukkaṭṭhaṃ ñāṇaṃ paññāṇanti katvā pākatikaṃ ñāṇaṃ nivattetuṃ “paññāṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:886_0: Catupārisuddhisīlena dhotāti samādhipadaṭṭhānena catupārisuddhisīlena sakalasaṃkilesamalavisuddhiyā dhovitā visuddhā.
tika-s0105t:886_7: Vedanāpariggahamattampīti ettha vedanāpariggaho nāma yathāuppannaṃ vedanaṃ sabhāvasarasato upadhāretvā
tika-s0105t:886_8: puna padaṭṭhānato “ayaṃ vedanā phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati,
tika-s0105t:886_9: so ca phasso anicco dukkho vipariṇāmadhammo”ti lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā pavattitavipassanā.
tika-s0105t:886_10: Evaṃ passantena hi sukhena sakkā sā vedanā adhivāsetuṃ “vedanā eva vedayatī”ti.
tika-s0105t:886_11: Vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvāti yathāuppannaṃ dukkhavedanaṃ anuvattitvā vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā vīthipaṭipannāya vipassanāya taṃ vinodetvā.
tika-s0105t:886_12: Saṃsumārapatitenāti kumbhīlena viya bhūmiyaṃ urena nipajjamānena.
tika-s0105t:886_16: vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti catūsu puggalesu ugghāṭitaññuno evāyaṃ visayoti āha “ugghāṭitaññutāyā”ti.
tika-s0105t:886_17: Paññāya sīlaṃ dhovitvāti sīlaṃ ādimajjhapariyosānesu akhaṇḍādibhāvāpādanena paññāya suvisodhitaṃ katvā.
tika-s0105t:887_2: Lajjā nāma “sīlassa ca jātiyā ca guṇadosappakāsanena samaṇena gotamena pucchitapañhaṃ vissajjesī”ti parisāya paññātatā,
tika-s0105t:887_4: paṭhamaṃ alajjamānopi idāni lajjissāmīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:887_6: “Ettakaparamā maya”nti padānaṃ tulyādhikaraṇataṃ dassetuṃ “te maya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:887_10: vedattayavibhāvanaṃ paññañca lakkhaṇādito niddhāretvā jānanaṃ natthi,
tika-s0105t:888_0: Ayaṃ pana visesoti sīlaniddese niyyātanamattaṃ apekkhitvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:888_2: Sāmaññaphalasutte hi sīlaṃ niyyātetvāpi puna sāmaññaphalamicceva niyyātitaṃ.
tika-s0105t:888_5: Paññāniddese hi jhānapaññaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā paṭhamaṃ vipassanāpaññā niyyātitā.
tika-s0105t:890_1: Daharo yuvāti ettha daharavacanena paṭhamayobbanabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:890_6: “Āsanā me taṃ vuṭṭhāna”nti etassa atthāpattiṃ dassetuṃ “mama agāravenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:890_8: Ayañhi yathā tathā attano mahājanassa sambhāvanaṃ uppādetvā kohaññena pare vimhāpetvā lābhuppādanaṃ nijigīsanto vicarati,
tika-s0105t:890_9: tasmāssa ativiya kuhakabhāvaṃ dassento “iminā kirā”tiādiṃ vadati.
tika-s0105t:890_10: Agāravaṃ nāma natthīti agāravavacanaṃ nāma natthi,
tika-s0105t:890_12: atha kho attano lābhaparihānibhayenevāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:891_3: Tadā tassa vivaṭṭasannissitassa tādisassa ñāṇaparipākassa abhāvato kevalaṃ abbhudayasannissito eva attho
tika-s0105t:891_8: Pariyāyato pana “catubhūmake”tipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati lokuttarakusalassapi āyatiṃ labbhamānattā.
tika-s0105t:891_13: Samuttejetvāti sammadeva uparūpari nisānetvā puññakiriyāya tikkhavisadabhāvamāpādetvā.
tika-s0105t:891_14: Taṃ pana atthato tattha ussāhajananameva hotīti āha “saussāhaṃ katvā”ti.
tika-s0105t:891_15: Tāya ca saussāhatāyāti evaṃ puññakiriyāya saussāhatā niyamato diṭṭhadhammikādiatthasampādanīti yathāvuttāya saussāhatāya ca sampahaṃsetvāti sambandho.
tika-s0105t:891_16: Aññehi ca vijjamānaguṇehīti evarūpā te guṇasamaṅgitā ca ekantena diṭṭhadhammikādiatthanipphādanīti tasmiṃ vijjamānehi,
tika-s0105t:891_17: aññehi ca guṇehi sampahaṃsetvā sammadeva haṭṭhatuṭṭhabhāvamāpādetvāti attho.
tika-s0105t:892_1: atha kasmā so visesaṃ nādhigacchīti codanaṃ sodhetuṃ “brāhmaṇo panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:892_4: Yajjevaṃ kasmā bhagavā tassa tathā dhammaratanavassaṃ vassīti paṭicodanampi sodhento “kevalamassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:892_8: Āyatiṃ visesādhigamanūpāyabhūtā puññakiriyāsu paricayasaṅkhātā vāsanā eva bhāgo,
tika-s0105t:892_10: Na hi bhagavato niratthakā catuppadikagāthāmattāpi dhammadesanā atthi.
tika-s0105t:892_12: Ādito cettha pabhuti yāva brāhmaṇassa vissajjanāpariyosānaṃ,
tika-s0105t:892_15: Brāhmaṇena vuttāpi hi buddhaguṇādipaṭisaññuttā kathā āyatiṃ nibbānatthāya vāsanābhāgiyā evāti.
tika-s0105t:896_1: Evaṃ soṇadaṇḍasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni kūṭadantasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ saṃvaṇṇanokāsassa pattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ,
tika-s0105t:896_2: soṇadaṇḍa suttassānantaraṃ saṅgītassa suttassa kūṭadantasuttabhāvaṃ vā pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe…
