tika-s0105t:896_4: “Magadhā nāma janapadino rājakumārā”tiādīsu ambaṭṭhasutte kosalajanapadavaṇṇanāyaṃ amhehi vuttanayo yathārahaṃ netabbo.
tika-s0105t:896_8: maṃsesu vā gijjhantīti magadhā niruttinayena. Ruḷhito,
tika-s0105t:896_9: paccayalopato ca tesaṃ nivāsabhūtepi janapade vuddhi na hotīti neruttikā.
tika-s0105t:896_11: na janapadasadde jātisaddattāti vuttaṃ “tasmiṃ magadhesu janapade”ti.
tika-s0105t:896_17: “Taruṇo ambarukkho ambalaṭṭhikā”ti brahmajālasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttattā “ambalaṭṭhikā brahmajāle vuttasadisāvā”ti āha.
tika-s0105t:897_1: aviññāṇakāni ca yaññūpakaraṇāni upaṭṭhapitānīti atthaṃ sandhāya “mahāyañño upakkhaṭo”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:897_2: taṃ panetaṃ upakaraṇaṃ tesaṃ tathā sajjanamevāti dasseti “sajjito”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:897_5: te pana vacchā eva honti, na dammā,
tika-s0105t:898_3: tassa vidhamanato nivāraṇato nirodhanato vidhā vuccanti vippaṭisāravinodanā,
tika-s0105t:898_4: tā eva puññābhisandaṃ avicchinditvā ṭhapentīti “ṭhapanā”ti ca vuttā.
tika-s0105t:898_6: Ṭhapanā cetā yaññassa ādimajjhapariyosānavasena tīsu kālesu pavattiyā tippakārāti āha “tiṭṭhapana”nti.
tika-s0105t:898_7: Parikkhārasaddo cettha parivārapariyāyo “parikaronti yaññaṃ abhisaṅkharontī”ti katvā.
tika-s0105t:900_3: Tathā hi tassa anugāminidhissa thāvaranidhinā nidassanaṃ upapannaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:900_4: Saddavidū pana vadanti “bhūtapubbanti idaṃ kālasattamiyā nepātikapada”nti.
tika-s0105t:900_8: Mahantaṃ vā vijitaṃ pathavīmaṇḍalamassa atthīti attho.
tika-s0105t:900_10: tassa raṭṭhe”tiādīsu viya hi vijitasaddo rajje pavattati,
tika-s0105t:900_13: Pāḷiyaṃ na yena kenaci santakamattena aḍḍhatāti dassetuṃ “aḍḍho”ti vatvā “mahaddhano”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:900_15: Aḍḍhatā hi nāma vibhavasampannattā sā ca taṃ tadupādāya vuccati.
tika-s0105t:900_16: Tathā mahaddhanatāpīti taṃ thāmappattaṃ ukkaṃsagataṃ dassetuṃ “aparimāṇasaṅkhyenā”ti āha.
tika-s0105t:900_17: Bhuñjitabbaṭṭhena visesato kāmā idha bhogā nāmāti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:901_3: Anekakoṭisaṅkhyenāti kahāpaṇānaṃ koṭisatādippamāṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ heṭṭhimantena koṭisatappamāṇeneva khattiyamahāsālabhāvappattito.
tika-s0105t:905_0: Sālivīhiādi sattadhaññaṃ sānulomaṃ pubbannaṃ nāma purekkhataṃ sassaphalanti katvā.
tika-s0105t:905_8: Purimaṃ “aḍḍho mahaddhano pahūtajātarūparajato”ti vacanaṃ devasikaṃ paribbayadānagahaṇādivasena,
tika-s0105t:905_11: saṅgahitadhaññavasena cāti imaṃ visesaṃ sandhāya ayaṃ nayo dassito.
tika-s0105t:906_0: Idāni tabbiparītavasena visesaṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādinā dutiyanayo āraddho.
tika-s0105t:906_2: saṅgahitadhaññavasena ca vuttanti atthato siddhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:906_12: Tattha “paribbayadānaggahaṇādivasenā”ti idaṃ parivattanapadena sambandhaṃ katvā tādisena vidhinā ito
tika-s0105t:906_13: cito ca parivattetabbānaṃ dhanadhaññānaṃ vasenāti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:907_4: dhaññaṭṭhapanaṭṭhānaṃ koṭṭhāgāranti dassetvā idāni tato aññathāpi taṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:907_5: Tattha yathā asino tikkhabhāvaparihārato paricchado “koso”ti vuccati,
tika-s0105t:907_6: evaṃ rañño tikkhabhāvaparihārakattā caturaṅginī senā “koso”ti āha “catubbidho koso”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:907_8: Vatthakoṭṭhāgāraggahaṇeneva sabbassapi kuppabhaṇḍaṭṭhapanaṭṭhānassa gahitattā “koṭṭhāgāraṃ tividha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:907_9: Jātarūparajatato hi aññaṃ lohaayadāruvisāṇavatthādikamasāradabbaṃ gopetabbato ga-
tika-s0105t:907_13: Tattha tattha ratanaṃ viloketvā caraṇaṃ ratanavilokanacārikā.
tika-s0105t:907_15: bhaṇḍāgārikena pana kathāpetvā parisāya nissaddabhāvāpādanatthameva evaṃ pucchati.
tika-s0105t:907_16: Tathā kathāpane hi asati parisā saddaṃ karissati “kasmā rājā paramparāgataṃ kuladhanaṃ vināsetī”ti,
tika-s0105t:907_18: sati pana tathā kathāpane “etaṃkāraṇā taṃ chaḍḍetī”ti nissaddabhāvamāpajjissati.
tika-s0105t:908_1: Pāḷiyaṃ “āmantetvā”ti etassa mantitukāmo hutvāti atthaṃ viññāpetuṃ “ekena paṇḍitena saddhiṃ mantetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:908_3: pakaraṇādhigato ca katthaci atthaviseso yathā “sikkhamānena bhikkhave bhikkhunā aññātabbaṃ paripucchitabbaṃ paripañhitabba”nti.
tika-s0105t:908_8: yaññassa ca cirānappavattanatthaṃ brāhmaṇo cintesīti āha “ayaṃ rājā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:909_2: ahitadukkhassa ca āvahanato kaṇṭakasadisatāya corā eva idha “kaṇṭakā”ti vuttaṃ “corakaṇṭakehi sakaṇṭako”ti.
tika-s0105t:909_7: yo vā attano vijite janapadādīnaṃ tato tato anatthato tāyanena khattiyena kattabbadhammo,
tika-s0105t:909_12: Yathā hi khette khīlaṃ kasanādīnaṃ sukhappavattiṃ,
tika-s0105t:909_18: Vadhasaddo hi hiṃsanatthopi hoti “vadhati na rodati,
tika-s0105t:910_12: “Anuppadetū”ti etassa anu anu padetūti atthaṃ sandhāya “dinne appahonte”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:910_14: iminā pāḷiyaṃ bījabhattameva nidassanavasena vuttanti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:910_15: Sakkhikaraṇapaṇṇāropananibandhanaṃ vaḍḍhiyā saha vā vinā vā puna gahetukāmassa dāne hoti,
tika-s0105t:910_16: idha pana tadubhayampi natthi puna aggahetukāmattāti vuttaṃ “sakkhiṃ akatvā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:910_19: Paṇṇe anāropetvāti tālādipaṇṇe yathāciṇṇaṃ likhanavasena anāropetvā.
tika-s0105t:910_22: Bhaṇḍamūlañhi pakārato udayabhaṇḍāni ābharati saṃharati etenāti pābhataṃ.
tika-s0105t:910_24: paṇṇākāro pana taṃ tadatthaṃ patthentehi ābharīyateti pābhataṃ.
tika-s0105t:911_5: Samuṭṭhāpeti attānanti mahantaṃ dhanañca yasañca uppādetvā tattha attānaṃ saṇṭhāpeti patiṭṭhāpeti.
tika-s0105t:911_8: yathā paṇḍitapuriso parittaṃ aggiṃ anukkamena gomayacuṇṇādīni pakkhipitvā mukhavātena dhamanto samuṭṭhāpeti vaḍḍheti mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ karoti,
tika-s0105t:911_9: evameva paṇḍito thokampi pābhataṃ labhitvā nānāupāyehi payojetvā dhanañca yasañca vaḍḍheti,
tika-s0105t:911_10: vaḍḍhetvā ca pana tattha attānaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti,
tika-s0105t:911_11: tāya eva vā pana dhanayasamahantatāya attānaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-s0105t:912_5: kammānurūpena sūrabhāvānurūpenāti dvandato paraṃ suyyamāno anurūpasaddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo.
tika-s0105t:912_8: so ca jāṇusoṇiādikulānamiva kulānurūpampi dātabbato yujjateva.
tika-s0105t:912_19: “Bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodī”tiādīsu hi mudasaddo saṃsandanepi pavattati,
tika-s0105t:912_20: aññe modā hutvā aparepi modamānā viharantīti vā attho.
tika-s0105t:912_22: asaññogepi vatticchāyeva vuddhīti dvidhā pāṭho vutto.
tika-s0105t:914_1: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kicce anuyanti anuvattantīti anuyantā.
tika-s0105t:914_4: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kicce anuyujjantīti hi ānuyuttā vuttanayena.
tika-s0105t:914_7: “Amhe ettha bahi karotī”ti attamanā na bhavissanti.
tika-s0105t:914_12: taṃ tabbiparīto gāmo”ti (kaṅkhāvitaraṇī abhinavaṭīkāyaṃ saṅghādisesakaṇḍe kuladūsakasikkhāpade passitabbaṃ) vinayaṭīkāsu.
tika-s0105t:914_20: duggañca vijitaṃ bala”nti vuttāsu sattasu rājapakatīsu rañño tadavasesānaṃ channaṃ vasena hitasukhātivuddhi,
tika-s0105t:915_0: Taṃtaṃkiccesu raññā amā saha bhavantīti amaccā.
tika-s0105t:915_1: “Amāvāsī”tiādīsu viya hi samakiriyāya amāti abyayapadaṃ, ca-
tika-s0105t:915_9: parivārasampattiyā ca abhāve tādisaṃ dātuṃ na sakkā.
tika-s0105t:915_10: Vuddhakāle ca tādisānampi rājūnaṃ tadubhayaṃ hāyateva,
tika-s0105t:915_12: Deyyadhammasmiṃ asati ca mahallakakāle ca dātuṃ na sakkāti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:915_17: te ca tassa yaññassa aṅgabhūtattā parivārā viya hontīti āha “parivārā bhavantī”ti.
tika-s0105t:918_4: Jhānakkhoti vipassanāsampayuttānaṃ pañcannaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ vasena jhānamayaakkho.
tika-s0105t:918_6: Upekkhā dhurasamādhīti upekkhā dvinnaṃ dhurānaṃ samatā.
tika-s0105t:918_7: Anicchā parivāraṇanti alobho sīhadhammādīni viya parivāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t:920_4: “Saddho”ti etassa “dātādānassa phalaṃ paccanubhoti pattiyāyatī”ti atthaṃ dassetuṃ “dānassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:920_8: Tassa hi tikkhavisadabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “saddo”ti vatvā “dānasūro”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:920_12: Yaṃ dānaṃ detīti yaṃ deyyadhammaṃ parassa deti.
tika-s0105t:920_13: Tassa pati hutvāti tabbisayaṃ lobhaṃ suṭṭhumabhibhavanto tassa adhipati hutvā deti.
tika-s0105t:921_6: Dāso hutvā deti taṇhāya dāsabyataṃ upagatattā.
tika-s0105t:921_8: Sāmī hutvā deti tattha taṇhādāsabyato attānaṃ mocetvā abhibhuyya pavattanato.
tika-s0105t:921_11: Na hi khīṇāsavassa paribhogo sāmiparibhogo viya khīṇāsavasseva dānaṃ dānasāmīti attho upapanno hoti,
tika-s0105t:922_6: kammaphalakittanamukhena ca yācanakā seyyathāpi naggacariyādayoti atthaṃ dassetuṃ “ye iṭṭhaṃ dinna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:922_12: Opānaṃ vuccati ogāhetvā pātabbato nadītaḷākādīnaṃ sabbasādhāraṇaṃ titthaṃ,
tika-s0105t:923_2: na buddhānaṃ viya tattha paccakkhadassitāyāti dassetuṃ “atīte”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:923_8: Imesu pana aṭṭhasu aṅgesu aḍḍhatādayo pañca yaññassa tāva parikkhārā hontu tehi vinā tassa asijjhanato, sujātatā,
tika-s0105t:923_9: pana sūrūpatā ca kathaṃ yaññassa parikkhāro siyā tadubhayena vināpi tassa sijjhanatoti codanāya sabbesampi
tika-s0105t:923_12: Ettha ca keci evaṃ vadanti “yathā aḍḍhatādayo pañca yaññassa ekaṃsatova aṅgāni,
tika-s0105t:923_15: tadubhayaṃ pana anekaṃsatova aṅganti dīpetuṃ arucisūcakassa kirasaddassa gahaṇaṃ kata”nti.
tika-s0105t:923_16: Te hi “ayaṃ dujjātotiādivacanassa anekaṃsikataṃ maññamānā tathā vadanti,
tika-s0105t:923_18: Sabbasādhāraṇavasena hetaṃ byatirekato yaññassa aṅgabhāvadassanaṃ tattha siyā kesañci tathā parivitakko”ti
tika-s0105t:923_21: Kirasaddo panettha tadā brāhmaṇassa cintitākārasūcanattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0105t:923_22: Evamanena cintetvā “imānipi aṭṭhaṅgāni tasseva yaññassa parikkhārā bhavantīti vuttānī”ti kirasaddena tassa cintitākāro sūcito hoti.
tika-s0105t:925_1: “Sujaṃ paggaṇhantāna”nti ettha soṇadaṇḍasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttesu dvīsu vikappesu dutiyavikappaṃ nisedhento “mahāyāga”ntiādimāha,
tika-s0105t:925_2: tena ca purohitassa sayameva kaṭacchuggahaṇajotanena evaṃ sahatthā sakkaccaṃ dāne yuttapayuttatā icchitabbāti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:925_3: Evaṃ dujjātassāti etthāpi “sujātatāya anekaṃsato aṅgabhāvadassanamevida”nti aggahetvā heṭṭhā vuttanayena sabbasādhāraṇavaseneva attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0105t:925_6: duppaññassa saṃvidhānena pavattadānaṃ kittakaṃ kālaṃ pavattissatī”ti etesaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0105t:927_1: Tiṇṇaṃ ṭhānānanti dānassa ādimajjhapariyosānasaṅkhātānaṃ tissannaṃ bhūmīnaṃ,
tika-s0105t:927_5: Karaṇīyasaddāpekkhāya hi kattari eva etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:927_7: Yebhuyyena hi karaṇajotakavacanassa atthabhāvato anuttakattāva karaṇatthoti idhādhippeto.
tika-s0105t:927_13: Tathā patiṭṭhāpanena hi yathā taṃ dānaṃ sampati yathādhippāyaṃ nippajjati,
tika-s0105t:927_14: evaṃ āyatimpi vipulaphalatāya mahapphalaṃ hoti vippaṭisārena anupakkiliṭṭhabhāvato.
tika-s0105t:927_17: na kattabboti atthaṃ sandhāya “eseva nayo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:927_19: tassā niccalabhāvo nāma muttacāgatā pubbābhisaṅkhāravasena uḷārabhāvo.
tika-s0105t:927_21: tassā pana niccalabhāvo “aho mayā dānaṃ dinnaṃ sādhu suṭṭhū”ti dānassa sakkaccaṃ paccavekkhaṇavasena veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:927_28: “Nāpi uḷāresu bhogesu cittaṃ namatī”ti idaṃ pana pacchāsamanussaraṇacetanāya eva byatirekato niccalakaraṇūpāyadassanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:927_30: Tattha uḷāresu bhogesūti khettavisese pariccāgassa katattā laddhesupi uḷāresu bhogesu.
tika-s0105t:927_31: Nāpi cittaṃ namati pacchā vippaṭisārena upakkiliṭṭhabhāvato.
tika-s0105t:927_33: Tassa hi seṭṭhissa gahapatino vatthu kosalasaṃyutte,
tika-s0105t:928_0: “Bhūtapubbaṃ so mahārāja seṭṭhi gahapati tagarasikhiṃ nāma paccekasambuddhaṃ piṇḍapātena paṭipādesi,
tika-s0105t:928_2: datvā ca pana pacchā vippaṭisārī ahosi “varametaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dāsā vā kammakarā vā bhuñjeyyu”’ntiādi.
tika-s0105t:929_0: So kira aññesupi divasesu taṃ paccekabuddhaṃ passati,
tika-s0105t:929_2: tasmiṃ pana divase ayaṃ padumavatiyā deviyā tatiyaputto tagarasikhī paccekabuddho gandhamādanapabbate
tika-s0105t:929_3: phalasamāpattisukhena vītināmetvā pubbaṇhasamaye vuṭṭhāya anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā manosilātale nivāsetvā
tika-s0105t:929_4: kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā pattacīvaramādāya abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā iddhiyā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
tika-s0105t:929_5: nagaradvāre oruyha cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattamādāya nagaravāsīnaṃ gharadvāresu sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ ṭhapento
tika-s0105t:929_6: viya pāsādikehi abhikkamanādīhi anupubbena seṭṭhino gharadvāraṃ sampatto,
tika-s0105t:929_7: taṃ divasañca seṭṭhi pātova uṭṭhāya paṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā gharadvārakoṭṭhake āsanaṃ paññapetvā dantantarāni sodhento nisinno hoti.
tika-s0105t:929_8: So paccekabuddhaṃ disvā taṃ divasaṃ pātova bhutvā nisinnattā dānacittaṃ uppādetvā bhariyaṃ pakkosāpetvā
tika-s0105t:929_9: “imassa samaṇassa piṇḍapātaṃ dehī”ti vatvā rājupaṭṭhānatthaṃ pakkāmi.
tika-s0105t:929_10: Seṭṭhibhariyā sampajaññajātikā cintesi “mayā ettakena kālena imassa ‘dethā’ti vacanaṃ na sutapubbaṃ,
tika-s0105t:929_11: dāpentopi ca ajja na yassa vā tassa vā dāpeti,
tika-s0105t:929_13: yaṃ vā taṃ vā adatvā paṇītaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dassāmī”ti gharā nikkhamma paccekabuddhaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā
tika-s0105t:929_14: pattaṃ ādāya antonivesane paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā suparisuddhehi sālitaṇḍulehi bhattaṃ sampādetvā tadanurūpaṃ
tika-s0105t:929_17: sūpeyyañca abhisaṅkharitvā pattaṃ pūretvā bahi gandhehi alaṅkaritvā paccekabuddhassa hatthesu patiṭṭhapetvā vandi.
tika-s0105t:929_18: Paccekabuddho “aññesampi paccekabuddhānaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti aparibhuñjitvāva anumodanaṃ vatvā pakkāmi.
tika-s0105t:929_19: Sopi kho seṭṭhi rājupaṭṭhānaṃ katvā āgacchanto paccekabuddhaṃ disvā āha “mayaṃ tumhākaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dethā”ti vatvā pakkantā,
tika-s0105t:929_24: So cittaṃ saṃyametuṃ asakkonto pacchā vippaṭisārī ahosi,
tika-s0105t:929_25: tassa pana vippaṭisārassa uppannākāro “varameta”ntiādinā pāḷiyaṃ vuttoyeva.
tika-s0105t:929_26: Piṇḍapātadānena panesa sattakkhattuṃ sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapanno,
tika-s0105t:929_29: pacchā vippaṭisārena pana nāpi uḷāresu bhogesu cittaṃ namati.
tika-s0105t:930_0: “Yaṃ kho so mahārāja seṭṭhi gahapati datvā pacchā vippaṭisārī ahosi ‘varametaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dāsā vā kammakarā vā bhuñjeyyu’nti,
tika-s0105t:930_1: tassa kammassa vipākena nāssuḷārāya bhattabhogāya cittaṃ namati,
tika-s0105t:930_4: nāssuḷārānaṃ pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ bhogāya cittaṃ namatī”ti.
tika-s0105t:932_0: “Iti mahārāja āgantukaseṭṭhi tagarasikhipaccekabuddhassa dinnapaccayena bahuṃ dhanaṃ labhi,
tika-s0105t:932_1: datvā aparacetanaṃ paṇītaṃ kātuṃ asamatthatāya paṇīte bhoge bhuñjituṃ nāsakkhī”ti.
tika-s0105t:933_0: Bhātu panesa ekaṃ puttaṃ sāpateyyassa kāraṇā jīvitaṃ voropesi,
tika-s0105t:933_1: tena kammena bahūni vassāni niraye paccittha,
tika-s0105t:933_6: Ekā hi cetanā dve paṭisandhiyo na detīti.
tika-s0105t:935_1: Ākaroti attano anurūpatāya samariyādaparicchedaṃ phalaṃ nibbattetīti ākāro,
tika-s0105t:935_6: Tadubhayepi na uppādetabboti hi dassetuṃ api- saddena, pi-
tika-s0105t:935_8: Paṭiggāhakatova uppajjatīti balavataraṃ vippaṭisāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:937_1: Anumatipakkhādayo eva heṭṭhā yaññassa vatthuṃ katvā “soḷasaparikkhārā”ti vuttā,
tika-s0105t:937_2: idha pana sandassanādivasena anumodanāya āraddhattā vuttaṃ “soḷasahi ākārehī”ti.
tika-s0105t:937_3: Dassetvāti attano desanānubhāvena paccakkhamiva phalaṃ dassetvā,
tika-s0105t:937_5: tadeva ābhuso meḍanaṭṭhena āmeḍitavacananti ācariyena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:937_8: Samādapetvāti sutamattaṃ akatvā yathā rājā tamatthaṃ sammadeva ādiyati citte karonto suggahitaṃ katvā gaṇhāti,
tika-s0105t:938_2: tesaṃ vinodanenapi taṃ vodāpitaṃ samuttejitaṃ nāma hoti tikkhavisadabhāvāpattito,
tika-s0105t:938_5: Yāthāvato vijjamānehi guṇehi haṭṭhapahaṭṭhabhāvāpādanaṃ sampahaṃsananti āha “sundara”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t:939_3: sabbaso viparītaggāhehi avidūsitatādassanatthañca pāḷiyaṃ “neva gāvo haññiṃsū”tiādīni vatvāpi “na rukkhā
tika-s0105t:939_9: Bhūmiyaṃ vā pattharantīti vedibhūmiṃ parikkhipantā tattha tattha pattharanti.
tika-s0105t:939_10: Mantādinā hi parisaṅkhatā bhūmi vindati assa lābhasakkāreti katvā “vedī”ti vuccati.
tika-s0105t:939_20: Dhanaṃ gahetvāti divase divase yathākammaṃ gahetvā.
tika-s0105t:939_30: tena paṇītapaṇītānaṃ nānappakārānaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyādīnañceva vatthayānamālāgandhavilepanaseyyāvasathādīnañca saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-s0105t:940_2: attano attano santakabhāvato ca saṃ nāma dhanaṃ vuccati,
tika-s0105t:941_3: tāya ca puratthimanagaradvāre katāya puratthimabhāge evāti atthaṃ dasseti “puratthimato nagaradvāre”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:941_4: Taṃ pana ṭhānaṃ rañño dānasālāya nātidūre evāti āha “yathā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:941_5: Yato tattha pātarāsaṃ bhuñjitvā akilantarūpāyeva sāyanhe rañño dānasālaṃ sampāpuṇanti.
tika-s0105t:942_2: Upari vattabbamatthanti “apica me bho evaṃ hotī”tiādinā vuccamānamatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:942_5: ujukavuttiṃ pariharitvā vaṅkavuttiyāva yathācintitamatthaṃ pucchanto evamāhāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:944_4: Appasambhārataro ceva mahapphalataro cāti saṅkhepato aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto pāḷiyaṃ pana “appatthataro ca
tika-s0105t:944_5: appasamārambhataro ca mahapphalataro ca mahānisaṃsataro cā”ti pāṭho.
tika-s0105t:944_20: Dhuvadānānīti dhuvāni thirāni avicchinnāni katvā dātabbadānāni.
tika-s0105t:945_5: “Ekasalākato uddhaṃ dātuṃ nāsakkhī”ti iminā ekenapi salākadānena nibaddhadānaṃ upacchinditumadatvā anurakkhaṇamāha.
tika-s0105t:946_0: Ādīni vatvāti ettha ādisaddena “kasmā seno viya maṃsapesiṃ pakkhanditvā gaṇhāsī”ti evamādīnaṃ samasamadāne ussukkanavacanānaṃ saṅgaho.
tika-s0105t:946_2: “Kammacchedavasenā”ti iminā attano attano kammokāsādānampi pīḷāyevāti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:946_5: vītarāgatāvītadosatāvītamohatāpaṭipattiyā dakkhiṇeyyavasena ca tīṇīti evaṃ chaḷaṅgasamannāgatā hoti dakkhiṇā,
tika-s0105t:946_8: mahogho viya ca ito cito ca abhisanditvā pakkhanditvā pavattito puññameva puññābhisando.
tika-s0105t:946_10: Kāraṇamahattena phalamahattampi veditabbaṃ upari najjā vuṭṭhiyā mahogho viyāti vuttaṃ “tasmā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:947_2: divase divase dāyakassa byāpārāpajjanato kiccapariyosānaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ “ekenā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:947_3: Yathāraddhassa āvāsassa katipayenāpi kālena parisamāpetabbato kiccapariyosānaṃ atthīti āha “paṇṇasāla”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t:947_4: Mahāvihārepi kiccapariyosānassa atthitāupāyaṃ dassetuṃ “ekavāraṃ dhanapariccāgaṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:947_6: Navānisaṃsāti sītapaṭighātādayo paṭisallānārāmapariyosānā yathāpaccavekkhaṇaṃ gaṇitā nava udayā,
tika-s0105t:948_0: Yasmā pana āvāsaṃ dentena nāma sabbampi paccayajātaṃ dinnameva hoti.
tika-s0105t:948_1: Yathāha saṃyuttāgamavaralañchake “so ca sabbadado hoti yo dadāti upassaya”nti,
tika-s0105t:948_5: sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī”ti tathā hi dve tayo gāme piṇḍāya caritvā kiñci aladdhā āgatassāpi chāyūdakasampannaṃ
tika-s0105t:948_6: ārāmaṃ pavisitvā nahāyitvā patissaye muhuttaṃ nipajjitvā uṭṭhāya nisinnassa kāye balaṃ āharitvā pakkhittaṃ
tika-s0105t:948_8: Bahi vicarantassa ca kāye vaṇṇadhātu vātātapehi kilamati,
tika-s0105t:948_9: patissayaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya muhuttaṃ nipannassa visabhāgasantati vūpasammati,
tika-s0105t:948_12: Bahi vicarantassa ca pāde kaṇṭako vijjhati,
tika-s0105t:948_15: patissayaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya nipannassa sabbe te parissayā na honti,
tika-s0105t:948_17: kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karontassa upasamasukhañca uppajjati bahiddhā vikkhepābhāvato.
tika-s0105t:948_18: Bahi vicarantassa ca kāye sedā muccanti akkhīni phandanti,
tika-s0105t:948_20: muhuttaṃ nipannassa pana akkhipasādo āharitvā pakkhitto viya hoti,
tika-s0105t:948_22: Etasmiñca āvāse vasantaṃ disvā manussā catūhi paccayehi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahanti.
tika-s0105t:948_25: tasmā ete yathāvuttā sabbepi ānisaṃsā veditabbā.
tika-s0105t:949_0: Khandhakapariyāyenāti senāsanakkhandhake āgatavinayapāḷinayena. Tattha hi āgatā –
tika-s0105t:951_0: Sarīsape ca makase, sisire cāpi vuṭṭhiyo.
tika-s0105t:955_0: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ atthamattano.
tika-s0105t:960_0: Yaṃ so dhammaṃ idhaññāya, parinibbāti anāsavo”ti. –
tika-s0105t:961_2: Sisire cāpi vuṭṭhiyoti ettha sisiroti samphusitakavāto vuccati.
tika-s0105t:962_3: “Jhāyituñca vipassitu”nti idampi padadvayaṃ “sukhatthañcā”ti imināva padena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:962_10: “idha jhāyissati vipassissatī”ti dadato vihāradānaṃ saṅghassa aggaṃ buddhena vaṇṇitaṃ.
tika-s0105t:963_2: Vāsayettha bahussuteti ettha vihāre pariyattibahussute ca paṭivedhabahussute ca vāseyya.
tika-s0105t:963_3: Tesaṃ annañcāti yaṃ tesaṃ anucchavikaṃ annañca pānañca vatthāni ca mañcapīṭhādisenāsanāni ca,
tika-s0105t:963_8: Evaṃ vippasannacittassa hi te tassa dhammaṃ desenti…pe…
tika-s0105t:964_0: Ayaṃ pana ācariyadhammapālattherena ceva ācariyasāriputtattherena ca saṃvaṇṇito ṭīkānayo –
tika-s0105t:964_1: sītanti ajjhattaṃ dhātukkhobhavasena vā bahiddhā utuvipariṇāmavasena vā uppajjanakasītaṃ.
tika-s0105t:964_4: Paṭihantīti paṭibādhati yathā tadubhayavasena kāyacittānaṃ bādhanaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0105t:964_6: Sītuṇhabbhāhate hi sarīre vikkhittacitto bhikkhu yoniso padahituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0105t:964_8: Guttasenāsanañhi āraññakampi pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya nisinnassa te parissayā na honti.
tika-s0105t:964_9: Sarīsapeti ye keci sarante gacchante dīghajātike sappādike.
tika-s0105t:964_14: Vuṭṭhiyoti yadā tadā uppannā vassavuṭṭhiyo paṭihantīti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:965_0: Vātātapo ghoroti rukkhagacchādīnaṃ ummūlabhañjanādivasena pavattiyā ghoro sarajaarajādibhedo vāto ceva
tika-s0105t:965_1: gimhapariḷāhasamayesu uppattiyā ghoro sūriyātapo ca paṭihaññati paṭibāhīyati.
tika-s0105t:965_4: Jhāyitunti aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu yattha katthaci cittaṃ upanibandhitvā upanijjhāyituṃ.
tika-s0105t:966_3: Vāsayettha bahussuteti kāretvā pana ettha vihāre bahussute sīlavante kalyāṇadhamme nivāseyya,
tika-s0105t:966_4: te nivāsento pana tesaṃ bahussutānaṃ yathā paccayehi kilamatho na hoti,
tika-s0105t:966_5: evaṃ annañca pānañca vatthasenāsanāni ca dadeyya ujubhūtesu ajjhāsayasampannesu kammakammaphalānaṃ,
tika-s0105t:967_0: Idāni gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ aññamaññūpakāritaṃ dassetuṃ “te tassā”ti gāthamāha.
tika-s0105t:967_4: Yaṃ so dhammaṃ idhaññāyāti so upāsako yaṃ saddhammaṃ imasmiṃ sāsane sammāpaṭipajjanena jānitvā aggamaggādhigamanena
tika-s0105t:967_5: anāsavo hutvā parinibbāti ekādasaggivūpasamena sīti bhavatīti.
tika-s0105t:969_0: Paṭiggahaṇakānaṃ vihāravasena uppannaphalānurūpampi dāyakānaṃ vihāradānaphalaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:969_2: “Saṅghassa pana pariccattattā”ti iminā saṅghikavihārameva padhānavasena vadati,
tika-s0105t:969_3: saṅghikavihāro nāmesa cātuddisaṃ saṅghaṃ uddissa katavihāro,
tika-s0105t:969_4: yaṃ sandhāya padabhājaniyaṃ vuttaṃ “saṅghiko nāma vihāro saṅghassa dinno hoti pariccatto”ti.
tika-s0105t:969_7: catūhi disāhi bhikkhū āgantvā appaṭipucchitvāyeva pāde dhovitvā kuñcikāya dvāraṃ vivaritvā senāsanaṃ paṭijaggitvā yathāphāsukaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0105t:970_4: saraṇaṃ pana tesaṃ sāmaṃ samādinnampi samādinnameva hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0105t:970_5: Saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā santiketi yojanā.
tika-s0105t:970_9: Natthi punappunaṃ kattabbatāti viññūjātike sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:970_10: Viññūjātikānameva hi saraṇādiatthakosallānaṃ suvaṇṇaghaṭe sīhavasā viya akuppaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0105t:970_11: “Jīvitapariccāgamayaṃ puñña”nti ca idaṃ “sace tvaṃ yathāgahitaṃ saraṇaṃ na bhindissati,
tika-s0105t:970_12: evāhaṃ taṃ māremī”ti kāmaṃ koci tiṇhena satthena jīvitā voropeyya,
tika-s0105t:970_15: saṅghaṃ ‘na saṅgho’ti vadāmī”ti daḷhataraṃ katvā gahitasaraṇassa vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:971_2: taṃ maṇati “mayi idha ṭhitāya kathamāgacchasī”ti tajjentī viya nivāretīti veramaṇī,
tika-s0105t:971_3: tato vā pāpadhammato viramati etāyāti “viramaṇī”ti vattabbe niruttinayena i-
tika-s0105t:971_7: viramaṇisikkhāpadanti dvidhāsajjhāyaṃ karontī”ti kusalacittasampayuttāvettha virati adhippetā,
tika-s0105t:971_12: tappariyāpannā hutvā pāpadhammānaṃ samucchedavasena ghātanappavattā virati setughātavirati.
tika-s0105t:971_14: Idāni tā sarūpato dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Jāti…pe…
tika-s0105t:972_4: veramaṇiṃ samādiyāmī”ti evamādīnaṃ paccekamatthānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0105t:972_9: akhaṇḍā’ chiddā’ kammāsā’ sabalakāritāya ca gaṇhāmīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:973_4: bhedatotiādinā anekadhā vinicchayesu saṅkhepeneva ārammaṇato vinicchayaṃ dassetuṃ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:973_9: abrahmacariyā ca viramatī”ti khuddakāgamaṭṭhakathāvacanena saṃsandati sametīti.
tika-s0105t:973_14: Taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattantīti yathāvuttaṃ vītikkamavatthuṃ ālambitvā vītikkamanacetanāsaṅkhātaviramitabbavatthuto viramaṇavasena pavattanti.
tika-s0105t:973_17: Iminā pana tattheva āgatesu tīsu ācariyavādesu dve paṭibāhitvā ekassevānujānanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:974_2: taṃ attano pāṇātipātādiakusalamevārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattatī”ti keci vadanti.
tika-s0105t:974_4: taṃ attano vā paresaṃ vā pāṇātipātādiakusalamevālambaṇaṃ katvā pavattati.
tika-s0105t:974_6: tesaṃ pāṇātipātādīnaṃ ālambaṇāneva ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattatī”ti apare.
tika-s0105t:974_9: Purimapurimapadatthañhi vītikkamavatthumālambaṇaṃ katvā pacchimapacchimapadatthato viramitabbavatthuto viramatī”ti aññe.
tika-s0105t:974_21: Tena vuttaṃ “tīsu ācariyavādesu dve paṭibāhitvā ekassevānujānanaṃ veditabba”nti.
tika-s0105t:975_2: evaṃ sati aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ kareyya,
tika-s0105t:975_4: taṃ na jāneyyāti aya’manadhippeto attho āpajjatīti? Vuccate –
tika-s0105t:975_5: na hi kiccasādhanavasena pavattento “aññaṃ cintento aññaṃ karotī”ti vā “yañca pajahati,
tika-s0105t:975_7: Yathā pana ariyamaggo nibbānārammaṇova kilese pajahati,
tika-s0105t:975_8: evaṃ jīvitindriyādivatthārammaṇampetaṃ viratidvayaṃ pāṇātipātādīni dussīlyāni pajahati.
tika-s0105t:978_3: Evampi hi kiccavasena etāsaṃ pañcavidhatā viññāyati.
tika-s0105t:978_5: Na hi tadā pañcaṅgikattaṃ sīlassa sampajjati.
tika-s0105t:978_8: “Pāṇātipātā veramaṇisikkhāpadaṃ samādiyāmī”tiādinā ekekaṃ visuṃ visuṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-s0105t:978_12: Sāmaṇerānaṃ pana yathā tathā vā samādāne ekasmiṃ bhinne sabbānipi bhinnāni honti pārājikāpattito.
tika-s0105t:978_15: khuddakāgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ekajjhaṃ samādiyato ekāyeva virati ekāva cetanā hoti,
tika-s0105t:978_18: pañca ca cetanā hontī”ti ayaṃ viseso vutto.
tika-s0105t:978_20: sāmaṇerānaṃ ekasmiṃ bhinne sabbānipi bhinnāni honti.
tika-s0105t:978_24: Gahaṭṭhānaṃ pana ekasmiṃ bhinne ekameva bhinnaṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:978_25: yato tesaṃ taṃsamādāneneva puna pañcaṅgikattaṃ sīlassa sampajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:978_26: Yathāvuttopi dīghabhāṇakānaṃ vādo aparevādo nāma tattha kato.
tika-s0105t:979_0: Setughātaviratiyā pana bhedo nāma natthi paṭipakkhasamucchindanena akuppasabhāvattā.
tika-s0105t:979_2: Tattha “bhavantarepī”ti iminā attano ariyabhāvaṃ ajānantopīti atthaṃ viññāpeti.
tika-s0105t:979_11: yaṃ vā panaññampi surāsavavinimuttaṃ madanīya”nti saṃyuttamahāvaggaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:979_13: yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñci atthi madanīyaṃ,
tika-s0105t:979_15: idaṃ vuccati majja”nti “sace pissā”tiādinā tattheva visesadassanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:979_16: ajānantassapi khīrameva mukhaṃ pavisati, na surā,
tika-s0105t:979_19: Sacepi mukhe khīramissake udake pakkhipantīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:979_20: “Na cettha upamopameyyānaṃ sambaddhatā siyā koñcasakuṇānaṃ yonisiddhattā”ti koci vadeyyāti āha “ida”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t:979_21: Yonisiddhanti manussatiracchānānaṃ uddhaṃ tiriyameva dīghatā viya,
tika-s0105t:979_23: kukkuṭīnaṃ vātena gabbhaggahaṇaṃ viya ca jātisiddhaṃ,
tika-s0105t:979_26: Dhammatāsiddhanti bodhisatte kucchigate bodhisattamātu sīlaṃ viya,
tika-s0105t:979_27: vijāte tassā divaṅgamanaṃ viya ca sabhāvena siddhaṃ,
tika-s0105t:979_28: maggadhammatāya vā ariyamaggānubhāvena siddhanti veditabbanti vissajjeyyāti attho.
tika-s0105t:980_4: Yathā vā tathā vā gaṇhantassāpīti ādaraṃ gāravamakatvā samādiyantassāpi.
tika-s0105t:980_5: Sādhukaṃ gaṇhantassāpīti sakkaccaṃ sīlāni samādiyantassāpi appaṭṭhatarameva,
tika-s0105t:980_7: na diguṇaṃ ussāho karaṇīyoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:980_9: anavasesaṃ vā sattanikāyaṃ dayati rakkhatīti dānaṃ.
tika-s0105t:980_11: saraṇaṃ upagatena kāyavācācittehi sakkaccaṃ vatthuttayapūjā kātabbā,
tika-s0105t:981_5: Sabbaso kenacipi pakārena sādhūhi na kiṇṇāni na chaḍḍitānīti asaṃkiṇṇāni.
tika-s0105t:981_13: Na hi kadācipi viññū samaṇabrāhmaṇā hiṃsādipāpadhammaṃ anujānanti.
tika-s0105t:981_14: Aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ abhayaṃ detīti sabbesu bhūtesu nihitadaṇḍattā sakalassapi sattanikāyassa bhayābhāvaṃ deti.
tika-s0105t:981_15: Na hi ariyasāvakato kassaci bhayaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:982_4: na ca ekantato vimuttāyatanaṃ bāhirakānampi samādinnattā.
tika-s0105t:982_7: kathaṃ tattha saraṇagamanato pañcasīlassa mahapphalatāti āha “kiñcāpī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:982_9: “Saraṇagamaneyeva patiṭṭhāyā”ti iminā tassa sīlassa saraṇagamanena abhisaṅkhatattā tato mahapphalataṃ,
tika-s0105t:982_10: tathā anabhisaṅkhatassa ca sīlassa appaphalataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:983_3: kasmā buddhuppādato paṭṭhāya desanamārabhatīti anuyogaṃ pariharituṃ “tividha…pe…
tika-s0105t:983_5: Tividhasīlapāripūriyaṃ ṭhitassa hi nesaṃ yaññānaṃ appaṭṭhataratā,
tika-s0105t:983_7: tasmā taṃ dassetukāmattā buddhuppādato paṭṭhāya desanaṃ ārabhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:983_9: Heṭṭhā vuttehi guṇehīti ettha “so taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhatī”tiādinā heṭṭhā vuttā saraṇagamanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:983_12: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ nibbattento na kilamatīti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:983_14: “Paṭhamaṃ jhāna”ntiādinā pāḷiyaṃ paṇītānameva jhānānaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddeso katoti mantavā “ekaṃ kappaṃ,
tika-s0105t:983_17: Hīnaṃ pana paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyakappassa tatiyabhāgaṃ āyuṃ deti.
tika-s0105t:983_21: Apica yasmā paṇītāniyevettha jhānāni adhippetāni mahapphalatarabhāvadassanaparattā desanāya,
tika-s0105t:983_22: tasmā “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ ekaṃ kappa”ntiādinā paṇītāneva jhānāni niddiṭṭhānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:984_2: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ āruppatāti āha “ākāsānañcāyatanādisamāpattivasena bhāvita”nti,
tika-s0105t:984_3: tathā bhāvitattā catutthajjhānameva āruppaṃ hutvā vīsatikappasahassādīni āyuṃ detīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:984_6: taṃ pana kasmā vīsatikappasahassādīni āyuṃ detīti vuttaṃ “ākāsānañcāyatanādisamāpattivasena bhāvita”nti,
tika-s0105t:984_8: Aparo nayo “tadevā”ti vutte rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānamevāti attho āpajjeyyāti taṃ nivattetuṃ “ākāsānañcāyatanādisamāpattivasena bhāvita”nti āha,
tika-s0105t:984_9: tathā bhāvitaṃ aṅgasamatāya catutthajjhānasaṅkhātaṃ āruppajjhānamevādhippetanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:985_0: Sammadeva niccasaññādipaṭipakkhavidhamanavasena pavattamānā pubbabhāgiye eva bodhipakkhiyadhamme samānentī
tika-s0105t:985_1: vipassanā vipassakapuggalassa anappakaṃ pītisomanassaṃ samāvahatīti vuttaṃ “vipassanāsukhasadisassa pana
tika-s0105t:988_0: Yasmā panāyaṃ desanā iminā anukkamena imāni ñāṇāni nibbattentassa vasena pavattitā,
tika-s0105t:988_1: tasmā “vipassanāñāṇe patiṭṭhāyā”tiādinā heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ uparimassa uparimassa patiṭṭhābhūtaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:988_2: Samānarūpanimmānaṃ nāma manomayiddhiyā aññehi asādhāraṇakiccanti āha “attano…pe…
tika-s0105t:990_4: Sabbe te pāṇayoti “satta ca usabhasatānī”tiādinā vutte sabbe te pāṇino.
tika-s0105t:990_6: Ākulabhāvoti bhagavato santike dhammassa sutattā pāṇīsu anuddayaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā ṭhitassa “kathañhi nāma
tika-s0105t:990_7: mayā tāva bahū pāṇino māraṇatthāya bandhāpitā”ti citte paribyākulabhāvo,
tika-s0105t:990_11: Sutvāti “muttā bho te pāṇayo”ti ārocitavacanaṃ sutvā.
tika-s0105t:990_13: “Kallacittaṃ muducittaṃ vinīvaraṇacittaṃ udaggacittaṃ pasannacitta”nti idaṃ padapañcakaṃ sandhāya“kallacittantiādī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:990_19: vicikicchāvigamena sammāpaṭipattiyā avimuttatāya pasannacittatā anāvilacittatā ca hotīti āha “anupubbikathānubhāvena
tika-s0105t:995_1: Evaṃ kūṭadantasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni mahālisuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ saṃvaṇṇanokāsassa pattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ,
tika-s0105t:995_2: kūṭadantasuttassānantaraṃ saṅgītassa suttassa mahālisuttabhāvaṃ vā pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe…
tika-s0105t:995_5: bārāṇasirañño kira aggamahesiyā maṃsapesigabbhena dve dārakā nibbattā dhītā ca putto ca,
tika-s0105t:995_6: tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ vivāhena soḷasakkhattuṃ puttadhītuvasena dve dve dārakā vijātā.
tika-s0105t:995_7: Tato tesaṃ dārakānaṃ yathākkamaṃ vaḍḍhentānaṃ paccekaṃ saparivārānaṃ ārāmuyyānanivāsaṭṭhānaparivārasampattiṃ
tika-s0105t:995_8: gahetuṃ appahonakatāya nagaraṃ tikkhattuṃ gāvutantarena gāvutantarena parikkhipiṃsu,
tika-s0105t:995_9: evaṃ tassa punappunaṃ tipākāraparikkhepena visālabhāvamupagatattā “vesālī”tveva nāmaṃ jātaṃ.
tika-s0105t:995_10: Tena vuttaṃ “punappunaṃ visālabhāvūpagamanato vesālīti laddhanāmake nagare”ti.
tika-s0105t:995_19: Yaṃ pana venayikānaṃ matena vinayaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ –
tika-s0105t:996_0: “Tattha mahāvanaṃ nāma sayaṃjātaṃ aropimaṃ saparicchedaṃ mahantaṃ vanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:996_1: Kapilavatthusāmantā pana mahāvanaṃ himavantena saha ekābaddhaṃ aparicchedaṃ hutvā mahāsamuddaṃ āhacca ṭhitaṃ,
tika-s0105t:997_2: Idha pana dīghabhāṇakānaṃ matena evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:997_7: tabbohārena pana sakalopi saṅghārāmoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:998_0: “Kūṭāgārasālā pana mahāvanaṃ nissāya kate ārāme kūṭāgāraṃ antokatvā haṃsavaṭṭakacchadanena katā sabbākārasampannā
tika-s0105t:999_8: tasmā samavāye sati kattabbato taṃ kiccanti vuccatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:1000_10: Saparivārattā anekopi tadā eko viya bhavatīti ekībhāvo,
tika-s0105t:1002_2: Tassa kira uttaroṭṭhassa appakatāya tiriyaṃ phāletvā addhamapanītaṃ viya khāyati cattāro dante,
tika-s0105t:1002_6: saddena pāṭhaṃ parikappetvā heṭṭhā oṭṭhassa olambakatāya “oṭṭhādho”ti atthaṃ vadanti,
tika-s0105t:1002_9: Ayaṃ kira uposathiko dāyako dānapati saddho pasanno buddhamāmako dhammasaṅghamāmako.
tika-s0105t:1002_14: Ayaṃ pana vesālī bhagavato kāle iddhā ceva vepullappattā ca ahosi.
tika-s0105t:1002_23: Tassa pana kulassa ādibhūtānaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ maṃsapesiyā nibbattadārakānaṃ tāpasena pāyitaṃ yaṃ khīraṃ udaraṃ pavisati,
tika-s0105t:1002_25: carimakabhave bodhisatte kucchigate bodhisattamātu viya udaracchaviyā ativippasannatāya te nicchavī ahesuṃ.
tika-s0105t:1002_26: Apare panāhu “sibbetvā ṭhapitā viya nesaṃ aññamaññaṃ līnā chavi ahosī”ti.
tika-s0105t:1002_27: Evaṃ te nicchavitāya vā līnacchavitāya vā licchavīti paññāyiṃsu,
tika-s0105t:1002_29: tabbaṃse uppannā sabbepi licchavayo nāma jātā.
tika-s0105t:1002_33: Mahantaṃ yasaṃ lāti gaṇhātīti mahāli yathā “bhaddālī”ti.
tika-s0105t:1003_2: Sabbattha sīhasamānavuttinopi bhagavato parisāya mahatte sati tadajjhāsayānurūpaṃ pavattiyamānāya dhammadesanāya
tika-s0105t:1003_3: viseso hotīti āha “mahantena ussāhena dhammaṃ desessatī”ti.
tika-s0105t:1004_3: vāsanālesaṃ pana upādāya “īsakaṃ appahīno viya hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1004_4: Na hi sāvakānaṃ buddhānamiva savāsanā kilesā pahīyanti.
tika-s0105t:1005_1: Vineyyajanānuparodhena buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ paṭihāriyavijambhanaṃ hotīti āha “atha kho”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:1005_2: Gandhakuṭito nikkhamanavelāyañhi chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo āveḷāveḷā yamalā yamalā hutvā savisesaṃ pabhassarā vinicchariṃsu.
tika-s0105t:1006_2: tathā “hiyyo”ti vuttadivasato paraṃ purimataraṃ atisayena purimattā.
tika-s0105t:1006_3: Iti imesu dvīsu divasesu vavatthito yathākkamaṃ purimapurimatarabhāvo.
tika-s0105t:1006_10: hi disāvidisābhāvassa viya ca purimapurimatarabhāvassa apekkhāsiddhi.
tika-s0105t:1006_16: Taṃ panettha parā atītā koṭiyevāti āha “parakoṭiṃ katvā”ti. Yaṃ-
tika-s0105t:1006_19: attho pana atītavasena veditabboti dassetuṃ “yāva vihāsi”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1006_21: Paṭhamavikappe “viharāmī”ti imassa “yadagge”ti iminā ujukaṃ tāva sambandhitvā pacchā “naciraṃ tīṇi vassānī”ti pamāṇavacanaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1006_22: Dutiyavikappe pana “naciraṃ tīṇi vassānī”ti imehipi kuṭilaṃ sambandho kattabbo.
tika-s0105t:1007_11: Tasmā saddenāti taṃ nissāya tato uppannena saddenāti attho.
tika-s0105t:1008_2: kiṃ imassa sāsane adhiṭṭhānenā”ti kujjhanto bhagavati āghātaṃ bandhitvā,
tika-s0105t:1008_4: Cintesīti “kasmā nu kho so mayhaṃ taṃ parikammaṃ na kathesī”ti parivicārento ayoniso ummujjanavasena cintesi.
tika-s0105t:1008_6: mahāsīhanādasutte ca āgatanayena taṃ taṃ ayuttameva cintento, bhāsanto,
tika-s0105t:1008_7: karonto ca anukkamena bhagavati baddhāghātatāya sāsane patiṭṭhaṃ alabhanto gihibhāvaṃ patvā tamatthaṃ katheti.
tika-s0105t:1010_4: so ca adhikārato dibbarūpadassanadibbasaddasavanavasena veditabboti āha “ekakoṭṭhāsāyā”tiādi. Vā-
tika-s0105t:1010_12: Tayidaṃ visuṃ visuṃ parikammakaraṇena ijjhantīsu vattabbaṃ natthi,
tika-s0105t:1010_13: ekajjhaṃ ijjhantīsupi kameneva kiccasiddhi bhavati ekajjhaṃ kiccasiddhiyā asambhavato.
tika-s0105t:1010_15: dibbānañca saddānaṃ savanāyā”ti idaṃ ekassa ubhayasamatthatāsandassanameva,
tika-s0105t:1010_17: “Ekaṃsabhāvito samādhi hetū”ti iminā sunakkhatto dibbacakkhuñāṇāya eva parikammassa katattā vijjamānampi dibbasaddaṃ nāssosīti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:1011_1: Dibbacakkhuñāṇato dibbasotañāṇameva seṭṭhanti maññamāno mahāli etamatthaṃ pucchatīti āha “idaṃ dibbasotena…pe… maññe”ti.
tika-s0105t:1011_5: “Dibbasotañāṇaṃ seṭṭha”nti maññamānena ca tena dibbacakkhuñāṇampi dibbasoteneva saha gahetvā “etāsaṃ
tika-s0105t:1011_6: nūna bhante”tiādinā puthuvacanena pucchitanti dassetuṃ “ubhayaṃsabhāvitānaṃ samādhīna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1011_10: Na hi te saccāni viya sāmukkaṃsikā.
tika-s0105t:1011_18: yesaṃ sacchikiriyāhetu bhikkhū mayi brahmacariyaṃ carantī”ti sacchikātabbadhammā ca idha vuttā.
tika-s0105t:1013_2: Tasmāti yasmā vaṭṭadukkhabhaye saṃyojanato tattha satte saṃyojenti nāma, tasmā.
tika-s0105t:1013_8: Āpannoti ca ādito pattoti attho ā-
tika-s0105t:1013_14: sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanne dānaṃ detī”ti apatanadhammoti anupapajjanasabhāvo.
tika-s0105t:1013_16: Heṭṭhimantena sattamabhavato upari anupapajjanadhammatāya vā niyatoti aṭṭhakathāmuttakanayo.
tika-s0105t:1013_17: Paraṃ ayanaṃ parāgati assa atthīti attho.
tika-s0105t:1014_4: “Orena ce māso seso gimhānanti vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyeseyyā”tiādīsu viya ora-
tika-s0105t:1014_12: Cittasīsena cettha samādhi gahito “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño,
tika-s0105t:1014_23: Paccakkhakaraṇaṃ nāma anussavākāraparivitakkādike muñcitvā sarūpato ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1016_4: sā ca tassa pubbabhāgo evāti ariyamaggo pubbabhāgapaṭipadānāmena idha vutto.
tika-s0105t:1016_7: Aṭṭhaṅgato mutto añño koci aṭṭhaṅgiko nāma maggo natthīti āha “aṭṭhaṅgamattoyevā”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:1016_8: Na hi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma koci atthīti.
tika-s0105t:1016_9: Tasmā “aṭṭha aṅgāni assāti aññapadatthasamāsaṃ akatvā ‘aṭṭha aṅgāni aṭṭhaṅgāni,
tika-s0105t:1016_10: tāni assa santīti aṭṭhaṅgiko’ti samāsagabbhataddhitavasena padasiddhi kātabbā”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1016_12: Aññapadatthasamāse hi kate na sakkā aṭṭhaṅgaaṭṭhaṅgikānaṃ bhedo aññamaññaṃ vipariyāyaṃ katvāpi niyametuṃ
tika-s0105t:1016_14: Samāsagabbhe pana taddhite kate sakkā eva tesaṃ bhedo aññamaññaṃ vipariyāyaṃ katvā niyametuṃ samāse uttarapadatthaparabhāvena
tika-s0105t:1016_17: Dhammadāyādasuttantaṭīkāyaṃ pana ācariyeneva evaṃ vuttaṃ “yasmā maggaṅgasamudāye maggavohāro hoti,
tika-s0105t:1016_19: tasmā attano avayavabhūtāni aṭṭha aṅgāni etassa santīti aṭṭhaṅgiko”ti.
tika-s0105t:1016_20: Paṭhamanaye cettha aṅginā aṅgassa aṭṭhaṅgikabhāvo vutto,
tika-s0105t:1016_21: dutiyanaye pana aṅgena aṅginoti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-s0105t:1017_2: Sammādassanalakkhaṇāti aviparītaṃ yāthāvato catunnamariyasaccānaṃ paccakkhameva dassanasabhāvā.
tika-s0105t:1017_4: Sammā pariggahaṇalakkhaṇāti caturaṅgasamannāgatā vācā jane saṅgaṇhātīti tabbipakkhato viratisabhāvā sammāvācā bhedakaramicchāvācappahānena jane,
tika-s0105t:1017_7: Sammā samuṭṭhāpanalakkhaṇoti yathā cīvarakammādiko kammanto ekaṃ kātabbaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-s0105t:1017_8: taṃtaṃkiriyānipphādako vā cetanāsaṅkhāto kammanto hatthapādacalanādikaṃ kiriyaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-s0105t:1017_10: sampayutte ca samuṭṭhāpento eva pavattatīti aviparītaṃ samuṭṭhāpanasabhāvo.
tika-s0105t:1017_13: Sammā paggahalakkhaṇoti sasampayuttadhammassa cittassa saṃkilesapakkhe patitumadatvā aviparītaṃ paggahaṇasabhāvo.
tika-s0105t:1017_14: Sammā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇāti tādibhāvalakkhaṇena aviparītaṃ tattha upaṭṭhānasabhāvo.
tika-s0105t:1017_15: Sammā samādhānalakkhaṇoti vikkhepaviddhaṃsanena aviparītaṃ cittassa samādahanasabhāvo.
tika-s0105t:1018_0: Sahajekaṭṭhatāya diṭṭhekaṭṭhā avijjādayo micchādiṭṭhito aññe attano paccanīkakilesā nāma.
tika-s0105t:1018_5: Teneva hi sammādiṭṭhisaṅkhātena aṅgena tattha paccavekkhaṇā pavattati.
tika-s0105t:1018_6: Purimāni dve kiccāni sabbesameva sādhāraṇānīti āha “sammāsaṅkappādayopī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:1019_5: Kiccatoti pubbabhāge dukkhādiñāṇehi kattabbena idha sātisayaṃ nibbattena kiccena,
tika-s0105t:1019_7: Cattāri nāmāni labhati catūsu saccesu kātabbakicca nibbattito.Tīṇi nāmāni labhati kāmasaṅkappādippahānanibbattito.
tika-s0105t:1019_10: Tattha pana padhānānaṃ viraticetanānaṃ vasena “viratiyopi honti cetanāyopī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1019_15: ekāyeva viratiyā musāvādādiviratibhāvo viya ca ekāya eva cetanāya sammāvācādikiccattayasādhanāsambhavena sammāvācādibhāvāsiddhito,
tika-s0105t:1019_16: taṃsiddhiyañca aṅgattayattāsiddhito ca evaṃ vuttantipi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1020_0: Yadipi samādhiupakārakānaṃ abhiniropanā numajjanasampiyāyanu pabrūhanasantānaṃ vitakkavicārapītisukhopekkhānaṃ
tika-s0105t:1020_3: sati viya ca asubhāsukhāniccānattabhūtesu kāyādīsu subhādisaññāpahānacatusatikiccaṃ ekova samādhi catukkajjhānasamādhikiccaṃ na sādheti.
tika-s0105t:1020_5: Tathā maggakkhaṇepi pubbabhāgepi dutiyajjhānasamādhi dutiyajjhānasamādhi eva.
tika-s0105t:1020_6: Tathā maggakkhaṇepi pubbabhāgepi tatiyajjhānasamādhi tatiyajjhānasamādhi eva.
tika-s0105t:1020_7: Tathā maggakkhaṇepi pubbabhāgepi catutthajjhānasamādhi catutthajjhānasamādhi eva.
tika-s0105t:1021_0: Tasmāti paññāpajjotattā avijjāndhakāraṃ vidhamitvā paññāsatthattā kilesacore ghātentoti yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1021_1: Yasmā pana anādimati saṃsāre iminā yoginā kadācipi asamugghāṭitapubbo kilesagaṇo,
tika-s0105t:1021_3: Ayañcettha sammādiṭṭhi pariññābhisamayādivasena pavattiyā pubbaṅgamā hoti bahūpakārā, tasmā.
tika-s0105t:1021_4: Tadeva bahūpakārataṃ kāraṇabhāvena dassetuṃ “yogino bahūpakārattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1022_1: “Bahūpakāro”ti vatvā taṃ bahūpakārataṃ upamāya vibhāvento “yathā hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:1022_4: Evanti yathā heraññikassa cakkhunā disvā kahāpaṇavibhāgajānane kiriyāsādhakatamabhāvena karaṇantaraṃ bahukāraṃ yadidaṃ hattho,
tika-s0105t:1022_5: evaṃ yogino paññāya oloketvā dhammavibhāgajānane pubbacārībhāvena dhammantaraṃ bahukāraṃ yadidaṃ vitakko vitakketvāva paññāya tadavabodhato.
tika-s0105t:1022_7: Dutiyaupamāyaṃ evanti yathā tacchako parena parivattetvā parivattetvā dinnaṃ dabbasambhāraṃ vāsiyā tacchetvā gehādikaraṇakamme upaneti,
tika-s0105t:1022_8: evaṃ yogī vitakkena lakkhaṇādito vitakketvā dinnadhamme yāthāvato paricchinditvā pariññābhisamayādikamme upanetīti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:1022_9: Vacībhedassa upakārako vitakko sāvajjānavajjavacībhede nivattanapavattanakarāya sammāvācāyapi upakārakovāti āha “svāya”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t:1022_10: “Yathāhā”tiādinā dhammadinnāya bhikkhuniyā visākhassa nāma gahapatino vuttaṃ cūḷavedallasuttapadaṃ sādhakabhāvena dasseti.
tika-s0105t:1023_0: Vacībhedaniyāmikā vācā kāyikakiriyāniyāmakassa kammantassa upakārikāti tadatthaṃ lokato pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “yasmā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1023_3: Ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ nāma catubbidhavacīsucaritatividhakāyasucaritehi saddhiṃ sammāājīvaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ katvā vuttaṃ ādibrahmacariyakasīlaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1023_4: Yañhi sandhāya vuttaṃ “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti.
tika-s0105t:1025_1: Kasmā āraddhanti anusandhikāraṇaṃ pucchitvā taṃ vissajjetuṃ “ayaṃ kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ tena ajjhāsayānusandhivasenāyaṃ upari desanā pavattāti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:1025_6: Tantidhammaṃ nāma kathentoti yesaṃ atthāya dhammo kathīyati,
tika-s0105t:1025_7: tattha tesaṃ asatipi maggapaṭivedhe kevalaṃ sāsane paveṇībhūtaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1025_11: Assāti paṭhamajjhānādisamadhigamena samāhitacittassa kulaputtassa etaṃ “taṃ jīva”ntiādinā ucchedādigahaṇaṃ api nu yuttanti pucchati,
tika-s0105t:1025_12: laddhiyā pana jhānādhigamamattena na tāva vivecitattā “yuttamasseta”nti tehi vutte jhānalābhinopetaṃ gahaṇaṃ ayuttamevāti taṃ ucchedavādaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1025_20: arahattakūṭena pana desanā niṭṭhāpitāti dassetuṃ “uttari khīṇāsavaṃ dassetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1025_21: Te hi dve pabbajitā vipassakato paṭṭhāya “na kallaṃ tassetaṃ vacanāyā”ti avocuṃ.
tika-s0105t:1025_24: “na kalla”ntiādinā pana vissajjanāvacaneneva tesaṃ attamanatā veditabbāti āha “te mamā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:1025_26: tasmā tassa tathā vattumayuttanti uppannanicchayatāya taṃ mama vacanaṃ sutvā attamanā ahesunti attho.
tika-s0105t:1025_27: Sopi kho licchavi rājā te viya tathāsañjātanicchayattā attamano ahosi.
tika-s0105t:1030_1: Evaṃ mahālisuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni jāliyasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ saṃvaṇṇanokāsassa pattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ,
tika-s0105t:1030_2: mahālisuttassānantaraṃ saṅgītassa suttassa jāliyasuttabhāvaṃ vā pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe…
tika-s0105t:1030_6: Evampi hi “anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”tiādīsu viya dāyakakittanaṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:1030_7: evaṃ pana kittento āyasmā ānando aññepi tassa diṭṭhānugatiāpajjane niyojetīti aññattha vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1030_10: kathaṃ pana tattha bhagavā vihāsīti pucchāya sabbaṃ taṃ vissajjanaṃ samudāgamato paṭṭhāya saṅkhepatova dassento “pubbe kirā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:1030_23: Paccekabuddhe pana cīvarakammatthāya aññaṃ ṭhānaṃ gate sunakhassa hadayaṃ phālitaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1031_0: Iti so tāya paccekabuddhe sinehavasena ujudiṭṭhitāya akuṭilatāya kālaṅkatvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatto.
tika-s0105t:1031_3: Tassa pana kaṇṇamūle kathentassa saddo soḷasayojanaṭṭhānaṃ pharati,
tika-s0105t:1031_12: Imassa pana kāmaguṇe paribhuñjato muṭṭhassatissa āhārakkhayena cavanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:1031_13: So kosambiyaṃ nagarasobhiniyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
tika-s0105t:1031_20: Tameko manusso kākasunakhaparivāritaṃ disvā “putto me laddho”ti gehaṃ nesi,
tika-s0105t:1031_21: tassa pana hatthato kosambakaseṭṭhi kahāpaṇasahassaṃ datvā aggahesi,
tika-s0105t:1031_22: tamatthaṃ sandhāya “kosambiyaṃ ekassa kulassa ghare nibbattī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1031_26: Sā hi tassa pitarā pesitaṃ mārāpanapaṇṇaṃ phāletvā vivāhapaṇṇaṃ bandhitvā jīvitalābhaṃ karoti.
tika-s0105t:1032_0: Sarīrasantappanatthanti himavanteva mūlaphalāhāratāya kilantasarīrassa loṇambilasevanena pīnanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1032_4: Te kira taṃ patvā tassa mūle nisīdiṃsu.
tika-s0105t:1032_5: Atha jeṭṭhakatāpaso nigrodharukkhassa sobhāsampattiṃ passitvā “mahānubhāvo maññe ettha adhivutthā devatā.
tika-s0105t:1032_6: Sādhu vatāyaṃ devatā isigaṇassa pānīyādidānena addhānaparissamaṃ vinodeyyā”ti cintesi.
tika-s0105t:1032_7: Devatāpi tathā cintitaṃ utvā isigaṇassa pānīyanhānakabhojanāni adāsi.
tika-s0105t:1032_9: Jeṭṭhakatāpasassa pana tathā cintanaṃ avisesato sabbattha āropetvā “saṅgahaṃ paccāsisantā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1032_10: “Hatthaṃ pasāretvā”ti iminā hatthappasāraṇamattena tassā yathicchitanipphattiṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:1032_11: Devatā āhāti sā attano puññassa parittakattā lajjāya kathetuṃ avisahantīpi punappunaṃ nippīḷiyamānā evamāha.
tika-s0105t:1032_15: Tadā uposathikattā kammaṃ akarontānampi kammakaraṇadivase dātabbabhattavetanameva,
tika-s0105t:1032_18: idha pana dīghabhāṇakānaṃ matena “majjhanhike pātarāsatthāya āgato”ti.
tika-s0105t:1032_22: tena upaḍḍhadivasameva samādinnattā “upaḍḍhūposatho”ti taṃ voharantīti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:1033_0: “Ghosopi kho dullabho lokasmiṃ yadidaṃ buddho”ti sañjātapītipāmojjo.
tika-s0105t:1033_6: Tepi seṭṭhino sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya aḍḍhamāsamattaṃ dānāni datvā paccāgamma tayo vihāre kāresuṃ.
tika-s0105t:1033_7: Bhagavā pana devasikaṃ ekekasmiṃ vihāre vasati.
tika-s0105t:1034_2: Upecca parassa vācāya ārambhanaṃ bādhanaṃ upārambho,
tika-s0105t:1034_5: Vadanti nindāvasena kathenti etenāti hi vādo, doso,
tika-s0105t:1034_8: Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti yaṃ vatthu jīvasaññitaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1034_10: Idañhi “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti vuttavādaṃ gahetvā vadanti.
tika-s0105t:1034_11: Rūpañca attānañca advayaṃ ekībhāvaṃ katvā samanupassanavasena,
tika-s0105t:1034_18: Na hettha yathā diṭṭhabhedavatā sarīrato anaññattā adiṭṭhopi jīvassa bhedo vutto,
tika-s0105t:1034_19: evaṃ adiṭṭhabhedavatā jīvato anaññattā sarīrassāpi abhedoti sakkā vattuṃ tassa bhedassa paccakkhasiddhattā,
tika-s0105t:1034_20: bhūtupādāyarūpavinimuttassa ca sarīrassa abhāvatoti iminā adhippāyenāha “ucchedavādo hotī”ti.
tika-s0105t:1035_0: Aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti aññadeva vatthu jīvasaññitaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1035_4: attani ca tadabhāvato “attā nicco”ti ayamattho āpanno vāti iminā adhippāyenāha “satto sassato āpajjatī”ti.
tika-s0105t:1036_8: Taṃ tattha rājanimīlanaṃ katvā “tena hāvusosuṇāthā”tiādinā satthā nesaṃ upari dhammadesanamārabhīti āha “atha bhagavā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:1037_0: Saddhāpabbajitassāti saddhāya pabbajitassa “evamahaṃ ito vaṭṭadukkhato nissarissāmī”ti pabbajjamupagatassa,
tika-s0105t:1037_2: Etanti kilesavaṭṭaparivuddhidīpanaṃ “taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra”ntiādikaṃ diṭṭhisaṃkilesanissitavacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1037_3: Nibbicikiccho na hotīti dhammesu tiṇṇavicikiccho na hoti,
tika-s0105t:1038_0: Etamevaṃ jānāmīti yena so bhikkhu paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati,
tika-s0105t:1038_3: No ca evaṃ vadāmīti yathā diṭṭhigatikā taṃ dhammajātaṃ sanissayaṃ abhedato gaṇhantā “taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra”nti,
tika-s0105t:1038_4: tadubhayaṃ vā bhedato gaṇhantā “aññaṃ jīvaṃ añña sarīra”nti attano micchāgāhaṃ pavedenti,
tika-s0105t:1038_5: evamahaṃ na vadāmi tassa dhammassa supariññātattā.
tika-s0105t:1038_7: Bāhirakā yebhuyyena kasiṇajjhānāni eva nibbattentīti vuttaṃ “kasiṇaparikammaṃ bhāventassā”ti.
tika-s0105t:1038_9: bhāvanā ca pathavīkasiṇādisañjānanamukhena hotīti katvā saññāsīsena niddisīyati,
tika-s0105t:1038_12: Yasmā pana bhagavatā tattha tattha vāre “atha ca panāhaṃ na vadāmī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1038_13: tasmā bhagavato vacanamupadesaṃ katvā na vattabbaṃ kiretaṃ kevalinā uttamapurisenāti adhippāyena “na kallaṃ tasseta”nti āhaṃsu,
tika-s0105t:1038_14: na sayaṃ paṭibhānenāti dassetuṃ “maññamānā vadantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1043_1: Evaṃ jāliyasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni mahāsīhanādasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ saṃvaṇṇanokāsassa pattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ,
tika-s0105t:1043_2: jāliyasuttassānantaraṃ saṅgītassa suttassa mahāsīhanādasuttabhāvaṃ vā pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe…
tika-s0105t:1043_4: Etadeva nāmanti yasmiṃ raṭṭhe taṃ nagaraṃ,
tika-s0105t:1043_5: tassa raṭṭhassapi yasmiṃ nagare bhagavā vihāsi,
tika-s0105t:1043_7: tasmā uruññāyanti uruññānāmajanapade uruññānāmanagareti āvuttiādinayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:1043_10: katthaci aniyatapulliṅgaputhuvacanāpi yathā “āḷaviyaṃ viharatī”ti keci janapadamevatthaṃ vadanti,
tika-s0105t:1043_25: Muttācārādīti ettha ādisaddena parato pāḷiya māgatā hatthāpalekhanādayo saṅgahitā.
tika-s0105t:1043_26: Lūkhaṃ pharusaṃ sādhusammatācāravirahato apasādanīyaṃ ājīvati vattatīti lūkhājīvīti aṭṭhakathāmuttakanayo.
tika-s0105t:1043_30: “Hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu viya dhammasaddo hetupariyāyoti āha “kāraṇassa anukāraṇa”nti.
tika-s0105t:1043_33: Soyeva ca saddattho parehi vuccamāno anukāraṇaṃ tadanurūpaṃ tassadisaṃ vā tato pacchā vā vuttakāraṇabhāvato.
tika-s0105t:1043_38: evaṃ sati tehi vuttakāraṇena sakāraṇo hutvā tumhākaṃ vādo vā tato paraṃ tassa anuvādo vā koci appamattakopi
tika-s0105t:1044_1: Idāni yaṃ vibhajjavādaṃ sandhāya bhagavatā “na mete vuttavādino”ti saṅkhepena vatvā taṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “idhāhaṃ kassapā”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1044_3: Bhagavā hi niratthakaṃ anupasamasaṃvattanikaṃ kāyakilamathaṃ “attakilamathānuyogo dukkho anariyo anatthasaṃhito”tiādinā. Garahati,
tika-s0105t:1044_7: Appasaddo cettha “dvattichadanassa pariyāyaṃ appaharite ṭhitena adhiṭṭhātabba”ntiādīsu viya abhāvattho.
tika-s0105t:1044_8: Micchādiṭṭhibhāvato kammaphalaṃ paṭikkhipantena “natthi dinna”ntiādinā micchādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā jīvitavuttihetu
tika-s0105t:1044_9: tathā tathā duccaritapūraṇaṃ sandhāya “tīṇi duccaritāni pūretvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1045_2: Anesanavasenāti kohaññe ṭhatvā asantaguṇasambhāvanicchāya yathā tathā tapaṃ katvā anesitabbamesanāvasena micchājīvenāti attho.
tika-s0105t:1045_5: puññavā”ti ca vutte duccaritakārino dve puggale.
tika-s0105t:1046_0: Dutiyanaye ime dveti “appapuñño, puññavā”ti ca vutte sucaritakārino dve puggale.
tika-s0105t:1047_0: Paṭhamadutiyanayesu vuttanayeneva tatiyacatutthanayesupi yathākkamaṃ attho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:1047_5: Attānaṃ sukhetvāti adhammikena anesanāya laddhapaccayanimittena sukhena attānaṃ sukhetvā sukhaṃ katvā,
tika-s0105t:1048_0: “Na dāni mayā sadiso atthī”tiādinā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhisaṅkhātānaṃ tissannaṃ maññanānaṃ vasena duccaritapūraṇamāha.
tika-s0105t:1048_1: Lābhasakkāraṃ vā uppādento tīṇi duccaritāni puretvāti sambandho.
tika-s0105t:1048_5: “Aparo”ti etthāpi hi “tāpaso vā channaparibbājako vā”ti adhikāro.
tika-s0105t:1048_18: kattusādhano cettha tabbasaddo yathā uparipaṇṇāsake pañcattayasutte “ye hi keci bhikkhave samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā
tika-s0105t:1048_19: vā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbasaṅkhāramattena etassa āyatanassa upasampadaṃ paññapentī”ti tathā hi tadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0105t:1048_22: taṭṭīkāyañca “yathā niyyantīti niyyānikāti bahulaṃ vacanato kattusādhano niyyānikasaddo,
tika-s0105t:1048_23: evaṃ idha viññātabbasaddoti āha ‘vijānātīti viññātabba’nti,” tā-
tika-s0105t:1049_1: “Titthiyavasena āgataṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tathā vibhattattā”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1050_3: Arahattaṃ vā attani asantaṃ “atthi me”ti yathārutaṃ paṭijānitvā.
tika-s0105t:1053_5: Puna upapattinti āyatiṃ anantarabhave puna upapattiṃ,
tika-s0105t:1053_6: tato anantarabhavepi puna upapattinti punappunaṃ nibbattiṃ.
tika-s0105t:1053_7: Kena kāraṇena garahissāmīti ettha yathābhūtamajānanto icchādosavasena yaṃ kiñci garaheyya,
tika-s0105t:1053_9: ahaṃ pana yathābhūtaṃ jānanto sabbampetaṃ kena kāraṇena garahissāmi,
tika-s0105t:1053_10: sabbassapetassa tapassa garahāya kāraṇaṃ natthīti imamadhippāyaṃ dassento “garahitabbamevā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:1054_2: samparāyikassa ca atthassa sādhanavasena pavattiyā garukattā na koci na sādhūti vadati.
tika-s0105t:1054_6: tato eva ca taṃ na koci “sādhū”ti vadati tathā diṭṭhadhammikādiatthānamasādhanato,
tika-s0105t:1054_12: tadaggena tattha saṃvaro na sādhūti adhippāyo hotīti āha “puna…pe…
tika-s0105t:1055_1: yaṃ te ekaccaṃ vadanti “sādhū”ti te “eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā”ti vuttā titthiyā yaṃ attakilamathānuyogādiṃ “sādhū”ti vadanti,
tika-s0105t:1056_1: tadeva puna sakavādamūlakaṃ catukkaṃ katvā dassitanti viññāpetuṃ “eva”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1058_2: Laddhiṃ pucchantoti “kiṃ samaṇo gotamo saṃkilesadhamme anavasesaṃ pahāya vattati,
tika-s0105t:1058_4: ettha tāva attano laddhiṃ vadehī”ti evaṃ paṭiññātaṃ siddhantaṃ pucchanto.
tika-s0105t:1058_5: Kāraṇaṃ pucchantoti “samaṇova gotamo saṃkilesadhamme anavasesaṃ pahāya vattatī”ti vutte “kāraṇenapi etamatthaṃ gāhayā”ti evaṃ hetuṃ pucchanto.
tika-s0105t:1058_6: Ubhayaṃ pucchantoti “idaṃ nāmettha kāraṇa”nti kāraṇaṃ vatvā paṭiññāte atthe sādhiyamāne anvayato,
tika-s0105t:1058_7: byatirekato ca kāraṇaṃ samatthetuṃ sadisāsadisappabhedaṃ upamodāharaṇadvayaṃ pucchanto.
tika-s0105t:1058_8: Apica hetupamodāharaṇavasena tilakkhaṇasampattiyā yathāpaṭiññāte atthe sādhite sammadeva anu pacchā bhāsanto
tika-s0105t:1059_0: Tamatthanti taṃ pahātabbadhammānaṃ anavasesaṃ pahāya vattanasaṅkhātaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1059_3: Akosallasambhūtādiatthena akusalā ceva tatoyeva akusalāti ca saṅkhātā,
tika-s0105t:1059_15: Ime pana akusalā kathañcipi niddosā na hontīti niddosaṭṭhena ariyā bhavituṃ nālaṃ asamatthā.
tika-s0105t:1060_4: Pahāya vattantīti ca atthavasā puthuvacanavipariṇāmoti vuttaṃ “yaṃ vā taṃ vā appamattakaṃ pahāya vattantī”ti.
tika-s0105t:1060_6: Satthupabhavattā saṅghassa saṅghasampattiyāpi satthusampatti vibhāvīyatīti āha “saṅgha…pe…
tika-s0105t:1060_8: sā pana pasaṃsā pasādahetukāti pasādamukhena taṃ dassetuṃ “pasīdamānāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1060_10: saddena appasīdamānāpi evameva na pasīdantīti sampiṇḍeti.
tika-s0105t:1061_4: Tattha setughātaviratiyā ariyamaggasampayuttattā “sabbena sabbaṃ natthī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1061_7: Vipassanāmattavasenāti ca “anicca”nti vā “dukkha”nti vā vividhaṃ dassanamattavasena,
tika-s0105t:1061_8: na pana nāmarūpavavatthānapaccayapariggaṇhanapubbakaṃ lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā saṅkhārānaṃ sammasanavasena.
tika-s0105t:1061_11: Itarāni samucchedapaṭippassaddhinissaraṇappahānāni tīṇi sabbena sabbaṃ natthi maggaphalanibbānattā.
tika-s0105t:1061_13: “khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassā”tiādinā vutto suparisuddho khantisaṃvaro,
tika-s0105t:1061_14: “paññāyete pidhiyyare”tiādinā vutto kilesānaṃ samucchedako maggañāṇasaṅkhāto ñāṇasaṃvaro,
tika-s0105t:1061_15: manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ pidahanavasena pavatto suparisuddho indriyasaṃvaro,
tika-s0105t:1061_16: “anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāyā”tiādinā vutto sammappadhānasaṅkhāto vīriyasaṃvaroti
tika-s0105t:1061_17: imaṃ saṃvarapañcakaṃ sandhāya “sesaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ natthī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1062_0: “Pañca kho panime pātimokkhuddesā”tiādinā yathāvuttasīlasseva puna gahaṇaṃ sāsane sīlassa bahubhāvaṃ
tika-s0105t:1067_2: tassevaṃ aviparītabhāvo imaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjitvā aparappaccayato jānitabbo”ti evaṃ aviparītabhāvāvabodhanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1067_4: yaṃ maggaṃ paṭipanno sāmaṃyeva attapaccakkhato evaṃ ñassati dakkhati “samaṇo gotamo vadanto yuttapattakāle tathabhāvato bhūtaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1067_9: so mayā sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedito sakalavaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇabhūto atthi kassapa maggo,
tika-s0105t:1067_11: tena “samaṇo gotamo ime dhamme anavasesaṃ pahāya vattatī”tiādi nayappavatto vādo kenaci asampakampito yathābhūta sīhanādoti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:1067_13: saddena padasiddhi “yatra hi nāma sāvako evarūpaṃ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṃ karissatī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0105t:1068_0: “Evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passatī”tiādi suttapadesu viya ca maggañca paṭipadañca ekato katvā dassento.
tika-s0105t:1068_4: Tenāha “ekāyano ayaṃ bhikkhave maggo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”ti.
tika-s0105t:1073_0: Tarissanti ye ca taranti ogha”nti. ca –
tika-s0105t:1074_0: Sabbesu ceva suttapadesesu, abhidhammapadesesu ca ekovāyaṃ maggo pākaṭoti.
tika-s0105t:1076_6: Niccoloti nissaṭṭhacolo sabbena sabbaṃ paṭikkhittacolo. Celaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1076_8: Koci chinnabhinnapaṭapilotikadharopi dasantayuttassa vatthassa abhāvato “niccolo”ti vattabbataṃ labheyyāti taṃ nivattetuṃ “naggo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1076_12: idañca nidassanamattaṃ vamitvā mukhavikkhālanādiācārassapi tena vissaṭṭhattā.
tika-s0105t:1076_15: tasmā taṃ paṭipadaṃ pūrento evaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ “uccāraṃ vā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:1077_10: Puretaranti taṃ ṭhānaṃ attanā upagamanato paṭhamataraṃ,
tika-s0105t:1077_11: taṃ kira so “bhikkhunā nāma yādicchakī eva bhikkhā gahetabbā”ti adhippāyena na gaṇhāti.
tika-s0105t:1077_12: Uddissakataṃ pana “mama nimittabhāvena bahū khuddakā pāṇā saṅghāṭamāpāditā”ti adhippāyena nādhivāseti.
tika-s0105t:1077_13: Nimantanampi “evaṃ tesaṃ vacanaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī”ti adhippāyena na sādiyati.
tika-s0105t:1078_5: Tathā saṃhaṭataṇḍulādisañcayo tena katabhattamidhādhippetanti vuttaṃ “saṃkittetvā katabhattesū”ti.
tika-s0105t:1078_6: Majjhimanikāye mahāsīhanādasuttantaṭīkāyaṃ pana ācariyeneva evaṃ vuttaṃ “saṃkittayanti etāyāti saṃkitti,
tika-s0105t:1078_8: ettha pana bhattasaṃkitti adhippetāti āha ‘saṃkittetvā katabhattesū’ti”.
tika-s0105t:1079_11: sati bhikkhālābhe taduttari na gacchatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:1079_18: Abhuñjanavasena eko ho etassāti ekāhiko, āhāro,
tika-s0105t:1079_27: Ukkaṭṭho hi pariyāyabhattabhojaniko dvīhaṃ abhuñjitvā ekāhameva bhuñjati.
tika-s0105t:1079_29: Majjhimāgamaṭīkāyaṃ pana “ekāhaṃ antarabhūtaṃ etassa atthīti ekāhikaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1079_31: “Therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadanti pariyāyenā”tiādīsu viya vārattho pariyāya saddo.
tika-s0105t:1079_33: “Ekāhika”ntiādinā vuttavidhimeva paṭipāṭiyā pavattabhāvena dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “iti evarūpa”ntiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1080_9: “Vāsitakena piññākena nahāyeyyā”tiādīsu viya piññāka saddo tilapiṭṭhapariyāyo.
tika-s0105t:1081_2: aññehi missakāni sāṇāni eva masāṇāni niruttinayena,
tika-s0105t:1081_4: Keci pana “masāṇāni nāma coḷavisesānīti parikappetvā massakacoḷānī”ti paṭhanti,
tika-s0105t:1081_7: erakādīhi katāni hi chavāni lāmakāni dussānīti vattabbataṃ labhanti.
tika-s0105t:1081_23: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttanti ajitavādassa paṭikiṭṭhatarabhāve upamādassanatthaṃ yadeva kesakambalaṃ sandhāya aṅguttarāgame vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1082_3: Pāḷiyaṃ ubbhaṭṭhako”ti etassa “uddhaṃ ṭhitako”ti attho majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ mahāsīhanādasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vutto.
tika-s0105t:1083_8: Amarakosepi hi nighaṇṭusatthe vuttaṃ “vedī parikkhatā bhūmi,
tika-s0105t:1083_9: same thaṇḍilaṃ cāture”ti (sattarasamavagge 18 gāthāyaṃ) tasmā thaṇḍile anantarahitāya pakatibhūmiyaṃ seyyampi kappetīti attho.
tika-s0105t:1083_10: Yaṃ sandhāya tattheva nighaṇṭusatthe vuttaṃ “yo thaṇḍile vata vasā,
tika-s0105t:1083_11: sete thaṇḍilasāyi so”ti (sattarasamavagge 44 gāthāyaṃ) rajo eva jallaṃ malīnaṃ rajojallaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1083_16: Evaṃ nisīdanto hi taṃ akopento nāma hoti.
tika-s0105t:1084_0: Ettha ca “acelako hotī”tiādīni yāva “thusodakaṃ pivatī”ti etāni vatapadāni ekavārāni,
tika-s0105t:1084_10: Purimesu pana vatapadesu tadubhayampi na kataṃ,
tika-s0105t:1084_12: “rajojalladharopi hotī”ti vatvā “udakorohanānuyogamanuyutto viharatī”ti vacanassa ca avirodho siddho hoti.
tika-s0105t:1084_15: Apica “acelako hotī”ti ārabhitvā tappasaṅgena sabbampi aññamaññavirodhameva attakilamathānuyogaṃ dassentena
tika-s0105t:1086_5: vinā vā tāhi na kadācipi sāmaññaṃ vā brahmaññaṃ vā sambhavati,
tika-s0105t:1086_6: tasmā tesaṃ tapopakkamānaṃ niratthakataṃ dassentoti sapāṭhasesayojanā.
tika-s0105t:1086_9: Yaṃ pana ācariyena vuttaṃ “dosaggahaṇena vā sabbepi jhānapaṭipakkhā saṃkilesadhammā gahitā.
tika-s0105t:1086_14: aṭṭhakathāyañca tadatthameva dassetuṃ dosasaddassa vuttattā vicāretabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1087_5: “Mattā sukhapariccāgā”tiādīsu viya mattāsaddo appattaṃ antonītaṃ katvā pamāṇavācakoti āha “iminā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:1087_6: Tena pana pamāṇena pahātabbo eva paṭipattikkamo pakaraṇappatto.
tika-s0105t:1087_7: Iminā “tapopakkamenā”ti saddantarena vā adhigatoti dasseti “paṭipattikkamenā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:1087_8: Tatoti tasmā sāmaññabrahmaññassa appamattakeneva paṭipattikkamena sudukkarabhāvato.
tika-s0105t:1088_1: Aññathāti yadi acelakabhāvādinā sāmaññaṃ vā brahmaññaṃ vā abhavissa,
tika-s0105t:1088_4: Yasmā pana tumhe ito aññathāva sāmaññaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1088_6: tasmā dujjānova samaṇo dujjāno brāhmaṇoti attho.
tika-s0105t:1088_8: Taṃ pakativādaṃ paṭikkhipitvāti yaṃ pubbe pākatikaṃ sāmaññaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1088_9: brahmaññañca hadaye ṭhapetvā tena acelakassapena “dukkaraṃ sudukkara”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1088_10: bhagavatā ca tameva sandhāya “pakati kho esā”tiādi bhāsitaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1088_13: brāhmaṇassa ca dujjānabhāvaṃ āvikaronto punapi “pakati kho”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:1090_2: Kathaṃ uggahesīti paripakkañāṇattā ghaṭe padīpena viya abbhantare samujjalantena paññāveyyattiyena tattha
tika-s0105t:1090_3: tattha bhagavatā desitamatthaṃ pariggaṇhanto taṃ desanaṃ upadhāresi.
tika-s0105t:1090_11: yāhi samaṇo ca brāhmaṇo ca hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:1092_12: “Yāvatā kassapa ariyaṃ paramaṃ sīla”nti idaṃ “sīlassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantī”ti ettha ākāradassanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1092_14: “Yadidaṃ adhisīla”nti ca lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidhampi buddhasīlaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ, tasmā ta-
tika-s0105t:1092_15: saddenapi ubhayasseva parāmasananti dassetuṃ “tattha sīlepi paramasīlepī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:1092_16: Samasamanti samena visesanabhūtena sīlena samanti atthaṃ viññāpetuṃ “mama sīlasamena sīlena mayā sama”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1093_12: Yadidaṃ adhijegucchanti sīle viya lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidhampi buddhajegucchaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1094_5: ṭhapetvā saccānulomikaṃ ñāṇaṃ sabbāpi sāsavā kusalā paññā kammassakatāñāṇa”nti.
tika-s0105t:1095_0: Sabbampi hi akusalaṃ attano vā hotu,
tika-s0105t:1095_5: Tathā sabbampi kusalaṃ sakaṃ nāma. Kasmā?
tika-s0105t:1095_8: Evaṃ kammassakabhāve pavattā paññā kammassakatāpaññā nāma.
tika-s0105t:1095_13: Yāyaṃ adhipaññāti sīle viya lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidhāpi buddhapaññā.
tika-s0105t:1095_19: sammādiṭṭhiyā adhipaññāggahaṇena gahitattā aggahitaggahaṇena sammāsaṅkappasatisamādhayo maggaphalapariyāpannā
tika-s0105t:1095_22: Yā ayaṃ adhivimuttīti sīle vuttanayena duvidhāpi adhivimutti.
tika-s0105t:1096_2: Tattha nadantena vinā añño jano natthīti dassetuṃ “ekakovā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1097_3: “Vesārajja”nti hi catūsu ṭhānesu sārajjābhāvaṃ paccavekkhantassa uppannasomanassamayañāṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1097_4: Aññehi pana asādhāraṇataṃ dassetuṃ “tathāgatassa tathāgatavesārajjānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1097_6: tathā āgatavesārajjānī”ti vā dutiyassa tathāgatasaddassa tulyādhikaraṇattā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1098_7: sabbagavaseṭṭho sabbattha jeṭṭho sabbaparissayasaho seto pāsādiko mahābhāravaho asanisatasaddehipi akampanīyo nisabhoti.
tika-s0105t:1098_12: Yatheva hi nisabhasaṅkhāto usabho usabhabalena samannāgato catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0105t:1098_13: evaṃ tathāgatopi dasatathāgatabalena samannāgato catūhi vesārajjapādehi aṭṭhaparisāpathaviṃ uppīḷetvā
tika-s0105t:1098_14: sadevake loke kenaci paccatthikena paccāmittena akampiyo acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0105t:1098_15: Evaṃ tiṭṭhamānova taṃ āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭivijānāti upagacchati na paccakkhāti attani āropeti.
tika-s0105t:1099_3: Yathā vā sīho migarājā parissayānaṃ sahanato,
tika-s0105t:1099_8: Tattha yathā migasīho sīhabalena samannāgato sabbattha visārado vigatalomahaṃso sīhanādaṃ nadati,
tika-s0105t:1099_9: evaṃ tathāgatasīho dasatathāgatabalena samannāgato aṭṭhasu parisāsu visārado vigatalomahaṃso “iti rūpa”ntiādinā
tika-s0105t:1100_0: Pañhaṃ abhisaṅkharitvāti ñātumicchitaṃ atthaṃ attano ñāṇabalānurūpaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā.
tika-s0105t:1100_5: Sotabbaṃ maññantīti aṭṭhakkhaṇavajjitena navamena khaṇena labbhamānattā “yaṃ no satthā sāsati,
tika-s0105t:1100_6: taṃ mayaṃ sossāmā”ti ādarabhāvajātā mahanteneva ussāhena sotabbaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ maññati.
tika-s0105t:1100_7: Kallacittā muducittāti pasādābhivuddhiyā vigatupakkilesatāya kallacittā muducittā honti.
tika-s0105t:1100_12: Dhammapūjā pana pāḷiyameva “tathattāya paṭipajjantī”ti iminā dassitā.
tika-s0105t:1100_13: Tathābhāvāyāti yathābhāvāya yassa vaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇassa atthāya dhammo desito,
tika-s0105t:1100_17: sā ca dhammānudhammapaṭipatti yāya anupubbiyā paṭipajjitabbā,
tika-s0105t:1100_18: paṭipajjantānañca sati ajjhattikaṅgasamavāye ekaṃsikā tassā pāripūrīti taṃ anupubbiṃ dassento “keci saraṇesū”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:1100_20: tathā pūraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “sabbākārena pana pūrentī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1101_0: Imasmiṃ panokāseti “paṭipannā ca ārādhentī”ti sīhanādakiccapāripūriṭṭhapane pāḷipadese.
tika-s0105t:1101_3: passāmīti bhagavato eko sīhanādo asādhāraṇo aññehi appaṭivattiyo seṭṭhanādo abhītanādoti katvā.
tika-s0105t:1101_6: Purimānaṃ dasannanti “ekaccaṃ tapassiṃ niraye nibbattaṃ passāmī”ti vuttasīhanādato paṭṭhāya yāva “vimuttiyā
tika-s0105t:1101_7: mayhaṃ sadiso natthī”ti vuttasīhanādā purimakānaṃ dasannaṃ sīhanādānaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1101_10: “Parisāsu ca nadatī”ti ādayo “paṭipannā ca maṃ ārādhentī”ti pariyosānā dasa dasa sīhanādā parivārā.
tika-s0105t:1101_11: “Ekaccaṃ tapassiṃ niraye nibbattaṃ passāmī”ti hi sīhanādaṃ nadanto bhagavā parisāsu nadati visārado hutvā nadati,
tika-s0105t:1101_20: paṭipannā ca maṃ ārādhentīti evaṃ parivāretvā atthayojanā sambhavati.
tika-s0105t:1102_1: Te dasāti “parisāsu ca nadatī”ti ādayo dasa sīhanādā.
tika-s0105t:1102_2: Purimānaṃ dasannanti yathāvuttānaṃ mūlabhūtānaṃ purimakānaṃ dasasīhanādānaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1102_3: Parivāravasenāti mūliṃ katvā paccekaṃ parivāravasena yojiyamānā sataṃ sīhanādā.
tika-s0105t:1102_4: Purimā ca dasāti mūlamūliyo katvā parivāravasena ayojiyamānā purimakā ca dasāti evaṃ dasādhikaṃ sīhanādasataṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:1102_5: Aññasmiṃ pana sutteti majjhimāgamacūḷasīhanādasuttādimhi tenāti saṅkhyāmahattena.
tika-s0105t:1102_7: na pana majjhimanikāye mahāsīhanādasuttamiva cūḷasīhanādasuttamupādāyāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:1104_2: Yaṃ bhagavā pāthikavagge udumbarikasutte “idha nigrodha tapassī”tiādinā upakkilesavibhāgaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1104_3: pārisuddhivibhāgañca dassento saparisassa nigrodhaparibbājakassa purato sīhanādaṃ nadati,
tika-s0105t:1104_5: Naditapubbanti udumbarikasutte āgatanayena pubbe nigrodhaparibbājakassa naditaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1104_11: Ettha ca kāmaṃ yadā nigrodho pañhamapucchi,
tika-s0105t:1104_13: na tadā bhagavā gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharati,
tika-s0105t:1104_14: rājagahasamīpeyeva udumbarikāya deviyā uyyāne viharati tattheva tathā pucchitattā,
tika-s0105t:1104_16: tathāpi gijjhakūṭe pabbate bhagavato vihāro na tāva vicchinno,
tika-s0105t:1104_18: aṭṭhakathāyañca “tatra rājagahe gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharantaṃ ma”ntiādivacanaṃ vuttanti imamatthampi “yaṃ taṃ bhagavā”tiādinā viññāpetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1104_19: “Gijjhakūṭe pabbate”ti idaṃ tattha katavihāraṃ sandhāya vuttanti dasseti “gijjhakūṭe mahāvihāre”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:1104_25: kena samaṇo gotamo saddhiṃ sallapatī”tiādinā sallāpakathaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1105_2: Khandhaketi mahāvagge pabbajjakhandhake yaṃ parivāsaṃ parivasatīti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:1105_4: Paṭhamaṃ pabbajjaṃ gahetvāva parivasatīti āha “sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhito”ti.
tika-s0105t:1105_8: “Uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeyyā”ti ettha dirattaggahaṇaṃ viya vacanasiliṭṭhatāvaseneva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1105_20: buddhādīnaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇane attamanatāti imesaṃ sattavattānaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:1105_26: Ghaṃsitvā koṭṭetvāti ajjhāsayavīmaṃsanavasena suvaṇṇaṃ viya ghaṃsitvā koṭṭetvā.
tika-s0105t:1106_0: “Gaṇamajjhe nisīditvāti upasampadākammassa gaṇappahonakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ majjhe saṅghatthero viya tassa anuggahatthaṃ nisīditvā”ti ācariyena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1106_1: idāni pana bahūsupi potthakesu “taṃ nisīdāpetvā”ti kāritavasena pāṭho dissati.
tika-s0105t:1106_3: atthamattaṃ pana dassetuṃ “upasampanno hutvā naciramevā”ti āha.
tika-s0105t:1106_4: Kāyacittavivekāva idhādhippetā upadhivivekatthaṃ paṭipajjanādhikārattāti vuttaṃ “kāyena ceva cittena cā”ti.
tika-s0105t:1106_6: Tādisassa sīlavisodhane appamādo avuttasiddhoti kammaṭṭhāne appamādameva dasseti.
tika-s0105t:1106_9: evaṃbhūto ca tathā anapekkhatāya vissajjitakāyo nāmāti adhippāyamāvikātuṃ “vissaṭṭhaattabhāvo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1106_10: Attāti cettha cittaṃ vuccati rūpakāyassa avisayattā.
tika-s0105t:1106_12: Jātikulaputtāpi ācārasampannā eva arahattādhigamāya pabbajjāpekkhā hontīti tepi jātikulaputte teheva
tika-s0105t:1106_14: Iminā hi ācārasampannā jātikulaputtāpi saṅgahitā honti.
tika-s0105t:1106_16: “Otiṇṇomhi jātiyā”tiādinā nayena hi saṃvegapubbikaṃ yathānusiṭṭhaṃ pabbajjaṃ sandhāya “sammadevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1106_21: Tadeva hi “anuttaraṃ brahmacariyapariyosāna”nti vattumarahati aññesaṃ tathā abhāvato.
tika-s0105t:1106_24: pabbajjantī”ti pubbe vuttassa tassa arahattaphalassa atthāya kulaputtā pabbajanti,
tika-s0105t:1106_26: Natthi paro jano tathā sacchikaraṇe paccayo yassāti aparappaccayo, taṃ. Upa-
tika-s0105t:1107_2: vihāsī”ti iminā eva hi arahattanikūṭena desanā pariyosāpitā,
tika-s0105t:1107_8: Tathā ubbāhitattā ca tesamabbhantaroti attho āpannoti adhippāyaṃ dassento “bhagavato”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:1107_11: ato cettha saha pāṭhasesena adhippāyamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “bhagavato”tiādi vuttanti.
tika-s0105t:1112_1: Evaṃ mahāsīhanādasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni poṭṭhapādasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ saṃvaṇṇanokāsassa pattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ,
tika-s0105t:1112_2: mahāsīhanādasuttassānantaraṃ saṅgītassa suttassa poṭṭhapādasuttabhāvaṃ vā pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe…
tika-s0105t:1112_4: “Sāvatthiya”nti idaṃ samīpatthe bhummanti dassetuṃ “sāvatthiṃ upanissāyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1112_7: tena ropitattā saṃvaḍḍhitattā paripālitattā jetassa vanaṃ upavananti atthamāha “jetassa kumārassa vane”ti.
tika-s0105t:1112_8: Sudatto nāma gahapati anāthānaṃ piṇḍassa dāyakattā anāthapiṇḍiko.
tika-s0105t:1112_9: Tena jetassa hatthato aṭṭhārasahiraññakoṭisantharaṇena taṃ kiṇitvā aṭṭhārasahiraññakoṭīheva senāsanaṃ
tika-s0105t:1112_10: kārāpetvā aṭṭhārasahiraññakoṭīheva vihāramahaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā evaṃ catupaññāsahiraññakoṭipariccāgena so
tika-s0105t:1112_14: pāṇino nivāsaphāsutādinā vā visesena pabbajitā tato tato āgamma ramanti anukkaṇṭhitā hutvā nivasanti etthāti ārāmo.
tika-s0105t:1112_15: Atha vā yathāvuttaguṇasampattiyā tattha tattha gatepi attano abbhantare ānetvā rametīti ārāmo.
tika-s0105t:1113_6: ājīvako pana upari ekameva vatthaṃ upakacchakantare pavesetvā pariharati,
tika-s0105t:1113_8: Ayaṃ pana duvidhopesa na hotīti vuttaṃ “channaparibbājako”ti,
tika-s0105t:1113_16: attanā attanā uggahitaniyāmena yathā tathā samayaṃ vadantīti attho.
tika-s0105t:1114_1: aparāparuppattito ca bhagavato ñāṇaṃ loke patthaṭamiva hotīti vuttaṃ “sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pattharitvā”ti,
tika-s0105t:1114_4: Veneyyasattapariggaṇhanatthaṃ samannāhāre kate paṭhamaṃ nesaṃ veneyyabhāveneva upaṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:1114_5: atha saraṇagamanādivasena kiccanipphatti vīmaṃsīyatīti āha “kinnu kho bhavissatīti upaparikkhanto”ti.
tika-s0105t:1114_7: Nirodhā vuṭṭhānanti tato nirodhato vuṭṭhānaṃ saññuppattiṃ.
tika-s0105t:1114_8: Sabbabuddhānaṃ ñāṇena saṃsanditvāti yathā te nirodhaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1114_16: Adhunā pana “citto hatthisāriputto” tveva pāṭho dissati,
tika-s0105t:1115_0: Surattadupaṭṭanti rajanena sammā rattaṃ diguṇaṃ antaravāsakaṃ parivattanavasena nivāsetvā.
tika-s0105t:1115_8: Tathā hi suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vaṅgīsasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ “ekaṃsanti ca vāmaṃsaṃ pārupitvā ṭhitassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1115_9: Yato yathā vāmaṃsaṃ pārupitvā ṭhitaṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:1115_10: tathā cīvaraṃ katvāti evamassattho veditabbo”ti [su. ni. aṭṭha.
tika-s0105t:1115_11: nigrodhakappasutta (vaṅgīsasutta) vaṇṇanā] tattha etanti “ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā”ti vacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1115_12: Yatoti yathāvuttavacanassa pārupitvā ṭhitasseva adhivacanattā evamassa attho veditabboti sambandho.
tika-s0105t:1115_13: Paccagghanti ekaṃ katvā anadhiṭṭhitakāle pāṭekkaṃ mahagghaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1115_17: Tathā hi ācariyeneva udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ “paccaggheti abhinave,
tika-s0105t:1115_20: Na hi buddhā bhagavanto mahagghaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti,
tika-s0105t:1115_23: Abhinavatāya “paccaggha”nti ca idaṃ ādito tathā laddhavohārena,
tika-s0105t:1115_25: tathā vā satthu adhiṭṭhānena taṃ pattaṃ sabbakālaṃ “paccaggha”ntveva vuccati.
tika-s0105t:1115_27: Ayameva hi bhagavatā niccaparibhutto patto samacittasuttavaṇṇanādīsupi tathā vuttattā.
tika-s0105t:1116_3: “Atippagabhāvameva disvā”ti ca idaṃ bhūtakathanaṃ na tāva bhikkhācaraṇavelā sampattāti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1116_4: Bhagavā hi tadā kālasseva vihārato nikkhanto “vāsanābhāgiyāya dhammadesanāya poṭṭhapādaṃ anuggaṇhissāmī”ti.
tika-s0105t:1116_5: Pāḷiyaṃ atippago khoti ettha “pago”ti idaṃ kaccāyanamatena pa-
tika-s0105t:1116_9: Aññesaṃ pana saddavidūnaṃ matena pātopadamiva nepātikaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1116_10: Teneva tattha tattha aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ “atippago khoti ativiya pāto”ti.
tika-s0105t:1116_11: Apica paṭhamaṃ gacchati divasabhāvena pavattatīti pagoti nibbacanaṃ iminā dassitaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1116_12: Duvidho khalusaddo viya hi pagoti saddo nāmanipātopasaggavasena tividho.
tika-s0105t:1116_13: Evañhi idha “atippagabhāvameva disvā”ti vacanaṃ upapannaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:1117_4: Saṃsayo nāma natthi bodhimūle eva tassa samugghāṭitattā.
tika-s0105t:1117_7: na karissāmā”tiādiko esa cittācāro sabbabuddhānaṃ labbhati sambhavati vicāraṇavaseneva pavattanato,
tika-s0105t:1117_10: tena bhagavā evamāhāti imameva pāḷiṃ imassa atthassa sādhakaṃ karoti.
tika-s0105t:1117_13: “Upasaṅkameyya”nti kiriyāpadena vuccamānoyeva hi attho anena jotīyati.
tika-s0105t:1117_14: Tasmā ahaṃ yaṃnūna yadi pana upasaṅkameyyaṃ sādhu vatāti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:1117_15: “Yadi panā”ti idampi tena samānatthanti vuttaṃ “yadi panāhanti attho”ti.
tika-s0105t:1118_3: Disāsu patthaṭavasenāti vipulabhāvena bhūtaparamparāya sabbadisāsu pattharaṇavasena.
tika-s0105t:1118_4: Ettha ca pāḷiyaṃ yathā unnatapāyo saddo unnādo,
tika-s0105t:1118_5: evaṃ vipulabhāvena uparūpari pavattopi unnādoyevāti tadubhayaṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā “unnādiniyā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1119_0: Sūriyuggamane khajjopanamiva nippabhataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “khajjopanakūpamā jātā”ti.
tika-s0105t:1119_1: Lābhasakkāropi no parihīnoti attho bāverujātakena dīpetabbo.
tika-s0105t:1120_2: Saṇṭhapanañcettha tiracchānakathāya aññamaññasmiṃ agāravassa cajāpanavasena ācārasikkhāpanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1121_1: No āgate ānandoti amhākaṃ bhagavati āgate ānando pīti hoti.
tika-s0105t:1121_2: “Cirassaṃ kho bhante bhagavā imaṃ pariyāyamakāsī”ti vacanaṃ pubbepi tattha āgatapubbattā vuttavacanamiva
tika-s0105t:1121_7: atha kho aññepi pabbajitā yebhuyyena bhagavato apacitiṃ karontevāti tadaññesampi bāhullakammena tadatthaṃ sādhetuṃ “bhagavantañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1121_10: Tathā hi soṇadaṇḍena vuttaṃ “samaṇo khalu bho gotamo uccākulā pabbajito asambhinnakhattiyakulā”ti,
tika-s0105t:1121_11: tena sāsane appasannānampi kulagāravena bhagavati apacitiṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:1121_12: Etasmiṃ antare kā nāma kathāti yathāvuttaparicchedabbhantare kīdisā nāma kathā.
tika-s0105t:1121_14: “Kā kathā vippakatā”ti pana vadanto atthato tassā pariyosāpanaṃ paṭijānāti nāma.
tika-s0105t:1121_16: tasmā yassā tassā sabbassāpi kathāya pariyosāpanaṃ paṭiññātaṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:1123_8: “Ayaṃ kiṃ vadati ayaṃ kiṃ vadatī”ti kutūhalaṃ kolāhalamettha atthīti kotūhalā,
tika-s0105t:1123_17: atthato pana nirodhakathā vuccamānā tattheva tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0105t:1123_18: tasmā atthāpattimattaṃ pati tathā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1123_21: bhavantarapaṭicchannampi kāraṇaṃ evaṃ hatthāmalakaṃ viya paccakkhato dasseti,
tika-s0105t:1123_22: sāvake ca edise saṃvarasamādāne patiṭṭhāpetī’ti thutighoso yāva bhavaggā pattharatīti.
tika-s0105t:1123_24: Idāni pana “sakalajambudīpe bhagavato kathākittighoso pattharatī”ti pāṭho dissati.
tika-s0105t:1123_26: Bhavantarasamayanti tatra tatra vuṭṭhānasamayaṃ abhūtaparikappitaṃ kiñci ussāriyavatthuṃ attano samayaṃ katvā kathenti.
tika-s0105t:1123_28: ettakaṃ velaṃ ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne nisīditabba”nti evamādikaṃ kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ sikkhākoṭṭhāsaṃ katvā paññapenti.
tika-s0105t:1124_2: Purimoti “ahetū appaccayā purisassa saññā uppajjantipi nirujjhantipī”tiādinā vuttavādī.
tika-s0105t:1124_9: Hetuṃ apassantoti yena hetunā asaññībhave saññāya nirodho sabbaso anuppādo,
tika-s0105t:1124_10: yena ca tato cutassa idha pañcavokārabhave saññāya uppādo,
tika-s0105t:1125_0: Dutiyoti “saññā hi bho purisassa attā”tiādinā vuttavādī.
tika-s0105t:1125_2: Nisedhetvāti “na kho pana metaṃ bho evaṃ bhavissatī”ti evaṃ paṭikkhipitvā.
tika-s0105t:1125_4: Tassa kira matthake migasiṅgākārena dve cūḷā uṭṭhahiṃsu,
tika-s0105t:1125_8: Cattālīsanipāte āgatanayena migasiṅgatāpasavatthuṃ saṅkhepato dassetuṃ “migasiṅgatāpaso kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1125_22: Evamāhāti evaṃ “saññā hi bho purisassa attā”tiādinā ākārena saññānirodhamāha.
tika-s0105t:1125_23: Imināva nayena ito paresupi dvīsu ṭhānesu pāḷimāharitvā yojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0105t:1126_4: Āthabbaṇaṃ payojetvāti āthabbaṇavede āgataṃ aggijuhanapubbakaṃ mantapadaṃ payojetvā sīsacchinnatādidassanena saññānirodhamāha.
tika-s0105t:1127_0: Catutthoti “santi hi bho devatā mahiddhikā”tiādinā vuttavādī.
tika-s0105t:1127_11: pabuddhakāle saññupakaḍḍhanavasena nirodhā vuṭṭhitāti maññamānoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:1128_0: Eḷamūgakathā viyāti imesaṃ paṇḍitamānīnaṃ kathā andhabālakathāsadisī.
tika-s0105t:1128_3: Na bahunāti na ca aññamaññaviruddhena bahuvidhena nānāsabhāvena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1128_9: Ayaṃ nirodho ayaṃ nirodhoti dvikkhattuṃ byāpanicchāvacanaṃ satthā attano desanāvilāsena anekākāravokāraṃ nirodhaṃ vibhāvessatīti dassanatthaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0105t:1128_10: Aho nūnāti ettha ahoti acchariye nipāto,
tika-s0105t:1128_12: Tasmā aho nūna bhagavāti anaññasādhāraṇadesanattā bhagavā nirodhampi aho acchariyaṃ katvā ārādheyya maññeti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:1128_13: Aho nūna sugatoti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-s0105t:1128_15: Acchariyatthopi hesa ahosaddo anussaraṇamukheneva poṭṭhapādena gahito.
tika-s0105t:1128_20: Kāladesapuggalādivibhāgena bahubhedattā imesaṃ nirodhadhammānanti bahutte sāmivacanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1128_23: Aho nūna katheyyāti acchariyaṃ katvā katheyya maññe.
tika-s0105t:1130_1: Gharamajjheyeva pakkhalitāti yathā gharato bahi gantukāmā purisā maggaṃ anotaritvā gharavivare samatale vivaṭaṅgaṇe eva pakkhalanaṃ pattā,
tika-s0105t:1130_5: idha pana tena vibhāgena payojanaṃ natthi saññāya akāraṇabhāvapaṭikkhepaparattā codanāyāti vuttaṃ “kāraṇasseva nāma”nti.
tika-s0105t:1130_6: Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ “sahetū hi poṭṭhapāda sappaccayā purisassa saññā uppajjantipi nirujjhantipī”ti,
tika-s0105t:1130_14: tassapi puna nirodhena bhavitabbaṃ aṅkurādīnaṃ puna aṅkurādinā viya,
tika-s0105t:1130_15: na ca tassa puna nirodho atthi,
tika-s0105t:1130_19: so “sahetuko”ti veditabbo tathārūpāya paṭipattiyā vinā abhāvato.
tika-s0105t:1130_21: sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhatī”ti tato eva ca aṭṭhakathāyampi vuttaṃ “saññāya sahetukaṃ uppādanirodhaṃ dīpetu”nti.
tika-s0105t:1130_25: kāralopo vā “saṅkhyāpi tamhā vanapattā pakkamitabba”ntiādīsu viya.
