tika-s0105t:1130_28: na saṅkhyāvācī “ittheke sato sattassā”tiādīsu viyāti āha “sikkhāya ekaccā saññā jāyantī”ti.
tika-s0105t:1131_13: upakārato ca yathārahaṃ paññākkhandhe avarodhattā saṅgahitattāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:1131_14: Tathā hi cūḷavedallasutte vuttaṃ “yā cāvuso visākha sammādiṭṭhi,
tika-s0105t:1131_16: ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā”ti kāmañcettha vuttanayena tissopi sikkhā āgatā,
tika-s0105t:1131_18: Itarā pana tassā sambhārabhāvena ānītāti ayamattho pāḷivasena veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:1132_1: Asamuppannakāmacāroti vattamānuppannatāvasena nasamuppanno yo koci kāmacāro,
tika-s0105t:1132_5: Kāmarāgo cettha visayavasena niyamitattā kāmaguṇārammaṇova lobho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-s0105t:1132_11: tasmā “kāmasaññā”ti paduddhāraṃ katvā tadubhayameva niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1132_14: Kāmaṃ pañcakāmaguṇikarāgopi asamuppanno eva anāgāmimaggena samugghāṭīyati,
tika-s0105t:1132_15: tasmiṃ pana samugghāṭitepi na sabbo rāgo samugghāṭaṃ gacchati tassa aggamaggena samugghāṭitattā.
tika-s0105t:1132_16: Tasmā pañcakāmaguṇikarāgaggahaṇena itarassa sabbassa gahaṇaṃ na hotīti ubhayatthasādhāraṇena pariyāyena
tika-s0105t:1132_19: visesato ca dassetvā sabbasaṅgāhikabhāvato “asamuppannakāmacāro pana imasmiṃ ṭhāne vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1132_20: Tasmāti asamuppannakāmacārasseva idha vaṭṭanato ayamattho veditabboti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:1132_23: etena pāḷiyaṃ “purimā”ti idaṃ sadisakappanāvasena vuttanti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:1132_24: Anāgatā hi idha “nirujjhatī”ti vuttā anuppādassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0105t:1133_5: Saṅkhātasaddo hettha koṭṭhāsattho “adinnaṃ theyyasaṅkhātaṃ ādiyeyyā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0105t:1133_11: Evaṃ byāsavasena yathāpāṭhamatthaṃ dassetvā samāsavasenapi yathāpāṭhameva dassento “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:1133_19: Idāni jhānasamaṅgīvasena vuttassa dutiyapadassa atthaṃ dassetuṃ “sā assā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1134_0: Samāpajjanādhiṭṭhānaṃ viya vuṭṭhānampijhāne pariyāpannaṃ hoti yathā taṃ dhammānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇo dhammesu,
tika-s0105t:1134_9: Hetubhāvo cettha jhānassa vivekajapītisukhasukhumasaccasaññāya uppattiyā sahajātādipaccayabhāvo.
tika-s0105t:1134_12: Tathā ceva heṭṭhā saṃvaṇṇitaṃ “tathārūpāya paṭipattiyā vinā abhāvato”ti etenupāyenāti yvāyaṃ paṭhamajjhānatappaṭipakkhasaññāvasena
tika-s0105t:1134_14: sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhatī”ti ettha nayo vutto,
tika-s0105t:1135_1: Idāni ākiñcaññāyatanaparamāya eva saññāya dassane kāraṇaṃ vibhāvento “yasmā panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:1135_7: Anupadadhammavipassanañhi karonto samāpattiṃ patvā aṅgatova sammasanaṃ karoti,
tika-s0105t:1135_8: na ca saññā samāpattiyā kiñci aṅgaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:1135_9: Atha ca panetaṃ vuttaṃ “idañca saññā saññāti evaṃ aṅgato sammasanaṃ uddhaṭa”nti,
tika-s0105t:1135_14: Yasmā panettha samāpattivasena taṃtaṃsaññānaṃ uppādanirodhe vuccamāne aṅgavasena so vutto hoti,
tika-s0105t:1136_0: “Yo”ti vattabbe “yato”ti vuttanti āha “yo nāmā”ti yathā “ādimhī”ti vattabbe “ādito”ti vuccati atthe pariggayhamāne yathāyuttavibhattiyāva to-
tika-s0105t:1136_7: sā etassatthīti sakasaññīti vuttaṃ “attano paṭhamajjhānasaññāya saññavā”ti.
tika-s0105t:1136_8: Īkāro cettha upari vuccamānanirodhapādakatāya sātisayāya jhānasaññāya atthibhāvajotako daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0105t:1136_10: Tasmā tattha tattha sakasaññitāggahaṇena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ jhāne sabbaso suciṇṇavasībhāvo dīpitoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1137_5: Ettha pana “lokiyāna”nti visesanaṃ lokuttarasamāpattīhi tassa aseṭṭhabhāvato kataṃ.
tika-s0105t:1137_6: Sesaṃ “kiccakārakasamāpattīna”nti pana visesanaṃ akiccakārakasamāpattito tassa aseṭṭhabhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1137_9: “yadaggena hi tattha dhammā saṅkhārāvasesabhāvappattiyā pakativipassakānaṃ sammasituṃ asakkuṇeyyarūpena ṭhitā,
tika-s0105t:1137_10: tadaggena heṭṭhimasamāpattidhammā viya paṭukiccakaraṇasamatthāpi na hontī”ti ca aṭṭhakathāsu paṭusaññākiccābhāvavacanato viññāyati.
tika-s0105t:1137_11: Svāyamattho paramatthamañjūsāya nāma visuddhimaggaṭīkāya āruppakathāyaṃ ācariyena savisesaṃ vutto,
tika-s0105t:1137_13: Keci pana “yathā heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā samāpattiyo uparimānaṃ uparimānaṃ samāpattīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ sādhenti,
tika-s0105t:1137_14: na evaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpatti kassacipi adhiṭṭhānaṃ sādheti,
tika-s0105t:1137_15: tasmā sā akiccakārikā itarā kiccakārikā”ti vadanti,
tika-s0105t:1138_1: Jhānaṃ samāpajjanto hi jhānasukhaṃ attani saṃvidahati nāma.
tika-s0105t:1138_12: Ākiñcaññāyatanato vuṭṭhāya eva hi uparijhānatthāya cetanābhisaṅkharaṇāni bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-s0105t:1139_0: Cetentovāti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanajjhānaṃ ekaṃ dve cittavārepi samāpajjanavasena pakappento eva.
tika-s0105t:1139_1: Na cetetīti tathā heṭṭhimajhānesu viya vā pubbābhogābhāvato na pakappeti nāma.
tika-s0105t:1139_2: Pubbābhogavasena hi jhānaṃ pakappento idha “cetetī”ti vutto.
tika-s0105t:1139_4: Nābhisaṅkharotīti tathā heṭṭhimajhānesu viya vā pubbābhogābhāvato nāyūhati nāma.
tika-s0105t:1139_5: “Ahametaṃ jhānaṃ nibbattemi upasampādemi samāpajjāmī”ti hi evaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ tattha sālayasseva hoti,
tika-s0105t:1139_7: tasmā ekadvicittakkhaṇikampi jhānaṃ pavattento tattha appahīnanikantikatāya “abhisaṅkharonto evā”ti vutto.
tika-s0105t:1139_8: Yasmā panassa tathā heṭṭhimajhānesu viya vā tattha pubbābhogo natthi,
tika-s0105t:1140_1: Pacchābhāgeti āsanasālāya pacchimadisāyaṃ ṭhitassa pitugharassa pacchābhāge.
tika-s0105t:1140_5: Āsanasālā viya ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti tato pitugharaputtagharaṭṭhāniyānaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatananirodhasamāpattīnaṃ upagantabbato.
tika-s0105t:1140_10: Pitugharaṃ amanasikaritvāti pavisitvā samatikkantampi pitugharaṃ amanasikaritvā.
tika-s0105t:1140_11: Puttagharasseva ācikkhaṇaṃ viya ekaṃ dve cittavāre samāpajjitabbampi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ amanasikaritvā
tika-s0105t:1140_14: manasikārasāmaññena ca upamopameyyatā vuttā ācikkhaṇenapi manasikārasseva jotanato.
tika-s0105t:1140_15: Na hi manasikārena vinā ācikkhaṇaṃ sambhavati.
tika-s0105t:1141_0: Tā jhānasaññāti ekaṃ dve cittavāre pavattā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanajhānasaññā.
tika-s0105t:1141_8: So evaṃ paṭipanno bhikkhūti yathāvutte saññagge ṭhitabhāvena paṭipanno bhikkhu,
tika-s0105t:1141_9: so ca kho anāgāmī vā arahā vā dvīhi phalehi samannāgamo,
tika-s0105t:1141_12: navavidhā samādhicariyāti imesaṃ vasena nirodhapaṭipādanapaṭipattiṃ paṭipannoti attho.
tika-s0105t:1141_14: Phusatīti ettha phusanaṃ nāma vindanaṃ paṭiladdhīti dasseti “vindati paṭilabhatī”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:1141_15: Atthato pana vuttanayena yathāparicchinnakālaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ sabbaso appavattiyeva.
tika-s0105t:1142_2: Nirodhapadena anantarikaṃ katvā samāpattipade vattabbe tesaṃ dvinnamantare sampajānapadaṃ ṭhapitanti āha “nirodhapadena antarikaṃ katvā vutta”nti.
tika-s0105t:1142_5: Tatrāpīti tasmiṃ yathāpadamanupubbiṭhapanepi ayaṃ visesatthoti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:1142_6: Sampajānantassāti taṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha tattha saṅkhārānaṃ sammasanavasena pajānantassa puggalassa.
tika-s0105t:1142_9: iminā nirodhasamāpattisamāpajjanakassa bhikkhuno ādito paṭṭhāya sabbapāṭihārikapaññāya saddhiṃ atthasādhikā paññā kiccato dassitā hoti.
tika-s0105t:1144_0: Pāḷiyaṃ evaṃ kho ahanti ettha ākārattho evaṃ-
tika-s0105t:1144_2: Evaṃ poṭṭhapādāti ettha pana sampaṭicchanattho tatheva anujānananti katvā.
tika-s0105t:1145_3: Avasesasamāpattīsupi saññaggaṃ atthīti ettha pana saññaggabhāvo “saññagga”nti vutto,
tika-s0105t:1145_10: Jhānānaṃ tāva yutto karaṇabhāvo saññānirodhaphusanassa sādhakatamabhāvato,
tika-s0105t:1145_15: Anekakaraṇāpi ca kiriyā hotiyeva yathā “aññena maggena yānena dīpikāya gacchatī”ti.
tika-s0105t:1146_4: eko saññaggabhāvo vā heṭṭhimāya saññāya ukkaṭṭhabhāvato.
tika-s0105t:1146_5: Saññā ca sā aggañcāti hi saññaggaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1146_7: Yathā pana saññā aggo etthāti saññaggaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1146_16: tato eva cettha jhānaggahaṇenapi kasiṇajjhānāni eva gahitānīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1146_17: Yathā “pathavīkasiṇena karaṇabhūtenā”ti tadārammaṇikaṃ jhānaṃ anāmasitvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1147_1: Paṭhamanaye jhānapadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhentassa puggalassa vasena saññāñāṇāni dassitāni.
tika-s0105t:1147_2: Dutiyanaye pana yasmā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggena ghaṭentassa maggañāṇaṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0105t:1147_5: dutiyanayopi missakoti tadubhayaṃ asambhāvetvā accantasukhumagambhīraṃ nibbattitalokuttarameva dassetuṃ maggaphalavasena saññāñāṇāni dassitāni.
tika-s0105t:1148_1: Tathā hi “arahattaphalasaññāya uppādā”tiādinā theravādānukūlameva upari attho saṃvaṇṇitoti.
tika-s0105t:1148_3: Tadā dīghanikāyatantiṃ parivattante imaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā yathāvuttapaṭipāṭiyā tayo naye kathente bhikkhū sandhāya evaṃ thero vadati.
tika-s0105t:1148_4: Nirodhaṃ pucchitvā tasmiṃ kathite tadanantaraṃ saññāñāṇuppattiṃ pucchanto atthato nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṃ pucchati nāma.
tika-s0105t:1148_5: Nirodhato ca vuṭṭhānaṃ arahattaphaluppattiyā vā siyā,
tika-s0105t:1148_8: tadanantarañca paccavekkhaṇañāṇanti tadubhayaṃ niddhārento thero “poṭṭhapādo heṭṭhā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:1149_0: Yathā maggavīthiyaṃ maggaphalañāṇesu uppannesu niyamato maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇañāṇāni honti,
tika-s0105t:1149_7: So pana theravāde na phalasamādhisaññā evāti āha “phalasamādhisaññāpaccayā”ti,
tika-s0105t:1149_11: Samādhisīsena cettha sabbaṃ arahattaphalaṃ gahitaṃ sahacaraṇañāyena,
tika-s0105t:1149_12: tasmiṃ asati paccavekkhaṇāya asambhavoti pāḷiyaṃ “idappaccayā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1149_13: Evamidha dīghabhāṇakānaṃ matena phalapaccavekkhaṇāya ekantikatā dassitā.
tika-s0105t:1149_14: Cūḷadukkhakkhandhasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana evaṃ vuttaṃ “sā pana na sabbesaṃ paripuṇṇā hoti.
tika-s0105t:1149_20: Imāsu pana pañcasu paccavekkhaṇāsu ekaṃ vā dve vā no laddhuṃ na vaṭṭantī”ti,
tika-s0105t:1153_3: Desanāya saṇhabhāvena sārambhamakkhaissādimalavisodhanato sutamayañāṇaṃ nhāpitaṃ viya,
tika-s0105t:1153_15: Anumatiṃ gahetvāti anuññaṃ gahetvā “ediso me attā”ti anujānāpetvā,
tika-s0105t:1154_1: arūpīti tiṇṇaṃ attavādānaṃ vasena tividhesu attānesu kataraṃ attānaṃ paccesīti attho.
tika-s0105t:1154_2: “Desanāya sukusalo”ti iminā “avassaṃ me bhagavā laddhiṃ viddhaṃsessatī”ti tassa manasikāraṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:1154_4: arūpī attāti attano laddhiṃ nigūhantoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:1154_6: yasmā catusantatirūpappabandhaṃ ekattavasena gahetvā rūpībhāvato “oḷāriko attā”ti pacceti attavādī,
tika-s0105t:1154_8: rūpībhāvato eva ca saññāya aññattaṃ ñāyāgatameva,
tika-s0105t:1154_11: tasmā paribbājako taṃ attavādimataṃ attānaṃ sandhāya “oḷārikaṃ kho”tiādimāhāti.
tika-s0105t:1155_0: “Oḷāriko ca hi te poṭṭhapāda attā abhavissā”tiādimhi bhagavato vacane cāyamadhippāyo –
tika-s0105t:1155_5: Rūpī ca samāno yadi tava matena nicco,
tika-s0105t:1155_6: saññā ca aparāparaṃ pavattanato tattha tattha bhijjatīti bhedasabbhāvato aniccā,
tika-s0105t:1155_8: añño attā”ti saññāya abhāvato acetanova attā hoti,
tika-s0105t:1155_9: tasmā esa attā na kammassa kārako,
tika-s0105t:1155_10: na ca phalassa upabhuñjanakoti āpannamevāti imaṃ dosaṃ dassento bhagavā “oḷāriko cā”tiādimāhāti.
tika-s0105t:1155_17: aññā ca saññā nirujjhantī”ti kasmā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1155_19: na ca uppannaṃ anirujjhanakaṃ nāma atthīti codanaṃ sodhetuṃ “catunnaṃ khandhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1155_20: Satipi nesaṃ ekālambaṇavatthukabhāve uppādanirodhādhikārattā ekuppādanirodhabhāvova vutto.
tika-s0105t:1156_8: Dose dinneti “aññāva saññā bhavissatī”tiādinā dose dinne attano laddhiṃyeva vadanto “arūpiṃ kho”tiādimāhāti sambandho.
tika-s0105t:1156_9: Idhāpi purimavāde vuttanayena “yadi attā manomayo sabbaṅgapaccaṅgī ahīnindriyo bhaveyya,
tika-s0105t:1156_11: na ca saññī saññāya arūpabhāvato”tiādi sabbaṃ dosadassanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1156_12: Tamatthañhi dassento bhagavā “manomayo ca hi te poṭṭhapādā”tiādimavoca.
tika-s0105t:1156_13: Kasmā panāyaṃ paribbājako paṭhamaṃ oḷārikaṃ attānaṃ paṭijānitvā taṃ laddhiṃ vissajjetvā puna manomayaṃ attānaṃ paṭijānāti?
tika-s0105t:1156_14: Tampi vissajjitvā puna arūpiṃ attānaṃ paṭijānātīti?
tika-s0105t:1156_15: Kāmañcettha kāraṇaṃ “tato so arūpī attāti evaṃladdhiko samānopi…pe…
tika-s0105t:1156_17: tathāpi ime titthiyā nāma anavaṭṭhitacittā thusarāsimhi nikhātakhāṇuko viya cañcalāti kāraṇantarampi dassetuṃ “yathā nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1156_18: Saññā nappatiṭṭhātīti ārammaṇe sañjānanavasena saññā na patiṭṭhāti,
tika-s0105t:1156_19: ārammaṇe saññaṃ na karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:1157_4: Tena vedikānaṃ matena nānakkhaṇe uppannāya nānārammaṇāya saññāya uppādanirodhamicchatīti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:1157_8: Aparāparaṃ pavattāya saññāya uppādavayadassanato uppādanirodhaṃ icchati.
tika-s0105t:1157_9: Tathāpi “saññā saññā”ti pavattasamaññaṃ “attā”ti gahetvā tassa avicchedaṃ parikappento sassataṃ maññati.
tika-s0105t:1157_11: Tasmāti aparāparaṃ pavattasaññāya nāmamattena sassataṃ maññanato.
tika-s0105t:1157_12: Saññāya uppādanirodhamatte aṭṭhatvā taduttari sassataggāhassa gahaṇato dosaṃ dassetīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:1157_14: manomayo attā”ti ca vādadvaye attano asaññatā,
tika-s0105t:1157_21: samūhaghanena ca vañcito bālo pabandhavasena pavattamānaṃ dhammasamūhaṃ micchāgāhavasena “attā”ti ca “nicco”ti ca abhinivissa voharati,
tika-s0105t:1157_24: so ca sabbena sabbaṃ titthiyānaṃ natthi.
tika-s0105t:1157_25: Tasmā ayampi paribbājako tādisassa ñāṇaparipākassa abhāvato vuccamānampi nānattaṃ nāññāsīti āha “taṃ nānattaṃ ajānanto”ti.
tika-s0105t:1157_28: Saññāya uppādanirodhaṃ passantopi saññāmayaṃ saññābhūtaṃ attānaṃ parikappetvā yathāvuttaghanavinibbhogābhāvato
tika-s0105t:1157_30: Tathābhūtassa ca tassa saṇhasukhumaparamagambhīradhammatā na ñāyatevāti idaṃ kāraṇaṃ passantena bhagavatā
tika-s0105t:1158_1: Tassā eva pubbabhāgabhūtaṃ “evameta”nti nijjhānavasena khamanaṃ khanti.
tika-s0105t:1158_4: Tattha aññathāyevāti yathā ariyavinaye antadvayaṃ anupagamma majjhimapaṭipadāvasena dassanaṃ hoti,
tika-s0105t:1158_8: tato aññadeva paramatthato avijjamānaṃ attasassatādikaṃ tayā khamate ceva ruccate cāti attho.
tika-s0105t:1158_15: Aññasmiṃ titthāyatane tava ācariyabhāvo atthīti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:1158_18: ayaṃ sammutī”ti imassa vibhāgassa dubbibhāgattā dujjānaṃ etaṃ nānattaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1158_20: aññaṃ panatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ pucchāmī”ti cintetvā tathā paṭipannataṃ dassetuṃ “atha paribbājako”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1158_21: Añño vā saññātoti saññāsabhāvato aññasabhāvo vā attā hotūti attho.
tika-s0105t:1158_22: Adhunā pana “aññā vā saññā”ti pāṭho dissati.
tika-s0105t:1159_5: Diṭṭhigatanti “sassato attā ca loko cā”tiādi nayapavattaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ.
tika-s0105t:1159_8: so “taṃ nissito”ti vattabbataṃ labheyya yathā taṃ puññañāṇasambhāro.
tika-s0105t:1159_13: Sabbampi vākyaṃ antogadhāvadhāraṇaṃ tassa avadhāraṇaphalattāti vuttaṃ “ādimatta”nti.
tika-s0105t:1159_16: na aññattha viya ājīvaṭṭhamakādi ādibrahmacariyakanti dasseti “adhisīlasikkhāmatta”nti iminā.
tika-s0105t:1159_21: Taṃ pana vaṭṭassa paccakkhakaraṇameva hotīti āha “paccakkhakiriyāyā”ti.
tika-s0105t:1160_1: tassā pana samudayabhāvena visuṃ gahitattā “taṇhaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1160_3: Dukkhaṃ pabhāventīpi taṇhā avijjādipaccayantarasahitā eva pabhāveti,
tika-s0105t:1160_12: Taṃ ākāranti taṃ tuṇhībhāvasaṅkhātaṃ gamanaliṅga ārocento viya,
tika-s0105t:1161_2: Manogaṇādīnaṃ visesanassa napuṃsakaliṅgena niddiṭṭhattā “vācāya sannitodakenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1161_4: Atha vā “vācāyā”ti idaṃ “sannitodakenā”ti ettha karaṇavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1161_10: satamattehi tuttakehi viya vividhehi paribbājakavācātodanehi tudiṃ sūti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:1161_24: Kasmā panesā paṭipadā dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatāti āha “buddhānañhī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:1163_7: Itaro pana taṃ sutvāva na vibbhami,
tika-s0105t:1163_9: Gihibhāve ānisaṃsakathāya kathitattāti ettha sīlavantassa bhikkhuno tathā kathanena vibbhamane niyojitattā
tika-s0105t:1163_10: idāni sayampi sīlavā eva hutvā cha vāre vibbhamīti adhippāyo gahetabbo.
tika-s0105t:1163_13: Mahāsāvakassa kathiteti mahāsāvakabhūtena mahākoṭṭhikattherena apasādanavasena kathite,
tika-s0105t:1163_16: Dhammapadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kudālapaṇḍitajātake ca chakkhattumeva vibbhamanavāro vutto.
tika-s0105t:1164_8: Na ekaṃsikāti na ekantikā nibbānāvahabhāvena nicchitā vaṭṭantogadhabhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:1164_9: Ayamattho hi “kasmā cete poṭṭhapāda mayā ekaṃsikā dhammā desitā paññattā,
tika-s0105t:1166_2: Phale hi siddhe hetupi siddho hotīti,
tika-s0105t:1166_3: ayaṃ ācariyamati apare pana “edisesu atthasaddo kāraṇe vattati,
tika-s0105t:1166_7: Vaṭṭadukkhapariyosānaṃ gacchati etāyāti niṭṭhāti hi vimutti vuttā “goṭṭhā paṭṭhitagāvo”ti mahāsīhanādasuttapade viya ṭhā-
tika-s0105t:1167_1: Amataṃ nibbānaṃ niṭṭhamiti paññapeti yathāti sambandho.
tika-s0105t:1167_2: Lokathūpikādivasena niṭṭhaṃ paññapentīti “nibbānaṃ nibbāna”nti vacanasāmaññamattaṃ gahetvā tathā paññapenti.
tika-s0105t:1167_3: Lokathūpikā nāma brahmabhūmi vuccati lokassa thūpikasadisatāparikappanena.
tika-s0105t:1167_13: Tasmiṃ tasmiñhi samaye niṭṭhaṃ apaññapento nāma natthi.
tika-s0105t:1167_15: Tattha hi nesaṃ niccābhiniveso yathā taṃ bakassa brahmuno,
tika-s0105t:1167_20: sabbepi cete diṭṭhivasena brahmalokādīni arahattamaññanāya “nibbānaṃ nibbāna”nti vacanasāmaññamattaṃ gahetvā tathā paññapenti,
tika-s0105t:1167_21: na pana paramatthato nesaṃsamaye nibbānapaññāpanassa labbhanatoti āha “sā ca na niyyānikā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:1167_24: Na niyyātīti “yenākārena niṭṭhā pāpuṇīyatī”ti tehi paveditā,
tika-s0105t:1167_26: Paṇḍitehi paṭikkhittāti “nāyaṃ niṭṭhā paṭipadā vaṭṭassa anatikkamanato”ti buddhādīhi paṇḍitehi paṭikkhittā.
tika-s0105t:1167_28: yasmā tehi paññattā niṭṭhā paṭipadā na niyyāti na gacchati,
tika-s0105t:1167_29: aññadatthu taṃsamaṅginaṃ puggalaṃ saṃsāre eva paribbhamāpentī nivattati,
tika-s0105t:1168_2: Gacchantādisaddānañhi “yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṃ sabhikkhukaṃ ārāmaṃ anāpucchā paviseyyā”tiādīsu liṅgavasena vipariyāyo,
tika-s0105t:1168_7: Padhānaṃ jānanaṃ nāma paccakkhato jānanaṃ tassa jeṭṭhabhāvato,
tika-s0105t:1168_8: dassanamappadhānaṃ tassa saṃsayānubandhattāti ayaṃ kamo vutto “jānaṃ passa”nti.
tika-s0105t:1168_10: Evañhi diṭṭhapubbāni kho tasmiṃ loke manussānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānādīnīti ekato adhippāyadassanaṃ sūpapannaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:1168_11: Ayañhetthādhippāyo “kiṃ tumhākaṃ ekantasukhe loke paccakkhato ñāṇadassanaṃ atthī”ti.
tika-s0105t:1168_12: Jānanti vā tassa lokassa anumānavisayataṃ vuccati,
tika-s0105t:1168_14: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “api tumhākaṃ loko paccakkhato ñāto,
tika-s0105t:1169_0: Yasmā pana loke paccakkhabhūto attho indriyagocarabhāvena pākaṭo,
tika-s0105t:1169_1: tasmā pākaṭena atthena adhippāyaṃ dassetuṃ “diṭṭhapubbānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1169_3: tadanugatañca jānanaṃ gahetvā tadubhayeneva atthena adhippāyaṃ vibhāvetuṃ evaṃ vuttantipi daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1169_21: Sauttarañhi vacanaṃ tena uttaravacanena paṭiharīyati viparivattīyati,
tika-s0105t:1169_24: Tasmā eva niyyānassa paṭiharaṇamaggassa abhāvato “aniyyānika”nti vattabbataṃ labhati.
tika-s0105t:1172_5: Rūpabhavaṃ dasseti jhānamanena nibbattaṃ hutvā rūpībhāvena upalabbhanato.
tika-s0105t:1172_7: Saṃkilesikā dhammā nāma dvādasa akusalacittuppādā tadabhāve kassaci saṃkilesassa asambhavato.
tika-s0105t:1172_8: Vodāniyā dhammā nāma samathavipassanā tāsaṃ vasena sabbaso cittavodānassa sijjhanato.
tika-s0105t:1173_1: Paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ asamucchede sati na kadācipi anavajjadhammānaṃ vā pāripūrī,
tika-s0105t:1173_3: samucchede pana sati sambhavatīti maggaphalapaññānameva gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1173_4: tā hi sakiṃ paripuṇṇāpi aparihīnadhammattā paripuṇṇā eva bhavanti.
tika-s0105t:1173_6: Balavatuṭṭhīti punappunaṃ uppattiyā laddhāsevanā uparivisesādhigamassa paccayabhūtā thiratarā pīti.
tika-s0105t:1173_11: yaṃ vihāraṃ “saṃkilesikavodāniyadhammānaṃ pahānābhivuddhiniṭṭhaṃ paññāya pāripūrivepullabhūtaṃ imasmiṃyeva
tika-s0105t:1173_12: attabhāve aparappaccayena ñāṇena paccakkhato sampādetvā viharissatī”ti kathayimhāti.
tika-s0105t:1173_28: sabbesupi iriyāpathavihārādīsu santapaṇītatāya imasseva sukhattā “sukho vihāro”ti vattabbataṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:1174_0: Paṭhamajjhāne paṭiladdhamatte hīnabhāvato pīti dubbalā pāmojjapakkhikā,
tika-s0105t:1174_1: subhāvite pana tasmiṃ paguṇe sā paṇītā balavabhāvato paripuṇṇakiccā pītīti vuttaṃ “paṭhamajjhāne pāmojjādayo chapi dhammā labbhantī”ti.
tika-s0105t:1174_2: Pāmojjaṃ nivattatīti dubbalapītisaṅkhātaṃ pāmojjaṃ chasu dhammesu nivattati hāyati.
tika-s0105t:1174_3: Vitakkavicārakkhobhavirahitena hi catukkanayavibhatte dutiyajjhāne sabbadā pīti balavatī eva hoti,
tika-s0105t:1174_4: na paṭhamajjhāne viya kadāci dubbalāti evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1174_6: “Sukho vihāro”ti iminā samādhi gahitoti āha “tathā catutthe”ti.
tika-s0105t:1174_7: Ye pana “sukho vihāro’ti etena sukhaṃ gahita”nti vadanti,
tika-s0105t:1174_8: tesaṃ matena santavuttitāya upekkhāpi catutthajjhāne “sukha”micceva bhāsitāti katvā tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1174_9: Imasmiṃyeva dīghanikāye āgataṃ anekadhā desanānayamuddharitvā idha desitanayaṃ niyametuṃ “imesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1174_11: kathitanti uparimaggaṃ akathetvā kevalaṃ vipassanāpādakameva jhānaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1174_13: kathitāti vipassanāpādakabhāvena jhānāni kathetvā tato paraṃ vipassanāpubbakā cattāropi maggā kathitā.
tika-s0105t:1174_14: Catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpatti kathitāti paṭhamajjhānikādikā phalasamāpattiyo akathetvā catutthajjhānikā eva phalasamāpatti kathitā.
tika-s0105t:1174_15: Pītivevacanameva katvāti dvinnaṃ pītīnaṃ ekasmiṃ cittuppāde anuppajjanato pāmojjaṃ pītivevacanameva katvā,
tika-s0105t:1174_18: “sukho vihāro”ti ca sātisayassa sukhavihārassa gahitattā “dutiyajjhānikaphalasamāpatti nāma kathitā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1174_20: tāni pana vitakkavicāraparikkhobhena na tattha santapaṇītāni,
tika-s0105t:1175_1: Vibhāvanatthoti pakāsanattho sarūpato nirūpanattho “na samaṇo gotamo brāhmaṇe jiṇṇe …pe…
tika-s0105t:1175_2: abhivādeti vā paccuṭṭheti vā āsanena vā nimantetī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0105t:1175_4: “Ayaṃ attapaṭilābho so evā”ti evaṃ sarūpato vibhāvetvā pakāsetvā.
tika-s0105t:1175_5: Ayanti hi bhagavatā pubbe vuttaṃ attapaṭilābhaṃ āsannapaccakkhabhāvena paccāmasati,
tika-s0105t:1175_7: Na naṃ evaṃ vadāmāti ettha nanti oḷārikamattapaṭilābhaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1175_8: Sappāṭihīrakatanti ettha pubbe vuttanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:1175_9: Parehi coditavacanapaṭihārakaṃ sauttaravacanaṃ sappāṭihīrakanti hi ayameva viseso.
tika-s0105t:1175_14: Tasmiṃ samaye sacco hotīti tasmiṃ paccuppannasamaye vijjamāno hoti.
tika-s0105t:1175_15: Attapaṭilābhotveva niyyātesīti attapaṭilābhasaddena tathā eva pariyosāpesi,
tika-s0105t:1175_16: na pana naṃ “attapaṭilābho”ti saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti paññattiṃ sarūpato nīharitvā dassesīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:1175_17: Rūpādayo cettha dhammāti rūpavedanādayo eva ettha loke sabhāvadhammā.
tika-s0105t:1176_1: Evañca pana vatvāti rūpādike upādāya paññattimattametaṃ attapaṭilābhoti imamatthaṃ “yasmiṃ citta samaye”tiādinā vatvā.
tika-s0105t:1176_5: Ye te atītā dhammāti atītasamaye atītattapaṭilābhassa upādānabhūtā rūpādayo dhammā.
tika-s0105t:1176_11: Sacco ahosīti bhūto vijjamāno viya ahosi.
tika-s0105t:1176_13: Tadā abhāvāti tasmiṃ atītasamaye abhāvā avijjamānattā.
tika-s0105t:1176_15: paccuppanno ca attapaṭilābho tasmiṃ atīta samaye mogho tuccho musā natthīti attho.
tika-s0105t:1177_0: “Eseva nayo”ti iminā ye te anāgatā dhammā,
tika-s0105t:1177_3: tasmā sopi me attapaṭilābho tasmiṃyeva samaye sacco bhavissati.
tika-s0105t:1177_4: Atītapaccuppannānaṃ pana dhammānaṃ tadā abhāvā tasmiṃ samaye “mogho atīto,
tika-s0105t:1177_5: mogho paccuppanno”ti evaṃ atthato nāmamattameva attapaṭilābhaṃ paṭijānāti.
tika-s0105t:1177_10: Atītānāgatānaṃ pana dhammānaṃ adhunā abhāvā etarahi “mogho atīto,
tika-s0105t:1177_11: mogho anāgato”ti evaṃ atthato nāmamattameva attapaṭilābhaṃ paṭijānātīti imamatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0105t:1178_4: Yasmiṃ samaye khīraṃ hotīti yasmiṃ kāle bhūtupādāyasaññitaṃ upādānavisesaṃ upādāya khīrapaññatti hoti.
tika-s0105t:1178_10: Attaṃ nīharitvā uccanti vadanti etāyāti nirutti.
tika-s0105t:1178_11: Taṃ tadatthaṃ namanti sattā etenāti nāmaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1178_14: “Yasmiṃ samaye”tiādinā khīre vuttanayaṃ dadhiādīsupi “esa nayo sabbatthā”ti atidisati.
tika-s0105t:1179_1: idaṃ dadhī”tiādinā tādisesu bhūtupādāyarūpavisesesu loke paramparāgataṃ paññattiṃ appaṭikkhipitvā samanujānanaṃ
tika-s0105t:1179_2: viya paccayavisesavisiṭṭhaṃ rūpādikhandhasamūhaṃ upādāya “oḷāriko attapaṭilābho”ti ca “manomayo attapaṭilābho”ti
tika-s0105t:1179_3: ca “arūpo attapaṭilābho”ti ca tathā tathā samanujānanamattakāni,
tika-s0105t:1179_4: na ca tabbinimutto upādānato añño koci paramatthato atthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:1182_1: Niruttiyeva hi aññesampi diṭṭhānugatimāpajjantānaṃ kāraṇaṭṭhena vacanapatho.
tika-s0105t:1182_5: Sabbametanti “attapaṭilābho”ti vā “satto”ti vā “poso”ti vā sabbametaṃ vohāramattakaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1183_0: Yajjevaṃ kasmā cesā buddhehipi vuccatīti codanaṃ sodhento “buddhānaṃ panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:1185_0: Nibbānañceva paññatti, anattā iti nicchayā” ti. –
tika-s0105t:1186_5: khandhādisīsena vā tadupādānasabhāvadhammā eva gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1186_10: na ca saddo kenaci pavattinimittena vinā atthaṃ pakāsetīti.
tika-s0105t:1187_0: Kasmā cevaṃ dubbidhā buddhānaṃ kathā pavattatīti anuyogaṃ kāraṇavibhāvanena pariharituṃ “tattha yo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1187_1: Atthaṃ vijānituṃ catusaccaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ vaṭṭato niyyātuṃ arahattasaṅkhātaṃ jayaggāhaṃ gahetuṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0105t:1187_4: tasmā vineyyapuggalavasena ādito sammutikathaṃ kathentopi bhagavā parato paramatthakathaṃyeva kathetīti āha “tassā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:1187_5: “Āditova sammutikathaṃ kathetī”ti hi vadanto parato paramatthakathampi kathetīti dīpeti,
tika-s0105t:1187_8: Bodhetvāti veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ tathā tathā desetabbamatthaṃ jānāpetvā,
tika-s0105t:1187_12: iti vineyyadammakusalassa satthu veneyyajjhāsayavasena tathā tathā desanā pavattatīti.
tika-s0105t:1187_13: Sabbattha pana bhagavā dhammataṃ avijahanto eva sammutimanuvattati,
tika-s0105t:1188_0: Paṭhamaṃ sammutikathākathanaṃ pana veneyyavasena yebhuyyena buddhānamāciṇṇanti taṃ kāraṇena saddhiṃ dassento “pakatiyā panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:1188_2: Nanu ca sammuti nāma paramatthato avijjamānattā abhūtā,
tika-s0105t:1188_3: taṃ kathaṃ buddhā kathentīti vuttaṃ “sammutikathaṃ kathentāpī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:1189_2: buddhiyā vā avayavavinibbhoge kate na taṃsaññā,
tika-s0105t:1189_5: Na hi kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāve ayaṃ nayo labbhati.
tika-s0105t:1189_6: Evaṃ santepi vuttanayena sammuti ca saccasabhāvā evāti āha “duve saccāni akkhāsī”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:1189_7: Tattha duve saccāni akkhāsīti nānādesabhāsākusalo tiṇṇaṃ vedānamatthasaṃvaṇṇanako ācariyo viya nānāvidhasammutiparamatthakusalo
tika-s0105t:1189_8: bhagavā veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ duveyeva saccāni akkhāsīti attho.
tika-s0105t:1190_0: Idāni nesaṃ saccasabhāvaṃ saha kāraṇena dassetuṃ “saṅketavacana”nti gāthā vuttā.
tika-s0105t:1190_6: lokasiddhā sammuti saṅketavacanassa avisaṃvādanatāya kāraṇanti attho,
tika-s0105t:1190_8: Dhammānaṃ bhūtalakkhaṇanti ca paramatthavacanassa saccabhāve kāraṇadassanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1190_11: yāthāvato avisaṃvādanavasena pavattanato paramatthavacanaṃ saccanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:1190_12: Anaṅgaṇasuttaṭīkāyaṃ pana ācariyeneva nissakkavacanena padamulliṅgetvā “lokasammutikāraṇāti lokasamaññaṃ nissāya pavattanato.
tika-s0105t:1194_3: Sammutiṃ voharantassāti “puggalo satto”tiādinā lokasamaññaṃ kathentassa musāvādo nāma na jāyatīti attho.
tika-s0105t:1194_4: Apica “aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā puggala kathaṃ katheti hirottappadīpanatthaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1194_11: lokasammutiyā appahānatthañcā”tiādinā tattha tattha vuttakāraṇampi āharitvā idha vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1195_0: Yadi tathāgato paramatthasaccaṃ sammadeva abhisambujjhitvā ṭhitopi lokasamaññābhūtaṃ sammutisaccaṃ gahetvāva vadati,
tika-s0105t:1195_5: Tathāgato pana sabbaso pahīnaparāmāsattā aparāmasantova yasmā lokasamaññāhi vinā lokiyo attho lokena dubbiññeyyo,
tika-s0105t:1195_7: Tathā voharanto ca attano desanāvilāsena veneyyasatte paramatthasacce patiṭṭhāpetīti.
tika-s0105t:1195_8: Desanaṃ vinivaṭṭetvāti heṭṭhā vuttāya diṭṭhābhinivesapaṭisaññuttāya vaṭṭakathāya vinivattetvā vivecetvā.
tika-s0105t:1195_9: Arahattanikūṭena niṭṭhāpesīti “aparāmasa”nti iminā padena taṇhāmānaparāmāsappahānakittanena tappahāyakaarahattasaṅkhātanikūṭena desanaṃ pariyosāpesi.
tika-s0105t:1200_1: Evaṃ poṭṭhapādasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni subhasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ saṃvaṇṇanokāsassa pattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ,
tika-s0105t:1200_2: poṭṭhapādasuttassānantaraṃ saṅgītassa suttassa subhasuttabhāvaṃ vā pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe…
tika-s0105t:1200_4: Anunāsikalopena “acira parinibbute”ti vuttanti dasseti “aciraṃ parinibbute”ti iminā yathā poṭṭhapādasutte “appāṭihīraka taṃ bhāsitaṃ sampajjatī”ti,
tika-s0105t:1200_5: aciraṃ parinibbutassa assāti vā aciraparinibbuto yathā “acirapakkanto,
tika-s0105t:1200_8: Aciraparinibbuteti ca satthu parinibbutabhāvassa cirakālatāpaṭikkhepena āsannatāmattaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1200_9: kālaparicchedo pana na dassitoti taṃ dassento “parinibbānato”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:1200_12: Mattasaddena pana tassa kālassa kiñci asampuṇṇataṃ joteti.
tika-s0105t:1200_14: Taṃ panesa yasmā soṇadaṇḍo viya campaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1200_19: Puttampi āhāti subhaṃ māṇavampi ovadanto āha.
tika-s0105t:1201_4: Paṇḍito gharamāvaseti yasmā appatarappatarepi gayhamāne bhogā khīyanti,
tika-s0105t:1201_6: tasmā yathāvuttamupamattayaṃ paññāya disvā viññujātiko kiñcipi vayamakatvā āyameva uppādento gharevase
tika-s0105t:1202_0: Adānameva sikkhāpetvā sikkhāpanahetu lobhābhibhūtatāya tasmiṃyeva ghare sunakho hutvā nibbatti.
tika-s0105t:1202_2: “janavasabho nāma yakkho hutvā nibbattī”ti ettha vuttanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:1202_6: Subhaṃ māṇavaṃ anuggaṇhitukāmo ekakova bhagavā piṇḍāya pāvisi.
tika-s0105t:1202_11: Nanu ca heṭṭhā “adānameva sikkhāpetvā sunakho hutvā nibbatto”ti āha,
tika-s0105t:1202_12: kasmā panettha “pubbepi maṃ ‘bho bho’ti paribhavitvā sunakho jāto”ti vadatīti?
tika-s0105t:1203_4: Taṃ pavattiṃ pucchīti “sutametaṃ bho gotama mayhaṃ pitā sunakho hutvā nibbatto”ti tumhehi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1203_6: Tatheva vatvāti yathā pubbe sunakhassa vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1203_9: “todeyyabrāhmaṇo sunakho hutvā nibbatto”ti vacanassa avisaṃvādanena attano avisaṃvādibhāvadassanatthanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:1203_15: “Sabbaṃ dassesīti buddhānubhāvena so sunakho taṃ sabbaṃ netvā dassesi,
tika-s0105t:1203_17: Bhagavantaṃ disvā bhukkaraṇaṃ pana purimajātisiddhavāsanāvasenā”ti evaṃ ācariyena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1203_18: Uparipaṇṇāsake pana cūḷakammavibhaṅgasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sunakho ‘ñātomhi iminā’ti roditvā ‘huṃ hu’nti
tika-s0105t:1203_19: karonto dhananidhānaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā pādena pathaviṃ khaṇitvā saññaṃ adāsī”ti jātissarākāramāha,
tika-s0105t:1204_0: “Bhavapaṭicchannaṃ nāma evarūpaṃ sunakhapaṭisandhiantaraṃ pākaṭaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa,
tika-s0105t:1204_3: Tenassa etadahosi “imaṃ dhammapaṇṇākāraṃ katvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmī”ti,
tika-s0105t:1204_4: tato so cuddasa pañhe abhisaṅkharitvā bhagavantaṃ pucchi.
tika-s0105t:1204_6: Tattha cuddasa pañheti “dissanti hi bho gotama manussā appāyukā,
tika-s0105t:1204_19: Ko nu kho bho gotama hetu ko paccayo,
tika-s0105t:1204_20: yena manussānaṃyeva sataṃ manussabhūtānaṃ dissanti hīnapaṇītatā”ti ime cūḷakammavibhaṅgasutte āgate cuddasa pañhe.
tika-s0105t:1204_22: vitthārato ca vissajjanapariyosāne bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gato.
tika-s0105t:1204_24: Māṇavoti pana mahallakakālepi taruṇavohārena naṃ voharati.
tika-s0105t:1204_25: Attano bhogagāmatoti tudigāmato āgantvā taṅkhaṇikaṃ vasati.
tika-s0105t:1205_1: “Ekā ca me kaṅkhā atthī”ti iminā upari pucchiyamānassa pañhassa pageva tena abhisaṅkhatabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0105t:1205_6: Sā hi kusalakammanibbatte attabhāve uppajjanakasukhavedanāpaṭipakkhabhāvato “visabhāgavedanā”ti ca kāyaṃ
tika-s0105t:1205_7: gāḷhā hutvā bādhanato pīḷanato “ābādho”ti ca vuccati.
tika-s0105t:1205_9: Ekadese uppajjitvāti sarīrekadese uṭṭhahitvāpi aparivattibhāvakaraṇato ayapaṭṭena ābandhitvā viya gaṇhāti,
tika-s0105t:1205_12: iminā dubbalo appamattako rogo ātaṅko nāmāti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:1205_14: tena yathā tathā aparāparaṃ sarīrassa parivattanaṃ vadati.
tika-s0105t:1205_16: Gilānasseva kāye balaṃ na hotīti sambandho.
tika-s0105t:1205_18: Heṭṭhā catūhi padehi aphāsuvihārābhāvaṃ pucchitvāpi idāni puna phāsuvihārabhāvaṃ pucchati,
tika-s0105t:1205_19: tena saviseso ettha phāsuvihāro pucchitoti viññāyati.
tika-s0105t:1205_20: Asatipi hi atisayatthajotane sadde atthāpattito atisayattho labbhateva yathā “abhirūpassa kaññā dātabbā”ti.
tika-s0105t:1205_23: idaṃ pana pucchitabbākāradassananti ayamimesaṃ visesoti dasseti “athassā”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:1206_3: atthato panesa tajjaṃ sarīrabalañceva tappaccayaparissayābhāvo ca.
tika-s0105t:1206_4: Upādānaṃ nāma ñāṇena tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ sallakkhaṇanti āha “paññāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:1207_2: kārena hi padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1207_4: “Yasmā maraṇaṃ nāma tādisānaṃ dasabalānaṃ rogavaseneva hoti,
tika-s0105t:1207_10: tathā maraṇassa ca appaṭikaraṇatā”ti evamādinā maraṇapaṭisaññuttaṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathesīti dassetuṃ “bho ānandā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1207_18: tena ko dāni añño maraṇā muccissatītiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1207_19: Idānīti ca attano manasikāraṃ pati vohāramattena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1208_3: api tu khalu upaṭṭhāko hutvā santikāvacaroti hi viseseti.
tika-s0105t:1209_1: Atthato payuttatāya saddapayogassa saddapabandhalakkhaṇāni tīṇi piṭakāni tadatthabhūtehi sīlādīhi tīhi
tika-s0105t:1209_2: dhammakkhandhehi saṅgayhantīti vuttaṃ “tīṇi piṭakāni tīhi khandhehi saṅgahetvā”ti.
tika-s0105t:1209_3: Saṅkhittena kathitanti “tiṇṇaṃ kho māṇava khandhāna”nti evaṃ gaṇanato,
tika-s0105t:1209_9: Aññattha pana īdisesu ṭhānesu kathetukamyatāpucchāyeva dissati,
tika-s0105t:1209_13: Tadā pavattamānañhi paccakkhaṃ katvā aṭṭhakathampi saṅgahamāropiṃsu.
tika-s0105t:1211_8: tesu tīsu khandhesu uddesavasena dassitesūti attho.
tika-s0105t:1211_10: tena imassa suttassa buddhabhāsitabhāvaṃ dassetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1211_11: Sāsane na sīlameva sāroti ariyamaggasāre bhagavato sāsane yathādassitaṃ sīlaṃ sāro eva na hoti sāravato mahato rukkhassa papaṭikaṭṭhānikattā.
tika-s0105t:1211_12: Aṭṭhānapayutto hi evasaddo yathāṭhāne na yojetabbo.
tika-s0105t:1211_14: Jhānādiuttarimanussadhamme adhigantukāmassa adhiṭṭhānamattaṃ tattha appatiṭṭhitassa tesamasambhavato.
tika-s0105t:1211_15: Vuttañhi “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño”tiādi atha vā sāsane na sīlameva sāroti kāmañcettha sāsane maggaphalasīlasaṅkhātaṃ lokuttarasīlampi sārameva,
tika-s0105t:1211_16: tathāpi na sīlakkhandho eva sāro hoti,
tika-s0105t:1211_17: atha kho samādhikkhandhopi paññākkhandhopi sāro evāti evampettha yathāpayuttena evasaddena attho veditabbo,
tika-s0105t:1213_1: Kasmā panettha thero samādhikkhandhaṃ puṭṭhopi indriyasaṃvarādike vissajjesi,
tika-s0105t:1213_2: nanu evaṃ sante aññaṃ puṭṭho aññaṃ byākaronto ambaṃ puṭṭho labujaṃ byākaronto viya hotīti īdisī codanā idha anokāsāti dassento “kathañca…pe…
tika-s0105t:1213_4: tenettha indriyasaṃvarādayopi samādhiupakārakataṃ upādāya samādhikkhandhapakkhikabhāvena uddiṭṭhāti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:1213_6: Rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānadesanānantaraṃ abhiññādesanāya avasaroti katvā rūpajjhānāneva āgatāni,
tika-s0105t:1213_9: Yasmā pana lokiyābhiññāyo ijjhamānā aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu cuddasavidhena cittaparidamanena vinā na ijjhanti,
tika-s0105t:1213_10: tasmā abhiññāsu desiyamānāsu arūpajjhānānipi desitāneva honti nānantarikabhāvato.
tika-s0105t:1213_12: vuttanayena desitāneva katvā saṃvaṇṇakehi pakāsetabbānīti attho.
tika-s0105t:1213_13: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “catutthajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti imināva arūpajjhānampi saṅgahitanti dassetuṃ “catutthajjhānena hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1214_1: Na cittekaggatāmattakenevāti ettha heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena ṭhānāṭhānapayuttassa evasaddassānurūpamattho veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:1214_4: Ariyo samādhikkhandhoti ettha hi ariyasaddo suddhamattapariyāyova,
tika-s0105t:1214_9: so ca ukkaṭṭhato arahattaphalapariyāpanno evāti āha “arahattapariyosāna”ntiādi.
tika-s0105t:1214_10: Lokiyābhiññāpaṭisambhidāhi vināpi hi arahatte adhigate “nattheva uttarikaraṇīya”nti sakkā vattuṃ yadatthaṃ bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati,
tika-s0105t:1219_1: Evaṃ subhasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni kevaṭṭasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ saṃvaṇṇanokāsassa pattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ,
tika-s0105t:1219_2: subhasuttassānantaraṃ saṅgītassa suttassa kevaṭṭasuttabhāvaṃ vā pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe…
tika-s0105t:1219_6: Taṃ kira so seṭṭhi bhagavato anucchavikaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ,
tika-s0105t:1219_7: bhikkhusaṅghassa ca rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānakuṭimaṇḍapādīni sampādetvā pākāraparikkhittaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakasampannaṃ
tika-s0105t:1219_13: Gahapatiputtassāti ettha kāmañcesa tadā gahapatiṭṭhāne ṭhito,
tika-s0105t:1219_18: kāraṃ katvā “mahāsālo”ti vuttaṃ yathā “palibuddho”ti saddho pasannoti pothujjanikasaddhāvasena ratanattayasaddhāya samannāgato,
tika-s0105t:1220_2: ākiṇṇā bahū manussā etthāti atthaṃ sandhāya “aṃsakūṭenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1220_4: anusaṃvaccharaṃ vā manussānaṃ pasādāya iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ karohī”ti ekassa bhikkhuno āṇāpanameva samādisanaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1220_5: taṃ pana tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapanaṃ nāmāti āha “ṭhānantare ṭhapetū”ti.
tika-s0105t:1220_6: Uttarimanussānanti pakatimanussehi uttaritarānaṃ uttamapurisānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ jhāyīnaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1220_12: Evaṃ uttarisaddaṃ manussasaddena ekapadaṃ katvā idāni pāṭihāriyasaddena sambajjhitabbaṃ visumeva padaṃ karonto “dasakusalasaṅkhātato vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0105t:1220_17: Sikkhāpadaṃ paññāpesīti “na bhikkhave gihīnaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ dassetabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1220_19: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti vikubbaniddhipaṭikkhepakaṃ idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapesi.
tika-s0105t:1221_1: Guṇasampattito acāvanaṃ sandhāya etaṃ vuttanti dasseti “na guṇavināsanenā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:1221_3: Visahanto nāma natthīti nivāritaṭṭhāne ussahanto nāma natthi.
tika-s0105t:1221_4: Evampi iminā kāraṇantarenāyaṃ ussahantoti dassetuṃ “ayaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1223_8: Tattha cūḷagandhārī nāma tivassato oraṃ matasattānaṃ upapannaṭṭhānajānanā vijjā.
tika-s0105t:1223_13: Tassā kira vijjāya sādhako puggalo tādise dese,
tika-s0105t:1223_14: kāle ca mantaṃ parijappetvā bahudhāpi attānaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0105t:1225_1: Kāmaṃ “cetasika”nti idaṃ ye cetasi niyuttā cittena sampayuttā,
tika-s0105t:1225_3: sādhāraṇe pana gahite cittaviseso dassito nāma hoti.
tika-s0105t:1225_5: tasmā cetasikapadassa yathādhippetamatthaṃ dassento “somanassadomanassaṃ adhippeta”nti āha.
tika-s0105t:1225_10: saddassa vattabbasampiṇḍanattho suviññeyyoti āha “evaṃ tava mano”ti,
tika-s0105t:1225_11: iminā pakārena tava mano pavattoti attho.
tika-s0105t:1225_14: na pana yena somanassito vā domanassito vā,
tika-s0105t:1225_15: taṃ dassananti taṃ cittaṃ dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ “itipi te citta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1225_16: Itisaddo cettha nidassanattho “atthīti kho kaccāna ayameko anto”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0105t:1225_19: Parassa cintaṃ manati jānāti etāyāti cintāmaṇi na-
tika-s0105t:1225_23: Cintā nāma na cittena vinā bhavatīti āha “paresaṃ cittaṃ jānātī”ti.
tika-s0105t:1225_24: “Tassā kira vijjāya sādhako puggalo tādise dese,
tika-s0105t:1225_25: kāle ca mantaṃ parijappitvā yassa cittaṃ jānitukāmo,
tika-s0105t:1225_26: tassa diṭṭhasutādivisesasañjānanamukhena cittācāraṃ anuminanto kathetī”ti keci.
tika-s0105t:1227_16: Pañcakāmaguṇikarāganti nidassanamattaṃ tadaññarāgassa ceva dosādīnañca pahānassa icchitattā,
tika-s0105t:1227_17: tappahānassa ca tadaññarāgādikhepanassa upāyabhāvato duṭṭhalohitavimocanassa pubbaduṭṭhamaṃsakhepanūpāyatā viya.
tika-s0105t:1227_18: Lokuttaradhammamevāti avadhāraṇaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato sāvajjadhammanivattanaparaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ tassādhigamūpāyānisaṃsabhūtānaṃ
tika-s0105t:1227_20: Iddhividhaṃ iddhipāṭihāriyanti dasseti iddhiyeva pāṭihāriyanti katvā.
tika-s0105t:1228_2: bhagavato pana paṭipakkhā rāgādayo na santi ye haritabbā.
tika-s0105t:1228_3: Puthujjanānampi vigatupakkilese aṭṭhaṅgaguṇasamannāgate citte hatapaṭipakkhe iddhividhaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0105t:1228_4: tasmā tattha pavattavohārena ca na sakkā idha “pāṭihāriya”nti vattuṃ.
tika-s0105t:1228_5: Sace pana mahākāruṇikassa bhagavato veneyyagatā ca kilesā paṭipakkhā,
tika-s0105t:1228_8: Atha vā bhagavato ceva sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhā titthiyā,
tika-s0105t:1228_11: diṭṭhippakāsane asamatthabhāvena ca iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi haritā apanītā hontīti.
tika-s0105t:1228_12: “Paṭī”ti vā ayaṃ saddo “pacchā”ti etassa atthaṃ bodheti “tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi,
tika-s0105t:1228_14: tasmā samāhite citte vigatupakkilese ca katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti paṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1228_15: attano vā upakkilesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchā haraṇaṃ paṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1228_16: iddhiādesanānusāsaniyo ca vigatupakkilesena katakiccena ca sattahitatthaṃ puna pavattetabbā,
tika-s0105t:1228_17: haritesu ca attano upakkilesesu parasattānaṃ upakkilesaharaṇāni hontīti paṭihāriyāni nāma bhavanti,
tika-s0105t:1228_19: Paṭihāriye vā iddhiādesanānusāsanisamudāye bhavaṃ ekekaṃ “pāṭihāriya”nti vuccati.
tika-s0105t:1228_25: iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi vā parasantāne pasādādīnaṃ paṭipakkhassa kilesassa haraṇato vuttanayena pāṭihāriyaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1229_5: Gayāsīseti gayāgāmassa avidūre gayāsīsanāmako hatthikumbhasadiso piṭṭhipāsāṇo atthi,
tika-s0105t:1229_12: “Nāgo”ti hi arahato adhivacanaṃ natthi āgu pāpametassāti katvā.
tika-s0105t:1234_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ panettha “dhammasenāpatissa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pañcasatā bhikkhū sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
tika-s0105t:1234_2: Saṅghabhedakakkhandhakapāḷiyaṃ pana “atha kho tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ āyasmatā sāriputtena ādesanāpāṭihāriyānusāsaniyā,
tika-s0105t:1234_3: āyasmatā ca mahāmoggallānena iddhipāṭihāriyānusāsaniyā ovadiyamānānaṃ anusāsiyamānānaṃ virajaṃ vītamalaṃ
tika-s0105t:1234_5: sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma’nti” ubhinnampi therānaṃ dhammadesanāya tesaṃ dhammacakkhupaṭilābhova dassito,
tika-s0105t:1234_10: apica pāḷiyaṃ uparimaggaphalampi saṅgahetvā “dhammacakkhuṃ udapādī”ti vuttaṃ yathā taṃ brahmāyusutte,
tika-s0105t:1235_0: “Anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ pana buddhānaṃ satataṃ dhammadesanā”ti sātisayatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1235_3: Sadosattā eva addhānaṃ na tiṭṭhanti cirakālaṭṭhāyīni na honti.
tika-s0105t:1235_4: Addhānaṃ atiṭṭhanato na niyyantīti phalena hetuno anumānaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1235_12: Addhānaṃ tiṭṭhanato niyyātīti idhāpi phalena hetuno anumānaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1235_16: anupārambhādiñcāti ubhayaṃ yathākkamaṃ ubhayattha gārayhapāsaṃsabhāvānaṃ hetubhāvena paccāmasati.
tika-s0105t:1237_1: Aniyyānikabhāvadassanatthanti yasmā mahābhūtapariyesako bhikkhu purimesu dvīsu pāṭihāriyesu vasippatto
tika-s0105t:1237_2: sukusalopi samāno mahābhūtānaṃ aparisesanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ nāvabujjhi,
tika-s0105t:1237_3: tasmā tadubhayāni niyyānāvahattābhāvato aniyyānikānīti tesaṃ aniyyānikabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1237_4: Niyyānikabhāvadassanatthanti anusāsanīpāṭihāriyaṃ takkarassa ekantato niyyānāvahanti tasseva niyyānikabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1238_0: Evaṃ etissā desanāya mukhyapayojanaṃ dassetvā idāni anusaṅgikapayojanaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1238_1: Niyyānameva hi etissā desanāya mukhyapayojanaṃ tassa tadatthabhāvato.
tika-s0105t:1238_2: Buddhānaṃ pana mahantabhāvo anusaṅgikapayojanaṃ atthāpattiyāva gantabbato.
tika-s0105t:1238_8: yadidaṃ tassa bhikkhuno tathā vicaraṇaṃ yathā abhijātiyaṃ mahāpathavikampādi.
tika-s0105t:1238_14: Mahantabhāvappakāsanatthanti sadevake loke anaññasādhāraṇassa buddhānaṃ mahantabhāvassa mahānubhāvatāya dīpanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1238_15: Idañca kāraṇanti “sabbesampi buddhānaṃ sāsane ediso eko bhikkhu tadānubhāvappakāsako hotī”ti imampi kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1239_1: kasmiṃ ṭhāne kāraṇabhūteti atthaṃ dassetuṃ “kiṃ āgammā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1239_2: kiṃ ārammaṇaṃ paccayabhūtaṃ adhigantvā adhigamanahetūti attho.
tika-s0105t:1240_1: Dibbanti ettha pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samaṅgībhūtā hutvā vicaranti, kīḷanti,
tika-s0105t:1240_3: Te yanti upagacchanti etenāti devayāniyo yathā “niyyānikā”ti ettha anīyasaddo katvatthe,
tika-s0105t:1240_6: Vasaṃ vattentoti ettha vasavattanaṃ nāma yathicchitaṭṭhānagamanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1240_9: Kasmā panesa samīpe ṭhitaṃ sadevakalokapajjotaṃ bhagavantaṃ apucchitvā dūre deve upasaṅkamīti codanamapaneti “samīpe ṭhita”ntiādinā.
tika-s0105t:1240_12: buddhavisayo panāyaṃ pañho pucchito”ti cintetvā “na jānāmā”ti āhaṃsu.
tika-s0105t:1240_15: ajjhottharaṇaṃ nāmettha pucchāya nibbādhananti vuttaṃ “punappunaṃ pucchatī”ti.
tika-s0105t:1240_19: rūpasampattiyā ceva paññāpaṭibhānādiguṇehi ca amhe abhibhuyya paresaṃ kāmanīyatarāti attho.
tika-s0105t:1241_1: Sahassakkho pana sakko abhisametāvī āgataphalo viññātasāsano,
tika-s0105t:1241_2: so kasmā taṃ bhikkhuṃ upāyena niyyojesīti anuyogamapaneti “ayaṃ pana viseso”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:1242_2: Atthi cevāti ediso mahābhūtapariyesako puggalo nāma vijjamāno eva bhaveyya,
tika-s0105t:1242_7: abhiññāñāṇanti vā sabbametaṃ iddhividhañāṇasseva nāma”nti idaṃ pāḷiyaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1242_8: aṭṭhakathāsu ca tattha tattha āgataruḷhināmavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1243_1: Āgamanapubbabhāge nimittanti brahmuno āgamanassa pubbabhāge uppajjanakanimittaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1246_9: Pucchāya dosaṃ dassetvāti tena katapucchāya pucchitākāre dosaṃ vibhāvetvā.
tika-s0105t:1246_13: na ca tathāgatā virajjhitvā katapucchānurūpaṃ virajjhitvāva vissajjenti,
tika-s0105t:1246_14: atthasabhāgatāya ca vissajjanassa pucchakā tadatthaṃ anavabujjhantā sammuyhanti,
tika-s0105t:1246_15: tasmā pucchaṃ sikkhāpetvā avitathapucchāya vissajjanaṃ buddhānamāciṇṇanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1247_1: Na patiṭṭhātīti paccayaṃ katvā na patiṭṭhahati.
tika-s0105t:1247_6: Yasmā ekadisābhimukhaṃ santānavasena bahudhā saṇṭhite rūpappabandhe dīghasaññā,
tika-s0105t:1247_12: idampi dvayaṃ visesato rūpaggahaṇamukhena gayhatīti āha “imināpī”tiādi. “Pi-
tika-s0105t:1247_13: saddena cettha ‘saṇṭhānavasena upādārūpaṃ vutta”nti etthāpi vaṇṇamattameva kathitanti imamatthaṃ samuccinātī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0105t:1247_20: Dīghaṃ rassaṃ aṇuṃ thūlaṃ subhāsubhanti tīsupi ṭhānesu rūpāyatanamukhena upādārūpasseva gahaṇaṃ bhūtarūpānaṃ visuṃ gahitattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1247_22: tejo vāyo na gādhatī”ti hi bhūtarūpāni visuṃ gayhanti.
tika-s0105t:1247_26: Heṭṭhā “dīghaṃ rassa”ntiādinā vuttameva idha ruppanaṭṭhena rūpasaññāya gahitanti dasseti “dīghādibheda”nti iminā.
tika-s0105t:1247_31: tasmā dīgharassādiggahaṇena bhūtarūpampi gayhatevāti imamatthaṃ viññāpetuṃ “dīghādibhedaṃ rūpa” micceva vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1247_32: Kiṃ āgammāti kiṃ adhigantvā kissa adhigamanahetu.
tika-s0105t:1248_1: Tatra veyyākaraṇaṃ bhavatīti anusandhivacanamattaṃ cuṇṇiyapāṭhaṃ vatvā veyyākaraṇavacanabhūtaṃ viññāṇantiādiṃ silokamāhāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:1248_11: Na hi nibbānassa niccassa ekabhūtassa accantapaṇītasabhāvassa sadisaṃ nidassanaṃ kutoci labbhatīti.
tika-s0105t:1248_15: asaṅkhatassa pana nibbānassa niccassa te ubhopi antā na santi,
tika-s0105t:1248_16: tato eva navabhāvāpagamasaṅkhātā jaratāpi tassa natthīti vuttaṃ “uppādanto vā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:1248_24: Tathā hi ācariyena vuttaṃ “papanti etthāti papanti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1248_34: kenaci anupakkiliṭṭhatāya samantato pabhassaraṃ visuddhanti attho.
tika-s0105t:1248_35: Ettha nibbāneti nimitte bhummaṃ dasseti “idaṃ nibbānaṃ āgammā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:1248_37: taṃ santatipariyāpannānaṃyeva idha anuppādanirodho adhippetoti vuttaṃ “upādinnakadhammajātaṃ nirujjhati,
tika-s0105t:1249_0: Tatthāti yadetaṃ “viññāṇassa nirodhenā”ti padaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmiṃ.
tika-s0105t:1249_4: Etthetaṃ uparujjhatīti etasmiṃ nibbāne etaṃ nāmarūpaṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā nirujjhati.
tika-s0105t:1254_1: Evaṃ kevaṭṭasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni lohiccasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ saṃvaṇṇanokāsassa pattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ,
tika-s0105t:1254_2: kevaṭṭasuttassānantaraṃ saṅgītassa suttassa lohiccasuttabhāvaṃ vā pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe…
tika-s0105t:1254_4: Sālavatikāti kāraṇamantarena itthiliṅgavasena tassa gāmassa nāmaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1254_8: tabbaṃsavasena lohitassa apaccaṃ lohiccoti brāhmaṇassa gottato āgatanāmaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1255_1: “Kiñhi paro parassa karissatī”ti parānukampā virahitattā lāmakaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1255_2: Na tu ucchedasassatānaṃ aññatarassāti āha “na panā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:1255_4: aññathā ucchedasassataggāhavinimutto koci diṭṭhiggāho nāma natthīti tesamaññataraṃ siyā.
tika-s0105t:1255_8: bhāsatiyevāti ca tassā laddhiyā loke pākaṭabhāvaṃ vadati.
tika-s0105t:1255_9: Yasmā pana attato añño paro hoti,
tika-s0105t:1255_11: evaṃ anusāsitabbatopi anusāsakoti dassetuṃ “paro”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kiṃ-
tika-s0105t:1255_13: anāgatepi vā tena tassa kātabbaṃ natthīti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1255_16: “Paresaṃ dhammaṃ kathessāmī”ti tehi attānaṃ parivārāpetvā vicaraṇaṃ kimatthiyaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1255_17: āsayavuddhassapi anurodhena vinā taṃ na hoti,
tika-s0105t:1257_4: Appeva nāma siyāti ettha pītivasena āmeḍitaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1257_6: Bhagavā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu visesato pītisomanassajāto hoti,
tika-s0105t:1260_1: Dutiyaṃ upapattinti “nanu rājā pasenadikosalo”tiādinā vuttaṃ dutiyaṃ upapattiṃ ṭhānaṃ yuttiṃ.
tika-s0105t:1260_3: imāya ca upapattiyā tumhe ceva aññe cāti lohiccampi antokatvā saṃvejanaṃ kataṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:1260_4: Ye ca ime kulaputtā dibbā gabbhā paripācentīti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:1260_7: Kammapadena atulyādhikaraṇattā paripācenti kiriyāya vibhattivipallāsena upayogatthe paccattavacanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1260_9: tesaṃ mate vibhattivipallāsena payojanaṃ natthi kammakattubhāvato,
tika-s0105t:1260_10: attho panassa dutiyavikappe vuttanayena dānādipuññaviseso veditabbo.
tika-s0105t:1260_13: Gabbhenti paripaccanavasena attani pabandhentīti gabbhā, devalokā.
tika-s0105t:1260_16: Evañca katvā “bhāvanaṃ bhāvayamānā”ti idampi vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:1260_17: “Devalokagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ pūrayamānā”ti vatvā taṃ paṭipadaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “dānaṃ dadamānā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1260_18: Bhavanti ettha yathāruci sukhasamappitāti bhavā, vimānāni.
tika-s0105t:1260_22: Dibbā bhavāti idha devalokapariyāpannā upapattibhavā adhippetā.
tika-s0105t:1260_23: Tadāvaho hi kammabhavo pubbe gahitoti āha “devaloke vipākakkhandhā”ti.
tika-s0105t:1262_3: evaṃ sattānaṃ anatthassa kārako”ti evaṃ anuddesikeneva.
tika-s0105t:1262_4: Sabbalokapatthaṭāya laddhiyā samuppajjanato yāva bhavaggā uggataṃ.
tika-s0105t:1262_9: Tayo satthāreti asampāditaattahito anovādakarasāvako ca asampāditaattahito ovādakarasāvako ca sampāditaattahito
tika-s0105t:1262_12: tasmā “taṃ tena pucchito eva kathessāmī”ti codanāraheva tayo satthāre paṭhamaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0105t:1262_14: Kāmañcettha catuttho satthā eko adutiyo anaññasādhāraṇo,
tika-s0105t:1262_15: tathāpi so yesaṃ uttarimanussadhammānaṃ vasena “dhammamayo kāyo”ti vuccati,
tika-s0105t:1262_16: tesaṃ samudāyabhūtopi te guṇāvayave satthuṭṭhāniye katvā dassento bhagavā “ayampi kho lohicca satthā”ti abhāsi.
tika-s0105t:1263_3: Sāvakattaṃ paṭijānitvā ṭhitattā ekadesenassa sāsanaṃ karontīti āha “nirantaraṃ tassa sāsanaṃ akatvā”ti.
tika-s0105t:1263_11: Eko iccheyyāti adutiyo puriso sampayogaṃ iccheyyāti ānetvā sambandho.
tika-s0105t:1263_12: Osakkanādimukhena itthipurisasambandhanidassanaṃ gehassitāgehassitaapekkhavasena tassa satthuno sāvakesu paṭipattidassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1263_13: Ativirattabhāvato daṭṭhumpi anicchamānaṃ parammukhiṃ ṭhitaṃ itthiṃ.
tika-s0105t:1263_17: Tattha sampādehīti tasmiṃ paṭipattidhamme patiṭṭhitaṃ katvā sampādehi.
tika-s0105t:1265_1: Evaṃ codanaṃ arahatīti vuttanayena sāvakesu appossukkabhāvāpādane niyojanavasena codanaṃ arahati,
tika-s0105t:1265_3: na ca dutiyo viya “attānameva tāva tattha sampādehī”tiādinā. Kasmā?
tika-s0105t:1267_1: Na codanārahoti ettha yasmā codanārahatā nāma satthuvippaṭipattiyā vā sāvakavippaṭipattiyā vā ubhayavippaṭipattiyā vā hoti,
tika-s0105t:1267_3: tasmā na codanārahoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “ayañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1268_1: Mayā gahitāya diṭṭhiyāti sabbaso anavajje anupavajje sammāpaṭipanne,
tika-s0105t:1268_2: paresañca sammadeva sammāpaṭipattiṃ dassente satthari abhūtadosāropanavasena micchāgahitāya nirayagāminiyā pāpadiṭṭhiyā.
tika-s0105t:1272_1: Evaṃ lohiccasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā idāni tevijjasuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇento yathānupubbaṃ saṃvaṇṇanokāsassa pattabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ,
tika-s0105t:1272_2: lohiccasuttassānantaraṃ saṅgītassa suttassa tevijjasuttabhāvaṃ vā pakāsetuṃ “evaṃ me sutaṃ…pe…
tika-s0105t:1272_8: pañcamiyatthe ca sāmivacanaṃ dassetuṃ “manasākaṭato avidūre uttarapasse”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1272_9: “Disāvācīsaddato pañcamīvacanassa adūratthajotanato adūratthaṃ dassetuṃ enasaddena evaṃ vutta”nti keci,
tika-s0105t:1272_10: sattamiyatthe cetaṃ tatiyāvacanaṃ “pubbena gāmaṃ ramaṇīya”ntiādīsu viya.
tika-s0105t:1272_14: tasmā idha sāmivacanavaseneva vutta”nti ayaṃ ācariyamati.
tika-s0105t:1273_2: Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ dese, kule vā.
tika-s0105t:1275_7: Tena vuttanti ubhosupi anucaṅkamanānuvicaraṇānaṃ labbhanato evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1275_9: Icchitaṭṭhānaṃ ujukaṃ maggati upagacchati etenāti hi maggo,
tika-s0105t:1275_12: Tathā hi “katamaṃ nu kho”tiādinā maggameva dasseti.
tika-s0105t:1276_0: Añjasāyanoti ujumaggassa vevacanaṃ pariyāyadvayassa atirekatthadīpanato yathā “padaṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0105t:1276_10: tasmā niyyāyantapuggalassa yoniso paṭipajjanavasena niyyāyanto maggo “niyyātī”ti vutto.
tika-s0105t:1276_12: Tathā uppādentoyeva hi taṃ paṭipajjati nāma.
tika-s0105t:1276_22: Bhāradvājopi sakameva attano ācariyena tārukkhena kathitameva ācariyavādaṃ thometvā paggaṇhitvā vicaratīti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:1276_23: Tena vuttanti yathā tathā vā abhiniviṭṭhabhāvena pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1277_2: aññamaññassa vāde dosaṃ dassetvā aviparītatthadassanatthaṃ uttararahitā evāti attho.
tika-s0105t:1277_5: sveva vivadanavasena aparāparaṃ uppanno vivādoti āha “pubbuppattiko”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:1278_6: Tena vuttaṃ “esa kirā”tiādi evaṃ satīti yadi sabbattha maggasaññino,
tika-s0105t:1278_7: evaṃ sati “kismiṃ vo viggaho”ti bhagavā pucchati.
tika-s0105t:1279_1: “Icchitaṭṭhānaṃ ujukaṃ maggati upagacchati etenāti maggo, ujumaggo.
tika-s0105t:1279_3: saddo vā vuddhiattho daṭṭhabbo”ti heṭṭhā vuttovāyamattho.
tika-s0105t:1279_6: Tameva vatthunti sabbesampi brāhmaṇānaṃ maggassa maggabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1279_8: Sabbe teti sabbe te nānāācariyehi vuttamaggā,
tika-s0105t:1279_15: Tittirinā nāma isinā katā mantāti tittirā,
tika-s0105t:1279_25: Bahavo iriyo thomanā etthāti bavhāri, iruvedo,
tika-s0105t:1280_1: yathā te nānāmaggā ekaṃsato tassa gāmassa vā nigamassa vā pavesāya honti,
tika-s0105t:1280_2: evaṃ brāhmaṇehi paññāpiyamānāpi nānāmaggā ekaṃsato brahmalokūpagamanāya brahmunā sahabyatāya hontīti.
tika-s0105t:1281_1: Paṭijānitvā pacchā niggayhamānā avajānantīti pubbe niddosataṃ sallakkhamānā paṭijānitvā pacchā sadosabhāvena
tika-s0105t:1282_2: Evasaddena ñāpito attho idha natthīti va-
tika-s0105t:1282_7: “Paṇṇāsasaṭṭhi andhā”ti idaṃ tassā andhapaveṇiyā mahato gacchagumbassa anuparigamanayogyatādassanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1282_8: Evañhi te “suciraṃ velaṃ mayaṃ maggaṃ gacchāmā”ti saññino honti.
tika-s0105t:1282_11: Anuparigantvāti kañci kālaṃ anukkamena samantato gantvā.
tika-s0105t:1282_15: “Sambādho nāma ubho upakacchakā muttakaraṇa”ntiādīsu viya hi kāyekadesavācako kacchasaddo.
tika-s0105t:1282_19: taṃ pana bhāsitaṃ tehi sārasaññitampi nāmamattatāya asārabhāvato nihīnamevāti atthamattaṃ dasseti “lāmakaṃyevā”ti iminā.
tika-s0105t:1283_3: Sāmaññajotanāya visese avatiṭṭhanato visesaparāmasanaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmiṃ kāle”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1283_9: Ayaṃ kira brāhmaṇānaṃ laddhi “pubbebrāhmaṇānamāyācanāya candimasūriyā’gantvā loke obhāsaṃ karontī”ti.
tika-s0105t:1284_1: Idha pana kiṃ vattabbanti imasmiṃ pana appaccakkhabhūtassa brahmuno sahabyatāya maggadesane tevijjānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ kiṃ vattabbaṃ atthi,
tika-s0105t:1284_2: ye paccakkhabhūtānampi candimasūriyānaṃ sahabyatāya maggaṃ desetuṃ na sakkontīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:1287_6: “Aciravatiyā tīre nisinno”ti iminā yassā tīre nisinno,
tika-s0105t:1287_7: tadeva upamaṃ katvā āharati dhammarājā dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattāti dasseti.
tika-s0105t:1288_4: tesaṃ panettha asambhavato pārisesañāyena bandhanaṭṭhoyeva yuttoti dassetuṃ ayamatthuddhāro āraddho.
tika-s0105t:1291_1: Na hi rūpādīnaṃ kāmetabbabhāve vuccamāne paṭalaṭṭho yujjati tathā kāmetabbatāya anadhippetattā.
tika-s0105t:1292_0: Koṭṭhāsaṭṭhopi cettha yujjateva cakkhuviññeyyādikoṭṭhāsabhāvena nesaṃ kāmetabbato.
tika-s0105t:1292_1: Koṭṭhāse ca guṇasaddo dissati “diguṇaṃ vaḍḍhetabba”ntiādīsu viya.
tika-s0105t:1295_0: Ādīsu pana sampadāṭṭho guṇasaddo, sopi idha na yujjatīti anuddhaṭo.
tika-s0105t:1296_3: te idha nādhippetāti dassetuṃ “pariyiṭṭhā vā hontu mā vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1296_11: Kammabhūte ārammaṇe sati rāgo uppajjatīti taṃ kāraṇabhāvena nidassento “rāguppattikāraṇabhūtā”ti āha.
tika-s0105t:1297_1: Abhibhūtā hutvā pañca kāmaguṇe paribhuñjantīti yojanā.
tika-s0105t:1298_6: Te hi āsevanabalavatāya purimapurimehi pacchimapacchimā daḷhataratamādibhāvappattā.
tika-s0105t:1300_1: Itthipariggahe sati purisassa pañcakāmaguṇapariggaho paripuṇṇo eva hotīti vuttaṃ “itthipariggahena sapariggaho”ti.
tika-s0105t:1300_2: “Itthipariggahena apariggaho”ti ca idaṃ tevijjabrāhmaṇesu dissamānapariggahānaṃ duṭṭhullatamapariggahābhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1300_3: Evaṃ bhūtānaṃ tevijjānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ kā brahmunā saṃsandanā,
tika-s0105t:1300_10: Uddhaccakukkuccādīhīti ettha ādisaddena tadekaṭṭhā saṃkilesadhammā saṅgayhanti.
tika-s0105t:1300_12: Appaṭipattihetubhūtāya vicikicchāya sati na kadāci cittaṃ purisassa vase vattati,
tika-s0105t:1300_13: pahīnāya pana tāya siyā cittassa purisavase vattananti āha “vicikicchāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:1300_16: Na tādisoti brāhmaṇā viya na cittavasiko hoti,
tika-s0105t:1300_17: atha kho vasībhūtajhānābhiññatāya cittaṃ attano vase vattetīti vasavattī.
tika-s0105t:1301_6: Samatalanti saññāyāti matthake ekaṅgulaṃ vā upaḍḍhaṅgulaṃ vā sukkhatāya samatalanti saññāya.
tika-s0105t:1301_7: Paṅkaṃ otiṇṇā viyāti anekaporisaṃ mahāpaṅkaṃ otiṇṇā viya.
tika-s0105t:1301_16: Sukkhataraṇaṃ maññe tarantīti sukkhanadītaraṇaṃ taranti maññe.
tika-s0105t:1301_18: Tasmāti yasmā tevijjā amaggameva “maggo”ti upagantvā saṃsīdanti, tasmā.
tika-s0105t:1301_19: Yathā teti te “samatala”nti saññāya paṅkaṃ otiṇṇā sattā hatthapādādīnaṃ saṃbhañjanaṃ paribhañjanaṃ pāpuṇanti yathā.
tika-s0105t:1301_21: Sukhaṃ vā sātaṃ vā na labhantīti jhānasukhaṃ vā vipassanāsātaṃ vā na labhanti,
tika-s0105t:1301_22: kuto maggasukhaṃ vā nibbānasātaṃ vāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:1301_27: Iriṇanti araññāniyā idaṃ adhivacananti āha “agāmakaṃ mahārañña”nti.
tika-s0105t:1302_1: Nanu jātasaddeneva ayamattho siddhoti codanamapaneti “yo hī”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:1302_2: Jāto hutvā saṃvaḍḍhito jātasaṃvaḍḍhoti ācariyena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1302_3: jāto ca so saṃvaḍḍho cāti jātasaṃvaḍḍhoti pana yujjati visesanaparanipātattā.
tika-s0105t:1302_7: “Jātasaṃvaḍḍho”ti padadvayena atthassa paripuṇṇābhāvato “tamena”nti kammapadaṃ “tāvadeva avasaṭa”nti puna visesetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0105t:1302_9: taṃ pana saṃsayavasena cirāyanaṃ nāma hotīti āha “kaṅkhāvasena cirāyitatta”nti.
tika-s0105t:1302_11: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vitthāyitattaṃ nāma thambhitattanti adhippāyena “thaddhabhāvaggahaṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1302_13: Nanvetampi antarāyapaṭihataṃ siyāti āsaṅkaṃ pariharati “tassa hī”tiādinā.
tika-s0105t:1302_15: Na sakkā tassa kenaci antarāyo kātuṃ catūsu anantarāyikadhammesu pariyāpannabhāvato.
tika-s0105t:1303_3: Upasaggavisesena hi dhātusaddā atthavisesavuttino honti yathā “ādāna”nti.
tika-s0105t:1305_8: Appanāva vaṭṭati paṭipakkhato sammadeva cetaso vimuttibhāvato,
tika-s0105t:1306_0: Pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma kāmāvacaraṃ vuccati pamāṇakarānaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ avikkhambhanato.
tika-s0105t:1306_1: Tathā hi taṃ brahmavihārapubbabhāgabhūtaṃ pamāṇaṃ atikkamitvā odissakānodissakadisāpharaṇavasena vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkā.
tika-s0105t:1306_2: Vuttavipariyāyato pana rūpārūpāvacaraṃ appamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0105t:1306_4: Tattha arūpāvacare odissakānodissakavasena pharaṇaṃ na labbhati,
tika-s0105t:1306_10: tasmā yaṃ subhāvitaṃ vasībhāvaṃ pāpitaṃ āruppaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1306_12: “Yaṃ vā sātisayaṃ brahmavihārabhāvanāya abhisaṅkhatena santānena nibbattitaṃ,
tika-s0105t:1306_14: taṃ iminā pariyāyena pharaṇapamāṇavasena appamāṇakata”nti apare.
tika-s0105t:1307_0: Rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakammeti rūpāvacarakamme ca arūpāvacarakamme ca sati.
tika-s0105t:1307_1: Na ohīyati na tiṭṭhatīti katūpacitampi kāmāvacarakammaṃ yathādhigate mahaggatajjhāne aparihīne taṃ abhibhavitvā
tika-s0105t:1307_2: paṭibāhitvā sayaṃ ohīyakaṃ hutvā paṭisandhiṃ dātuṃ samatthabhāve na tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0105t:1307_12: iminā “laggituṃ vā ṭhātuṃ vā”ti vacanameva vitthāretīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1307_14: Kammassa pariyādiyanaṃ nāma tassa vipākuppādanaṃ nisedhetvā attano vipākuppādanamevāti āha “tassā”tiādi.
tika-s0105t:1307_17: Brahmasahabyataṃ upaneti asati tādisānaṃ cetopaṇidhiviseseti adhippāyo.
tika-s0105t:1307_18: Tissabrahmādīnaṃ viya hi mahāpuññānaṃ cetopaṇidhivisesena mahaggatakammaṃ parittakammassa vipākaṃ na paṭibāhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0105t:1308_0: Atha mahaggatassa garukakammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā parittaṃ lahukakammaṃ kathamattano vipākassa okāsaṃ karotīti?
tika-s0105t:1308_1: Tīsupi kira vinayagaṇṭhipadesu evaṃ vuttaṃ “nikantibaleneva jhānaṃ parihāyati,
tika-s0105t:1308_3: Keci pana vadanti “anīvaraṇāvatthāya nikantiyā jhānassa parihāni vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbā”ti.
tika-s0105t:1308_5: asatipi mahaggatakammuno vipākapaṭibāhanasamatthe parittakamme “ijjhati bhikkhave sīlavato cetopaṇidhi
tika-s0105t:1308_6: visuddhattā sīlassā”ti vacanato kāmabhave cetopaṇidhi mahaggatakammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā parittakammuno
tika-s0105t:1308_8: Evaṃ mettādivihārīti vuttanayena appanāpattānaṃ mettādīnaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ vasena vihārī.
tika-s0105t:1309_11: Tattha āgatanayena upasampadañceva arahattañca alatthuṃ paṭilabhiṃsūti attho.
tika-s0105t:1310_3: mahādhammarājādhirājagarunā katāya sādhuvilāsiniyā nāma līnatthapakāsaniyā tevijjasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthapakāsanā.
tika-s0105t:1313_0: Byañjanañceva attho ca, vinicchayo ca sabbathā;
tika-s0105t:1314_0: Sādhakena vinā vutto, natthi cettha yato tato.
tika-s0105t:1351_0: Yaṃ nissāya visodhesi, sāsanaṃ esa bhūpati;
tika-s0105t:1354_0: Tisate dvisahasse ca, sampatte sā suniṭṭhitā.
tika-s0105t:1356_0: Imañca saṅkharontena, yaṃ puññaṃ pasutaṃ mayā.
tika-s0105t:1359_0: Sadā rakkhantu rājāno, dhammeneva pajaṃ imaṃ;
tika-s0105t:1361_0: Ime ca pāṇino sabbe, sabbadā nirupaddavā;
